我没有问题。Wǒ méiyǒu wèntí. I don't have any questions. src
我们现在没有钱。Wǒmen xiànzài méiyǒu qián. We don't have money now. src
他没有工作吗？Tā méiyǒu gōngzuò ma? Does he not have a job? src
他们没有爸爸妈妈。Tāmen méiyǒu bàba māma. They don't have parents. src
我们在北京没有房子。Wǒmen zài Běijīng méiyǒu fángzi. We don't have a house in Beijing. src
你爸爸没有手机吗？Nǐ bàba méiyǒu shǒujī ma? Does your dad not have a cell phone? src
你们在上海没有朋友吗？Nǐmen zài Shànghǎi méiyǒu péngyou ma? Do you not have friends in Shanghai? src
我的老师现在没有男朋友。Wǒ de lǎoshī xiànzài méiyǒu nánpéngyou. My teacher doesn't have a boyfriend now. src
他们都没有电脑吗？Tāmen dōu méiyǒu diànnǎo ma? Do they all not have computers? src
这个周末你们都没有时间吗？Zhège zhōumò nǐmen dōu méiyǒu shíjiān ma? Do you all not have time this weekend? src

我没钱。Wǒ méi qián. I don't have money. src
你没男朋友吗？Nǐ méi nánpéngyou ma? Do you not have a boyfriend? src
你们没车吗？Nǐmen méi chē ma? You don't have a car? src

我没工作，我老公也没工作。Wǒ méi gōngzuò, wǒ lǎogōng yě méi gōngzuò. I don't have a job. My husband doesn't have a job either. src
你们都认识John吗？Nǐmen dōu rènshi John ma? Do you all know John? src
他们都在上海。Tāmen dōu zài Shànghǎi. They are all in Shanghai. src

你们都用wiki吗？Nǐmen dōu yòng wiki ma? Do you all use the wiki? src
我们都要冰水。Wǒmen dōu yào bīngshuǐ . We all want ice water. src
我们两个都爱你。Wǒmen liǎng gè dōu ài nǐ. The two of us both love you. src
你爸爸和你妈妈都是美国人吗？Nǐ bàba hé nǐ māma dōu shì Měiguó rén ma? Are your father and your mother both Americans? src
我和我太太都不吃肉。Wǒ hé wǒ tàitai dōu bù chī ròu. Neither my wife nor I eat meat. src

我也喜欢。Wǒ yě xǐhuan. I also like it. src
我也是学生。Wǒ yě shì xuésheng. I am a student too. src

他们也是法国人吗？Tāmen yě shì Fǎguó rén ma? Are they also French? src
我也想学中文。Wǒ yě xiǎng xué Zhōngwén. I also want to study Chinese. src
他们也会去吗？Tāmen yě huì qù ma? Are they also going? src

我也是。Wǒ yě shì. I am too. / Me too. src

我姓王。Wǒ xìng Wáng. My family name is Wang. src

是不是？Shì bu shì? Is it (or not)? src
他们来不来？Tāmen lái bu lái? Are they going to come or not? src
你想不想我？Nǐ xiǎng bu xiǎng wǒ? Do you or do you not miss me? src
我们要去酒吧，你去不去？Wǒmen yào qù jiǔbā, nǐ qù bu qù? We are going to the bar. Do you want to go? src
我去买咖啡，你要不要？Wǒ qù mǎi kāfēi, nǐ yào bu yào? I'm going to buy coffee. Do you want some? src
你回不回家？Nǐ huí bu huíjiā? Are you coming back home or not? src
她吃不吃鱼？Tā chī bu chī yú? Does she eat fish? src
你们要不要米饭？Nǐmen yào bu yào mǐfàn? Do you want rice? src
你爸爸喝不喝酒？Nǐ bàba ​hē bu hējiǔ? Does your dad drink alcohol or not? src

中国菜辣不辣？Zhōngguó cài là bu là? Is Chinese food spicy? src
喜欢不喜欢？Xǐhuan bu xǐhuan? Do you like it? src
喜不喜欢？Xǐ bu xǐhuan? Do you like it? src

高不高兴？Gāo bu gāoxìng? Are you happy? src

他女朋友漂不漂亮？Tā nǚpéngyou piào bu piàoliang? Is his girlfriend pretty? src
中国菜好吃不好吃？Zhōngguó cài hǎochī bu hǎochī? Is Chinese food good? src

你们有没有孩子？Nǐmen yǒu méiyǒu háizi? Do you have children? src

什么shénme what src
哪里、哪儿nǎlǐ, nǎr where src
哪个nǎge which src
谁shéi who src
什么时候shénme shíhou when src
为什么wèishénme why src
怎么zěnme how src
多少duōshao how many / how much src
我是小李。Wǒ shì Xiǎo Lǐ. I am Xiao Li. src
你是谁？Nǐ shì shéi? Who are you? (you are who?) src
A:这是什么？ B:这是我的iPad。Zhè shì shénme? Zhè shì wǒ de iPad. What is this?<br />This is my iPad. src
A:你喜欢吃什么菜？ B:我喜欢吃中国菜。Nǐ xǐhuan chī shénme cài? Wǒ xǐhuan chī Zhōngguó cài. What kind of food do you like?<br />I like Chinese food. src
A:你用什么手机？ B:我用iPhone。Nǐ yòng shénme shǒujī? Wǒ yòng iPhone. What kind of cell phone do you use?<br />I use an iPhone. src
A:你在看什么书？ B:我在看小说。Nǐ zài kàn shénme shū? Wǒ zài kàn xiǎoshuō. What kind of book are you reading?<br />I am reading a novel. src
A:他开什么车？ B:他开宝马。Tā kāi shénme chē? Tā kāi Bǎomǎ. What kind of car does he drive?<br />He drives a BMW. src
A:你在哪里？ B:我在家。Nǐ zài nǎlǐ? Wǒ zài jiā. Where are you?<br />I'm at home. src
A:你要去哪儿？ B:我要去洗手间。Nǐ yào qù nǎr? Wǒ yào qù xǐshǒujiān. Where are you going now?<br />I'm going to the bathroom. src
A:我们在哪儿？ B:我们在南京西路。Wǒmen zài nǎr? Wǒmen zài Nánjīng Xī Lù. Where are we?<br />We are at West Nanjing road. src
A:这个周末你想去哪儿？ B:我想去公园。Zhège zhōumò nǐ xiǎng qù nǎr? Wǒ xiǎng qù gōngyuán. Where do you want to go this weekend?<br />I want to go to the park. src
A:你好，你要去哪儿？ B:我要去外滩。Nǐhǎo, nǐ yào qù nǎr? Wǒ yào qù Wàitān. Hello, where do you want to go?<br />I want to go to the Bund. src
A:你要哪个？ B:我要这个。Nǐ yào nǎge? Wǒ yào zhège. Which one do you want?<br />I want this one. src
A:你喜欢哪个菜？ B:我喜欢这个菜。Nǐ xǐhuan nǎge cài? Wǒ xǐhuan zhège cài. Which dish do you like?<br />I like this dish. src
A:我们去哪个饭店？ B:我们去你妈妈的饭店。Wǒmen qù nǎge fàndiàn? Wǒmen qù nǐ māma de fàndiàn. Which restaurant are we going to?<br />We are going to your mom's restaurant. src
A:你在哪个房间？ B:我在你的房间。Nǐ zài nǎge fángjiān? Wǒ zài nǐ de fángjiān. Which room are you in?<br />I'm in your room. src
A:你住在哪个区？ B:我住在静安区。Nǐ zhù zài nǎge qū? Wǒ zhù zài Jìng'ān Qū . Which district do you live in?<br />I live in Jing'an District. src
A:你是谁？ B:我是他女朋友。Nǐ shì shéi? Wǒ shì tā nǚpéngyou. Who are you?<br />I'm his girlfriend. src
A:她是谁？ B:她是我的老师。Tā shì shéi? Tā shì wǒ de lǎoshī. Who is she?<br />She‘s my teacher. src
A:你不喜欢谁？ B:我不喜欢我的老板。Nǐ bù xǐhuan shéi? Wǒ bù xǐhuan wǒ de lǎobǎn. Who do you not like?<br />I don't like my boss. src
A:谁想去？ B:我想去。Shéi xiǎng qù? Wǒ xiǎng qù. Who wants to go?<br />I want to go. src
A:谁想喝咖啡？ B:我想喝咖啡。Shéi xiǎng hē kāfēi? Wǒ xiǎng hē kāfēi. Who wants to drink coffee?<br />I want to drink coffee. src
A:你什么时候来？ B:我明天来。Nǐ shénme shíhou lái? Wǒ míngtiān lái. When are you coming?<br />I'm coming tomorrow. src
A:你们什么时候走？ B:我们下个月走。Nǐmen shénme shíhou zǒu? Wǒmen xià gè yuè zǒu. When are you guys leaving?<br />We're leaving next month. src
A:我们什么时候吃饭？ B:我们6点吃饭。Wǒmen shénme shíhou chīfàn? Wǒmen liù diǎn chīfàn. When are we eating?<br />We're eating at 6:00. src
A:爸爸什么时候回来？ B:爸爸周末回来。Bàba shénme shíhou huílái? Bàba zhōumò huílái. When is dad coming back?<br />Dad is coming back this weekend. src
A:你的飞机什么时候到上海？ B:晚上八点。Nǐ de fēijī shénme shíhou dào Shànghǎi? Wǎnshang bā diǎn. When is your airplane arriving in Shanghai?<br />Eight o'clock this evening. src
A:你为什么学中文？ B:因为我在中国工作。Nǐ wèishénme xué Zhōngwén? Yīnwèi wǒ zài Zhōngguó gōngzuò. Why do you study Chinese?<br />Because I'm working in China. src
A:他们为什么不喝咖啡？ B:因为咖啡很苦。Tāmen wèishénme bù hē kāfēi? Yīnwèi kāfēi hěn kǔ. Why don't you drink coffee?<br />Because coffee is bitter. src
A:他为什么不来？ B:因为他很忙。Tā wèishénme bù lái? Yīnwèi tā hěn máng. Why isn't he coming?<br />Because he is busy. src
A:你早上为什么不在？ B:因为我出去见朋友了。Nǐ zǎoshang wèishénme bù zài? Yīnwèi wǒ chūqù jiàn péngyou le. Why were you not here this morning?<br />Because I went out to meet some friends. src
A:这些外国人为什么不喜欢中国？ B:因为中国人太多。Zhèxiē wàiguó rén wèishénme bù xǐhuan Zhōngguó? Yīnwèi Zhōngguó rén tài duō. Why do these foreigners not like China?<br />Because China has a lot of people. src
A:你怎么学习中文？ B:我用GrammarWiki学习中文。Nǐ zěnme xuéxí Zhōngwén? Wǒ yòng Grammar Wiki xuéxí Zhōngwén. How do you study Chinese?<br />I use the Grammar Wiki to study Chinese. src
A:你怎么上网？ B:我用手机上网。Nǐ zěnme shàngwǎng? Wǒ yòng shǒujī shàngwǎng. How do you go online?<br />I use my cell phone to go online. src
A:你怎么去北京？ B:我坐火车去。Nǐ zěnme qù Běijīng? Wǒ zuò huǒchē qù. How do you go to Beijing?<br />I take the train. src
A:你们怎么回家？ B:我开车回家。Nǐmen zěnme huíjiā? Wǒ kāichē huíjiā. How are you guys going to get home?<br />I‘m driving home. src
A:你怎么买票？ B:我上网买票。Nǐ zěnme mǎi piào? Wǒ shàngwǎng mǎi piào. How do you buy tickets?<br />I go online to buy tickets. src
你会说中文，对不对？Nǐ huì shuō Zhōngwén, duì bu duì? You speak Chinese, right? src
他是你的老板，对不对？Tā shì nǐ de lǎobǎn, duì bu duì? He's your boss, right? src
我们是好朋友，对不对？Wǒmen shì hǎo péngyou, duì bu duì? We are good friends, right? src
你昨天没回家，对不对？Nǐ zuótiān méi huíjiā, duì bu duì? You didn't come back home yesterday, right? src
你有新女朋友了，是不是？Nǐ yǒu xīn nǚpéngyou le, shì bu shì? You have a new girlfriend, right? src
九点开会，是不是？Jiǔ diǎn kāihuì, shì bu shì? We are going to hold a meeting at 9, right? src
你姓王，是不是？Nǐ xìng Wáng, shì bu shì? Your last name is Wang, is it not? src
我们回家吧，好不好？Wǒmen huíjiā ba, hǎo bu hǎo? Let's go home, OK? src
周末去看电影，好不好？Zhōumò qù kàn diànyǐng, hǎo bu hǎo? Let's go to a movie this weekend, OK? src
你们明天来，好不好？Nǐmen míngtiān lái, hǎo bu hǎo? You come here tomorrow, OK? src
这样做，对吗？Zhèyàng zuò, duì ma? Do it like this, right? src
你们见过，对吗？Nǐmen jiàn guo, duì ma? You’ve met, right? src
他们昨天都没去，是吗？Tāmen zuótiān dōu méi qù, shì ma? They didn't go yesterday, right? src
你没来过，是吗？Nǐ méi lái guo, shì ma? You haven't been here, right? src
你喜欢我妹妹，是吗？Nǐ xǐhuan wǒ mèimei, shì ma? You like my younger sister, huh? src
我们去你家，好吗？Wǒmen qù nǐ jiā, hǎo ma? Let's go to your place, OK? src
不要告诉他，好吗？Bùyào gàosu tā, hǎo ma? Don't tell him, OK? src
今天我们都不喝酒，好吗？Jīntiān wǒmen dōu bù hējiǔ​, hǎo ma? Let's all not drink alcohol today, OK? src
我现在想去洗手间，可以吗？Wǒ xiànzài xiǎng qù xǐshǒujiān, kěyǐ ma? I want to go to the bathroom now. Is that OK? src
妈妈，我要吃巧克力，可以吗？Māma, wǒ yào chī qiǎokèlì, kěyǐ ma? Mom, I want to eat chocolate. May I? src
你喜欢咖啡。Nǐ xǐhuan kāfēi. You like coffee. src
你喜欢咖啡吗？Nǐ xǐhuan kāfēi ma? Do you like coffee? src
你是大学生。Nǐ shì dàxuéshēng. You are a college student. src
你是大学生吗？Nǐ shì dàxuéshēng ma? Are you a college student? src
他是老板。Tā shì lǎobǎn. He is the boss. src
他是老板吗？Tā shì lǎobǎn ma? Is he the boss? src
你喜欢她。Nǐ xǐhuan tā. You like her. src
你喜欢她吗？Nǐ xǐhuan tā ma? Do you like her? src
你想家。Nǐ xiǎng jiā. You miss home. src
你想家吗？Nǐ xiǎng jiā ma? Do you miss home? src
爸爸喜欢喝茶。Bàba xǐhuan hē chá. Dad likes drinking tea. src
爸爸喜欢喝茶吗？Bàba xǐhuan hē chá ma? Does dad like drinking tea? src
你们也去。Nǐmen yě qù. You also go. src
你们也去吗？Nǐmen yě qù ma? Are you also going? src
他在你们学校学中文。Tā zài nǐmen xuéxiào xué Zhōngwén. He studies Chinese in your school. src
他在你们学校学中文吗？Tā zài nǐmen xuéxiào xué Zhōngwén ma? Does he study Chinese in your school? src
我见过他。Wǒ jiàn guo tā. I've met him. src
我见过他吗？Wǒ jiàn guo tā ma? Have I met him? src
妈妈会做饭。Māma huì zuòfàn. Mom knows how to cook. src
妈妈会做饭吗？Māma huì zuòfàn ma? Does mom know how to cook? src
你昨天没去上班。Nǐ zuótiān méi qù shàngbān. You didn't go to work yesterday. src
你昨天没去上班吗？Nǐ zuótiān méi qù shàngbān ma? Did you not go to work yesterday? src
第二dì-èr #2; second src
第二个dì-èr gè the second one src
第二次dì-èr cì the second time src
二月Èryuè February (the second month) src
二号èr hào #2; the second (of the month) src
二号线èr hào xiàn Line 2 (of the metro) src
二楼èr lóu second floor src
十二shí'èr 12 src
二十èrshí 20 src
十二块钱shí'èr kuài qián 12 RMB src
二十块钱èrshí kuài qián 20 RMB src
二十二个人èrshí-èr gè rén twenty-two people src
两个小时liǎng gè xiǎoshí two hours src
两点liǎng diǎn 2 o'clock src
两天liǎng tiān two days src
两个星期liǎng gè xīngqī two weeks src
两个月liǎng gè yuè two months src
两年liǎng nián two years src
两次liǎng cì two times / twice src
两块钱liǎng kuài qián 2 kuai / 2 RMB src
两百liǎngbǎi 200 src
两千liǎng qiān 2000 src
我两个都要。Wǒ liǎng gè dōu yào. I want both of them. src
我饿死了。Wǒ è sǐ le! I'm starving! src
今天累死了。Jīntiān lèi sǐ le! Today was so exhausting! src
热死了！Rè sǐ le! It's ridiculously hot! src
这几天忙死了。Zhè jǐ tiān máng sǐ le! It's been so terribly busy these days! src
这件衣服丑死了。Zhè jiàn yīfu chǒu sǐ le! This clothing is totally hideous! src
你的房间脏死了。Nǐ de fángjiān zāng sǐ le! Your room is absolutely filthy! src
吵死了！Chǎo sǐ le! It's so terribly noisy! src
这里的东西贵死了。Zhèlǐ de dōngxi guì sǐ le! The things here are criminally expensive! src
我们都急死了。Wǒmen dōu jí sǐ le! We are all so terribly anxious! src
这个孩子烦死了。Zhège háizi fán sǐ le! This kid is so freaking annoying! src
哇，可爱死了！Wā, kě'ài sǐ le! OMG, adorbs! src
漂亮死了！Piàoliang sǐ le! Drop-dead gorgeous! src
这个蛋糕好吃死了。Zhège dàngāo hǎochī sǐ le! This cake is to die for! src
这几个地方都差不多。Zhè jǐ gè dìfang dōu chàbuduō. These places are all pretty much the same. src
这两个词的意思差不多。Zhè liǎng gè cí de yìsi chàbuduō. The meanings of these two words are pretty much the same. src
我们的想法差不多。Wǒmen de xiǎngfǎ chàbuduō. Our ways of thinking are pretty much the same. src
那两家餐厅的菜差不多。Nà liǎng jiā cāntīng de cài chàbuduō. Those two restaurants' dishes are almost the same. src
你们的中文水平差不多。Nǐmen de Zhōngwén shuǐpíng chàbuduō. Your Chinese levels are almost the same. src
上海和纽约差不多。Shànghǎi hé Niǔyuē chàbuduō. Shanghai and New York are basically the same. src
Starbucks和Costa差不多。Starbucks hé Costa chàbuduō. Starbucks and Costa are almost the same. src
这里的天气跟台湾的天气差不多。Zhèlǐ de tiānqì gēn Táiwān de tiānqì chàbuduō. The weather here is pretty much like Taiwan's. src
你的工作跟我的工作差不多。Nǐ de gōngzuò gēn wǒ de gōngzuò chàbuduō. Your job and my job are almost the same. src
你的新手机跟我的旧手机差不多。Nǐ de xīn shǒujī gēn wǒ de jiù shǒujī chàbuduō. Your new cell phone is pretty much like my old cell phone. src
这两个孩子差不多大。Zhè liǎng gè háizi chàbuduō dà. These two children are more or less the same age. src
我跟我哥哥差不多高。Wǒ gēn wǒ gēge chàbuduō gāo. My older brother and I are more or less the same height. src
我差不多到公园门口了。Wǒ chàbuduō dào gōngyuán ménkǒu le. I'm almost at the entrance of the park. src
电影差不多要开始了。Diànyǐng chàbuduō yào kāishǐ le. The movie is almost about to start. src
今天的工作差不多做完了。Jīntiān de gōngzuò chàbuduō zuò wán le. Today's work is almost done. src
你儿子差不多五岁了吧？Nǐ érzi chàbuduō wǔ suì le ba? Your son should be about 5 years old, right? src
他住在上海差不多三个月了。Tā zhù zài Shànghǎi chàbuduō sān gè yuè le. He has lived in Shanghai for about three months. src
我在这家公司工作了差不多十年了。Wǒ zài zhè jiā gōngsī gōngzuò le chàbuduō shí nián le. I've worked for this company for almost ten years. src
我父母结婚差不多二十年了。Wǒ fùmǔ jiéhūn chàbuduō èrshí nián le. My parents have been married for about twenty years. src
差不多两个星期以前，我在北京见过他。Chàbuduō liǎng gè xīngqī yǐqián, wǒ zài Běijīng jiàn guo tā. About two weeks ago I met with him in Beijing. src
很多地方都有wifi。Hěn duō dìfang dōu yǒu wifi. A lot of places have wifi. src
我的很多朋友都有车。Wǒ de hěn duō péngyou dōu yǒu chē. A lot of my friends have cars. src
很多美国人都喜欢喝咖啡。Hěn duō Měiguó rén dōu xǐhuan hē kāfēi. A lot of Americans like drinking coffee. src
很多孩子都不喜欢上学。Hěn duō háizi dōu bù xǐhuan shàngxué. A lot of kids don't like to go to school. src
很多年轻人都想在大城市工作。Hěn duō niánqīng rén dōu xiǎng zài dà chéngshì gōngzuò. A lot of young people want to go to work in big cities. src
大家都来了吗？Dàjiā dōu lái le ma? Is everyone here? src
大家都应该知道。Dàjiā dōu yīnggāi zhīdào. Everyone should know. src
大家都说你很聪明。Dàjiā dōu shuō nǐ hěn cōngming. Everyone says you're smart. src
大家都忘了他的名字。Dàjiā dōu wàng le tā de míngzi. Everyone forgot his name. src
大家都喜欢吃辣吗？Dàjiā dōu xǐhuan chī là ma? Does everyone like eating spicy food? src
我每天都要上班。Wǒ měi tiān dōu yào shàngbān. I have to go to work every day. src
老师每天都迟到。Lǎoshī měi tiān dōu chídào. The teacher comes late every day. src
她每天都不吃早饭。Tā měi tiān dōu bù chī zǎofàn. Every day, she does not eat breakfast. src
我女朋友每天都上淘宝。Wǒ nǚpéngyou měi tiān dōu shàng Táobǎo. My girlfriend goes on Taobao every day. src
妈妈每天都给我们做晚饭。Māma měi tiān dōu gěi wǒmen zuò wǎnfàn. Mom cooks dinner for us every day. src
美国人都说英文。Měiguó rén dōu shuō Yīngwén. Americans all speak English. src
我们五个人都去。Wǒmen wǔ gè rén dōu qù. All five of us are going. src
四川人都喜欢吃辣。Sìchuān rén dōu xǐhuan chī là. Sichuanese people all like eating spicy food. src
我的家人都没去过中国。Wǒ de jiārén dōu méi qù guo Zhōngguó. None of my family members has been to China. src
我的学生都喜欢问问题。Wǒ de xuéshēng dōu xǐhuan wèn wèntí. My students all like to ask questions. src
我一直在学习中文。Wǒ yīzhí zài xuéxí Zhōngwén. I've been studying Chinese all along. src
昨天晚上我一直在做作业。Zuótiān wǎnshang wǒ yīzhí zài zuò zuòyè. Yesterday evening I was continuously doing homework. src
老板一直很忙。Lǎobǎn yīzhí hěn máng. The boss is always very busy. src
我一直很喜欢你。Wǒ yīzhí hěn xǐhuan nǐ. I've always liked you a lot. src
爸爸一直都不抽烟。Bàba yīzhí dōu bù chōuyān. Dad has never smoked cigarettes. src
我男朋友一直在中国教英文。Wǒ nánpéngyou yīzhí zài Zhōngguó jiāo Yīngwén. My boyfriend has always been teaching English in China. src
18岁以后，他一直一个人住。Shíbā suì yǐhòu, tā yīzhí yīgèrén zhù. Since he was 18, he has always lived alone. src
你一直在这家公司工作吗？Nǐ yīzhí zài zhè jiā gōngsī gōngzuò ma? Have you always worked in this company? src
你们一直住在一起吗？Nǐmen yīzhí zhù zài yīqǐ ma? Have you always been living together? src
北京的空气一直很不好。Běijīng de kōngqì yīzhí hěn bù hǎo. The air in Beijing has been bad for a while. src
他们已经走了。Tāmen yǐjīng zǒu le. They've already left. src
我已经有男朋友了。Wǒ yǐjīng yǒu nánpéngyou le. I already have a boyfriend. src
宝宝已经会说话了。Bǎobao yǐjīng huì shuōhuà le. The baby can already speak. src
妈妈已经回来了。Māma yǐjīng huílái le. Mom has already come back. src
他已经上飞机了。Tā yǐjīng shàng fēijī le. He's already gotten on the plane. src
爸爸妈妈已经老了。Bàba māma yǐjīng lǎo le. Mom and dad are already old. src
已经很便宜了。Yǐjīng hěn piányi le. It is already very cheap. src
你女朋友已经很漂亮了！Nǐ nǚpéngyou yǐjīng hěn piàoliang le! Your girlfriend is already very beautiful! src
你的感冒已经好了吗？Nǐ de gǎnmào yǐjīng hǎo le ma? Is your cold already better? src
已经很晚了，我们走吧。Yǐjīng hěn wǎn le, wǒmen zǒu ba. It's already really late. Let's go. src
已经11点了，女儿还没回来。Yǐjīng shíyī diǎn le, nǚ'ér hái méi huílái. It is already 11 o'clock, and my daughter has not returned. src
爷爷已经八十五岁了。Yéye yǐjīng bāshí-wǔ suì le. Grandpa is already eighty-five years old. src
我学习中文已经一年了。Wǒ xuéxí Zhōngwén yǐjīng yī nián le. I have already been studying Chinese for a year. src
他在洗手间里已经半个小时了。Tā zài xǐshǒujiān lǐ yǐjīng bàn gè xiǎoshí le. He has already been in the bathroom for half an hour. src
爸爸去北京出差已经两天了。Bàba qù Běijīng chūchāi yǐjīng liǎng tiān le. It has already been two days since dad went to Beijing on business trip. src
我已经不喜欢你了。Wǒ yǐjīng bù xǐhuan nǐ le. I don't like you anymore. src
他已经不爱他的猫了。Tā yǐjīng bù ài tā de māo le. He doesn't love his cat anymore. src
他们已经不住在中国了。Tāmen yǐjīng bù zhù zài Zhōngguó le. They don't live in China anymore. src
我已经不需要父母的钱了。Wǒ yǐjīng bù xūyào fùmǔ de qián le. I don't need my parents' money anymore. src
你已经不在Google工作了吗？Nǐ yǐjīng bù zài Google gōngzuò le ma? You don't work at Google anymore? src
他总是迟到。Tā zǒngshì chídào. He is always late. src
我总是忘记这个词。Wǒ zǒngshì wàngjì zhège cí. I always forget this word. src
他总是一个人吃饭。Tā zǒngshì yīgèrén chīfàn. He always eats alone. src
你男朋友总是说脏话。Nǐ nánpéngyou zǒngshì shuō zānghuà. Your boyfriend always uses foul language. src
我的学生总是问我很多有意思的问题。Wǒ de xuéshēng zǒngshì wèn wǒ hěn duō yǒu yìsi de wèntí. My students always ask me lots of interesting questions. src
他总是很累。Tā zǒngshì hěn lèi. He is always tired. src
你为什么总是很忙？Nǐ wèishénme zǒngshì hěn máng? Why are you always very busy? src
你家总是很干净。Nǐ jiā zǒngshì hěn gānjìng. Your house is always very clean. src
孩子们总是非常开心。Háizi men zǒngshì fēicháng kāixīn. The children are always very happy. src
我的学生总是特别努力。Wǒ de xuéshēng zǒngshì tèbié nǔlì. My students are always very hard-working. src
她有一个弟弟，还有一个妹妹。Tā yǒu yī gè dìdi, hái yǒu yī gè mèimei. She has a younger brother and also has a younger sister. src
我老板会说法语，还会说日语。Wǒ lǎobǎn huì shuō Fǎyǔ, hái huì shuō Rìyǔ. My boss can speak French and can also speak Japanese. src
你要一杯咖啡，还要什么？Nǐ yào yī bēi kāfēi, hái yào shénme? You want a cup of coffee, and what else do you want? src
我想吃冰淇淋，还想吃汉堡。Wǒ xiǎng chī bīngqílín, hái xiǎng chī hànbǎo. I want to eat ice cream and I also want to eat a hamburger. src
爸爸有一个小米手机，还有一个iPhone。Bàba yǒu yī gè Xiǎomǐ shǒujī, hái yǒu yī gè iPhone. Dad has a Xiaomi phone and also has an iPhone. src
你晚上在家做了作业，还做了什么？Nǐ wǎnshang zài jiā zuò le zuòyè, hái zuò le shénme? You did your homework at home tonight, and what else did you do? src
他结婚的时候，请了同事，还请了谁？Tā jiéhūn de shíhou, qǐng le tóngshì, hái qǐng le shéi? When he got married, he invited his co-workers. Who else did he invite? src
生日的时候，我们会吃蛋糕，还要送礼物。Shēngrì de shíhou, wǒmen huì chī dàngāo, hái yào sòng lǐwù. During a birthday, we eat cake and also give presents. src
去美国要带钱、护照，还要带什么？Qù Měiguó yào dài qián, hùzhào, hái yào dài shénme? To go to the USA, you need to take money and a passport. What else do you need to take with you? src
他做了饭，还洗了碗。Tā zuò le fàn, hái xǐ le wǎn. He fixed dinner and also washed the dishes. src
她也洗了碗。Tā yě xǐ le wǎn. She washed the dishes too. src
我洗了澡，还洗了衣服。Wǒ xǐ le zǎo, hái xǐ le yīfu. I took a shower and also did my laundry. src
她也洗了衣服。Tā yě xǐ le yīfu. She did her laundry too. src
我们今天晚上出去吃饭了，还看了电影。Wǒmen jīntiān wǎnshang chūqù chīfàn le, hái kàn le diànyǐng. We went out for dinner tonight and also watched a movie. src
他们今天晚上也看了电影。Tāmen jīntiān wǎnshang yě kàn le diànyǐng. They watched a movie tonight too. src
这两个银行哪个更近？Zhè liǎng gè yínháng nǎge gèng jìn? Between these two banks, which one is closer? src
我想找一个更帅的男朋友。Wǒ xiǎng zhǎo yī gè gèng shuài de nánpéngyou. I want to find a more handsome boyfriend. src
我喜欢在网上买书，因为更便宜。Wǒ xǐhuan zài wǎngshàng mǎi shū, yīnwèi gèng piányi. I like buying books online because it's cheaper. src
不要太高兴，我们还有更多的工作要做。Bùyào tài gāoxìng, wǒmen hái yǒu gèng duō de gōngzuò yào zuò. Don't get too excited. We still have more work to do. src
结婚以后，她变得更漂亮了。Jiéhūn yǐhòu, tā biàn de gèng piàoliang le. She's become more beautiful after she got married. src
北京的房子比上海更贵。Běijīng de fángzi bǐ Shànghǎi gèng guì. The houses in Beijing are even more expensive than those in Shanghai. src
春节比中秋节更热闹。Chūnjié bǐ Zhōngqiūjié gèng rènao. Spring Festival is even more boisterous than Mid-autumn Festival. src
汉字比声调更难。Hànzì bǐ shēngdiào gèng nán. Chinese characters are even more difficult than tones. src
他现在的女朋友比以前的更漂亮。Tā xiànzài de nǚpéngyou bǐ yǐqián de gèng piàoliang. His current girlfriend is even more beautiful than his previous one. src
中国的高铁比飞机更方便。Zhōngguó de gāotiě bǐ fēijī gèng fāngbiàn. China's high-speed trains are even more convenient than airplanes. src
我们刚知道。Wǒmen gāng zhīdào. We just found out. src
她们刚走。Tāmen gāng zǒu. They just left. src
老板刚刚到办公室。Lǎobǎn gānggāng dào bàngōngshì. The boss just arrived at the office. src
我老婆刚生完孩子。Wǒ lǎopo gāng shēng wán háizi. My wife just finished giving birth to our baby. src
你刚刚下班吗？Nǐ gānggāng xiàbān ma? Did you just get off work? src
我刚认识她十天。Wǒ gāng rènshi tā shí tiān. I just met her ten days ago. src
他刚来中国两个月。Tā gāng lái Zhōngguó liǎng gè yuè. He just got to China two months ago. src
我弟弟刚工作半年。Wǒ dìdi gāng gōngzuò bàn nián . My younger brother just started working half a year ago. src
她刚结婚三个月。Tā gāng jiéhūn sān gè yuè. She just got married three months ago. src
我的车刚买两天，开的时候小心点。Wǒ de chē gāng mǎi liǎng tiān, kāi de shíhou xiǎoxīn diǎn. I just bought the car two days ago. Be careful when you drive. src
我只有一个哥哥。Wǒ zhǐ yǒu yī gè gēge. I only have one older brother. src
我们只有十块钱。Wǒmen zhǐ yǒu shí kuài qián. We only have ten RMB. src
我们公司只有两个员工。Wǒmen gōngsī zhǐ yǒu liǎng gè yuángōng. Our company only has two employees. src
你只爱吃肉吗？Nǐ zhǐ ài chī ròu ma? Do you only like eating meat? src
他们只会说英文。Tāmen zhǐ huì shuō Yīngwén. They can only speak English. src
我只能说两句中文。Wǒ zhǐ néng shuō liǎng jù Zhōngwén. I can only say two sentences in Chinese. src
你们只要咖啡吗？Nǐmen zhǐ yào kāfēi ma? Do you only want coffee? src
我老婆只要一个孩子。Wǒ lǎopo zhǐ yào yī gè háizi. My wife only wants one child. src
宝宝只会走，不会跑。Bǎobao zhǐ huì zǒu, bù huì pǎo. The baby can only walk. He can't run. src
我只想跟你在一起。Wǒ zhǐ xiǎng gēn nǐ zài yīqǐ. I only want to be with you. src
她在看书。Tā zài kànshū. She is reading. src
妈妈在打电话。Māma zài dǎ diànhuà. Mom is making a phone call. src
谁在里面洗澡？Shéi zài lǐmiàn xǐzǎo? Who is taking a shower in there? src
阿姨正在打扫我们的房间。Āyí zhèngzài dǎsǎo wǒmen de fángjiān. The cleaning lady is cleaning our room right now. src
昨天晚上七点，我们在吃饭。Zuótiān wǎnshang qīdiǎn, wǒmen zài chīfàn. Yesterday at 7pm, we were eating dinner. src
老板在开会，没有时间见你。Lǎobǎn zài kāihuì, méiyǒu shíjiān jiàn nǐ. The boss is currently in a meeting. He doesn't have time to see you. src
我现在在上班，不方便离开。Wǒ xiànzài zài shàngbān, bù fāngbiàn líkāi. I am working now. It's not convenient for me to leave. src
我们正在上课，请你等一会儿。Wǒmen zhèngzài shàngkè, qǐng nǐ děng yīhuìr. We are in class right now; please wait a moment. src
你正在开车，不可以玩手机。Nǐ zhèngzài kāichē, bù kěyǐ wán shǒujī. You're driving right now; you can't play with your cell phone. src
你给我打电话的时候，我正在跟朋友打游戏。Nǐ gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà de shíhou, wǒ zhèngzài gēn péngyou dǎ yóuxì. When you called me, I was playing video games with friends. src
别走。Bié zǒu. Don't leave. src
别说话！Bié shuōhuà! Don't speak! src
别笑！Bié xiào! Don't laugh! src
别动！Bié dòng! Don't move! src
别过来！Bié guòlái! Don't come over here! src
别打孩子！Bié dǎ háizi! Don't hit the child! src
别喝太多。Bié hē tài duō. Don't drink too much. src
喝酒以后别开车。Hējiǔ yǐhòu bié kāichē. After drinking alcohol, don't drive. src
吃饭的时候别玩手机。Chīfàn de shíhou bié wán shǒujī. When eating, don't play with your cell phone. src
上课的时候别说英文。Shàngkè de shíhou bié shuō Yīngwén. Don't speak English in class. src
不要一边吃东西，一边说话。Bùyào yībiān chī dōngxi, yībiān shuōhuà. Don't speak while eating. src
我常常一边洗澡，一边唱歌。Wǒ chángcháng yībiān xǐzǎo, yībiān chànggē. I often sing songs while I take a shower. src
孩子喜欢一边吃饭，一边玩。Háizi xǐhuan yībiān chīfàn, yībiān wán. Children like to play while eating. src
你喜欢一边听音乐，一边做作业吗？Nǐ xǐhuan yībiān tīng yīnyuè, yībiān zuò zuòyè ma? Do you like to listen to music while doing homework? src
我们一边走一边聊吧。Wǒmen yībiān zǒu yībiān liáo ba. Let's walk while we talk. src
请你一边读一边写。Qǐng nǐ yībiān dú yībiān xiě. Please write as you read. src
不要一边开车，一边打电话。Bùyào yībiān kāichē, yībiān dǎ diànhuà. Don't talk on the phone while you drive. src
老板喜欢一边抽烟，一边工作。Lǎobǎn xǐhuan yībiān chōuyān, yībiān gōngzuò. The boss likes to smoke while working. src
很多人都一边上班，一边玩手机。Hěn duō rén dōu yībiān shàngbān, yībiān wán shǒujī. Many people play with their cell phones while working. src
她常常一边做饭，一边带孩子。Tā chángcháng yībiān zuòfàn, yībiān dài háizi. She often looks after the baby while cooking food. src
她多高？Tā duō gāo? How tall is she? src
你家多大？Nǐ jiā duō dà? How large is your house? src
你的孩子多大？Nǐ de háizi duō dà? How old is your child? src
黄河多长？Huánghé duō cháng? How long is the Yellow River? src
你家离这儿多远？Nǐ jiā lí zhèr duō yuǎn? How far is your house away from here? src
你要在美国待多久？Nǐ yào zài Měiguó dāi duō jiǔ? How long are you going to stay in the USA? src
这些东西多重？Zhèxiē dōngxi duō zhòng? How heavy are these things? src
你知道我们现在多胖吗？Nǐ zhīdào wǒmen xiànzài duō pàng ma? Do you know how fat we are now? src
你知道这里的冬天多冷吗？Nǐ zhīdào zhèlǐ de dōngtiān duō lěng ma? Do you know how cold it is here in winter? src
你知道上海的房子多贵吗？Nǐ zhīdào Shànghǎi de fángzi duō guì ma? Do you know how expensive housing is in Shanghai? src
我和你一样。Wǒ hé nǐ yīyàng. I am the same as you. src
他的性格跟他妈妈一样。Tā de xìnggé gēn tā māma yīyàng. He has the same personality as his mom. src
北京的天气和上海不一样。Běijīng de tiānqì hé Shànghǎi bù yīyàng. The weather in Beijing and the weather in Shanghai are not alike. src
这个词的意思和那个词一样吗？Zhège cí de yìsi hé nàge cí yīyàng ma? Are the meanings of this word and that word the same? src
美国文化跟中国文化不一样。Měiguó wénhuà gēn Zhōngguó wénhuà bù yīyàng. American culture and Chinese culture are not the same. src
你家跟我家一样大。Nǐ jiā gēn wǒ jiā yīyàng dà. Your house is just as big as mine. src
她和她哥哥一样高。Tā hé tā gēge yīyàng gāo. She and her older brother are equally tall. src
你的头发和我的头发一样长。Nǐ de tóufa hé wǒ de tóufa yīyàng cháng. You hair is as long as mine. src
这里的天气跟我老家一样舒服。Zhèlǐ de tiānqì gēn wǒ lǎojiā yīyàng shūfu. The weather here is just as comfortable as my hometown's. src
你跟老板一样忙吗？Nǐ gēn lǎobǎn yīyàng máng ma? Are you as busy as the boss is? src
啤酒和葡萄酒的味道一样吗？Píjiǔ hé pútaojiǔ de wèidào yīyàng ma? Do beer and red wine taste the same? src
我有点饿。Wǒ yǒudiǎn è. I'm a little hungry. src
这个菜有点辣。Zhège cài yǒudiǎn là. This dish is a little too spicy. src
昨天有一点热。Zuótiān yǒuyīdiǎn rè. Yesterday it was a little too hot. src
上海的冬天有一点冷。Shànghǎi de dōngtiān yǒuyīdiǎn lěng. Winter in Shanghai is a bit too cold. src
我弟弟有点胖。Wǒ dìdi yǒudiǎn pàng. My younger brother is a bit fat. src
今天有点累。Jīntiān yǒudiǎn lèi. Today I am a little bit tired. src
这个月公司有点忙。Zhège yuè gōgnsī yǒudiǎn máng. This month the company is a little bit busy. src
这个地方有点吵，我们走吧。Zhège dìfang yǒudiǎn chǎo, wǒmen zǒu ba. This place is a little too noisy. Let's go. src
爸爸回来有点晚，妈妈有点不高兴。Bàba huílái yǒudiǎn wǎn, māma yǒudiǎn bù gāoxìng. Dad came back home a bit too late, so mom was a little unhappy. src
老师今天有点不舒服，所以没来上课。Lǎoshī jīntiān yǒudiǎn bù shūfu, suǒyǐ méi lái shàngkè. Today, the teacher felt a little unwell, so she didn't come to class. src
她男朋友又高又帅。Tā nánpéngyou yòu gāo yòu shuài. Her boyfriend is both tall and handsome. src
这个房子又大又亮。Zhège fángzi yòu dà yòu liàng. This house is both big and bright. src
妈妈的头发又黑又亮。Māma de tóufa yòu hēi yòu liàng. Mom's hair is both black and shiny. src
我姐姐又聪明又漂亮。Wǒ jiějie yòu cōngming yòu piàoliang. My older sister is both smart and beautiful. src
中国菜又便宜又好吃。Zhōngguó cài yòu piányi yòu hǎochī. Chinese food is both cheap and good-tasting. src
你们老板又年轻又有钱。Nǐmen lǎobǎn yòu niánqīng yòu yǒuqián. Your boss is both young and rich. src
这里的咖啡又贵又难喝。Zhèlǐ de kāfēi yòu guì yòu nánhē. The coffee here is both expensive and bad-tasting. src
我家小狗又可爱又听话。Wǒ jiā xiǎogǒu yòu kě'ài yòu tīnghuà. My family's dog is both cute and obedient. src
上海的冬天又冷又湿。Shànghǎi de dōngtiān yòu lěng yòu shī. Winter here in Shanghai is both cold and humid. src
她小时候又矮又瘦。Tā xiǎoshíhou yòu ǎi yòu shòu. She was both short and thin when she was young. src
我有一点饿。Wǒ yǒuyīdiǎn è. I'm a little hungry. src
这个菜有一点辣。Zhège cài yǒuyīdiǎn là. This dish is a little too spicy. src
我家不太大。Wǒ jiā bù tài dà. My house is not too big. src
那个地方不太远。Nàge dìfang bù tài yuǎn. That place is not very far away. src
老板今天不太高兴。Lǎobǎn jīntiān bù tài gāoxìng. The boss is not very happy today. src
这个店的衣服不太贵。Zhège diàn de yīfu bù tài guì. The clothes in this shop are not too expensive. src
我觉得他不太聪明。Wǒ juéde tā bù tài cōngming. I think he is not too smart. src
我不太懂。Wǒ bù tài dǒng. I don't really understand. src
我不太会说英语。Wǒ bù tài huì shuō Yīngyǔ. I can't really speak English. src
他们不太想去。Tāmen bù tài xiǎng qù. They don't really want to go. src
我哥哥不太喜欢他的工作。Wǒ gēge bù tài xǐhuan tā de gōngzuò. My older brother doesn't really like his job. src
他不太明白老板的意思。Tā bù tài míngbai lǎobǎn de yìsi. He didn't really understand what the boss meant. src
你真好！Nǐ zhēn hǎo! You are so nice! src
你女朋友真漂亮！Nǐ nǚpéngyou zhēn piàoliang! Your girlfriend is really pretty! src
他家真有钱！Tā jiā zhēn yǒuqián! His family is really rich! src
小狗真可爱！Xiǎogǒu zhēn kě'ài! This puppy is really cute! src
今天真热！Jīntiān zhēn rè! It's truly hot today! src
你妈妈真爱你！Nǐ māma zhēn ài nǐ! Your mother really loves you! src
我真喜欢住在中国！Wǒ zhēn xǐhuan zhù zài Zhōngguó! I really like living in China! src
我真讨厌这种男人！Wǒ zhēn tǎoyàn zhè zhǒng nánrén! I really hate this kind of guy! src
你真会说话！Nǐ zhēn huì shuōhuà! You are so good with words! src
你真能吃！Nǐ zhēn néng chī! You ate so much! src
我家离公司很近。Wǒ jiā lí gōngsī hěn jìn. My house is close to my office. src
美国离中国很远。Měiguó lí Zhōngguó hěn yuǎn. The USA is far from China. src
这个酒店离火车站很近。Zhège jiǔdiàn lí huǒchēzhàn hěn jìn. This hotel is very close to the train station. src
那个酒吧离这儿太远了，我不想去。Nàge jiǔbā lí zhèr tài yuǎn le, wǒ bù xiǎng qù. That bar is too far away from here. I don't want to go. src
我不想去离家很远的地方工作。Wǒ bù xiǎng qù lí jiā hěn yuǎn de dìfang gōngzuò. I don't want to go work at a place very far away from home. src
你家离超市远吗？Nǐ jiā lí chāoshì yuǎn ma? Is your house far away from the supermarket? src
你的大学离你老家很远吗？Nǐ de dàxué lí nǐ lǎojiā hěn yuǎn ma? Is your college very far away from your hometown? src
你们公司离地铁站近吗？Nǐmen gōngsī lí dìtiězhàn jìn ma? Is your company close to the metro station? src
你家离学校多远？Nǐ jiā lí xuéxiào duō yuǎn? How far is it from your home to school? src
这个酒店离机场有多远？Zhège jiǔdiàn lí jīchǎng yǒu duō yuǎn? How far is it from this hotel to the airport? src
你离我远点儿！Nǐ lí wǒ yuǎn diǎnr! Stay away from me. src
一个人多好！Yīgèrén duō hǎo! It's so nice being alone! src
你女儿多聪明啊！Nǐ nǚér duō cōngming a! Your daughter is so smart! src
今天天气多舒服！Jīntiān tiānqì duō shūfu! Today's weather is so nice! src
你看这个地方，多美啊！Nǐ kàn zhège dìfang, duō měi a! Look at this place, it is so beautiful! src
学中文多有意思啊！Xué Zhōngwén duō yǒu yìsi a! Studying Chinese is so interesting! src
坐地铁多方便！Zuò dìtiě duō fāngbiàn! How convenient it is to take the metro! src
你看这个小狗，多可爱！Nǐ kàn zhège xiǎogǒu, duō kě'ài! Look at this puppy! It is so cute! src
这样做多麻烦！Zhèyàng zuò duō máfan! Doing it this way is so troublesome! src
这些菜多好吃啊！Zhèxiē cài duō hǎochī a! These foods are so delicious! src
你男朋友多帅啊！Nǐ nánpéngyou duō shuài a! Your boyfriend is so handsome! src
我还好。Wǒ hái hǎo. I'm OK. src
爸爸做的菜还可以。Bàba zuò de cài hái kěyǐ. The food that dad cooks is OK. src
我们老板还不错。Wǒmen lǎobǎn hái bùcuò. Our boss is not too bad. src
这家店还行，不太贵。Zhè jià diàn hái xíng, bù tài guì. This shop is OK. It's not too expensive. src
我男朋友的工资还可以。Wǒ nánpéngyou de gōngzī hái kěyǐ. My boyfriend's salary is OK. src
新的办公室还不错。Xīn de bàngōngshì hái bùcuò. The new office is OK. src
我觉得这里的菜还可以，没有那么难吃。Wǒ juéde zhèlǐ de cài hái kěyǐ, méiyǒu nàme nánchī. I think the food here is OK, it is not too bad-tasting. src
这个牌子还不错，很多年轻人喜欢。Zhège páizi hái bùcuò，hěn duō niánqīng rén xǐhuan. This brand is not too bad. Many young people like it. src
房子还可以，但是有点贵。Fángzi hái kěyǐ, dànshì yǒudiǎn guì. The apartment is not too bad, but it is a bit expensive. src
漂亮的女孩儿piàoliang de nǚháir beautiful girl src
辣的菜là de cài spicy food src
可爱的宝宝kě'ài de bǎobao a cute baby src
我喜欢新鲜的果汁。Wǒ xǐhuan xīnxiān de guǒzhī. I like fresh fruit juice. src
他常常买便宜的东西。Tā chángcháng mǎi piányi de dōngxi. He often buys cheap stuff. src
A:孩子喜欢吃什么东西？ B:甜的。Háizi xǐhuan chī shénme dōngxi? Tián de. What food do children like to eat?<br />Sweet food. src
A:你喜欢哪种女孩？ B:漂亮的。Nǐ xǐhuan nǎ zhǒng nǚhái? Piàoliang de. What kind of girls do you like?<br />Pretty ones. src
A:你要喝冷水还是热水？ B:冷的。Nǐ yào hē lěngshuǐ háishì rè shuǐ ? Lěng de. Do you want to drink cold or hot water?<br />Cold. src
A:你想找什么样的男朋友？ B:有钱的。Nǐ xiǎng zhǎo shénmeyàng de nánpéngyou? Yǒuqián de. What kind of boyfriend do you want to find?<br />A rich one. src
A:你不喜欢吃什么菜？ B:辣的。Nǐ bù xǐhuan chī shénme cài? Là de. Which foods do you not like to eat?<br />Spicy ones. src
妈妈做的菜māma zuò de cài the food that mom cooks src
去北京的火车qù Běijīng de huǒchē the train that goes to Beijing src
你教的学生nǐ jiāo de xuésheng the students that you teach src
老板请的朋友lǎobǎn qǐng de péngyou the friends that the boss invited src
我画的画wǒ huà de huà the pictures that I draw src
他写的书tā xiě de shū the books that he wrote src
妈妈给我买的衣服māma gěi wǒ mǎi de yīfu the clothes that mom bought for me src
客户问的问题kèhù wèn de wèntí the questions that the client asked src
穿Prada的女人chuān Prada de nǚrén women who wear Prada src
不喜欢中国菜的老外bù xǐhuan Zhōngguó cài de lǎowài the foreigners that don't like Chinese food src
哪个老师最好？Nǎge lǎoshī zuì hǎo? Which teacher is the best? src
你们家谁最漂亮？Nǐmen jiā shéi zuì piàoliang? In your family who is the most beautiful? src
谁最有钱？Shéi zuì yǒuqián? Who is the richest? src
汉语最难。Hànyǔ zuì nán. The Chinese language is the most difficult. src
这种事最麻烦。Zhè zhǒng shì zuì máfan. These kind of things are the most troublesome. src
小狗最可爱了。Xiǎogǒu zuì kě'ài le. The puppy is the cutest. src
四川菜最辣了。Sìchuān cài zuì là le. Sichuan food is the spiciest. src
我的中国朋友最热情了。Wǒ de Zhōngguó péngyou zuì rèqíng le. My Chinese friend is the most enthusiastic. src
他的学生最认真了。Tā de xuésheng zuì rènzhēn le. His student is the most serious. src
黄山的风景最美了。Huángshān de fēngjǐng zuì měi le. Huang Mountain's landscape is the most beautiful. src
老板最喜欢你了！Lǎobǎn zuì xǐhuan nǐ le! The boss likes you the best! src
你最怕什么？Nǐ zuì pà shénme? What do you most fear? src
我最爱中国菜。Wǒ zuì ài Zhōngguó cài. I love Chinese food most. src
谁最了解你？Shéi zuì liǎojiě nǐ? Who knows you best? src
她最讨厌抽烟的男人了。Tā zuì tǎoyàn chōuyān de nánrén le. She most hates men that smoke. src
你最喜欢什么颜色？Nǐ zuì xǐhuan shénme yánsè? What is your favorite color? src
你最喜欢什么动物？Nǐ zuì xǐhuan shénme dòngwù? What is your favorite animal? src
我喝咖啡或者茶，都行。Wǒ hē kāfēi huòzhě chá, dōu xíng. I drink coffee or tea. Either is OK. src
星期六或者星期天，都可以。Xīngqīliù huòzhě Xīngqītiān, dōu kěyǐ. Saturday or Sunday are both OK. src
今天晚上我想吃披萨或者寿司。Jīntiān wǎnshang wǒ xiǎng chī pīsà huòzhě shòusī. Tonight I would like to eat pizza or sushi. src
周末的时候，我喜欢在家做饭或者看电影。Zhōumò de shíhou, wǒ xǐhuan zài jiā zuòfàn huòzhě kàn diànyǐng. During the weekend, I like to cook or watch movies at home. src
你去或者她去，都可以。Nǐ qù huòzhě tā qù, dōu kěyǐ. You go or she goes, either way is fine. src
下班以后我去你家或者你来我家，都可以。Xiàbān yǐhòu wǒ qù nǐ jiā huòzhě nǐ lái wǒ jiā, dōu kěyǐ. After work I will go to your house, or you can come to my house, either way is fine. src
下个月我打算去杭州或者苏州旅行。Xià gè yuè wǒ dǎsuàn qù Hángzhōu huòzhě Sūzhōu lǚxíng. Next month I plan to go to Hangzhou or Suzhou to travel. src
我们可以坐飞机或者坐高铁去。Wǒmen kěyǐ zuò fēijī huòzhě zuò gāotiě qù. We can go by plane or by high-speed train. src
晚饭以后我和家人聊天或者看电视。Wǎnfàn yǐhòu wǒ hé jiārén liáotiān huòzhě kàn diànshì. After dinner I chat with or watch TV with my family. src
你可以用手机或者电脑上网。Nǐ kěyǐ yòng shǒujī huòzhě diànnǎo shàngwǎng. You can use either a cell phone or computer to go online. src
那个⋯⋯我不跟你们一起去了，可以吗？Nèige... wǒ bù gēn nǐmen yīqǐ qù le, kěyǐ ma? So, ummm... I won't go with you guys, OK? src
我想吃那个⋯⋯那个⋯⋯湖南菜。Wǒ xiǎng chī nèige... nèige... Húnán cài. I want to eat that... ummm, you know... Hunan cuisine. src
那个⋯⋯我明天不来了。Nèige... wǒ míngtiān bù lái le. Ummm... I'm not coming tomorrow. src
那个⋯⋯这样做不好吧？Nèige... zhèyàng zuò bù hǎo ba? Ummm, it's not good to do it this way? src
那个⋯⋯你可以做我的女朋友吗？Nèige... nǐ kěyǐ zuò wǒ de nǚpéngyou ma? Like... could you be my girlfriend? src
那个⋯⋯不好意思，我要走了。Nèige... bù hǎoyìsi, wǒ yào zǒu le. Ummmm... sorry, but I've gotta go. src
她很漂亮，就像那个⋯⋯明星一样。Tā hěn piàoliang, jiù xiàng nèige... míngxīng yīyàng. She's very pretty, just like, you know, a celebrity. src
我想看看你买的那个⋯⋯那个⋯⋯iPhone。Wǒ xiǎng kànkan nǐ mǎi de nèige... nèige... iPhone. I'd like to take a look at your, ummm, you know... iPhone you bought. src
那个⋯⋯我要去开会了。Nèige... wǒ yào qù kāihuì le. Ummm... I have to attend a meeting. src
昨天那个⋯⋯那个⋯⋯小笼包真好吃。Zuótiān nèige... nèige... xiǎolóngbāo zhēn hǎochī. Yesterday the, you know, steamed soup dumplings were so delicious. src
我昨天跟朋友去海滩了。Wǒ zuótiān gēn péngyou qù hǎitān le. I went to the beach with friends yesterday. src
不要跟我说话！Bùyào gēn wǒ shuōhuà! Don't talk to me! src

你什么时候跟你女朋友结婚？Nǐ shénme shíhou gēn nǐ nǚpéngyou jiéhūn? When are you gonna marry your girlfriend? src

你想跟我一起去吗？Nǐ xiǎng gēn wǒ yīqǐ qù ma? Do you want to go with me? src
请你们跟老师一起读。Qǐng nǐmen gēn lǎoshī yīqǐ dú. Please read together with the teacher. src
下周谁跟老板一起出差？Xià zhōu shéi gēn lǎobǎn yīqǐ chūchāi? Who is going on a business trip together with the boss next week? src
结婚以后，你想跟父母一起住吗？Jiéhūn yǐhòu, nǐ xiǎng gēn fùmǔ yīqǐ zhù ma? Do you want live together with your parents after you get married? src
今年中秋节你会跟家人一起过吗？Jīnnián Zhōngqiūjié nǐ huì gēn jiārén yīqǐ guò ma? Are you going to spend this Mid-Autumn Festival with your family? src
我要跟你见面。Wǒ yào gēn nǐ jiànmiàn. I want to meet with you. src
我昨天跟他见面了。Wǒ zuótiān gēn tā jiànmiàn le. I met with him yesterday. src
你什么时候跟她见面？Nǐ shénme shíhou gēn tā jiànmiàn? When are you going to meet with her? src

你有没有跟Obama见过面？Nǐ yǒu méiyǒu gēn Obama jiàn guo miàn? Have you ever met Obama? src
跟我读。Gēn wǒ dú. Read after me. src
跟我一起读。Gēn wǒ yīqǐ dú. Read with me. src
我喜欢他，可是他不喜欢我。Wǒ xǐhuan tā, kěshì tā bù xǐhuan wǒ. I like him, but he doesn't like me. src
我很想去，但是我太忙了。Wǒ hěn xiǎng qù, dànshì wǒ tài máng le. I really want to go, but I am too busy. src
中文很有意思，但是也很难。Zhōngwén hěn yǒuyìsi, dànshì yě hěn nán. Chinese is very interesting, but it is also very hard. src
我喜欢这件衬衫，可是太贵了。Wǒ xǐhuan zhè jiàn chènshān, kěshì tài guì le. I like this shirt, but it is too expensive. src

iPhone很好，但是我没钱买。iPhone hěn hǎo, dànshì wǒ méi qián mǎi. The iPhone is great, but I don't have the money to buy it. src
你们可以在这里看书，可是不可以说话。Nǐ kěyǐ zài zhèlǐ kàn shū, kěshì bù kěyǐ shuōhuà. You can read books here, but you can't talk. src
你可以吃，但是不可以吃太多。Nǐ kěyǐ chī, dànshì bù kěyǐ chī tài duō. You can eat, but you can't eat too much. src
他说五点来见我，但是他没来。Tā shuō wǔ diǎn lái jiàn wǒ, dànshì tā méi lái. He said he would come to see me at five, but he didn't. src
这个地方很漂亮，但是人太多了。Zhège dìfang hěn piàoliang, dànshì rén tài duō le. This place is beautiful, but there are too many people. src
下午三点以后，我不在家。Xiàwǔ sāndiǎn yǐhòu, wǒ bù zài jiā. After three p.m., I will not be at home. src

她一个月以后开始上班。Tā yī gè yuè yǐhòu kāishǐ shàngbān. After one month, she will start working. src
吃完午饭以后，我们要开会。Chī wán wǔfàn yǐhòu, wǒmen yào kāihuì. We are going to have a meeting after we finish lunch. src
几年以后，我们公司会更大。Jǐ nián yǐhòu, wǒmen gōngsī huì gèng dà. In a few years, our company will be even bigger. src
老板半个小时以后回来。Lǎobǎn bàn gè xiǎoshí yǐhòu huílái. After half an hour, the boss will return. src
下班以后你想跟我们一起去打球吗?Xiàbān yǐhòu, nǐ xiǎng gēn wǒmen yīqǐ qù dǎqiú ma? After we get off work, would you like to go play ball with us? src
老板来了以后，大家都不说话了。Lǎobǎn lái le yǐhòu, dàjiā dōu bù shuōhuà le. After the boss came, everyone stopped talking. src
你到家以后给我打电话。Nǐ dào jiā yǐhòu gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà. After you get home, call me. src

吃饭以前，你洗手了吗？Chīfàn yǐqián, nǐ xǐ shǒu le ma? Did you wash your hands before eating? src
睡觉以前，不要吃东西。Shuìjiào yǐqián, bùyào chī dōngxi. Don't eat anything before you go to sleep. src
两年以前，你认识他吗？Liǎng nián yǐqián, nǐ rènshi tā ma? Did you know him two years ago? src
星期五以前，你要做完这些工作。Xīngqīwǔ yǐqián, nǐ yào zuò wán zhèxiē gōngzuò. You need to finish this work before Friday. src
上大学以前，你来过上海吗？Shàng dàxué yǐqián, nǐ lái guo shànghǎi ma? Before you went to college, did you ever come to Shanghai? src
结婚以前，你应该先买房子。Jiéhūn yǐqián, nǐ yīnggāi xiān mǎi fángzi. Before getting married, you should first buy a house. src
二十年以前，这里是一个公园。Èrshí nián yǐqián, zhèlǐ shì yī gè gōngyuán. Twenty years ago, this was a park. src
几个月以前，他们分手了。Jǐ gè yuè yǐqián, tāmen fēnshǒu le. They broke up a few months ago. src
毕业以前，我要找到工作。Bìyè yǐqián, wǒ yào zhǎodào gōngzuò. I need to find a job before graduation. src
当总统以前，Obama没有白头发。Dāng zǒngtǒng yǐqián, Obama méiyǒu bái tóufa. Before he became the president, Obama didn't have white hair. src
以前我不会说中文。Yǐqián wǒ bù huì shuō Zhōngwén. Before, I could not speak Chinese. src
你以前住在哪儿？Nǐ yǐqián zhù zài nǎr? Before, where did you live? src
以前我不认识他。Yǐqián wǒ bù rènshi tā. Before, I didn't know him. src
以前他是我们的客户吗？Yǐqián tā shì wǒmen de kèhù ma? Was he our client before? src
以前他是一个服务员，现在是老板。Yǐqián tā shì yī gè fúwùyuán, xiànzài shì lǎobǎn. Before, he was a waiter. Now, he is a boss. src
我父母以前都是老师。Wǒ fùmǔ yǐqián dōu shì lǎoshī. Before, both of my parents were teachers. src
爸爸以前很喜欢抽烟。Bàba yǐqián hěn xǐhuan chōuyān. Before, dad really liked smoking. src
姐姐以前有一个很有钱的男朋友。Jiějie yǐqián yǒu yī gè hěn yǒuqián de nánpéngyou. My older sister had a very rich boyfriend before. src
他们以前没有钱，可是很快乐。Tāmen yǐqián méiyǒu qián, kěshì hěn kuàilè. They didn't have much money before, but they were happy. src
我男朋友以前在美国工作，现在在中国工作。Wǒ nánpéngyou yǐqián zài Měiguó gōngzuò, xiànzài zài Zhōngguó gōngzuò. Before, my boyfriend worked in the USA. Now, he works in China. src
你刚才说什么了？Nǐ gāngcái shuō shénme le? What did you just say? src
刚才谁来了？Gāngcái shéi lái le? Who came just now? src
刚才你去哪儿了？Gāngcái nǐ qù nǎr le? Where did you go just now? src
刚才我去洗手间了。Gāngcái wǒ qù xǐshǒujiān le. I just went to the restroom. src
老板刚才生气了。Lǎobǎn gāngcái shēngqì le. The boss just got angry. src
你们刚才在看什么？Nǐmen gāngcái zài kàn shénme? What were you looking at just now? src
不好意思，我刚才出去了。Bù hǎoyìsi, wǒ gāngcái chūqù le. I'm sorry, I just now stepped out. src
宝宝刚才哭了。Bǎobao gāngcái kū le. The baby just cried. src
他们刚才去开会了。Tāmen gāngcái qù kāihuì le. They just went to a meeting. src
刚才有人找你。Gāngcái yǒu rén zhǎo nǐ. Just now, there was someone looking for you. src
你不在的时候，我会想你。Nǐ bù zài de shíhou, wǒ huì xiǎng nǐ. When you are not here, I'll miss you. src
我上大学的时候，有很多朋友。Wǒ shàng dàxué de shíhou, yǒu hěn duō péngyou. When I was in college, I had a lot of friends. src
上课的时候不要吃东西。Shàngkè de shíhou bùyào chī dōngxi. Don't eat when you are in class. src
老板工作的时候喜欢喝咖啡。Lǎobǎn gōngzuò de shíhou xǐhuan hē kāfēi. When the boss works, he likes to drink coffee. src
我生气的时候，请你不要笑。Wǒ shēngqì de shíhou, qǐng nǐ bùyào xiào. Please don't laugh when I'm angry. src
妈妈不在家的时候，我自己做饭。Māma bù zài jiā de shíhou, wǒ zìjǐ zuòfàn. When mom is not home, I cook for myself. src
开会的时候不要聊天。Kāihuì de shíhou bùyào liáotiān. Don't chat when you are in a meeting. src
吃东西的时候不要说话。Chī dōngxi de shíhou bùyào shuōhuà. Don't talk when eating. src
你开车的时候会打电话吗？Nǐ kāichē de shíhou huì dǎ diànhuà ma? Do you talk on the phone when you're driving? src
走路的时候不要玩手机。Zǒulù de shíhou bùyào wán shǒujī. Don't play with your phone while walking. src

以后你想来中国吗？Yǐhòu nǐ xiǎng lái Zhōngguó ma? In the future, do you want to come to China? src
我以后不喝酒了。Wǒ yǐhòu bù hējiǔ le. I will not drink alcohol in the future. src
我们以后不在这里工作了。Wǒmen yǐhòu bù zài zhèlǐ gōngzuò le. We will not work here in the future. src

以后你们想去哪儿工作？Yǐhòu nǐmen xiǎng qù nǎr gōngzuò? In the future, where would you like to work? src

以后你可以住在这里。Yǐhòu nǐ kěyǐ zhù zài zhèlǐ. In the future, you can live here. src
他们以后会结婚吗？Tāmen yǐhòu huì jiéhūn ma? Will they get married in the future? src

一两天yī liǎng tiān one or two days src
三四个人sān sì gè rén three or four people src
老板昨天喝了七八瓶胡萝卜汁。Lǎobǎn zuótiān hē le qī bā píng húluóbo zhī. The boss drank 7 or 8 bottles of carrot juice yesterday. src
这个词我们学过两三次了。Zhège cí wǒmen xué guo liǎng sān cì le. We've studied this word two or three times now. src
我等了你三四个小时。Wǒ děng le nǐ sān sì gè xiǎoshí. I waited for you for three or four hours. src
他们七八年没见面了。Tāmen qī bā nián méi jiànmiàn le. They haven't seen each other for seven or eight years. src
要做完这个工作需要一两个月。Yào zuò wán zhège gōngzuò xūyào yī liǎng gè yuè. To complete this work, you need one to two months. src
他们家的孩子五六岁了吧。Tāmen jiā de háizi wǔ liù suì le ba. Their child is about five or six years old. src
这件衣服只要七八十块钱。Zhè jiàn yīfu zhǐ yào qī bā shí kuài qián. This clothing only costs seventy to eighty kuai. src
这几本书花了我两三百。Zhè jǐ běn shū huā le wǒ liǎng sān bǎi. These few books cost me two or three hundred kuai. src
一百万yībǎi wàn 1 million src
十四亿shísì yì 1.4 billion src
五万两千一百五十二wǔwàn liǎngqiān yībǎi wǔshí-èr 52152 src
二百九十一万四千六百八十èrbǎi jiǔshí-yī wàn sìqiān liùbǎi bāshí 2914680 src
七百八十九万零二百九十八qībǎi bāshí-jiǔ wàn líng èrbǎi jiǔshí-bā 7890298 src
两千七百二十一万四千八百九十六liǎngqiān qībǎi èrshí-yī wàn sìqiān bābǎi jiǔshí-liù 27214896 src
五千三百七十九万八千两百五十wǔqiān sānbǎi qīshí-jiǔ wàn bāqiān liǎngbǎi wǔshí 53798250 src
四亿一千四百二十九万四千一百八十二sìyì yīqiān sìbǎi èrshí-jiǔ wàn sìqiān yībǎi bāshí-èr 414294182 src
十三亿两千六百八十万shísān yì liǎngqiān liùbǎi bāshí wàn 1326800000 src
两百五十一亿五千八百三十六万七千二百liǎngbǎi wǔshí-yī yì wǔqiān bābǎi sānshí-liù wàn qīqiān èrbǎi 25158367200 src
一点四十分yī diǎn sìshí fēn 1:40 src
两点十分liǎng diǎn shí fēn 2:10 src
三点二十分sān diǎn èrshí fēn 3:20 src
七点十五分qī diǎn shíwǔ fēn 7:15 src
九点五十分jiǔ diǎn wǔshí fēn 9:50 src
两点零九分liǎng diǎn líng jiǔ fēn 2:09 src
三点零八分sān diǎn líng bā fēn 3:08 src
五点零三分wǔ diǎn líng sān fēn 5:03 src
七点零一分qī diǎn líng yī fēn 7:01 src
八点零五分bā diǎn líng wǔ fēn 8:05 src
九点一刻jiǔ diǎn yī kè 9:15 src
十二点一刻shí'èr diǎn yī kè 12:15 src
六点三刻liù diǎn sān kè 6:45 src
差五分三点chā wǔ fēn sān diǎn five minutes til 3 o'clock src
十二点差三分shí'èr diǎn chā sān fēn three minutes til 12 o'clock src
差五分八点半chā wǔ fēn bā diǎn bàn five minutes til 8:30 src
十点差两分shí diǎn chā liǎng fēn two minutes til 10:00 src
桌子上有几本书。Zhuōzi shàng yǒu jǐ běn shū. There are a few books on the table. src
只有几个人去过那个地方。Zhǐyǒu jǐ gè rén qù guo nàge dìfang. Only a few people have been to that place. src
从上海到东京坐飞机只要几个小时。Cóng Shànghǎi dào Dōngjīng zuò fēijī zhǐ yào jǐ gè xiǎoshí. Flying from Shanghai to Tokyo only takes a few hours. src
我每天都要喝几杯咖啡。Wǒ měi tiān dōu yào hē jǐ bēi kāfēi. Every day I have to drink a couple cups of coffee. src
老板今天开了几个重要的会。Lǎobǎn jīntiān kāi le jǐ gè zhòngyào de huì. The boss had a few important meetings today. src
他只想学几十个汉字。Tā zhǐ xiǎng xué jǐ shí gè Hànzì. He only wants to study a few dozen Chinese characters. src
我们公司有几十个员工。Wǒmen gōngsī yǒu jǐ shí gè yuángōng. Our company has a few dozen employees. src
他写过几十本书，我都喜欢。Tā xiě guo jǐ shí běn shū, wǒ dōu xǐhuan. He wrote a few dozen books. I like them all. src
这个年轻的演员演了几十部电影。我都喜欢。Zhège niánqīng de yǎnyuán yǎn le jǐ shí bù diànyǐng. Wǒ dōu xǐhuan. This young actor has acted in dozens of movies. I like them all. src
老板在国外有几十套房子。Lǎobǎn zài guówài yǒu jǐ shí tào fángzi. The boss has a few dozen houses abroad. src
妈妈每个月都给我几百块钱。Māma měi gè yuè dōu gěi wǒ jǐ bǎi kuài qián. Mom gives me a couple hundred dollars every month. src
这个月我们卖了几千本书。Zhège yuè wǒmen mài le jǐ qiān běn shū. We sold a couple thousand books this month. src
几百家外国公司参加了这个大会。Jǐ bǎi jiā wàiguó gōngsī cānjiā le zhège dàhuì. Several hundred foreign companies attended this conference. src
这篇文章有几万个字，太长了。Zhè piān wénzhāng yǒu jǐ wàn gè zì, tài cháng le. This article has tens of thousands of characters. It's too long. src
我认识一个朋友，她有几百双鞋。Wǒ rènshi yī gè péngyou, tā yǒu jǐ bǎi shuāng xié. I have a friend that has a couple hundred pairs of shoes. src
他读了好几遍。Tā dú le hǎojǐ biàn. He's read quite a few times. src
我有好几个室友。Wǒ yǒu hǎojǐ gè shìyǒu. I have quite a few roommates. src
我奶奶有好几个孩子。Wǒ nǎinai yǒu hǎojǐ gè háizi. My grandma has quite a few children. src
他吃了好几碗米饭。Tā chī le hǎojǐ wǎn mǐfàn. He ate quite a few bowls of rice. src
我们去过好几次北京。Wǒmen qù guo hǎojǐ cì Běijīng. We've been to Beijing quite a few times. src
下雨了。Xià yǔ le. It's raining. src
妈妈老了。Māma lǎo le. Mom is old. src
你胖了。Nǐ pàng le. You've gotten fat. src
家里没有牛奶了。Jiālǐ méiyǒu niúnǎi le. We don't have any milk at home. src
爸爸今年50岁了。Bàba jīnnián wǔshí suì le. Dad is 50 years old this year. src
手机没电了。Shǒujī méi diàn le. The cell phone ran out of power. src
宝宝会说话了。Bǎobao huì shuōhuà le. The baby can speak. src
你哥哥有女朋友了吗？Nǐ gēge yǒu nǚpéngyou le ma? Does your older brother have a girlfriend? src
我男朋友找到新工作了。Wǒ nánpéngyou zhǎodào xīn gōngzuò le. My boyfriend found a new job. src
你老婆怀孕了吗？Nǐ lǎopo huáiyùn le ma? Is your wife pregnant? src
A:太贵了！ B:好吧，我们可以看看别的。Tài guì le! Hǎo ba, wǒmen kěyǐ kànkan biéde. That's too expensive!<br />All right, we can take a look at something else. src
A:下午我不在家，你可以晚上来吗？ B:行吧。Xiàwǔ wǒ bù zài jiā, nǐ kěyǐ wǎnshang lái ma? Xíng ba. This afternoon I won't be home. Can you come by this evening?<br />All right. src
A:雨太大了，明天再去买吧。 B:好吧，但是明天一定要买到。Yǔ tài dà le, míngtiān zài qù mǎi ba. Hǎo ba, dànshì míngtiān yídìng yào mǎidào. It's raining heavily. Let's go buy it tomorrow.<br />Fine, but tomorrow we definitely have to buy it. src
A:可以带朋友吗？ B:行吧，但是不能带女孩。Kěyǐ dài péngyou ma ? Xíng ba, dànshì bù néng dài nǚhái. Can I bring friends?<br />All right, but you can't bring girls. src
A:我今天不太舒服，你可以自己去吗？ B:好吧，那你好好休息。Wǒ jīntiān bù tài shūfu, nǐ kěyǐ zìjǐ qù ma? Hǎo ba, nà nǐ hǎohǎo xiūxi. I'm not feeling well today. Can you go by yourself?<br />All right, rest well then. src
A:老板呢？ B:他走了。Lǎobǎn ne? Tā zǒu le. Where is the boss?<br />He (already) left. src
A:孩子还在上大学吗？ B:他们工作了。Háizi hái zài shàng dàxué ma? Tāmen gōngzuò le. Are your kids still in college?<br />They (already) work. src
A:用我的车吧？ B:谢谢，我们有车了。Yòng wǒ de chē ba? Xièxie, wǒmen yǒu chē le. How about using my car?<br />Thanks. We (already) have a car. src
A:你要不要告诉他？ B:他知道了。Nǐ yào bu yào gàosu tā? Tā zhīdào le. Are you going to tell him?<br />He (already) knows. src
A:你应该问老师。 B:我问了。Nǐ yīnggāi wèn lǎoshī. Wǒ wèn le. You should ask the teacher.<br />I (already) asked. src
我不想吃了。Wǒ bù xiǎng chī le. I don't want to eat anymore. src
你不喜欢我了吗？Nǐ bù xǐhuan wǒ le ma? You don't like me anymore? src
你们不能打了。Nǐmen bù néng dǎ le. You can't fight anymore. src
没有纸了。Méiyǒu zhǐ le. There's no paper anymore. src
他没有家了。Tā méiyǒu jiā le. He doesn't have his home anymore. src
我已经不住这里了。Wǒ yǐjīng bù zhù zhèlǐ le. I don't live here anymore. src
他已经不在这儿工作了。Tā yǐjīng bù zài zhèr gōngzuò le. He doesn't work here anymore. src
他们已经不在一起了。Tāmen yǐjīng bù zài yīqǐ le. They are no longer together. src
我们已经没钱了。Wǒmen yǐjīng méi qián le. We all don't have any more money. src
知道了。Zhīdào le. Got it. / I see. src
懂了。Dǒng le. Now I understand. src
吃饭了！Chīfàn le! Time to eat! src
我走了。Wǒ zǒu le. I'm leaving now. src
他来了。Tā lái le. He's coming over now. / He's on the way. src
上课了！Shàngkè le! Class begins now! src
我去睡觉了。Wǒ qù shuìjiào le. I'm going to bed now. src
快点儿，开会了！Kuài diǎnr, kāihuì le! Hurry up, it's time for the meeting now! src
该你了。Gāi nǐ le. It's your turn now. src
电影开始了！Diànyǐng kāishǐ le! The movie is starting now! src
你今天早上吃了什么？Nǐ jīntiān zǎoshang chī le shénme? What did you eat this morning? src
他买了一个新手机。Tā mǎi le yī gè xīn shǒujī. He bought a new cell phone. src
昨天晚上我看见了UFO。Zuótiān wǎnshang wǒ kànjiàn le UFO. I saw a UFO last night. src
我学了两年中文。Wǒ xué le liǎng nián Zhōngwén. I studied Chinese for two years. src
今年夏天我跟我男朋友去了台湾。Jīnnián xiàtiān wǒ gēn wǒ nánpéngyou qù le Táiwān. I went to Taiwan with my boyfriend this summer. src
你到了告诉我。Nǐ dào le gàosu wǒ. When you have arrived, tell me. src
老板走了以后，你们可以走。Lǎobǎn zǒu le yǐhòu, nǐmen kěyǐ zǒu. After the boss has left, you may leave. src
你找到了以后，给我打电话。Nǐ zhǎodào​ le yǐhòu, gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà. After you have found it, give me a call. src
你们吃了饭以后，可以出去。Nǐmen chī le fàn yǐhòu, kěyǐ chūqù. After you have eaten your food, you can go out. src
下了课以后，我要问老师一些问题。Xià le kè yǐhòu, wǒ yào wèn lǎoshī yīxiē wèntí. After class is over, I need to ask the teacher a few questions. src
你学过中文吗？Nǐ xué guo Zhōngwén ma? Have you ever studied Chinese? src
你见过那个人吗？Nǐ jiàn guo nàge rén ma? Have you seen that person before? src
我们来过这个地方。Wǒmen lái guo zhège dìfang. We've been to this place before. src
我也吃过日本菜。Wǒ yě chī guo Rìběn cài. I've also eaten Japanese food before. src
你看过这个电影吗？Nǐ kàn guo zhège diànyǐng ma? Have you seen this movie? src
我没想过这个问题。Wǒ méi xiǎng guo zhège wèntí. I've never thought about this question before. src
我没学过这个词。Wǒ méi xué guo zhège cí. I have never studied this word before. src
妈妈没买过很贵的衣服。Māma méi mǎi guo hěn guì de yīfu. Mom has never bought any expensive clothes before. src
我们都没坐过飞机。Wǒmen dōu méi zuò guo fēijī. None of us has ever been on a airplane before. src
你们没见过美女吗？Nǐmen méi jiàn guo měinǚ ma? Have you never seen beautiful girls before? src
对啊！Duì a! You're right! src
这里好漂亮啊！Zhèlǐ hǎo piàoliang a! This place is so pretty! src
你家真大啊！Nǐ jiā zhēn dà a! Your house is so big. src
学中文真难啊！Xué Zhōngwén zhēn nán a! Learning Chinese is so hard! src
好香啊！什么东西？Hǎo xiāng a! Shénme dōngxi? It smells great! What is it? src
是啊，我也觉得！Shì a, wǒ yě juéde! Definitely, I think so too! src
行啊！Xíng a! All right! src
可以啊！Kěyǐ a! It's fine! src
小心啊！Xiǎoxīn a! Be careful! src
吃啊！Chī a! Eat some! src
你走不走啊？Nǐ zǒu bu zǒu a? Are you going or what? src
你吃不吃啊？Nǐ chī bu chī a? Are you eating or not? src
谁说的啊？Shéi shuō de a? Who said so? src
你傻啊？Nǐ shǎ a? What are you, stupid? src
看什么啊？没见过漂亮姑娘啊？Kàn shénme a? Méi jiàn guo piàoliang gūniang a? What are you looking at? Have you never seen a pretty girl before? src
这不太好吧。Zhè bù tài hǎo ba. This isn't so good. src
算了吧。Suàn le ba. Let's forget it. src
应该是吧。Yīnggāi shì ba. It should be. src
钱太少了吧。Qián tài shǎo le ba. It's too little money. src
再等一等吧。Zài děng yī děng ba. Wait a little longer. src
太晚了，不要走了吧。Tài wǎn le, bùyào zǒu le ba. It's too late now, don't leave. src
你们早点来吧。Nǐmen zǎo diǎn lái ba. Come a little earlier. src
快点吧，要迟到了。Kuài diǎn ba, yào chídào le. Please hurry, we're going to be late. src
太贵了吧，我不买了。Tài guì le ba, wǒ bù mǎi le. It's too expensive. I'm not buying it. src
那个地方太远了吧，我不想去。Nàge dìfang tài yuǎn le ba，wǒ bù xiǎng qù. That place is too far away. I don't want to go. src

我女朋友的公司wǒ nǚpéngyou de gōngsī my girlfriend's company src
做得很好zuò de hěn hǎo do very well src
说得太快shuō de tài kuài speak too fast src
玩得很开心wán de hěn kāixīn play very happily src
开得很快kāi de hěn kuài drive very fast src
住得很舒服zhù de hěn shūfu live very comfortably src
生气地说shēngqì de shuō angrily say src
开心地笑kāixīn de xiào happily laugh src
慢慢地走mànmàn de zǒu slowly walk src
伤心地哭shāngxīn de kū sadly cry src
认真地听rènzhēn de tīng carefully listen src
今天的作业你做得不好，因为你没认真地听课。Jīntiān de zuòyè nǐ zuò de bù hǎo, yīnwèi nǐ méi rènzhēn de tīngkè. You didn't do today's homework well because you didn't listen attentively in class. src
她吃过了。Tā chī guo le. She has eaten (already). src
牙刷过了。Yá shuā guo le. I've brushed my teeth (already). src
洗过了。Xǐ guo le. I've showered (already). src
我们看过了。Wǒmen kàn guo le. We've seen it (already). src
他们见过了。Tāmen jiàn guo le. They've met (already). src
你吃过饭了吗？Nǐ chī guo fàn le ma? Have you eaten (already)? src
我刷过牙了。Wǒ shuā guo yá le. I have brushed my teeth (already). src
他洗过澡了。Tā xǐ guo zǎo le. He has showered (already). src
我给他打过电话了。Wǒ gěi tā dǎ guo diànhuà le. I called him (already). src
客户看过合同了吗？Kèhù kàn guo hétong le ma? Has the client read the contract (already)? src
她已经吃过饭了。Tā yǐjīng chī guo fàn le. She has already eaten (a meal). src
我已经刷过牙了。Wǒ yǐjīng shuā guo yá le. I have already brushed my teeth. src
他已经洗过澡了。Tā yǐjīng xǐ guo zǎo le. He has already had a shower. src
A:她想吃饭吗？ B:她已经吃过饭了。Tā xiǎng chīfàn ma? Tā yǐjīng chī guo fàn le. Does she want to eat?<br />She has already eaten. src
A:别忘记刷牙。 B:我已经刷过牙了。Bié wàngjì shuā yá. Wǒ yǐjīng shuā guo yá le. Don't forget to brush your teeth.<br />I have already brushed my teeth. src
A:他应该洗澡。 B:他已经洗过了。Tā yīnggāi xǐzǎo. Tā yǐjīng xǐ guo le. He should take a shower.<br />He has already showered. src
小李比小张高。Xiǎo Lǐ bǐ Xiǎo Zhāng gāo . Xiao Li is taller than Xiao Zhang. src
小张比小李矮。Xiǎo Zhāng bǐ Xiǎo Lǐ ǎi . Xiao Zhang is shorter than Xiao Li. src
他比老师聪明。Tā bǐ lǎoshī cōngming. He is smarter than the teacher. src
上海比纽约大吗？Shànghǎi bǐ Niǔyuē dà ma? Is Shanghai bigger than New York? src
她比她妈妈漂亮。Tā bǐ tā māma piàoliang . She is prettier than her mother. src
星巴克的咖啡比这里的咖啡贵。Xīngbākè de kāfēi bǐ zhèlǐ de kāfēi guì. The coffee at Starbucks is more expensive than the coffee here. src
地铁比公交车方便。Dìtiě bǐ gōngjiāochē fāngbiàn. The subway is more convenient than the bus. src
你比我聪明。Nǐ bǐ wǒ cōngming . You are smarter than me. src
我跟你一样聪明。Wǒ gēn nǐ yīyàng cōngming. I am as smart as you. src
小李比小张更高。Xiǎo Lǐ bǐ Xiǎo Zhāng gèng gāo . Xiao Li is even taller than Xiao Zhang. src
我哥哥比我更高。Wǒ gēge bǐ wǒ gèng gāo. My big brother is even taller than me. src
你男朋友比我男朋友更帅。Nǐ nánpéngyou bǐ wǒ nánpéngyou gèng shuài. Your boyfriend is even more handsome than mine. src
这里的冬天比纽约的冬天更冷。Zhèlǐ de dōngtiān bǐ Niǔyuē de dōngtiān gèng lěng. The winter here is even colder than it is in New York. src
中文语法比汉字更好玩。Zhōngwén yǔfǎ bǐ Hànzì gèng hǎowán. Chinese grammar is even more fun than Chinese characters. src
你的问题比我的问题更麻烦。Nǐ de wèntí bǐ wǒ de wèntí gèng máfan. Your problem is even more troublesome than mine. src
从2004年到2008年cóng èr-líng-líng-sì nián dào èr-líng-líng-bā nián from 2004 to 2008 src
从一号到五号都在下雨。Cóng yī hào dào wǔ hào dōu zài xiàyǔ. From the first to the fifth, it's been raining non-stop. src
老板从周二到周五都要出差。Lǎobǎn cóng Zhōuèr dào Zhōuwǔ dōu yào chūchāi. From Tuesday until Friday the boss will go on a business trip. src
她从18岁到现在都一个人住。Tā cóng shíbā suì dào xiànzài dōu yīgèrén zhù. She's lived alone since she was 18 until now. src
你不能从早到晚不吃东西。Nǐ bù néng cóng zǎo dào wǎn bù chī dōngxi. You can't eat nothing from morning to night. src
从南京西路到南京东路cóng Nánjīng Xī Lù dào Nánjīng Dōng Lù from West Nanjing Road to East Nanjing Road src
从酒店到机场不太远。Cóng jiǔdiàn dào jīchǎng bù tài yuǎn. From the hotel to the airport is not too far. src
从上海到北京要几个小时。Cóng Shànghǎi dào Běijīng yào jǐ gè xiǎoshí. From Shanghai to Beijing it takes a few hours. src
从你家到机场可以坐地铁吗？Cóng nǐ jiā dào jīchǎng kěyǐ zuò dìtiě ma? From your place to the airport, can I take the subway? src
从这里到我们公司，你会看见很多美女。Cóng zhèlǐ dào wǒmen gōngsī, nǐ huì kànjiàn hěn duō měinǚ. From here to our company, you'll see many beautiful girls. src
小张没有小李高。Xiǎo Zhāng méiyǒu Xiǎo Lǐ gāo. Xiao Zhang is not as tall as Xiao Li. src
小李没有小张矮。Xiǎo Lǐ méiyǒu Xiǎo Zhāng ǎi. Xiao Li is not as short as Xiao Zhang. src
这个地方没有上海好玩。Zhège dìfang méiyǒu Shànghǎi hǎowán. This place is not as fun as Shanghai. src
火车没有飞机快。Huǒchē méiyǒu fēijī kuài. Trains are not as fast as airplanes. src
他没有他弟弟聪明。Tā méiyǒu tā dìdi cōngming. He's not as smart as his younger brother. src
Clinton没有Obama帅。Clinton méiyǒu Obama shuài. Clinton is not as handsome as Obama. src
马云没有BillGates有钱。Mǎyún méiyǒu Bill Gates yǒuqián. Jack Ma is not as rich as Bill Gates. src
你们公司没有我们公司大。Nǐmen gōngsī méiyǒu wǒmen gōngsī dà. Your company is not as big as ours. src
拼音没有汉字难。Pīnyīn méiyǒu Hànzì nán. Pinyin is not as difficult as Chinese characters. src
坐公交车没有坐地铁方便。Zuò gōngjiāochē méiyǒu zuò dìtiě fāngbiàn. Taking the bus is not as convenient as taking the metro. src
小米手机没有iPhone贵。Xiǎomǐ shǒujī méiyǒu iPhone guì. The Xiaomi phone is not as expensive as the iPhone. src
爸爸做的菜没有妈妈做的菜好吃。Bàba zuò de cài méiyǒu māma zuò de cài hǎochī. The food dad cooks is not as tasty as the food mom cooks. src
妈妈要去超市。Māma yào qù chāoshì. Mom will go to the supermarket. src
老板今天来公司吗？Lǎobǎn jīntiān lái gōngsī ma? Is the boss coming into the office today? src
你现在来南京路吧。Nǐ xiànzài lái Nánjīng Lù ba. Come to Nanjing Road now. src
你不想来我们公司工作吗？Nǐ bù xiǎng lái wǒmen gōngsī gōngzuò ma? Do you not want to come to work for our company? src
去年她去美国工作了几个月。Qùnián tā qù Měiguó gōngzuò le jǐ gè yuè. Last year she went to work in the USA for a few months. src
你们想去Starbucks还是Costa？Nǐmen xiǎng qù Starbucks háishì Costa? Would you like to go to Starbucks or Costa? src
周末我喜欢去朋友家。Zhōumò wǒ xǐhuan qù péngyou jiā. I like to go to my friends' places on the weekends. src
爸爸明天去北京出差。Bàba míngtiān qù Běijīng chūchāi. Dad will go to Beijing on a business trip tomorrow. src
我今天不上班，你们可以来我家吃饭。Wǒ jīntiān bù shàngbān, nǐmen kěyǐ lái wǒ jiā chīfàn. I don't have to go to work today. You can come to my home to eat dinner. src
你要什么？Nǐ yào shénme? What do you want? src
我要一杯水。Wǒ yào yī bēi shuǐ. I want a cup of water. src
你们都要冰可乐吗？Nǐmen dōu yào bīng kělè ma? Do you all want coke with ice? src
你要茶还是咖啡？Nǐ yào chá háishì kāfēi? Do you want tea or coffee? src
我们要三碗米饭。Wǒmen yào sān wǎn mǐfàn. We want three bowls of rice. src
你要喝什么酒？Nǐ yào hē shénme jiǔ? What kind of wine do you want to drink? src
爸爸要买一个新手机。Bàba yào mǎi yī gè xīn shǒujī. Dad wants to buy a new cell phone. src
我要跟你一起去。Wǒ yào gēn nǐ yīqǐ qù. I want to go with you. src
她要去大城市找工作。Tā yào qù dà chéngshì zhǎo gōngzuò. She wants to go to a big city to find a job. src
周末你们要一起看电影吗？Zhōumò nǐmen yào yīqǐ kàn diànyǐng ma? Do you want to go see a movie together this weekend? src
你要早点睡觉。Nǐ yào zǎo diǎn shuìjiào. You need to go to bed earlier. src
我们明天要上班。Wǒmen míngtiān yào shàngbān. We need to work tomorrow. src
老板今天要见一个新客户。Lǎobǎn jīntiān yào jiàn yī gè xīn kèhù. Today the boss needs to see a new client. src
老师太累了，要好好休息。Lǎoshī tài lèi le, yào hǎohǎo xiūxi. The teacher is too tired. She needs to rest well. src
明天下雨，你要带伞。Míngtiān xiàyǔ, nǐ yào dài sǎn. It's going to rain tomorrow; you need to bring an umbrella. src
星期五我们要开会。Xīngqīwǔ wǒmen yào kāihuì. We are going to have a meeting on Friday. src
12点我要去吃饭。Shí'èr diǎn wǒ yào qù chīfàn. I am going to go eat at 12 o'clock. src
老板下周要出差吗？Lǎobǎn xià zhōu yào chūchāi ma? Is the boss going on a business trip next week? src
他们明年要结婚了。Tāmen míngnián yào jiéhūn le. They are going to get married next year. src
今年你要回家过年吗？Jīnnián nǐ yào huíjiā guònián ma? Are you going to return home this year to celebrate the Chinese New Year? src
在中国，你应该喝白酒。Zài Zhōngguó, nǐ yīnggāi hē báijiǔ. In China, you should drink baijiu. src
我应该给你多少钱？Wǒ yīnggāi gěi nǐ duōshao qián? How much money should I give you? src
感冒的时候应该喝热水。Gǎnmào de shíhou yīnggāi hē rè shuǐ. You should drink hot water when you have a cold. src
明天你应该八点半来公司。Míngtiān nǐ yīnggāi bādiǎn bàn lái gōngsī. You should come to the office tomorrow at 8:30. src
他太累了，应该回家休息。Tā tài lèi le, yīnggāi huíjiā xiūxi. He's too tired. He should go home and rest. src
你不应该告诉他。Nǐ bù yīnggāi gàosu tā. You should not tell him. src
他不应该打人。Tā bù yīnggāi dǎ rén. He should not hit people. src
我们不应该迟到。Wǒmen bù yīnggāi chídào. We shouldn't be late. src
你们不应该笑她。Nǐmen bù yīnggāi xiào tā. You shouldn't laugh at her. src
你们不应该拿别人的东西。Nǐmen bù yīnggāi ná biérén de dōngxi. You should not take other people's stuff. src
明天你会来吗？Míngtiān nǐ huì lái ma? Will you come tomorrow? src
他会来看你吗？Tā huì lái kàn nǐ ma? Will he come to see you? src
明天会下雨吗？Míngtiān huì xiàyǔ ma? Will it rain tomorrow? src
我出去一下，很快会回来。Wǒ chūqù yīxià, hěnkuài huì huílái. I'm going out for a little while. I'll come back very soon. src
老板会同意吗？Lǎobǎn huì tóngyì ma? Will the boss agree? src
你女儿会听你的话。Nǐ nǚér huì tīng nǐ de huà. Your daughter will listen to you. src
下班以后，我会给你打电话。Xiàbān yǐhòu, wǒ huì gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà. After getting off work, I will give you a call. src
我们不会告诉你。Wǒmen bù huì gàosu nǐ. We won't tell you. src
他不会跟你结婚。Tā bù huì gēn nǐ jiéhūn. He won't marry you. src
今晚我不会在外面吃饭。Jīnwǎn wǒ bù huì zài wàimiàn chīfàn. Tonight I will not eat out. src
你想去吗？Nǐ xiǎng qù ma? Would you like to go? src
我想吃面。Wǒ xiǎng chī miàn. I would like to eat noodles. src
你想喝水吗？Nǐ xiǎng hē shuǐ ma? Would you like to drink some water? src
我们想看电视。Wǒmen xiǎng kàn diànshì. We would like to watch TV. src
他想买一个大房子。Tā xiǎng mǎi yī gè dà fángzi. He would like to buy a big apartment. src
他们不想去酒吧。Tāmen bù xiǎng qù jiǔbā. They wouldn't like to go to the bar. src
你不想认识这个美女吗？Nǐ bù xiǎng rènshi zhège měinǚ ma? Would you not like to know this beautiful lady? src
我不想回家。Wǒ bù xiǎng huíjiā. I wouldn't like to return home. src
那个地方很近，我不想开车。Nàge dìfang hěn jìn, wǒ bù xiǎng kāichē. That place is so close. I would not like to drive. src
他不想花父母的钱。Tā bù xiǎng huā fùmǔ de qián. He would not like to spend his parents' money. src
我要回家吃饭。Wǒ yào huíjiā chīfàn. I want to go home and eat. src

他不想去图书馆看书。Tā bù xiǎng qù túshūguǎn kàn shū. He doesn't want to go to the library and read. src
你打电话告诉他了吗？Nǐ dǎ diànhuà gàosu tā le ma? Did you call and tell him? src

周末我喜欢自己买菜做饭。Zhōumò wǒ xǐhuan zìjǐ mǎi cài zuòfàn. I like to buy food to cook for myself on the weekend. src
早上我先刷牙洗脸，再吃早饭。Zǎoshang wǒ xiān shuā yá xǐ liǎn, zài chī zǎofàn. In the morning, I first brush my teeth and wash my face, and then I eat breakfast. src
这句话很难懂。Zhè jù huà hěn nán dǒng. This sentence is hard to understand. src
汉语很难学。Hànyǔ hěn nán xué. Mandarin is hard to learn. src
中国菜很难做。Zhōngguó cài hěn nán zuò. Chinese food is hard to make. src
这个东西现在很难买。Zhège dōngxi xiànzài hěn nán mǎi. This thing is really difficult to purchase now. src
这个汉字很难写。Zhège Hànzì hěn nán xiě. This character is very difficult to write. src
你做的菜很难吃。Nǐ zuò de cài hěn nánchī. The dishes you cook taste bad. src
这里的咖啡很难喝。Zhè lǐ de kāfēi hěn nánhē. The coffee here tastes bad. src
这首歌很难听。Zhè shǒu gē hěn nántīng. This song is terrible (hard to listen to). src
这种花很难闻。Zhè zhǒng huā hěn nánwén. This kind of flower smells bad. src
这件衣服很难看吗？Zhè jiàn yīfu hěn nánkàn ma? Is this article of clothing ugly? src
她从来不喝酒。Tā cónglái bù hējiǔ. She never drinks. src
我女朋友从不给我打电话。Wǒ nǚpéngyou cóng bù gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà. My girlfriend never calls me. src
这个人很奇怪，他从来不笑。Zhège rén hěn qíguài, tā cónglái bù xiào. This person is very strange. He never laughs. src
你父母从来不打你吗？Nǐ fùmǔ cónglái bù dǎ nǐ ma? Your parents never hit you? src
他从不关心别人。Tā cóng bù guānxīn biérén. He never cares about other people. src
你从来没有想过这个问题吗？Nǐ cónglái méiyǒu xiǎng guo zhège wèntí ma? Have you never thought about this question? src
她从来没见过她妈妈。Tā cónglái méi jiàn guo tā māma. She has never met her mother. src
我从没学过这个词。Wǒ cóngméi xué guo zhège cí. I have never before studied this word. src

你们有没有一起玩过这个游戏？Nǐmen yǒu méiyǒu yīqǐ wán guo zhège yóuxì? Have you all ever played this game together? src

你睡了一天了。Nǐ shuì le yī tiān le. You have been sleeping for the whole day. src
他在北京住了两年了。Tā zài Běijīng zhù le liǎng nián le. He has been living in Beijing for two years. src
这个会，他们开了两个小时了。Zhège huì, tāmen kāi le liǎng gè xiǎoshí le. They've been holding this meeting for the past two hours. src
我在这儿等了半个小时了。Wǒ zài zhèr děng le bàn gè xiǎoshí le. I have been waiting here for half an hour. src
他们在酒吧待了一个晚上了。Tāmen zài jiǔbā dāi le yī gè wǎnshang le. They have been staying at the bar for the whole evening. src
我学中文学了一年了。Wǒ xué Zhōngwén xué le yī nián le. I have been learning Chinese for a year. src
他打电话打了一个多小时了。Tā dǎ diànhuà dǎ le yī gè duō xiǎoshí le. He has been on the phone for more than an hour. src
老板打游戏打了一个上午了。Lǎobǎn dǎ yóuxì dǎ le yī gè shàngwǔ le. The boss has been playing video games all morning. src
你洗澡洗了差不多一个小时了。Nǐ xǐzǎo xǐ le chàbuduō yī gè xiǎoshí le. You have been showering for almost an hour. src
妈妈看电视看了一晚上了。Māma kàn diànshì kàn le yī wǎnshang le. Mom has been watching TV all evening. src
今天太忙了，中午没办法出去吃饭。Jīntiān tài máng le, zhōngwǔ méi bànfǎ chūqù chīfàn. It's too busy today. There's no way to go out for lunch. src
他没带手机，没办法给我打电话。Tā méi dài shǒujī, méi bànfǎ gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà. He didn't bring his phone, so he has no way to give me a call. src
没有水，我们没办法洗衣服。Méiyǒu shuǐ, wǒmen méi bànfǎ xǐ yīfu. There's no water. There's no way for us to wash clothes. src
这里太吵了，我没办法工作。Zhèlǐ tài chǎo le, wǒ méi bànfǎ gōngzuò. It‘s too noisy here. I can't work. src
他不开门，所以她没办法进去。Tā bù kāimén, suǒyǐ tā méi bànfǎ jìnqù. He didn't open the door, so she has no way to enter. src
你不会说中文，没办法在我们公司工作。Nǐ bù huì shuō Zhōngwén, méi bànfǎ zài wǒmen gōngsī gōngzuò. You can't speak Chinese, so there is no way for you to work for our company. src
事情太多了，我今天没办法做完。Shìqing tài duō le, wǒ jīntiān méi bànfǎ zuò wán. There's too much to do. I have no way to finish today. src
老板不同意，我没办法帮你。Lǎobǎn bù tóngyì , wǒ méi bànfǎ bāng nǐ. The boss didn't agree, so I have no way to help you. src
这里没有wifi，我没办法上网。Zhèlǐ méiyǒu wifi，wǒ méi bànfǎ shàngwǎng. There is no wifi here, so I have no way of going online. src
他很笨，我没办法跟他一起工作。Tā hěn bèn, wǒ méi bànfǎ gēn tā yīqǐ gōngzuò. He's really dumb. There is no way I can work with him. src
我在上海上大学。Wǒ zài Shànghǎi shàng dàxué. I went to college in Shanghai. src
我周末想在家睡觉。Wǒ zhōumò xiǎng zài jiā shuìjiào. On the weekend, I want to sleep at home. src
不要在床上吃东西。Bù yào zài chuáng shàng chī dōngxi. Don't eat food on the bed. src
你想在哪儿开生日派对？Nǐ xiǎng zài nǎr kāi shēngrì pàiduì? Where do you want to have the birthday party? src
他喜欢在厕所里抽烟。Tā xǐhuan zài cèsuǒ lǐ chōuyān. He likes to smoke in the bathroom. src

老板在会议室见客户。Lǎobǎn zài huìyìshì jiàn kèhù. The boss is seeing the client in the meeting room. src
你在外面吃过晚饭了吗？Nǐ zài wàimiàn chī guo wǎnfàn le ma? Did you eat dinner outside? src
你看看。Nǐ kànkan. Take a little look. src
我试试。Wǒ shìshi. I'll give it a try. src
说说你的想法。Shuōshuo nǐ de xiǎngfǎ. Talk a little bit about your ideas. src
出去玩玩吧！Chūqù wánwan ba! Go out and have fun! src
我想出去走走。Wǒ xiǎng chūqù zǒuzou. I want to go out and walk for a bit. src
别生气了，笑一笑！Bié shēngqì le, xiào yī xiào! Don't be mad, gimme a smile! src
你去问一问他们厕所在哪里。Nǐ qù wèn yī wèn tāmen cèsuǒ zài nǎlǐ. Go and ask them where the bathroom is. src
我可以用一用你的电脑吗？Wǒ kěyǐ yòng yī yòng nǐ de diànnǎo ma? Can I use your computer for a little bit? src
你现在有时间吗？我们聊一聊吧。Nǐ xiànzài yǒu shíjiān ma? Wǒmen liáo yī liáo ba. Do you have a second? Let's chat for a bit. src
你想尝一尝我做的菜吗？Nǐ xiǎng cháng yī cháng wǒ zuò de cài ma? Do you want to taste the food that I cooked? src
考虑考虑kǎolǜ kǎolǜ think it over src
讨论讨论tǎolùn tǎolùn discuss it src
商量商量shāngliang shāngliang talk it over src
打听打听dǎting dǎting inquire about it src
你住在上海吗？Nǐ zhù zài Shànghǎi ma? Do you live in Shanghai? src
他坐在老板的旁边。Tā zuò zài lǎobǎn de pángbiān. He sits next to the boss. src
你应该站在我后面。Nǐ yīnggāi zhàn zài wǒ hòumiàn. You should stand behind me. src
不要坐在我的床上。Bùyào zuò zài wǒ de chuáng shàng. Don't sit on my bed. src
你的衣服不可以放在这里。Nǐ de yīfu bù kěyǐ fàng zài zhèlǐ. You can't put your clothes here. src
不要站在路中间。Bùyào zhàn zài lù zhōngjiān. Don't stand in the middle of the road. src
不要坐在地上。Bùyào zuò zài dì shàng. Don't sit on the ground. src
那本书我放在桌子上了。Nà běn shū wǒ fàng zài zhuōzi shàng le. I placed that book on the table. src
不要走在草地上。Búyào zǒu zài cǎodì shàng. Don't walk on the grass. src
周末我不想待在家里。Zhōumò wǒ bù xiǎng dāi zài jiā lǐ. I don't want to stay at home on weekends. src
我在上海工作。Wǒ zài Shànghǎi gōngzuò. I work in Shanghai. src
我在图书馆学习。Wǒ zài túshūguǎn xuéxí. I study in the library. src
我很想你。Wǒ hěn xiǎng nǐ. I really miss you. src
他很喜欢你。Tā hěn xǐhuan nǐ. He really likes you. src
你应该很小心。Nǐ yīnggāi hěn xiǎoxīn. You should be very careful. src
我很怕晚上一个人在家。Wǒ hěn pà wǎnshang yīgèrén zài jiā. I fear staying home alone at night. src
你应该很了解自己的孩子。Nǐ yīnggāi hěn liǎojiě zìjǐ de háizi. You should know a lot about your child. src
外国人很讨厌中国的公共厕所。Wàiguó rén hěn tǎoyàn Zhōngguó de gōnggòng cèsuǒ. Foreigners really hate public toilets in China. src
你两天没回家，妈妈很担心你。Nǐ liǎng tiān méi huíjiā, māma hěn dānxīn nǐ. You haven't gone home in two days. Mom is really worried about you. src
父母都很希望我能上一个好大学。Fùmǔ dōu hěn xīwàng wǒ néng shàng yī gè hǎo dàxué. Both of my parents really hope that I can go to a good college. src
他们已经到酒吧了。Tāmen yǐjīng dào jiǔbā le. They have already arrived at the bar. src
我刚到家。Wǒ gāng dào jiā. I just got home. src
你到机场了吗？Nǐ dào jīchǎng le ma? Have you arrived at the airport? src
我已经到火车站了。Wǒ yǐjīng dào huǒchēzhàn le. I've already arrived at the train station. src
我们先到北京，然后到香港。Wǒmen xiān dào Běijīng, ránhòu dào Xiānggǎng. First we'll arrive in Beijing, then in Hong Kong. src
明天我要到南京路买衣服。Míngtiān wǒ yào dào Nánjīng Lù mǎi yīfu. Tomorrow I'll go to Nanjing Road to buy clothes. src
你们晚上到哪儿吃饭啊？Nǐmen wǎnshang dào nǎr chīfàn a? Where will you all go to eat food this evening? src
我跟朋友经常到KTV唱歌。Wǒ gēn péngyou jīngcháng dào KTV chànggē. I often go to Karaoke to sing songs with friends. src
今年春节我要到女朋友家见她的父母。Jīnnián Chūnjié wǒ yào dào nǚpéngyou jiā jiàn tā de fùmǔ. This Spring Festival I am going to my girlfriend's house to meet her parents. src
下个月我要到美国出差。Xià gè yuè wǒ yào dào Měiguó chūchāi. Next month I need to go to the USA on a business trip. src
这个词的意思很好懂。Zhège cí de yìsi hěn hǎo dǒng. The meaning of this word is easy to understand. src
这个汉字很好写。Zhège Hànzì hěn hǎo xiě. This Chinese character is easy to write. src
三明治很好做。Sānmíngzhì hěn hǎo zuò. Sandwiches are easy to make. src
苹果手机现在很好买。Píngguǒ shǒujī xiànzài hěn hǎo mǎi. iPhones are easy to buy now. src
这个笔很好用。Zhège bǐ hěn hǎo yòng. This pen is easy to use. src
好吃hǎochī good to taste, good to eat, delicious src
好喝hǎohē good to taste, good to drink src
好看hǎokàn good to look at, good-looking, attractive src
好听hǎotīng good to listen to, pleasant to listen to, good-sounding src
好闻hǎowén good to smell, smells good, good-smelling src
好玩hǎowán fun src
这首歌很好听。Zhè shǒu gē hěn hǎotīng. This song is great. src
这种茶很好闻。Zhè zhǒng chá hěn hǎowén. This kind of tea smells good. src
你的新包很好看。Nǐ de xīn bāo hěn hǎokàn. Your new bag looks good. src
妈妈做的菜很好吃。Māma zuò de cài hěn hǎochī. The food mom makes is delicious. src
我觉得上海很好玩。Wǒ juéde Shànghǎi hěn hǎowán. I think Shanghai is a lot of fun. src
请你等一下。Qǐng nǐ děng yīxià. Please wait a little bit. src
你看一下。Nǐ kàn yīxià. Take a look. src
试一下吧。Shì yīxià ba. Try it. src
我要想一下。Wǒ yào xiǎng yīxià. I want to think a little. src
开一下门吧。Kāi yīxià mén ba. Please open the door. src
请你说一下为什么。Qǐng nǐ shuō yīxià wèishénme. Please say why. src
不要生气了，笑一下！Bùyào shēngqì le, xiào yīxià! Don't be mad, laugh! src
宝宝，亲一下爸爸。Bǎobao, qīn yīxià bàba. Baby, give your dad a kiss. src
你可以来一下我的办公室吗？Nǐ kěyǐ lái yīxià wǒ de bàngōngshì ma? Could you please come to my office? src
你能介绍一下自己吗？Nǐ néng jièshào yīxià zìjǐ ma? Could you introduce yourself briefly? src
老师，我可以问你一个问题吗？Lǎoshī, wǒ kěyǐ wèn nǐ yī gè wèntí ma? Teacher, may I ask you a question? src
大家都叫他"怪叔叔"。Dàjiā dōu jiào tā "guài shūshu." Everyone calls him "Uncle Weirdo." src
我想告诉你一个好消息。Wǒ xiǎng gàosu nǐ yī gè hǎo xiāoxi. I want to tell you the good news. src
他们给了你多少钱？Tāmen gěi le nǐ duōshao qián? How much money did they give you? src
他送了女朋友很多花。Tā sòng le nǚpéngyou hěn duō huā. He gave his girlfriend lots of flowers. src
我想送给你一本书。Wǒ xiǎng sòng gěi nǐ yī běn shū. I want to give you a book. src
爸爸要送给我一个很贵的生日礼物。Bàba yào sòng gěi wǒ yī gè hěn guì de shēngrì lǐwù. My dad is going to give me a very expensive birthday gift. src
你可以借我两千块钱吗？Nǐ kěyǐ jiè wǒ liǎng qiān kuài qián ma? Can you lend me 2000 kuai? src
老板刚发给我上个月的工资。Lǎobǎn gāng fā gěi wǒ shàng gè yuè de gōngzī. The boss just gave me my pay for last month. src
这个人骗了我很多钱。Zhège rén piàn le wǒ hěn duō qián. This person cheated me out of a lot of money. src
我看不懂这本书。Wǒ kàn bu dǒng zhè běn shū. I don't understand the book. src
孩子们看不懂你写的汉字。Háizi men kàn bu dǒng nǐ xiě de Hànzì. Kids don't understand the characters that you wrote. src
你看不懂我的邮件吗？Nǐ kàn bu dǒng wǒ de yóujiàn ma? Do you not understand my emails? src
老板的中文说得很好，可是他看不懂中文报纸。Lǎobǎn de Zhōngwén shuō de hěn hǎo, kěshì tā kàn bu dǒng Zhōngwén bàozhǐ. The boss speaks very good Chinese, but he doesn't understand Chinese newspapers. src
我听不懂上海话。Wǒ tīng bu dǒng Shànghǎi-huà. I don't understand Shanghai dialect. src
你们听不懂我的话吗？Nǐmen tīng bu dǒng wǒ de huà ma? Do you not understand what I say? src
我听不懂你说的英语。Wǒ tīng bu dǒng nǐ shuō de Yīngyǔ. I don't understand your English. src
我们都听不懂你的意思。Wǒmen dōu tīng bu dǒng nǐ de yìsi. None of us understand what you mean. src
很多人读不懂这本书。Hěn duō rén dú bu dǒng zhè běn shū. Many people don't understand this book. src
这个句子很难，学生们都读不懂。Zhège jùzi hěn nán, xuéshengmen dōu dú bu dǒng. This sentence is very difficult. None of the students understand. src
我说完了。Wǒ shuō wán le. I am finished talking. src
你吃完了吗？Nǐ chī wán le ma? Are you done eating? src
我想看完这个电影。Wǒ xiǎng kàn wán zhège diànyǐng. I want to finish watching the movie. src
你做完以后，就可以下班了。Nǐ zuò wán yǐhòu, jiù kěyǐ xiàbān le. After you finish doing it, you can get off work. src
你今天可以做完作业吗？Nǐ jīntiān kěyǐ zuò wán zuòyè ma? Can you finish doing your homework today? src
你什么时候可以看完这本书？Nǐ shénme shíhou kěyǐ kàn wán zhè běn shū? When can you finish reading this book? src
妈妈洗完衣服以后，就去做晚饭了。Māma xǐ wán yīfu yǐhòu, jiù qù zuò wǎnfàn le. After mom finished washing clothes, she went to cook dinner. src
做完这些作业需要两个小时。Zuò wán zhèxiē zuòyè xūyào liǎng gè xiǎoshí. To finish your homework you will need two hours. src
看完以后告诉我。Kàn wán yǐhòu gàosu wǒ. Tell me when you have finished watching. src
我们学完了一百个词。Wǒmen xué wán le yībǎi gè cí. We have finished learning 100 words. src
我看完了电影。Wǒ kàn wán le diànyǐng. I finished watching the movie. src
你看到那个帅哥了吗？Nǐ kàndào nàge shuàigē le ma? Did you see that handsome guy? src
我看到了。Wǒ kàndào le. I saw it. src
你听到了吗？Nǐ tīngdào le ma? Did you hear it? src
你没看见那个帅哥吗？Nǐ méi kànjiàn nàge shuàigē ma? You didn't see that handsome guy? src
我没有看见。Wǒ méiyǒu kànjiàn. I didn't see it. src
你没听见吗？Nǐ méi tīngjiàn ma? You didn't hear it? src
妈妈去超市买了一些水果。Māma qù chāoshì mǎi le yīxiē shuǐguǒ. Mom went to the supermarket and bought some fruit. src
