你饿不饿？这里有一些吃的。Nǐ è bu è? Zhèlǐ yǒu yīxiē chīde. Are you hungry or not? There is some food here. src
下课以后，学生们问了一些问题。Xiàkè yǐhòu, xuéshengmen wèn le yīxiē wèntí. After class, the students asked some questions. src
给我一些时间，好吗？Gěi wǒ yīxiē shíjiān, hǎo ma? Give me some time, OK? src
他给我带了一些书。Tā gěi wǒ dài le yīxiē shū. He brought me some books. src
你可以借我一些钱吗？Nǐ kěyǐ jiè wǒ yīxiē qián ma? Can you lend me some money? src
你想在咖啡里放一些糖吗？Nǐ xiǎng zài kāfēi lǐ fàng yīxiē táng ma? Do you want to put some sugar in your coffee? src
我在中国的时候，去过一些很漂亮的地方。Wǒ zài Zhōngguó de shíhou, qù guo yīxiē hěn piàoliang de dìfang. When I was in China, I went to some beautiful places. src
外国人有的很有钱，有的没钱。Wàiguó rén yǒude hěn yǒuqián, yǒude méi qián. Some foreigners are rich, but some aren't. src
我们公司有一些电脑，有的是新的，有的是旧的。Wǒmen gōngsī yǒu yīxiē diànnǎo, yǒude shì xīn de, yǒude shì jiù de. Our company has some computers. Some are new, and some are old. src
他写了很多书，有的卖得很好，有的卖得不好。Tā xiě le hěn duō shū, yǒude mài de hěn hǎo, yǒude mài de bù hǎo. He has written a lot of books. Some sell well, but some don't. src
中国菜有的好吃，有的不好吃。Zhōngguó cài yǒude hāochī, yǒude bù hāochī. Some Chinese foods are tasty, while some aren't. src
这家店的衣服有的贵，有的便宜。Zhè jiā diàn de yīfu yǒude guì, yǒude piányi. In this shop, some of the clothes are expensive and some are cheap. src
他有很多房子，有的在国内，有的在国外。Tā yǒu hěn duō fángzi, yǒude zài guónèi, yǒude zài guówài. He has a lot of houses, some of them are within the country and some are abroad. src
晚上六点以后，有的人下班了，有的人在加班。Wǎnshang liùdiǎn yǐhòu, yǒude rén xiàbān le, yǒude rén zài jiābān. After six o'clock some people are off work, while some are still working. src
我的大学老师有的很年轻，有的很老。Wǒ de dàxué lǎoshī yǒude hěn niánqīng, yǒude hěn lǎo. Some of my college teachers are young, some are old. src
酒吧里，有的人在喝酒，有的人在跳舞，还有的人在聊天。Jiǔbā lǐ, yǒude rén zài hējiǔ, yǒude rén zài tiàowǔ, hái yǒude rén zài liáotiān. In the bar, some people are drinking, some are dancing, and some are chatting. src
因为工作，我认识了很多人，有的是大学老师，有的是CEO。Yīnwèi gōngzuò, wǒ rènshi le hěn duō rén, yǒude shì dàxué lǎoshī, yǒude shì CEO. I know a lot of people because of my work. Some are college teachers and some are CEOs. src
多少钱？Duōshao qián? How much? src
你的手机多少钱？Nǐ de shǒujī duōshao qián? How much was your cell phone? src
我们的午饭多少钱？Wǒmen de wǔfàn duōshao qián? How much is our lunch? src
这杯咖啡多少钱？Zhè bēi kāfēi duōshao qián? How much for this cup of coffee? src
这件衣服多少钱？Zhè jiàn yīfu duōshao qián? How much is this clothing? src
两块五毛liǎng kuài wǔ máo two kuai five mao (2.5) src
三块八毛sān kuài bā máo three kuai eight mao (3.8) src
十块两毛shí kuài liǎng máo ten kuai two mao (10.2) src
二十三块八毛èrshí-sān kuài bā máo Twenty-three kuai eight mao (23.8) src
五十块五毛wǔshí kuài wǔ máo fifty kuai five mao (50.5) src
两块五liǎng kuài wǔ two kuai five mao (2.5) src
两块二liǎng kuài èr two kuai two mao (2.2) src
五块二wǔ kuài èr five kuai two mao (5.2) src
三块八毛六sān kuài bā máo liù three kuai eight mao six fen (3.86) src
三块sān kuài Three kuai src
每个菜都好吃。Měi gè cài dōu hěn hǎochī. Every dish is delicious. src
你每个人都认识吗？Nǐ měi gè rén dōu rènshi ma? Do you know every person? src
老板每个月都出差。Lǎobǎn měi gè yuè dōu chūchāi. The boss goes on business trips every month. src
他每天都不吃早饭。Tā měi tiān dōu bù chī zǎofàn. Every morning he skips breakfast. src
他每年都来中国。Tā měi nián dōu lái Zhōngguó. He comes to China every year. src
我每个星期都给妈妈打电话。Wǒ měi gè xīngqī dōu gěi māma dǎ diànhuà. I give mom a phone call every week. src
这个班的每个学生都很聪明。Zhège bān de měi gè xuéshēng dōu hěn cōngming. Each of the students in this class are very smart. src
老师每天都给我们很多作业。Lǎoshī měi tiān dōu gěi wǒmen hěn duō zuòyè. Every day the teacher gives us a lot of homework. src
我们每周都要开会。Wǒmen měi zhōu dōu yào kāihuì. Every week we need to have a meeting. src
他们每个周末都去公园。Tāmen měi gè zhōumò dōu qù gōngyuán. Every weekend they go to the park. src
半个小时bàn gè xiǎoshí half an hour src
半个月bàn gè yuè half a month src
半碗米饭bàn wǎn mǐfàn half a bowl of rice src
半瓶酒bàn píng jiǔ half a bottle of liquor src
半份炒面bàn fèn chǎomiàn half a serving of chow mein src
一个半小时yī gè bàn xiǎoshí an hour and a half src
三个半小时sān gè bàn xiǎoshí three and a half hours src
两个半月liǎng gè bàn yuè two and a half months src
一斤半水果yī jīn bàn shuǐguǒ one and a half jin of fruit src
一瓶半白酒yī píng bàn báijiǔ one and a half bottles of wine src
四块半巧克力sì kuài bàn qiǎokèlì four and a half pieces of chocolate src
半天bàn tiān half a day src
半年bàn nián half a year src
两天半liǎng tiān bàn two and a half days src
一年半yī nián bàn a year and a half src
三天半sān tiān bàn three and a half days src
四年半sì nián bàn four and a half years src
两只猫liǎng zhī māo two cats src
三条鱼sān tiáo yú three fish src
四杯牛奶sì bēi niúnǎi four glasses of milk src
五瓶水wǔ píng shuǐ five bottles of water src
六块巧克力liù kuài qiǎokèlì six pieces of chocolate src
七盒茶叶qī hé cháyè seven boxes of tea leaves src
八台电脑bā tái diànnǎo eight computers src
九支玫瑰jiǔ zhī méiguī nine roses src
十个美女shí gè měinǚ ten beautiful women src
一条狗yī tiáo gǒu a dog src
一条河yī tiáo hé a river src
一条路yī tiáo lù a road src
一条龙yī tiáo lóng a dragon src
一条鱼yī tiáo yú a fish src
一条短信yī tiáo duǎnxìn a text (message) src
一块巧克力yī kuài qiǎokèlì a piece of chocolate src
一盒巧克力yī hé qiǎokèlì a box of chocolate src
一颗巧克力yī kē qiǎokèlì a small piece of chocolate src
他有几个孩子？Tā yǒu jǐ gè háizi? How many kids does he have? src
你家有几个房间？Nǐ jiā yǒu jǐ gè fángjiān? How many rooms are there in your house? src
他们在这里住几个星期？Tāmen zài zhèlǐ zhù jǐ gè xīngqī? How many weeks are they staying here? src
你带了几件衣服？Nǐ dài le jǐ jiàn yīfu? How many pieces of clothing have you brought? src
老板每天工作几个小时？Lǎobǎn měi tiān gōngzuò jǐ gè xiǎoshí? How many hours does the boss work every day? src
你去过多少个国家？Nǐ qù guo duōshao gè guójiā? How many countries have you been to? src
你们班有多少个学生？Nǐmen bān yǒu duōshao gè xuéshēng? How many students are there in your class? src
你大学的时候看了多少本书？Nǐ dàxué de shíhou kàn le duōshao běn shū? How many books did you read when you were in college? src
他们昨天请了多少个朋友？Tāmen zuótiān qǐng le duōshao gè péngyou? How many friends did they invite yesterday? src
上海有多少个外国公司？Shànghǎi yǒu duōshao gè wàiguó gōngsī? How many foreign companies are there in Shanghai? src
那个人nàge rén that person src
这本书zhè běn shū this book src
那件事nà jiàn shì that matter (in the sense of business, affair, or thing) src
这瓶啤酒zhè píng píjiǔ this bottle of beer src
那个房间nàge fángjiān that room src
那台电脑nà tái diànnǎo that new computer src
这只猫zhè zhī māo that cat src
那条河nà tiáo hé that river src
这件衣服zhè jiàn yīfu this piece of clothing src
我是第一个到公司的人。Wǒ shì dì-yī gè dào gōngsī de rén. I'm the first person that came to the office. src
他要坐早上第一班地铁去上班。Tā yào zuò zǎoshang dì-yī bān dìtiě qù shàngbān. He needs to take the first train in the morning to go to work. src
小李是她的第三个男朋友。Xiǎo Lǐ shì tā de dì-sān gè nánpéngyou. Little Li is her third boyfriend. src
我的第一个中文老师是美国人。Wǒ de dì-yī gè Zhōngwén lǎoshī shì Měiguó rén. My first Chinese teacher was American. src
爸爸的第一个手机是NOKIA。Bàba de dì-yī gè shǒujī shì NOKIA. Dad‘s first cell phone was a Nokia. src
你的第一个工作是什么？Nǐ de dì-yī gè gōngzuò shì shénme? What was your first job? src
到美国的第二个月，我找到了工作。Dào Měiguó de dì-èr gè yuè, wǒ zhǎodào le gōngzuò . I found a job the second month I was in the USA. src
第二行第五个汉字怎么读？Dì-èr háng dì-wǔ gè Hànzì zěnme dú? How do you read the fifth character from the second line? src
这次考试，我是我们班第一。Zhè cì kǎoshì, wǒ shì wǒmen bān dì-yī. On this test, I was first in our class. src
这次比赛，我们班第一，他们班第二。Zhè cì bǐsài, wǒmen bān dì-yī, tāmen bān dì-èr. In this contest, our class is the first, their class is the second. src
第一天，我们在宾馆里。Dì-yī tiān, wǒmen zài bīnguǎn lǐ. On the first day, we will be in the hotel. src
来上海以后的第二年，他开了这家公司。Lái Shànghǎi yǐhòu de dì-èr nián, tā kāi le zhè jiā gōngsī. He started this company his second year after coming to Shanghai. src
下个月的第一周老板要出差。Xià gè yuè de dì-yī zhōu , lǎobǎn yào chūchāi. The boss needs to go on a business trip the first week of next month. src
这是我第一次去北京。Zhè shì wǒ dì-yī cì qù Běijīng. This is my first time going to Beijing. src
他怎么还没来？Tā zěnme hái méi lái? How come he's not here yet? src
你们怎么打人？Nǐmen zěnme dǎ rén? How can you hit people? src
他帮了你，你怎么不说"谢谢"？Tā bāng le nǐ, nǐ zěnme bù shuō "xièxie"? He helped you. How come you didn't say thank you? src
你结婚的时候怎么不告诉我？Nǐ jiéhūn de shíhou zěnme bù gàosu wǒ? How come you didn't tell me when you got married? src
我们还没开始吃，他怎么已经吃完了？Wǒmen hái méi kāishǐ chī, tā zěnme yǐjīng chī wán le? We haven't started eating yet. How come he has already finished eating? src
今天是星期一，你怎么不去上班？Jīntiān shì Xīngqīyī, nǐ zěnme bù qù shàngbān? Today is Monday. Why aren't you going to work? src
水怎么不热？Shuǐ zěnme bù rè? Why is the water not hot? src
这里的川菜怎么不辣？Zhèlǐ de chuāncài zěnme bù là? Why is the Sichuan food here not spicy? src
他亲了你，你怎么不高兴？Tā qīn le nǐ, nǐ zěnme bù gāoxìng? He kissed you. How come you're not happy? src
她的小猫死了，她怎么不难过？Tā de xiǎomāo sǐ le, tā zěnme bù nánguò? Her kitten died. Why isn't she sad? src
每天工作十二个小时，你怎么不累？Měi tiān gōngzuò shí'èr gè xiǎoshí, nǐ zěnme bù lèi? Every day you work 12 hours. Why are you not tired? src
他怎么那么懒？Tā zěnme nàme lǎn? How can he be this lazy? src
昨天怎么那么冷？Zuótiān zěnme nàme lěng? How could it be so cold yesterday? src
这些人怎么这么吵？Zhèxiē rén zěnme zhème chǎo? How can these people so loud? src
北京的空气怎么那么差？Běijīng de kōngqì zěnme nàme chà? How can the air in Beijing be so bad? src
你的汉语怎么这么好？Nǐ de Hànyǔ zěnme zhème hǎo? How is your Mandarin so good? src
你吃饭了吗？Nǐ chīfàn le ma? Did you eat? src
老板走了吗？Lǎobǎn zǒu le ma? Did the boss leave? src
你男朋友找到新工作了吗？Nǐ nánpéngyou zhǎodào xīn gōngzuò le ma? Has your boyfriend found a new job yet? src
妈妈，你昨天给我打电话了吗？Māma, nǐ zuótiān gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà le ma? Mom, did you call me yesterday? src
你今天去上班了吗？Nǐ jīntiān qù shàngbān le ma? Did you go to work today? src
晚饭你吃了吗？Wǎnfàn nǐ chī le ma? Did you eat dinner? src
衣服你洗好了吗？Yīfu nǐ xǐ hǎo le ma? Have you finished washing the clothes? src
作业你写完了吗？Zuòyè nǐ xiě wán le ma? Have you finishing doing homework? src
这个电影你看了吗？Zhège diànyǐng nǐ kàn le ma? Have you seen this movie? src
我的邮件你收到了吗？Wǒ de yóujiàn nǐ shōudào le ma? Have you received my email? src
他学得很快，因为他很聪明。Tā xué de hěn kuài, yīnwèi tā hěn cōngming. He learns fast because he is smart. src
我爱吃四川菜，因为很辣。Wǒ ài chī Sìchuān cài, yīnwèi hěn là. I love eating Sichuan food because it's very spicy. src
我在学习中文，因为我想去中国。Wǒ zài xuéxí Zhōngwén, yīnwèi wǒ xiǎng qù Zhōngguó. I am studying Chinese because I want to go to China. src
我不喜欢她，因为她不友好。Wǒ bù xǐhuan tā, yīnwèi tā bù yǒuhǎo. I don't like her because she is very unfriendly. src
今天我们很忙，因为有很多工作。Jīntiān wǒmen hěn máng, yīnwèi yǒu hěn duō gōngzuò. We are very busy today because we have lots of work. src
汉字太难了，所以我不想学。Hànzì tài nán le, suǒyǐ wǒ bù xiǎng xué. Chinese characters are too hard, so I don't want to study them. src
她很漂亮，所以很多男孩喜欢她。Tā hěn piàoliang, suǒyǐ hěn duō nánhái xǐhuan tā. She is beautiful, so a lot of boys like her. src
他找到工作了，所以很高兴。Tā zhǎodào gōngzuò le, suǒyǐ hěn gāoxìng. He found a job so he's happy. src
我太忙了，所以没有时间给你打电话。Wǒ tài máng le, suǒyǐ méiyǒu shíjiān gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà. I was too busy, so I didn't have time to give you a call. src
我们公司有很多外国人，所以我们要说英文。Wǒmen gōngsī yǒu hěn duō wàiguó rén, suǒyǐ wǒmen yào shuō Yīngwén. There are a lot of foreigners in our company, so we need to speak English. src
因为我有一个中国女朋友，所以我要学中文。Yīnwèi wǒ yǒu yī gè Zhōngguó nǚpéngyou, suǒyǐ wǒ yào xué Zhōngwén. Since I have a Chinese girlfriend, I need to study Chinese. src
因为他生病了，所以没去上课。Yīnwèi tā shēngbìng le, suǒyǐ méi qù shàngkè. Since he was sick, he didn't go to class. src
因为我很累，所以要休息。Yīnwèi wǒ hěn lèi, suǒyǐ yào xiūxi. I'm very tired, so I want to rest. src
因为太远了，所以我不想去。Yīnwèi tài yuǎn le, suǒyǐ wǒ bù xiǎng qù. Since it's too far, I don't want to go. src
因为太忙，所以我们没有时间吃中饭。Yīnwèi tài máng, suǒyǐ wǒmen méiyǒu shíjiān chī zhōngfàn. We were too busy, so none of us had time to eat lunch. src
我们快到了。Wǒmen kuài dào le. We're almost there. src
快下雨了。Kuài xiàyǔ le. It's going to rain soon. src
快要过年了，你什么时候回家？Kuài yào guònián le, nǐ shénme shíhou huíjiā? It's almost Chinese New Year. When are you going back to your hometown? src
我女朋友快要过生日了。Wǒ nǚpéngyou kuài yào guò shēngrì le. My girlfriend is about to have her birthday. src
快下车了，你再等一会儿。Kuài xiàchē le, nǐ zài děng yīhuìr. We're about to get off. Just wait a little while. src
天快黑了。Tiān kuài hēi le. It’s almost getting dark. src
我快好了。Wǒ kuài hǎo le. I'm almost ready. src
饭快凉了。Fàn kuài liáng le. The food is about to be cold. src
这些脏衣服快臭了。Zhèxiē zāng yīfu kuài chòu le. These dirty clothes are about to smell bad. src
不能再喝了，我快醉了。Bù néng zài hē le, wǒ kuài zuì le. I can't drink another, I am almost drunk. src
我要生气了！Wǒ yào shēngqì le! I'm going to get angry! src
他们的孩子要出生了。Tāmen de háizi yào chūshēng le. Their child is about to be born. src
9点了，超市要关门了。Jiǔ diǎn le, chāoshì yào guānmén le. It's 9 o'clock. The supermarket is about to close. src
我最好的朋友要结婚了！Wǒ zuìhǎo de péngyou yào jiéhūn le! My best friend is about to get married! src
圣诞节要到了，你有什么打算？Shèngdànjié yào dào le, nǐ yǒu shénme dǎsuàn? It's almost Christmas. What plans do you have? src
我觉得这里的菜什么都好吃。Wǒ juéde zhèlǐ de cài shénme dōu hǎochī. I think everything is delicious here. src
中国的历史爸爸什么都知道。Zhōngguó de lìshǐ bàba shénme dōu zhīdào. My dad knows everything about Chinese history. src
工作的事情老公什么都跟我说。Gōngzuò de shìqing lǎogōng shénme dōu gēn wǒ shuō. My husband tells me everything about work stuff. src
妈妈做的菜我什么都喜欢。Māma zuò de cài wǒ shénme dōu xǐhuan. I like everything that mom cooks. src
我女朋友觉得外国的东西什么都好。Wǒ nǚpéngyou juéde wàiguó de dōngxi shénme dōu hǎo. My girlfriend thinks that all foreign things are good. src
我们什么果汁都喝。Wǒmen shénme guǒzhī dōu hē. We drink any kind of fruit juice. src
她什么衣服都是黑色的。Tā shénme yīfu dōu shì hēisè de. All of her clothes are black. src
妈妈做的什么菜都好吃。Māma zuò de shénme cài dōu hǎochī. All of the dishes mom makes are tasty. src
我男朋友什么运动都喜欢。Wǒ nánpéngyou shénme yùndòng dōu xǐhuan. My boyfriend likes all kinds of sports. src
你不应该什么话都跟他说。Nǐ bù yīnggāi shénme huà dōu gēn tā shuō. You shouldn't tell him everything. src
生病以后，爸爸什么酒都不能喝了。Shēngbìng yǐhòu, bàba shénme jiǔ dōu bù néng hē le. After dad got sick, he can't drink any kind of alcohol. src
老板现在很生气，什么人也不见。Lǎobǎn xiànzài hěn shēngqì, shénme rén yě bù jiàn. The boss is very angry. He's doesn't want to see anybody. src
今天我不舒服，什么东西都没吃。Jīntiān wǒ bù shūfu, shénme dōngxi dōu méi chī. Today I don't feel well, so I didn't eat anything. src
昨天开会的时候，她什么话也没说。Zuótiān kāihuì de shíhou, tā shénme huà yě méi shuō. She didn't say anything at yesterday's meeting. src
你在家里怎么什么事都不做？Nǐ zài jiālǐ zěnme shénme shì dōu bù zuò? How come you haven't done anything at home? src
别说了，我不想听。Bié shuō le, wǒ bù xiǎng tīng. Stop talking. I don't want to listen. src
别问了，我不想说。Bié wèn le, wǒ bù xiǎng shuō. Stop asking. I don't want to say. src
别做了，明天再做吧。Bié zuò le, míngtiān zài zuò ba. Stop doing it. Do it tomorrow. src
别看了，睡觉！Bié kàn le, shuìjiào! Stop watching. Go to sleep! src
别哭了，烦死了。Bié kū le, fán sǐ le. Stop crying, it's so annoying. src
别笑了，别人都在看你。Bié xiào le, biérén dōu zài kàn nǐ. Stop laughing. Other people are looking at you. src
别吃了，我们要迟到了。Bié chī le, wǒmen yào chídào le. Stop eating. We're going to be late. src
别玩了，去写作业。Bié wán le, qù xiě zuòyè. Stop playing. Do your homework. src
别买了，太贵了！Bié mǎi le, tài guì le! Don't buy it. It's too expensive! src
别喝了，你已经喝了五杯了。Bié hē le, nǐ yǐjīng hē le wǔ bēi le. Stop drinking. You've already drunk five glasses. src
在中国zàiZhōngguó in China src
在美国zài Měiguó in the USA src
在上海zài Shànghǎi in Shanghai src
在纽约zài Niǔyuē in New York src
在桌子上。zài zhuōzi shàng on the table src
在地上。zài dìshàng on the floor. src
你的手机在包里吗？Nǐ de shǒujī zài bāo lǐ ma? Is your cell phone in the bag? src
他在楼下。Tā zài lóuxià. He is downstairs. src
Walmart在我家旁边。Walmart zài wǒ jiā pángbiān. Walmart is next to my house. src
我在火车上。Wǒ zài huǒchē shàng. I am on the train. src
我在地铁上。Wǒ zài dìtiě shàng. I'm on the metro. src
在课上zài kè shàng in class src
在派对上zài huìyì shàng at the party src
在会议上zài pàiduì shàng at the meeting src
在婚礼上zài hūnlǐ shàng at the wedding src
我今天晚上不喝酒。Wǒ jīntiān wǎnshang bù hējiǔ. Tonight I'm not going to drink. src
爸爸不回来吃晚饭。Bàba bù huílái chī wǎnfàn. Dad is not coming back to eat dinner. src
老板明天不来。Lǎobǎn míngtiān bù lái. The boss won't come tomorrow. src
我知道这个周末不下雨。Wǒ zhīdào zhège zhōumò bù xiàyǔ. I know it's not going to rain this weekend. src
你女朋友不跟你一起去吗？Nǐ nǚpéngyou bù gēn nǐ yīqǐ qù ma? Is your girlfriend not going with you? src
我不吃肉。Wǒ bù chī ròu. I don't eat meat. src
你们都不喝酒吗？Nǐmen dōu bù hējiǔ ma? Do you all not drink alcohol? src
他不喜欢说话。Tā bù xǐhuan shuōhuà. He doesn't like to speak. src
你不用手机看书吗？Nǐ bù yòng shǒujī kàn shū ma? Do you not use your phone to read books? src
你晚上不洗澡吗？Nǐ wǎnshang bù xǐzǎo ma? Don't you shower at night? src
我们不饿。Wǒmen bù è. We're not hungry. src
你不胖。Nǐ bù pàng. You are not fat. src
我家不远。Wǒ jiā bù yuǎn. My home is not far. src
今天不冷。Jīntiān bù lěng. Today it isn't cold. src
我觉得Starbucks的咖啡不好喝。Wǒ juéde Starbucks de kāfēi bù hǎohē. I think the coffee at Starbucks isn't good. src
你是不是我的老师？Nǐ shì bu shì wǒ de lǎoshī? Are you my teacher or not? src
她想不想来？Tā xiǎng bu xiǎnglái? Does she want to come? src
你爱不爱我？Nǐ ài bu ài wǒ? Do you love me or not? src
你们周末上不上班？Nǐmen zhōumò shàng bu shàngbān? Do you all go to work on weekends? src
你的外国朋友们喜不喜欢吃中国菜？Nǐ de wàiguó péngyoumen xǐ bu xǐhuan chī Zhōngguó cài? Do your foreign friends like to eat Chinese food? src
我们去吃饭，好不好？Wǒmen qù chīfàn, hǎo bu hǎo? Let's go eat, is that OK? src
你们是好朋友，对不对？Nǐmen shì hǎo péngyou, duì bu duì? You are good friends, right? src
他没有打电话给我。Tā méiyǒu dǎ diànhuà gěi wǒ. He did not give me a call. src
你没去上班吗？Nǐ méi qù shàngbān ma? You didn't go to work? src
我昨天没喝酒。Wǒ zuótiān méi hējiǔ. I did not drink alcohol yesterday. src
妈妈没有做晚饭。Māma méiyǒu zuò wǎnfàn. Mom did not cook dinner. src
他们吃完饭以后没付钱。Tāmen chī wán fàn yǐhòu méi fù qián. They didn't pay after they finished eating. src
我没有钱。Wǒ méiyǒu qián. I don't have money. src
他没有女朋友。Tā méiyǒu nǚpéngyou. He doesn't have a girlfriend. src
我没办法。Wǒ méi bànfǎ. I don't have a way. src
我没有办法。Wǒ méiyǒu bànfǎ. I don't have a way. src
你没有我高。Nǐ méiyǒu wǒ gāo. You are not as tall as me. src
我的手机没有他的手机贵。Wǒ de shǒujī méiyǒu tā de shǒujī guì. My cell phone isn't as expensive as his. src
我们都没有老板忙。Wǒmen dōu méiyǒu lǎobǎn máng. We all are not as busy as the boss. src
上海的冬天没有北京的冬天冷。Shànghǎi de dōngtiān méiyǒu Běijīng de dōngtiān lěng. Shanghai winters are not as cold Beijing winters. src
他以前不是我的老板。Tā yǐqián bù shì wǒ de lǎobǎn. He was not my boss before. src
我不知道他要来。Wǒ bù zhīdào tā yào lái. I didn't know he was coming. src
他小时候不认识她。Tā xiǎo shíhou bù rènshi tā. He did not know her when he was young. src
昨天我不在家。Zuótiān wǒ bù zài jiā. I was not home yesterday. src
你也要茶吗？Nǐ yě yào chá ma? Do you also want tea? src
我们都要咖啡。Wǒmen dōu yào kāfēi. We all want coffee. src
大家要不要米饭？Dàjiā yào bù yào mǐfàn? Does everyone want rice? src
你们要冰水还是热水？Nǐmen yào bīng shuǐ háishì rè shuǐ? Do you want ice water or hot water? src
谢谢，我什么都不要。Xièxiè, wǒ shénme dōu bù yào. Thank you. I don't need anything. src
我想你。Wǒ xiǎng nǐ. I miss you. src
我有点想我的家人。Wǒ yǒudiǎn xiǎng wǒ de jiārén. I sort of miss my family. src
你们回美国以后，会想中国菜吗？Nǐmen huí Měiguó yǐhòu, huì xiǎng Zhōngguó cài ma? Will you all miss Chinese food after you go back to the U.S.? src
你女朋友不在的时候，你会想她吗？Nǐ nǚpéngyou bù zài de shíhou, nǐ huì xiǎng tā ma? Do you miss your girlfriend when she is not around? src
妈妈打电话的时候跟我说，她很想我。Māma dǎ diànhuà de shíhou gēn wǒ shuō, tā hěn xiǎng wǒ. Mom called me and said she misses me a lot. src
我要休息。Wǒ yào xiūxi. I want to rest. src
你也要回家吗？Nǐ yě yào huíjiā ma? Do you also want to go home? src
你们要喝什么？Nǐmen yào hē shénme? What do you want to drink? src
我要帮老板做完这些工作。Wǒ yào bāng lǎobǎn zuò wán zhèxiē gōngzuò. I want to help the boss finish this work. src
大家晚上要不要出去吃？Dàjiā wǎnshang yào bu yào chūqù chī? Does everyone want to go out to eat tonight? src
我不想见她。Wǒ bù xiǎng jiàn tā. I wouldn't like to see her. src
周末你们想看电影吗？Zhōumò nǐmen xiǎng kàn diànyǐng ma? Would you like to see a movie this weekend? src
我想请你吃饭。Wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ chīfàn. I'd like to treat you to dinner. src
他们春节不想回家吗？Tāmen Chūnjié bù xiǎng huíjiā ma? Don't they want to go back home for Spring Festival? src
星期六我要去北京。Xīngqīliù wǒ yào qù Běijīng. I'm going to Beijing on Saturday. src
下个月她要找新工作。Xià gè yuè tā yào zhǎo xīn gōngzuò. She is going to look for a new job next month. src
这个周末你们要出去玩吗？Zhège zhōumò nǐmen yào chūqù wán ma? Are you going out partying this weekend? src
结婚以后，你要跟父母住在一起吗？Jiéhūn yǐhòu, nǐ yào gēn nǐ fùmǔ zhù zài yīqǐ ma? Are you going to live together with your parents after you get married? src
生完孩子以后，你太太要回去工作吗？Shēng wán háizi yǐhòu, nǐ tàitai yào huíqù gōngzuò ma? Is your wife going back to work after she finishes giving birth to the baby? src
你想要几个孩子？Nǐ xiǎngyào jǐ gè háizi? How many kids do you want to have? src
我老婆总是想要最贵的包。Wǒ lǎopo zǒngshì xiǎngyào zuì guì de bāo. My wife always wants the most expensive bags. src
她想要找一个有钱的男朋友。Tā xiǎngyào zhǎo yī gè yǒuqián de nánpéngyou. She wants to find a rich boyfriend. src
你们为什么想要离开北京？Nǐmen wèishénme xiǎngyào líkāi Běijīng? Why do you all want to leave Beijing? src
他想要帮你找一个更好的工作。Tā xiǎngyào bāng nǐ zhǎo yī gè gèng hǎo de gōngzuò. He wants to help you find a better job. src
这个主意好极了。Zhège zhǔyi hǎo jíle. This idea is perfect. src
味道好极了!Wèidào hǎo jíle! The taste is perfect! src
他的英文棒极了。Tā de Yīngwén bàng jíle. His English is perfect. src
婚礼热闹极了。Hūnlǐ rènao jíle. The wedding was very lively. src
图书馆一点声音都没有，安静极了。Túshūguǎn yīdiǎn shēngyīn dōu méiyǒu, ānjìng jíle. There is no sound at all in the library. It's really quiet. src
昨天的派对无聊极了!Zuótiān de pàiduì wúliáo jíle! Yesterday's party was so boring! src
他那么生气，我们都害怕极了。Tā nàme shēngqì, wǒmen dōu hàipà jíle. He was so angry. We were all very scared. src
高考那天，我紧张极了。Gāokǎo nà tiān, wǒ jǐnzhāng jíle. I was really nervous the day I took the college entrance examination. src
这件事让我们都尴尬极了。Zhè jiàn shì ràng wǒmen dōu gāngà jíle. This matter made us all very embarrassed. src
那个男孩讨厌极了!Nàge nánhái tǎoyàn jíle! That boy is really annoying! src
你说得这么快，我怎么能听懂？Nǐ shuōde zhème kuài, wǒ zěnme néng tīngdǒng ? You speak so fast. How could I understand you? src
你怎么那么忙？Nǐ zěnme nàme máng? How come you are so busy? src
雨这么大，明天再去吧。Yǔ zhème dà, míngtiān zài qù ba. It's raining so heavily. How about we go tomorrow? src
你那么有钱，为什么还要工作？Nǐ nàme yǒuqián, wèishénme hái yào gōngzuò. You are so rich. Why are you still working? src
中国人口这么多，当然会有很多社会问题。Zhōngguó rénkǒu zhème duō, dāngrán huì yǒu hěn duō shèhuì wèntí. China has such a big population. Of course there will be many social problems. src
我没想到这个考试这么难。Wǒ méi xiǎng dào zhège kǎoshì zhème nán. I didn't expect this exam is so difficult. src
你怎么有这么多问题要问？Nǐ zěnme yǒu zhème duō wèntí yào wèn? How come you have so many questions to ask? src
这个老外怎么会了解那么多中国历史？Zhège lǎowài zěnme huì liǎojiě nàme duō Zhōngguó lìshǐ? How come this foreigner knows so much about Chinese history? src
今天这么冷，你怎么穿那么少？Jīntiān zhème lěng, nǐ zěnme chuān nàme shǎo? It's so cold today. How come you wear so little? src
科技那么发达，什么都是有可能的。Kējì nàme fādá, shénme dōu shì yǒu kěnéng de. Science and technology is so developed. Nothing is impossible. src
最近不怎么忙。Zuìjìn bù zěnme máng. It hasn't been very busy lately. src
这里的冬天不怎么冷。Zhèlǐ de dōngtiān bù zěnme lěng. It's not very cold here in winter. src
他们好像不怎么高兴。Tāmen hǎoxiàng bù zěnme gāoxìng. They seem not very happy. src
这个学生不怎么努力。Zhège xuéshēng bù zěnme nǔlì. This student isn't very hard-working. src
那家餐厅不怎么干净。Nà jiā cāntīng bù zěnme gānjìng. That restaurant isn't very clean. src
这个老师不怎么专业。Zhège lǎoshī bù zěnme zhuānyè. This teacher isn't very professional. src
你是不是昨天睡得不怎么好？Nǐ shì bu shì zuótiān shuì de bù zěnme hǎo? Did you not sleep very well last night? src
我不怎么喜欢咖啡。Wǒ bù zěnme xǐhuan kāfēi. I'm not very into coffee. src
他跟他父母长得不怎么像。Tā gēn tā fùmǔ zhǎng de bù zěnme xiàng. He and his parents don't look very much alike. src
他去美国一年多了，不过不怎么想家。Tā qù Měiguó yī nián duō le, bùguò bù zěnme xiǎngjiā. He's been in America for more than one year, but he's not very homesick. src
我们全家都去过北京。Wǒmen quán jiā dōu qù guo Běijīng. Our entire family have been to Beijing. src
全公司的人都不喜欢新老板。Quán gōngsī de rén dōu bù xǐhuan xīn lǎobǎn. The whole company doesn't like the new boss. src
运动完以后我全身都是汗。Yùndòng wán yǐhòu wǒ quán shēn dōu shì hàn. My whole body sweat after finishing exercising. src
全校都放假了。Quán xiào dōu fàngjià le. The whole school are on holiday. src
这个地方全年都很热。Zhège dìfang quán nián dōu hěn rè. It's hot here the whole year. src
大家全都到了。Dàjiā quán dōu dào le. Everybody has come. src
奶奶的头发全都白了。Nǎinai de tóufa quán dōu bái le. My grandma's hair all turned grey. src
我妈妈做的菜全都好吃。Wǒ māma zuò de cài quán dōu hǎochī. The food that my mother makes are all tasty. src
作业全都做完了吗？Zuòyè quán dōu zuò wán le ma? You've finished all your homework? src
你全都拿走吧。Nǐ quán dōu názǒu ba. Take them all. src
他们全都没去。Tāmen quán dōu méi qù. None of them went. src
这个周末我们全都不在家。Zhège zhōumò wǒmen quán dōu bù zài jiā. None of us will be home this weekend. src
你们全都不怕吗？Nǐmen quán dōu bù pà ma? Are you all not afraid? src
这些菜全都没熟。Zhèxiē cài quán dōu méi shóu. None of these food are fully cooked. src
他的话我全都不相信。Tā de huà wǒ quán dōu bù xiāngxìn. I don't believe anything he says. src
他说得有道理，但我不全都同意。Tā shuō de yǒu dàolǐ, dàn wǒ bù quán dōu tóngyì. He has a point, but I can't say I agree on all of it. src
菜太多了，我们没全都吃完。Cài tài duō le, wǒmen méi quán dōu chī wán. The food was too much. We didn't finish eating them all. src
昨天作业太多了，我没全都做完。Zuótiān zuòyè tài duō le, wǒ méi quán dōu zuò wán. I had too much homework yesterday. I didn't finish doing them all. src
我的家人没全都来参加我的婚礼。Wǒ de jiārén méi quán dōu lái cānjiā wǒ de hūnlǐ. Not all of my family came to my wedding. src

全国人民都知道这个新闻。Quán guó rénmín dōu zhīdào zhège xīnwén. People in the whole country know about this news. src
打完球以后我全身都是汗。Dǎ wán qiú yǐhòu wǒ quán shēn dōu shì hàn. My whole body sweat after playing the ball. src

他把咖啡全都喝了。Tā bǎ kāfēi quán dōu hē le. He drank up all the coffee. src
他说的话全都不要相信。Tā shuō de huà quán dōu bùyào xiāngxìn. Don't believe anything he says. src

他的话你不能全都相信。Tā de huà nǐ bù néng quán dōu xiāngxìn. You can't believe everything he says. src
你说得太快了，我不可能全都记下来。Nǐ shuō de tài kuài le, wǒ bù kěnéng quán dōu jì xiàlái. You spoke too fast. I can't write down all of what you said. src
地方太小，我们的朋友不能全都邀请。Dìfang tài xiǎo, wǒmen de péngyou bù néng quán dōu yāoqǐng. The place is too small. We can't invite all our friends. src
你的脸红红的。Nǐ de liǎn hóng hóng de. Your face is red. src
宝宝的眼睛大大的。Bǎobao de yǎnjing dà dà de. The baby's eyes are big. src
今晚的月亮圆圆的。Jīnwǎn de yuèliang yuán yuán de. The moon is round tonight. src
她爸爸高高胖胖的。Tā bàba gāo gāo pàng pàng de. Her father is tall and fat. src
我妹妹瘦瘦小小的。Wǒ mèimei shòu shòu xiǎo xiǎo de. My little sister are thin and small. src
高兴→高高兴兴gāoxìng ￫ gāo gāo xìng xìng happy src
热闹→热热闹闹rènao ￫ rè rè nāo nāo exciting src
漂亮→漂漂亮亮piàoliang ￫ piào piào liāng liāng pretty src
舒服→舒舒服服shūfu ￫ shū shū fū fū comfortable src
安静→安安静静ānjìng ￫ ān ān jìng jìng peaceful src
我们清清楚楚地看到他跟一个胖胖的男人上车了。Wǒmen qīng qīng chǔ chǔ de kàndào tā gēn yīgè pàng pàng de nánrén shàngchē le. We clearly saw him get in the car with a fat man. src
我真想舒舒服服地躺在沙发上看电视。Wǒ zhēn xiǎng shū shū fū fū de tǎng zài shāfā shàng kàn diànshì. I'd really like to comfortably lie on the couch and watch TV. src
你妈妈辛辛苦苦地做了两个小时的饭，你怎么不吃？Nǐ māma xīn xīn kǔ kǔ de zuò le liǎng gè xiǎoshí de fàn, nǐ zěnme bù chī? Your mother labored over this meal for two hours, and you are going to eat it? src
妹妹快过生日了，我打算给她办一个生日派对，热闹热闹。Mèimei kuàiguò shēngrìle, wǒ dǎsuàn gěi tā bàn yīgè shēngrì pàiduì, rènao rènao. My little sister's birthday is coming and I'm going to throw her a birthday party and have a blast. src

我妹妹一直瘦瘦小小的。Wǒ mèimei yīzhí shòu shòu xiǎo xiǎo de. My little sister are thin and small all the time. src

健康→健健康康jiànkāng ￫ jiàn jiàn kāng kāng healthy src

听到这个消息，她高高兴兴地走了。Tīngdào zhège xiāoxī, tā gāo gāo xìng xìng de zǒu le. Upon hearing the news, she happily left. src

洗个澡吧，舒服一下。Xǐ gè zǎo ba, shūfu yīxià. Take a shower and get comfortable. src
你要努力地学习。Nǐ yào nǔlì de xuéxí. You must study hard. src
雨天地滑，慢慢地走。Yǔtiān dì huá, màn màn de zǒu. The floor is very slippery in rainy days. Walk slowly. src

他热情地拥抱了我。Tā rèqíng de yōngbào le wǒ. He gave me a very warm embrace. src
她激动地对我说"谢谢"。Tā jīdòng de duì wǒ shuō "xièxie". She said "Thank you" to me excitedly. src

大家都在教室里安安静静地看书。Dàjiā dōu zài jiàoshì lǐ ān ān jìng jìng de kàn shū. Everybody is reading quietly in the classroom. src
我希望你快快乐乐地长大。Wǒ xīwàng nǐ kuài kuài lè lè de zhǎngdà. I hope that you grow up happily. src
你要认真地学习。Nǐ yào rènzhēn de xuéxí. You must study seriously. src
爷爷慢慢地走路。Yéyé màn man de zǒulù. Grandpa walks slowly. src
我们舒服地躺在那里。Wǒmen shūfu de tǎng zài nàlǐ. We comfortably laid down here. src
小狗大声地叫。Xiǎo gǒu dàshēng de jiào. The puppy barked loudly. src
我希望你健健康康地长大。Wǒ xīwàng nǐ jiàn jiàn kāng kāng de zhǎng dà. I hope that you grow up healthy. src
我正好要出去，垃圾我来扔吧。Wǒ zhènghǎo yào chūqù, lājī wǒ lái rēng ba. I'm just about to leave. I'll take out the trash. src
你来了！我正好要找你。Nǐ lái le! Wǒ zhènghǎo yào zhǎo nǐ. You are here! I was just looking for you. src
他正好问了我想问的问题。Tā zhènghǎo wèn le wǒ xiǎng wèn de wèntí. He happened to ask the question that I wanted to ask. src
我正好也在这里实习。Wǒ zhènghǎo yě zài zhèlǐ shíxí. I happened to do my internship there. src
正好你们都是单身。Zhènghǎo nǐmen dōu shì dānshēn. You both happen to be single. src
我明天见他，正好可以问问他这件事。Wǒ míngtiān jiàn tā, zhènghǎo kěyǐ wènwen tā zhè jiàn shì. I'm going to meet with him tomorrow. I can ask him about this piece of matter by the way. src
我们正好也要去那儿，一起走吧。Wǒmen zhènghǎo yě yào qù nàr, yīqǐ zǒu ba. We just happen to be going there. Let's go together. src
我敲门的时候，他正好出门。Wǒ yào qiāo mén de shíhou, tā zhènghǎo chūmén. He just happened to be leaving the house while I was knocking at the door. src
这件衣服的大小正好。Zhè jiàn yīfu de dàxiǎo zhènghǎo. The size of these clothes is just right. src
水温正好，不冷也不热。Shuǐwēn zhènghǎo, bù lěng yě bù rè. The temperature of the water is perfect, not too cold, not too hot. src
这件事情我还在考虑。Zhèjiàn shìqing wǒ hái zài kǎolǜ. I am still thinking about this piece of matter. src
已经中午了，他还在睡？Yǐjīng zhōngwǔ le, tā hái zài shuì? It's already noon and he's still sleeping? src
她还在生气吗？Tā hái zài shēngqì ma? Is she still mad? src
你怎么还在用那个旧手机？Nǐ zěnme hái zài yòng nàge jiù shǒujī? How come you're still using that old cell phone? src
你还在玩游戏？明天不是有考试吗？Nǐ hái zài wán yóuxì? Míngtiān bù shì yǒu kǎoshì ma? Why are you still playing video games? Don't you have an exam tomorrow? src
我让他不要买，他还是买了。Wǒ ràng tā bùyào mǎi, tā háishì mǎi le. I asked him not to buy it, but he still bought it. src
他不想离婚，但是最后还是离婚了。Tā bù xiǎng líhūn, dànshì zuìhòu háishì líhūn le. He didn't want to divorce, but he still ended up divorced. src
父母不同意他去，可是他还是去了。Fùmǔ bù tóngyì tā qù, kěshì tā háishì qù le. He still went there although his patents disagreed. src
医生不让她喝酒，她还是喝。Yīshēng bù ràng tā hējiǔ, tā háishì hē. The doctor told her to stop drinking alcohol, but she still drinks it. src
老师生病了，但是她还是来上课了。Lǎoshī shēngbìng le, dànshì tā háishì lái shàngkè le. The teacher still made it to the class although she got sick. src
我们等了半个小时了，老师还没到。Wǒmen děng le bàn gè xiǎoshí le. Lǎoshī hái méi dào. We've been waiting for half an hour, but the teacher hasn't arrived. src
电影已经开始了，你还没出门？Diànyǐng yǐjīng kāishǐ le, nǐ hái méi chūmén? The movie has started already, and you haven't left the house? src
你已经四十多了，还不想结婚？Nǐ yǐjīng sìshí duō le, hái bù xiǎng jiéhūn? You're in your forties, and you still don't want to get married? src
我解释了这么多遍，你还不懂？Wǒ jiěshì le zhème duō biàn, nǐ hái bù dǒng? I've explained so many times, and you still don't understand? src
我对你这么好，你还不高兴？Wǒ duì nǐ zhème hǎo, nǐ hái bù gāoxìng? I treat you so well, but you're still not happy? src
两个人正好，一个说，一个演。Liǎng gè rén zhènghǎo, yīgè shuō , yīgè yǎn. Two people is perfect. One to speak and one to act. src
这个楼层正好，不高也不低。Zhège lóucéng zhènghǎo, bù gāo yě bù dī. The floor is perfect, not too high, not too low. src
两个房间正好，我一间，我爸妈一间。Liǎng gè fángjiān zhènghǎo, wǒ yījiān, wǒ bà mā yījiān. Two rooms are perfect. One for me and one for my parents. src
我正好要出去，你要我帮你带什么东西吗？Wǒ zhènghǎo yào chūqù, nǐ yào wǒ bāng nǐ dài shénme dōngxi ma? I'm just about to leave. What do you want me to bring for you? src
我现在正好没事做，可以帮你照顾一下宝宝。Wǒ xiànzài zhènghǎo méi shì zuò, kěyǐ bāng nǐ zhàogù yíxià bǎobao. I just happened to have nothing to do now so I can help you with the baby. src
他正好是学这个专业的，也许可以帮你。Tā zhènghǎo shì xué zhège zhuānyè de, yěxǔ kěyǐ bāng nǐ. His major is just this. Maybe he could help you. src
你们都要来？太好了！正好帮我搬家。Nǐmen dōu yào lái? Tài hǎo le! Zhènghǎo bāng wǒ bānjiā. Are you all coming? Great! So you can help me to move. src
你来得正好，不早也不晚。Nǐ láidé zhènghǎo, bù zǎo yě bù wǎn. You arrived at just the right time, not too early and not too late. src
米饭煮得正好，不硬也不软。Mǐfàn zhǔ dé zhènghǎo, bù yìng yě bù ruǎn. The rice was made perfectly, not too hard and not too soft. src
盐放得正好，不咸也不淡。Yán fàng de zhènghǎo, bù xián yě bù dàn. The amount of salt you put was just right, not too salty and not too bland. src
钱给得正好，不多也不少。Qián gěi de zhènghǎo, bù duō yě bù shǎo. The money you gave was just right, not too much and not too little. src
菜点得正好，都吃完了。Cài diǎn de zhènghǎo, dōu chī wán le. The food you ordered was perfect. We finished them all. src
那个人就是她的新男朋友。Nàge rén jiù shì tā de xīn nánpéngyou. That guy is her new boyfriend. src
他就是你要找的人。Tā jiù shì nǐ yào zhǎo de rén. He's just the person that you're looking for. src
我们就是他的家人。Wǒmen jiù shì tā de jiārén. We're his family. src
你就是个笨蛋！Nǐ jiù shì gè bèndàn! A moron is precisely what you are! src
他就是那个骗子！Tā jiù shì nàge piànzi! That conman is him! src
他不去旅游就是不想花钱。Tā bù qù lǚyóu jiùshì bù xiǎng huāqián. He didn't travel only because he doesn't want to spend the money. src
你不参加比赛就是怕输吗？Nǐ bù cānjiā bǐsài jiùshì pà shū ma? You're not entering the competition just because you're afraid of failure? src
他这样说就是嫉妒我。Tā zhèyàng shuō jiùshì jídù wǒ. He said this only because he envies me. src
她就是漂亮，没别的优势。Tā jiùshì piàoliang, méi biéde yōushì. She's just pretty; she doesn't have any other strengths. src
我就要去！Wǒ jiù yào qù! I just want to go! src
我就是喜欢他。Wǒ jiù shì xǐhuan tā. I just like him. src
我就不告诉你。Wǒ jiù bù gàosu nǐ. I'm just not going to tell you. src
我父母就是不让我一个人去。Wǒ fùmǔ jiùshì bù ràng wǒ yīgèrén qù. My parents simply won't let me go alone. src
这个学生就是不听老师的话。Zhège xuéshēng jiù bù tīng lǎoshī de huà. The student just wouldn't listen to his teacher. src
问我干吗？我又不知道。Wèn wǒ gànmá? Wǒ yòu bù zhīdào. Why ask me? I definitely don't know. src
这些菜又没坏，为什么要扔？Zhèxiē cài yòu méi huài, wèishénme yào rēng? These food aren't bad. Why would you throw them away? src
不要生气，我又不是故意的。Bùyào shēngqì, wǒ yòu bù shì gùyì de. Don't be mad.It really wasn't on purpose. src
今天又不热，开空调干吗？Jīntiān yòu bù rè, kāi kōngtiáo gànmá? It's not hot today. Why turn on the air conditioner? src
明天又不上班，那么早起床干吗？Míngtiān yòu bù shàngbān, nàme zǎo qǐchuáng gànmá? You don't go to work tomorrow. Why get up so early? src
你现在又不忙，来帮我一下。Nǐ xiànzài yòu bù máng, lái bāng wǒ yīxià. You're not busy now. Come and help me. src
我又没吃过，我怎么知道好不好吃？Wǒ yòu méi chī guo, zěnme zhīdào hǎo bu hǎochī? I haven't eaten it. How would I know if it is tasty or not? src
孩子又没做错，打他干吗？Háizi yòu méi zuò cuò, dǎ tā gànmá? The child didn't do anything wrong. Why hit him? src
又没下雨，带伞干吗？Yòu méi xiàyǔ, dài sǎn gànmá? It's not raining. Why are you bringing the umbrella? src
又不关你的事，问那么多干吗？Yòu bù guān nǐ de shì, wèn nàme duō gànmá? It's not any of your business. Why ask so much? src
她就要出国了。Tā jiù yào chūguó le. She's going abroad. src
就要下雨了！Jiù yào xiàyǔ le! It's about to rain! src
我们的大老板就要来了。Wǒmen de dà lǎobǎn jiùyào lái le. Our big boss is coming soon. src
他们就要结婚了。Tāmen jiù yào jiéhūn le. They are about to get married. src
就要下课了，还有别的问题吗？Jiù yào xiàkè le, háiyǒu bié de wèntí ma? The class is almost over. Are there any other questions? src
还有十天宝宝就一岁了。Háiyǒu shí tiān bǎobao jiù yī suì le. In ten more days, the baby will be one year old. src
还有十分钟我就下班了。Háiyǒu shí fēnzhōng wǒ jiù xiàbān le. In 10 more minutes I get off work. src
还有五天就要放假了。Háiyǒu wǔ tiān jiù yào fàngjià le. In 10 more days, I go on vacation. src
还有一个月就要过年了。Háiyǒu yī gè yuè jiù yào guònián le. In another month it will be Chinese New Year. src
还有两个星期我们就要考试了。Háiyǒu liǎng gè xīngqí wǒmen jiù yào kǎoshì le. We're just two weeks away from the exam date. src
我明天再来。Wǒ míngtiān zài lái. I'll come again tomorrow. src
请再说一遍。Qǐng zài shuō yī biàn. Say it again, please. src
我想再看一遍。Wǒ xiǎng zài kàn yībiàn. I want to watch it again. src
我可以再试一下吗？Nǐ zài shì yīxià ma? Can I try it again? src
我希望能再去一次。Wǒ xīwàng néng zài qù yī cì. I hope that I can go there again. src

服务员，再来。Wǒmen zài zhǎo yī gè rén ba. Let's find another person. src

你再给我五十块。Nǐ zài gěi wǒ wǔshí kuài. Give me fifty more kuai. src
他问我们能不能再给他几天时间。Tā wèn wǒmen néng bu néng zài gěi tā jǐ tiān shíjiān. He asked if we can give him a few more days. src
再找找。Zài zhǎozhao. Keep looking a little bit. src
再等等他吧。Zài děngdeng tā ba. Keep waiting for him for a little while. src
时间还早，再玩一会儿吧。Shíjiān hái zǎo, zài wán yīhuǐ'er ba. It's still early. Let's keep playing for a while. src
现在才六点半，我想再睡一会儿。Xiànzài cái liù diǎn bàn, wǒ xiǎng zài shuì yīhuǐ'er. It's only 6:30. I want to sleep a little longer. src
你们想不想再休息一会儿？Nǐmen xiǎng bu xiǎng zài xiūxi yīhuǐ'er? Do you guys want to rest for a little longer? src
我们明年再来。Wǒmen míngnián zài lái. We'll come again next year. src
你可以再说一遍吗？Nǐ kěyǐ zài shuō yī biàn ma? Can you say it again, please? src
要不要再试一下？Yào bù yàozài shì yīxià? Would you like to try it again? src
这本书我要再看一遍。Zhè běn shū wǒ yào zài kàn yī biàn. I want to read this book again. src
老师说明天要再复习一遍。Lǎoshī shuō míngtiān yào zài fùxí yī biàn. The teacher said we'll review it again tomorrow. src
再点几个菜吧。Zài diǎn jǐ gè cài ba. Let's order some more dishes. src
服务员，再来两瓶啤酒。Fúwùyuán, zài lái liǎng píng píjiǔ. Waiter, two more bottles of beer, please. src
我能不能再拿两个？Wǒ néng bu néng zài ná liǎng gè? Can I take two more? src
不急，再想想。Bù jí, zài xiǎngxiang. Don't worry. Keep thinking. src
再等一会儿吧。Zài děng yīhuìr ba. Let's wait a little longer. src

快过年了，我们又能拿压岁钱了！Kuài guònián le, wǒmen yòu néng ná yāsuìqián le! CNY is coming soon. We can get our new year money again! src
我又忘了。Wǒ yòu wàng le. I forgot it again. src
他又没来上课。Tā yòu méi lái shàngkè. He didn't come to the class again. src

你又不参加？Nǐ yòu bù cānjiā? You are not going to attend this? Again? src

今天又要加班了！Jīntiān yòu yào jiābān le! We're going to work late today. AGAIN! src
你原来的发型很可爱。Nǐ yuánlái de fàxíng hěn kě'ài. Your original hairstyle was very cute. src
这件衣服原来的价格是999块。Zhè jiàn yīfu yuánlái de jiàgé shì 999 kuài. The original price is 999 RMB. src
他原来不知道这件事，是我刚刚跟他说的。Tā yuánlái bù zhīdào zhè jiàn shì, shì wǒ gānggāng gēn tā shuō de. Originally he didn't know about this. I just told him. src
我们原来住在浦东，几个月以前搬到了这边。Wǒmen yuánlái zhù zài Pǔdōng, jǐ gè yuè yǐqián bān dào le zhèbiān. Originally we lived in Pudong. We moved here a few months ago. src
她原来是他的中文老师，现在是他老婆。Tā yuánlái shì tā de Zhōngwén lǎoshī, xiànzài shì tā lǎopo. She was originally his Chinese teacher. She is now his wife. src
原来是你！Yuánlái shì nǐ! So it was you all along! src
原来你们认识！Yuánlái nǐmen rènshi! So you've known each other this whole time! src
原来他是你前男友！Yuánlái tā shì nǐ qián nányǒu! It turns out he was you ex-boyfriend! src
原来你这么有钱！Yuánlái nǐ zhème yǒuqián! It turns out you are so rich! src
原来你在骗我！我怎么那么傻？Yuánlái nǐ zài piàn wǒ! Wǒ zěnme nàme shǎ? You have been tricking me, how could I be so stupid? src
他一下子吃了三碗米饭。Tā yīxiàzi chī le sān wǎn mǐfàn. He ate three bowls of rice all at once. src
天气一下子变冷了。Tiānqì yīxiàzi biàn lěng le. The weather is suddenly getting cold. src
她下楼的时候不小心，一下子摔倒了。Tā xiàlóu de shíhou bù xiǎoxīn, yīxiàzi shuāidǎo le. She wasn't careful going down the stairs, and suddenly fell. src
这些问题不可能一下都解决。Zhè xiē wèntí bù kěnéng yīxià dōu jiějué. These problems can't be solved all at once. src
她在美国的第一个月一下瘦了十斤。Tā zài Měiguó de dì yī gè yuè yīxià shòu le shí jīn. She lost ten jin the first month she was in the USA. src
听他说完，我一下子就明白了。Tīng tā shuō wán, wǒ yīxiàzi jiù míngbai le. After hearing him out, I understood everything all at once. src
他是最高的，我一下就看到他了。Tā shì zuì gāo de, wǒ yīxià jiù kàndào tā le. He is the tallest. I spotted him right away. src
拍完那部电影以后，他一下子就出名了。Pāi wán nà bù diànyǐng yǐhòu, tā yīxiàzi jiù chūmíng le. He became very famous soon after that movie. src
他的新书很受欢迎，一下就卖了三千本。Tā de xīn shū hěn shòu huānyíng, yīxià jiù mài le sān qiān běn. His new book is very popular. Three thousand books were sold all at once. src
老师给了我一点提示，我一下子就想起来了。Lǎoshī gěi le wǒ yīdiǎn tíshì, wǒ yīxiàzi jiù xiǎng qǐlai le. The teacher gave me a little hint. I recalled it right away. src
你原来的发型也很可爱。Nǐ yuánlái de fàxíng yě hěn kě'ài. Your original hairstyle was also very cute. src
她们原来只是邻居，现在是很好的朋友。Tāmen yuánlái zhǐ shì línjū, xiànzài shì hěn hǎo de péngyou. Originally they were just neighbors. Now they're very good friends. src
我们原来住在浦东，几个月以前搬到了这里。Wǒmen yuánlái zhù zài Pǔdōng, jǐ gè yuè yǐqián bān dào le zhèlǐ. Originally we lived in Pudong. We moved here a few months ago. src
原来她是他的中文老师，现在是他老婆。Yuánlái tā shì tā de Zhōngwén lǎoshī, xiànzài shì tā lǎopo. She was originally his Chinese teacher. She is now his wife. src
原来是这样！Yuánlái shì zhèyàng! Oh, so it's like that is it! src
天气一下变冷了。Tiānqì yīxià biàn lěng le. The weather is suddenly getting cold. src
他一下吃了三碗米饭。Tā yīxià chī le sān wǎn mǐfàn. He ate three bowls of rice at all once. src
她下楼的时候一下子摔倒了。Tā xiàlóu de shíhou yīxiàzi shuāidǎo le. She suddenly fell when she went downstairs. src
我们说话的时候，她一下子哭了起来。Wǒmen shuōhuà de shíhou, tā yīxiàzi kū le qǐlai. She burst into tears when we were talking. src
她上个月一下瘦了十斤。Tā shàng gè yuè yīxià shòu le shí jīn. She lost ten jin the first last month at all once. src
老师进来以后，大家一下子就安静了。Lǎoshī jìnlái yǐhòu, dàjiā yīxiàzi jiù ānjìng le. Everyone became silent after the teacher came in. src
拍完那部电影，他一下子就出名了。Pāi wán nà bù diànyǐng, tā yīxiàzi jiù chūmíng le. He became very famous soon after that movie. src
看到那张照片，我一下子就想起来了。Kàndào nà zhāng zhàopiàn, wǒ yīxiàzi jiù xiǎng qǐlái le. It all flashed back to me when I saw that picture. src
我今天差点儿迟到。Wǒ chàdiǎnr chídào. I was almost late. src
他们差点打起来。Tāmen chàdiǎn dǎ qǐlái. They almost started a fight. src
我差点笑出来。Wǒ chàdiǎn xiào chūlái. I almost laughed. src
车差点撞到我。Chē chàdiǎn zhuàngdào wǒ. The car almost hit me. src
手机差点掉进水里。Shǒujī chàdiǎn diào jìn shuǐ. lǐ. The cell phone nearly fell into the water. src
我差点忘了今天要开会。Wǒ chàdiǎn wàng le . I almost forgot we need to have a meeting today. src
我们差点儿错过了最后一班地铁。Wǒmen chàdiǎnr cuòguò le zuìhòu yī bān dìtiě. We almost missed the last metro. src
菜差点就糊了。Cài chàdiǎn jiù hú le. almost . src
我们队差点儿就输了。Wǒmen duì chàdiǎnr jiù shū le. Our team almost lost. src
这个东西差点就丢了。Zhège dōngxi chàdiǎn jiù diū le. I almost lost the thing. src
我们差点相信他。Wǒmen chàdiǎn xiāngxìn tā. We almost believed him. src
我差点忘了。Wǒ chàdiǎn wàng le. I almost forgot. src
我今天差点儿迟到了。Wǒ jīntiān chàdiǎnr chídào le. I was almost late today. src
她差点疯了。Tā chàdiǎn fēng le. She almost went crazy. src
他差点就死了。Tā chàdiǎn jiù sǐ le. He almost died. src
菜差点糊了。Cài chàdiǎn hú le. The food was almost burnt. src
我们队差点儿输了。Wǒmen duì chàdiǎnr shū le. Our team almost lost. src
我差点就做到了。Wǒ chàdiǎn jiù zuòdào le. I almost did it. src
我从来都一个人住，已经习惯了。Wǒ cónglái dōu yīgèrén zhù, yǐjīng xíguàn le. I have always lived alone; I'm used to it already. src
她从来都这么自私。Tā cónglái dōu zhème zìsī. She's always been this selfish. src
我们下棋，他从来都是赢的。Wǒmen xiàqí, tā cónglái dōu shì yíng de. He always wins when we play chess. src
他说话从来都很大声。Tā shuōhuà cónglái dōu hěn dàshēng. He always speaks very loudly. src
她找男朋友从来都是要长得帅的。Tā zhǎo nánpéngyou cónglái dōu shì yào zhǎo zhǎng de shuài de. She always wants those good-looking guys when she looks for boyfriend. src
他工作从来都很努力。Tā gōngzuò cónglái dōu hěn nǔlì. He always works very hard. src
我的学生从来都这么有自信。Wǒ de xuéshēng cónglái dōu zhème yǒu zìxìn. My students are always so confident. src
他的电影从来都是最受欢迎的。Tā de diànyǐng cónglái dōu shì zuì shòuhuānyíng de. His movies are always the most popular ones. src
成功从来都要靠自己努力。Chénggōng cónglái dōu yào kào zìjǐ nǔlì. Success always depends on one's own efforts. src
我太紧张了，结果说错了很多。Wǒ tài jǐnzhāng le, jiéguǒ shuō cuò le hěn duō. I was too nervous. As a result, I said a lot of wrong things. src
他开得太快了，结果撞到了一个人。Tā kāi de tài kuài le, jiéguǒ zhuàngdào le yī gè rén. He drove too fast. As a result, he hit someone. src
她穿得太少了，结果感冒了。Tā chuān de tài shǎo le,jiéguǒ gǎnmào le. She didn't wear enough, as a result, she had a cold. src
他没好好复习，结果考试没考好。Tā méi hǎohǎo fùxí, jiéguǒ kǎoshì méi kǎo hǎo. He didn't review well. As a result, he didn't do well in the exam. src
他总是迟到，结果老板炒了他的鱿鱼。Tā zǒngshì chídào, jiéguǒ lǎobǎn chǎo le tā de yóuyú. He's always late for work. As a result, his boss fired him. src
我没带伞，结果全身都湿了。Wǒ méi dài sǎn, jiéguǒ quánshēn dōu shī le. I didn't take an umbrella. As a result, I got all wet. src
我跟朋友打赌，结果我输了。Wǒ gēn péngyou dǎdǔ, jiéguǒ wǒ shū le. I took a bet with my friends. I lost In the end. src
我昨天跟朋友去喝酒，结果喝醉了。Wǒ zuótiān gēn péngyou qù hējiǔ, jiéguǒ hē zuì le. I went to have a drink with my friends yesterday. I got drunk in the end. src
他吃了很多药，结果都没有用。Tā chī le hěn duō yào, jiéguǒ dōu méiyǒu yòng. He took a lot of pills. None of them were useful in the end. src
我点的是牛肉汉堡，结果服务员给了我一个鸡肉的。Wǒ diǎn de shì niúròu hànbǎo, jiéguǒ fúwùyuán gěi le wǒ yī gè jīròu de. I ordered a burger. The waiter gave me a chicken sandwich in the end. src
他从来都这样。Tā cónglái dōu zhèyàng. He's always like this. src
她从来都这么晚睡。Tā cónglái dōu zhème wǎn shuì. She's always gone to bed so late. src
她买衣服从来都只买名牌。Tā mǎi yīfu cónglái dōu zhǐ mǎi míngpái. She's always bought brand-name ones when she buys clothes. src
这个国家的女孩从来都很早结婚。Zhège guójiā de nǚhái cónglái dōu hěn zǎo jiéhūn. Girls in this country always get married at a very young age. src
我们学校的学生从来都只能穿校服。Wǒmen xuéxiào de xuéshēng cónglái dōu zhǐ néng chuān xiàofú. Students in our school can only. src
我们下棋，从来都是他赢。Wǒmen xiàqí, cónglái dōu shì tā yíng. He's always won when we play chess. src
互相帮助hùxiāng bāngzhù Help each other src
互相了解hùxiāng liǎojiě Know each other src
互相伤害hùxiāng shānghài Hurt each other src
互相尊重hùxiāng zūnzhòng Respect each other src
互相支持hùxiāng zhīchí Support each other src
互相鼓励hùxiāng gǔlì Encourage each other src
互相影响hùxiāng yǐngxiǎng Influence each other src
互相利用hùxiāng lìyòng Take advantage of each other src
互相看了一眼hùxiāng kàn le yī yǎn glanced at each other src
互相拥抱hùxiāng yōngbào hug each other src
互相交流hùxiāng jiāoliú communicate with each other src
我们买了很多菜，肯定够吃。Wǒmen mǎi le hěnduō cài, kěndìng gòu chī. We bought a lot of food. It must be good enough to eat. src
他带了好多衣服，应该够换。Tā dài le hǎo duō yīfu, yīnggāi gòu huàn. He brought a lot of clothes. It should be enough to change. src
我们只有三个人，你的车肯定够坐。Wǒmen zhǐ yǒu sān gè rén, nǐ de chē kěndìng gòu zuò. We only have three people. I'm sure your car is big enough to sit in. src
这些菜够吃了，不要再买了。Zhèxiē cài gòu chī le, bù yào zài mǎi le. This food is enough to eat. Don't buy more. src
我带的钱够用了，你不用带了。Wǒ dài de qián gòu yòng le, nǐ bù yòng dài le. I've brought enough money to spend. You don't need to bring any. src
你家太小了，恐怕不够住。Nǐ jiā tài xiǎo le, kǒngpà bùgòu zhù. Your house is too small. I'm afraid it's not big enough to live in. src
你的包太小了，这些东西肯定不够放。Nǐ de bāo tài xiǎo le, zhème duō dōngxi kěndìng bùgòu fàng. You bag is too small. This stuff definitely can't fit in it. src
办公室的纸不够用了，你明天去买一些吧。Bàngōngshì de zhǐ bùgòu yòng le, nǐ míngtiān qù mǎi yīxiē ba. The paper in the office is not enough to use. You should go buy some tomorrow. src
我这个月的钱不够花了，你能不能借我五百？Wǒ de qián bùgòu huā le, nǐ néng bu néng jiè wǒ wǔ bǎi? I don't have enough money to spend this month. Could you lend me five hundred kuai? src
别说了！这些话我已经听够了！Bié shuō le, zhèxiē huà wǒ yǐjīng tīng gòu le. Stop talking! I've heard enough of it! src
你今天玩游戏已经玩了三个小时了，玩够了没有？！Nǐ jīntiān wán yóuxì yǐjīng wǎn le sān gè xiǎoshí le, wán gòu le méiyǒu?! You've been playing games for three hours today. Are you not done yet? src
我受够了！我一定要跟他离婚！Wǒ shòu gòu le! Wǒ yīdìng yào gēn tā líhūn! I had enough of him. I'm definitely going to divorce him. src
你天天都叫外卖，还没吃够吗？Nǐ tiāntiān dū jiào wàimài, hái méi chī gòu ma? You order takeout every day. Haven't you gotten sick of eating it? src
她穿得很少，结果感冒了。Tā chuān de hěn shǎo, jiéguǒ gǎnmào le. She didn't wear enough, as a result, she had a cold. src
我去机场接他，结果没接到他。Wǒ qù jīchǎng jiē tā, jiéguǒ méi jiēdào tā. I went to the airport to pick him up. I didn't find him there. src
你终于到了！Nǐ zhōngyú dào le! You finally arrived! src
咱们终于见面了！Zánmen zhōngyú jiànmiàn le! We finally met each other! src
你们终于明白了。Nǐmen zhōngyú míngbai le. You finally understood. src
作业终于做完了！Zuòyè zhōngyú zuò wán le! I finally finished my homework! src
飞机终于起飞了！Fēijī zhōngyú qǐfēi le! The plane is finally taking off! src
你们终于决定了。Nǐmen zhōngyú juédìng le. You finally made your decision. src
饭终于做好了。我快饿死了。Fàn zhōngyú zuò hǎo le. Wǒ kuài è sǐ le. Dinner is finally ready. I'm starving. src
这个愿望终于实现了！Zhège yuànwàng zhōngyú shíxiàn le! This dream finally came true! src
我们找了两个多小时，终于找到了那家店。Wǒmen zhǎo le liǎng gè duō xiǎoshí, zhōngyú zhǎodào le nà jiā diàn. We'd been looking for that shop for more than two hours. We finally found it. src
这些问题终于解决了。我们应该庆祝一下。Zhèxiē wèntí zhōngyú jiějué le. Wǒmen yīnggāi qìngzhù yīxià. These problems are finally resolved. We should celebrate it. src
我们买了很多菜，够吃了。Wǒmen mǎi le hěn duō cài, gòu chī le. We bought a lot of food. It's enough for us to eat. src
这些纸够用吗？Zhèxiē zhǐ gòu yòng ma? Are these paper good enough to use? src
放心吧，我带的钱够花。Fàngxīn ba, wǒ dài de qián gòu huā. Don't worry. I've brought enough money to spend. src
我对你够好了。Wǒ duì nǐ gòu hǎo le. I've been good enough to you. src
别抱怨了，你够幸运了。Bié bàoyuàn le, nǐ gòu xìngyùn le. Stop complaining. You've been lucky enough. src
他觉得他女朋友不够漂亮。Tā juéde tā nǚpéngyou bù gòu piàoliang. He thinks his girlfriend is not pretty enough. src
你说得不够清楚。Nǐ shuō de bù gòu qīngchǔ. You didn't speak very clearly. src
这些菜不够吃，再点几个菜。Zhèxiē cài bù gòu chī, zài diǎn jǐ gè cài. These dishes are not enough to eat. Let's order some more. src
这里太小了，不够坐。Zhèlǐ tài xiǎo le, bùgòu zuò. It's too small here. It's not big enough to sit. src
我受够了！Wǒ shòu gòu le! I had enough of it! src
天天吃外卖，我们都吃够了。Tiāntiān chī wàimài, wǒmen dōu chī gòu le. We eat take-away every day. We're sick of eating it. src
你玩够了没有？Nǐ wán gòu le méiyǒu? Are you done playing or not? src
还是明天去吧。Háishì míngtiān qù ba. We'd better go tomorrow. src
还是让她进来吧。Háishì ràng tā jìnlái ba. We'd better let her come in. src
你还是快点走吧。Nǐ háishì kuài diǎn zǒu ba. You'd better leave now. src
我们还是帮帮他吧。Wǒmen háishì bāngbang tā ba. We'd better help him. src
太晚了，还是先回家吧。Tài wǎn le, háishì xiān huíjiā ba. It's too late. We'd better go home now. src
这里太脏了，我们还是走吧。Zhèlǐ tài zāng le, wǒmen háishì zǒu ba. It's too dirty here; we'd better leave. src
快迟到了，我们还是打车吧。Kuài chídào le, wǒmen háishì dǎchē ba. We're running late. Let's take a taxi. src
太贵了，还是别买了。Tài guì le, háishì bié mǎi le. It's too expensive. You'd better not buy it. src
她不想说，还是不要再问了。Tā bù xiǎng shuō, háishì bùyào zài wèn le. She doesn't want to say anything. We'd better stop asking. src
他一定不同意，还是别跟他说了。Tā yīdìng bù tóngyì, háishì bié gēn tā shuō le. He will definitely disagree. We'd better not tell him. src
你最好先休息一下。Nǐ zuìhǎo xiān xiūxi yīxià. You'd better get some rest first. src
你们最好给他打个电话问一下。Nǐmen zuìhǎo gěi tā dǎ gè diànhuà wèn yīxià. You'd better call and ask him. src
那个地方不好找，我们最好查一下百度地图。Nàge dìfang bù hǎo zhǎo, wǒmen zuìhǎo chá yīxià Bǎidù dìtú. It's not easy to find that place. We'd better search it on Baidu Map. src
外面挺冷的，最好多穿点。Wàimiàn tǐng lěng de, zuìhǎo duō chuān diǎn. It's pretty cold outside. You'd better wear some more layers. src
这个活动很重要，我们最好穿得正式一点。Zhège huódòng hěn zhòngyào, wǒmen zuìhǎo chuān de zhèngshì yīdiǎn. This is an important event. We'd better wear something more formal. src
最好别去。Zuìhǎo bié qù. You'd better not go. src
最好不要这样说。Zuìhǎo bùyào zhèyàng shuō. You'd better not to say it like that. src
这个问题是隐私，最好不要问。Zhège wèntí shì yǐnsī, zuìhǎo bùyào wèn. This question is private. We'd better not ask. src
我们还是坐地铁吧，这样更方便。Wǒmen háishì zuò dìtiě ba, zhèyàng gèng fāngbiàn. We'd better take the metro. It's more convenient this way. src
你要多吃蔬菜，这样对身体更好。Nǐ yào duō chī shūcài, zhèyàng duì shēntǐ hǎo. You should eat more vegetables. It's better for your body this way. src
你要多说，这样才能提高汉语口语。Nǐ yào duō shuō, zhèyàng cái néng kǒuyǔ. You need to speak more. You can improve your spoken Chinese this way. src
你要让他自己做，只有这样他才能学会。Nǐ yào ràng tā zìjǐ zuò, zhǐyǒu zhèyàng tā cái néng xuéhuì. You should let him do it by himself. Only in this way can he learn. src
这样的话，你还怕什么呢？Zhèyàng de huà, nǐ hái pà shénme ne? What are you afraid of in this case? src
如果是这样的话，我觉得你们需要更多的帮助。Rúguǒ shì dehuà zhèyàng de huà, wǒ juéde nǐmen xūyào gèng duō de bāngzhù. If this is the case, I think you need to get more help. src
如果不是这样的话，那你为什么生我的气？Rúguǒ bù shìzhèyàng de huà, nǐ wèishénme shēng wǒ de qì? If this is not the case, then why are you mad at me? src
如果不是这样的话，你还有什么更好的解释？Rúguǒ bù shìzhèyàng de huà, nǐ hái yǒu shénme gèng hǎo de jiěshì? If this is not the case, do you have a better explanation? src
小张请假了，难怪今天没有看到他。Xiǎo Zhāng qǐngjià le, nánguài jīntiān méiyǒu kàndào tā. Little Zhang asked for some vacation time, no wonder I haven't seen him today. src
老板过年要发红包，难怪大家最近都这么开心。Lǎobǎn guònián yào fā hóngbāo, nánguài dàjiā zuìjìn dōu zhème kāixīn. Boss is going to give out red envelopes. No wonder everyone looks so happy recently. src
你的手机丢了？难怪你的手机一直打不通。Nǐ de shǒujī diūle? Nánguài nǐ de shǒujī yīzhí dǎ butōng . Your cell phone is lost? No wonder I couldn't get through. src
难怪这里人这么多，原来在打折。Nánguài zhèlǐ rén zhème duō, yuánlái zài dǎzhé. No wonder there are so many people here. There's a sale going on. src
难怪他没告诉我，原来是不想让我担心。Nánguài tā méi gàosu wǒ, yuánlái shì bù xiǎng ràng wǒ dānxīn. No wonder he hasn't told me. It turns out that he doesn't want me to worry about this. src
这也难怪他，还是个孩子呢，什么都不懂。Zhè yě nánguài tā, háishì gè háizi ne, shénme dōu bù dǒng. Don't blame him. He's just a kid. He doesn't know better. src
这也难怪你，他昨天才给你回复。Zhè yě nánguài nǐ, tā zuótiān cái gěi nǐ huífù. Don't blame yourself. He just replied to you yesterday. src
这也难怪大家，你们第一次来，还不了解这里的风俗。Zhè yě nánguài dàjiā , nǐmen dì-yī cì lái, bù liǎojiě zhèlǐ de fēngsú. Don't blame yourselves. It's your first time here, and you don't understand the customs. src
A:他迟到了。A: Tā chídào le. A: He's late. src
B:这也难怪他。今天地铁坏了。B: Zhè yě nánguài tā. Jīntiān dìtiě huài le. B: Don't blame him. The subway broke down today. src
这样做不对。Zhèyàng zuò bù duì. It's not right to do so. src
这样说不礼貌。Zhèyàng shuō bù lǐmào. It's not polite to say so. src
这样走过去更近。Zhèyàng zǒu guòqù gèng jìn. It's closer to walk this way over there. src
你们真的是这样想的吗？Nǐmen zhēnde shì zhèyàng xiǎng de ma? Do you really think so? src
你要多鼓励学生，这样他们会更有自信。Nǐ yào duō gǔlì xuéshēng, zhèyàng tāmen huì gèng yǒu zìxìn. You need to encourage your students more. It will help them become more confident to do so. src
父母应该多陪孩子，这样孩子会更快乐。Fùmǔ yīnggāi duō péi háizi, zhèyàng háizi huì gèng kuàilè. Parents should spend more time with their children, which will make the children happier. src
你要多说，这样才能越来越流利。Nǐ yào duō shuō, zhèyàng cái néng yuèláiyuè liúlì. You need to speak more. Only in this way can you be more and more fluent. src
让他自己来，这样他才能学会。Ràng tā zìjǐ lái, zhèyàng tā cái néng xuéhuì. Let him do it by himself. Only in this way can he learn. src
如果是这样的话，麻烦就大了。Rúguǒ shì zhèyàng dehuà, máfan jiù dà le. If this is the case, I think we're going to have a big trouble. src
我会住在美国朋友的家里。这样的话，我家人就不那么担心我了。Wǒ huì zhù zài Měiguó péngyou de jiā lǐ. Zhèyàng dehuà, wǒ jiārén jiù bù nàme dānxīn wǒ le. I will stay at my local friend's home in America. My family won't worry about me so much. src
请一个房间一个房间检查。Qǐng yī gè fángjiān yī gè fángjiān jiǎnchá. Please inspect room by room. src
别着急，一点一点做。Bié zháojí, yī diǎn yī diǎn zuò. Don't worry, do it little by little. src
宝宝一天一天在长大。Bǎobao yī tiān yī tiān zài zhǎngdà. The baby is growing up day by day. src
爸爸妈妈一年一年在变老。Bàba māma yī nián yī nián zài biàn lǎo. Year by year, mom and dad are becoming old. src
我一次一次问，他就是什么都不说。Wǒ yī cì 一 cì wèn, tā jiùshì shénme dōu bù shuō. I asked him again and again, but he still wouldn't say anything. src
我一遍一遍地跟他解释，他还是不听。Wǒ yī biàn yī biàn de gēn tā jiěshì, tā háishì bù tīng. I explained it to him over and over again, but he still won't listen. src
你为什么一遍又一遍地听这首歌？Nǐ wèishénme yī biàn yòu yī biàn de tīng zhè shǒu gē? Why do you listen to this song on repeat? src
他们一次又一次犯这种小错误，让经理很头疼。Tāmen yī cì yòu yī cì fàn zhè zhǒng xiǎo cuòwù, ràng jīnglǐ hěn tóuténg. They make this mistake over and over again, giving the manager a headache. src
别拿这么多，一盒一盒拿。Bié ná zhème duō, yī hé yī hé ná. Don't carry too much. One box at a time. src
这件衣服大小挺合适的。Zhè jiàn yīfu dàxiǎo tǐng héshì de. The size of this piece of clothes is quite suitable. src
我觉得你妈妈挺年轻的。Wǒ juéde nǐ māma tǐng niánqīng de. I think your mom is quite young. src
你不觉得他挺帅的吗？Nǐ bù juéde tā tǐng shuài de ma? You don't think he's quite handsome? src
他们家挺有钱的，但是他不像有钱人。Tāmen jiā tǐng yǒuqián de, dànshì tā bù xiàng yǒuqiánrén. Their family is quite rich, but he doesn't like like a rich person. src
大学生毕业找工作的压力挺大的。Dàxuéshēng bìyè zhǎo gōngzuò de yālì tǐng dà de. College graduates who are looking for jobs are under quite a lot of pressure. src
这件事就我知道。Zhè jiàn shì jiù wǒ zhīdào. I'm the only person that knows about this. src
我们都忘了，就他还记得。Wǒmen dōu wàng le, jiù tā hái jìde. We all forgot. Only he still remembers it. src
大家都下班了，就老板还没走。Dàjiā dōu xiàbān le, jiù lǎobǎn hái méi zǒu. Everyone finished work and left. Only the boss hasn't left. src
所有的菜都很好吃，就这两个菜有点咸。Suǒyǒu de cài dōu hěn hǎochī, jiù zhè liǎng gè cài yǒudiǎn xián. All the food is delicious. Just these two dishes are a little salty. src
你觉得别人都是傻子吗？就你聪明？Nǐ juéde biérén dōu shì shǎzi ma? Jiù nǐ cōngming? Do you think everyone is an idiot? That only you are smart? src
我就去过一次。Wǒ jiù qù guo yī cì. I've only been there once. src
我早饭就吃了一片面包。Wǒ zǎofàn jiù chī le yī piān miànbāo. I only had a piece of bread for breakfast. src
你就点了两个菜？Nǐ jiù diǎn le liǎng gè cài? You ordered only two dishes? src
他的事，我们就知道一点点。Tā de shì, wǒmen jiù zhīdào yīdiǎndiǎn. We only know a little about his stuff. src
她在我们公司就工作了两个月。Tā zài wǒmen gōngsī jiù gōngzuò le liǎng gè yuè. She has worked at our company for only two months. src
这里就一个厕所？Zhèlǐ jiù yī gè cèsuǒ? Does this place only have one bathroom? src
你们家就一个孩子吗？Nǐmen jiā jiù yī gè háizi ma? Does your family only have one child? src
我就一个哥哥。Wǒ jiù yī gè gēge. I only have one brother. src
他在上海就一个朋友。Tā zài Shànghǎi jiù yī gè péngyou. He only has one friend in Shanghai. src
我们公司就三个员工。Wǒmen gōngsī jiù sān gè yuángōng. There are only three employees in our company. src
我马上就来。Wǒ mǎshàng jiù lái. I'll be there in a second. src
饭很快就好。Fàn hěn kuài jiù hǎo. Dinner will be ready very soon. src
你们现在就出门吗？Nǐmen xiànzài jiù chūmén ma? Are you leaving the house right now? src
他们一会儿就到。Tāmen yīhuìr jiù dào. They will be here in a few minutes. src
老板明天就回来。Lǎobǎn míngtiān jiù huílái. The boss will be back tomorrow. src
我昨晚八点半就睡觉了。Wǒ zuówǎn bā diǎn bàn jiù shuìjiào le. I went to bed at eight thirty last night. src
这个问题他十分钟就解决了。Zhège wèntí tā shí fēnzhōng jiù jiějué le. It only took him ten minutes to solve this problem. src
这本书你一个晚上就看完了？Zhè běn shū nǐ yī gè wǎnshang jiù kàn wán le? It only took you just one night to finish reading this book? src
她十八岁就大学毕业了。Tā shíbā suì jiù dàxué bìyè le. She graduated from college when she was only 18 years old. src
我们早上九点上课，他八点就来了。Wǒmen zǎoshang jiǔ diǎn shàngkè, tā bā diǎn jiù lái le. We have class at nine in the morning, and he came at eight. src
我早就知道了！Wǒ zǎo jiù zhīdào le! I knew that long ago! src
她早就结婚了。Tā zǎo jiù jiéhūn le. She got married long time ago. src
我们早就毕业了。Wǒmen zǎo jiù bìyè le. We graduated a long time ago! src
我早就跟你说过，他不是好人。Wǒ zǎo jiù gēn nǐ shuō guo, tā bù shì hǎo rén. I told you a long time ago that he's not a good guy. src
这家店早就关门了。Zhè jiā diàn zǎo jiù guānmén le. This shop closed a long time ago. src
他们已经两天没吃东西了。Tāmen yǐjīng liǎng tiān méi chī dōngxi le. They have gone two days without eating anything. src
我们已经十年没见了。Wǒmen yǐjīng shí nián méi jiàn le. It's been ten years since we met last time. src
他已经一个星期没洗澡了。Tā yǐjīng yī gè xīngqī méi xǐzǎo le. He has already gone a whole week without showering. src
你多长时间没刮胡子了？Nǐ duō cháng shíjiān méi guā húzi le? How long has it been since you last shaved? src
她半个月没出门了。Tā bàn gè yuè méi chūmén le. It's been half a month since last time she left the house. src
你们多久没回家了？Nǐmen duōjiǔ méi huíjiā le? How long has it been since you returned home last time? src
你多久没休假了？Nǐ duōjiǔ méi xiūjià le? How long has it been since your last vocation? src
买吧，你已经一年多没买新衣服了。Mǎi ba, nǐ yǐjīng yī nián duō méi mǎi xīn yīfu le. Let's buy it for you. It's been more than one year since you last bought new clothes. src
你好像很久没这么开心了。Nǐ hǎoxiàng hěnjiǔ méi zhème kāixīn le. It seems it's been a long time since you were so happy last time. src
我已经二十年没来中国了。Wǒ yǐjīng èrshí nián méi lái Zhōngguó le. It's been 20 years since I came to China last time. src
我上次来中国是二十年前。Wǒ shàngcì lái Zhōngguó shì èrshí nián qián. The last time I came to China was over ten years ago. (Same meaning as "I haven't been to China since 20 years ago.") src
米饭二十分钟就好。Mǐfàn èrshí fēnzhōng jiù hǎo. The rice will be ready in 20 minutes. src
他们早就分手了。Tāmen zǎo jiù fēnshǒu le. They broke up a long time ago. src
幸亏我们打车来的，不然就迟到了。Xìngkuī wǒmen dǎchē lái de, bùrán jiù chídào le. Luckily, we came by taxi, otherwise we could have been late. src
幸好我妈没看到，不然她肯定要生气。Xìnghǎo wǒ mā méi kàndào, bùrán tā kěndìng yào shēngqì. It's a good thing that my mother didn't see it, otherwise she would definitely be mad. src
幸亏有你在，不然我不知道怎么办。Xìngkuī nǐ zài, bùrán wǒ bù zhīdào zěnme bàn. Fortunately you're here, otherwise I don't know what to do. src
幸好带伞了，不然要淋湿了。Xìnghǎo dài sǎn le,bùrán yào línshī le. It's a good thing I brought the umbrella. Otherwise, I would have gotten soaked. src
幸好现在问题解决了，不然老板肯定要炒你的鱿鱼。Xìnghǎo xiànzài wèntí jiějué le, bùrán lǎobǎn kěndìng yào chǎo nǐ de yóuyú. Luckily, the problem is solved now. Otherwise the boss is definitely going to fire you. src
还好我没听他的话，不然我就输了。Hái hǎo wǒ méi tīng tā de huà,bùrán wǒ jiù shū le. It's a good thing I didn't listen to him, otherwise I would have lost the game. src
还好我保存了，不然文件都丢了。Hái hǎo wǒ bǎocún le, bùrán wénjiàn dōu diū le. Luckily I saved it, otherwise I would have lost all of the documents. src
还好我买得少，不然都浪费了。Hái hǎo mǎi de shǎo, bùrán dōu làngfèi le. Luckily I didn't buy a lot, otherwise it would be all wasted. src
还好老板不知道，不然你肯定被炒鱿鱼。Hái hǎo lǎobǎn bù zhīdào, bùrán nǐ kěndìng bèi chǎo yóuyú. Luckily the boss doesn't know about it, otherwise you will definitely get fired. src
还好你提醒我，不然我肯定忘了。Hái hǎo nǐ tíxǐng wǒ, bùrán wǒ kěndìng wàng le. Luckily, you reminded me, otherwise I would have definitely forgotten. src
我昨天晚上十一点才到家。Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshang shíyī diǎn cái dào jiā. I didn't arrived at home until eleven o'clock last night. src
他二十五岁才上大学。Tā èrshí-wǔ suì cái shàng dàxué. He didn't go to college until he was 25. src
她四十岁才结婚。Tā sìshí suì cái jiéhūn. She didn't get married until she was forty. src
我女儿昨天十二点才睡觉，作业太多了。Wǒ nǚ'ér zuótiān shí'èr diǎn cái shuìjiào, zuòyè tài duō le. My daughter didn't go to bed until 12 o'clock yesterday. Too much homework. src
你九点上班，八点半才起床？Nǐ jiǔ diǎn shàngbān, bā diǎn bàn cái qǐchuáng? You get up at 8:30 while you need to show up at work at nine? src
飞机刚刚才起飞，晚点了两个小时。Fēijī gānggāng cái qǐfēi, wǎndiǎn le liǎng gè xiǎoshí. The flight just took off. It was late for two hours. src
电影七点半开始，可是因为堵车，我们八点才到。Diànyǐng qī diǎn bàn kāishǐ, kěshì yīnwèi dǔchē, wǒmen bā diǎn cái dào. The movie began at 7:30, but we didn't arrive until eight because of traffic. src
你怎么才吃晚饭？已经十点了。Nǐ zěnme cái chī wǎnfàn? Yǐjīng shí diǎn le. How come you are eating supper now? It's 10 pm. src
你怎么才来？我们等了半个多小时。Nǐ zěnme cái lái? Wǒmen děng le bàn gè duō xiǎoshí. How come you came here so late? We've waited for more than half an hour. src
先洗手再吃。Xiān xǐ shǒu zài chī. Wash your hands, and then eat. src
我喜欢先洗澡，再睡觉。Wǒ xǐhuan xiān xǐzǎo, zài shuìjiào. I prefer to take a bath before I go to bed. src
请你先买票再进。Qǐng nǐ xiān mǎi piào zài jìn. Please buy a ticket before you enter. src
你要先做作业，再看电视。Tā yào xiān zuò zuòyè, zài kàn diànshì. First you need to do your homework, and then you can watch. src
我想先找工作，再搬家。Wǒ xiǎng xiān zhǎo gōngzuò, zài bānjiā. I want to find a job first, and then move to a new place. src
先吃饭再说。Xiān chīfàn zàishuō. Let's eat first, then we'll talk. src
先休息一下再说。Xiān xiūxi yīxià zàishuō. Let's rest a little first, then talk. src
你先看完再说。Nǐ xiān kàn wán zàishuō. Finish reading first, and then we can talk. src
我先问一下老板再说。Wǒ xiān wèn yīxià lǎobǎn zàishuō. I'm going to ask the boss first. src
你们先讨论一下再说。Nǐmen xiān tǎolùn yīxià zàishuō. You guys discuss a little first, then we'll talk. src
今早我起床以后先准备早饭，再叫孩子们起床，接着我们一起吃早饭，然后我送他们去学校。Jīn zǎo wǒ qǐchuáng yǐhòu xiān zhǔnbèi zǎofàn, zài jiào háizi men qǐchuáng, jiēzhe wǒmen yīqǐ chī zǎofàn, ránhòu wǒ sòng tāmen qù xuéxiào. After I got up this morning, I first prepared breakfast, and then I woke up the kids. Afterwards, we ate breakfast together. After that, I took them to school. src
你们两个人要的价格差很多。Nǐmen liǎng gè rén yào de jiàgé chà hěn duō. There is a big difference in price you two charge. src
公司对新老员工的要求差很多。Gōngsī duì xīn lǎo yuángōng de yāoqiú chà hěn duō. There are huge differences in the company requirements for new employees and the old ones. src
这两件衣服看起来差不多，但是质量差很多。Zhè liǎng jiàn yīfu kànqǐlái chàbuduō, dànshì zhìliàng chà hěn duō. These two pieces of clothing look pretty much the same, but their quality is very different. src
我的生活习惯跟我父母差很多。Wǒ de shēnghuó xíguàn gēn wǒ fùmǔ chà hěn duō. My life habits are very different from my parents'. src
我和我男朋友的年龄差很多。Wǒ hé wǒ nánpéngyou de niánlíng chà hěn duō. There is a big difference between my age and my boyfriend's age. src
中国文化和西方文化差很多。Zhōngguó wénhuà hé xīfāngwénhuà chà hěn duō. Chinese culture and western culture are quite different. src
员工的收入跟老板的收入差很多。Yuángōng de shōurù gēn wǒlǎobǎn de shōurù chà hěn duō. There is a huge difference in income between the employees and the boss. src
他们是双胞胎兄弟，但是两个人的性格差很多。Tāmen shì shuāngbāotāi xiōngdì, dànshì liǎng gè rén de xìnggé chà hěn duō. They are twin brothers, but there is a big difference in personality between them. src
两个老师都很好，不过教学风格差很多。Liǎng gè lǎoshī dōu hěn hǎo, bùguò jiàoxué fēnggé chà hěn duō. They are both great teachers, but their teaching styles are very different. src
这两个词的意思差不多，但是用法差很多。Zhè liǎng gè cí de yìsi chàbùduō, dànshì yòngfǎ chà hěn duō. The meanings of these two words are basically the same, but their usages are very different. src
你怎么老是加班？Nǐ zěnme lǎoshì jiābān? Why do you always work overtime? src
他老说脏话。Tā lǎo shuō zānghuà. He always says bad words. src
这个机器老出问题。Zhège jīqì lǎo chū wèntí. There is always something wrong with this machine. src
他老是抱怨自己的生活。Tā lǎoshì bàoyuàn zǐjǐ de shēnghuó. He complains about his life all the time. src
你老是找借口。Nǐ lǎoshì zhǎo jièkǒu. You always make excuses. src
这个老师老是很严肃。Zhège lǎoshī lǎoshì hěn yánsù. This teacher is always very serious. src
你老是这么凶干吗？Nǐ lǎoshì zhème xiōng gànmá? Why are you always so mean to me? src
你怎么老是不高兴？Nǐ zěnme lǎoshì bù gāoxìng? How are you always unhappy? src
别老是那么自恋。Bié lǎoshì nàme zìliàn. Don't be so self-absorbed all the time. src
你家的东西怎么老是坏？Nǐ jiā de dōngxi zěnme lǎoshì huài? How come there's always something broken in your house? src
中西方的文化差很多。Zhōng xīfāng de wénhuà chà hěn duō. Chinese culture and western culture are quite different. src
她和她老公的年龄差很多。Tā hé tā lǎogōng de niánlíng chà hěn duō. There is a big difference between her age and her husband's age. src
公司今年的收入跟去年差很多。Gōngsī jīnnián de shōurù gēn qùnián chà hěn duō. The company's income of this year is a lot less than last year. src
这个服务员和经理的服务态度差很多。Zhège fúwùyuán hé jīnglǐ de fúwù tàidu chà hěn duō. There is a big difference in the attitude between this waiter and his manager. src
两个老师都很好，不过他们的学历差很多。Liǎng gè lǎoshī dōu hěn hǎo, bùguò tāmen de xuélì chà hěn duō. They are both great teachers, but their education are very different. src
老版本跟新版本的功能差很多。Lǎo bǎnběn hé xīn bǎnběn de gōngnéng chà hěn duō. There are huge differences in the features between the old version and the new one. src
他们是双胞胎，但是两个人的性格差很多。Tāmen shì shuāngbāotāi, dànshì liǎng gè rén de xìnggé chà hěn duō. They are twins, but there is a big difference in personality between them. src
那个孩子老说脏话。Nàge háizi lǎo shuō zāng huà. That kid always says bad words. src
你儿子上课的时候老是说话。Nǐ érzi shàngkè de shíhou lǎoshì shuōhuà. Your son talks all the time in the class. src
这个老师老是这么严肃。Zhège lǎoshī lǎoshì zhème yánsù. This teacher is always so serious. src
别老是抱怨。Bié lǎoshì bàoyuàn. Stop complaining all the time. src
他经常迟到，还老是找借口。Tā jīngcháng chídào, hái lǎoshì zhǎo jièkǒu. He's always late. And he always makes excuses. src
奶奶老是忘带钥匙。Nǎinai lǎoshì wàng dài yàoshi. My grandma forgets to take her keys all the time. src
他真讨厌，老是跟朋友借钱。Tā zhēn tǎoyàn, lǎoshì gēn péngyou jièqián. He's such a nuisance. He borrows money from his friend very often. src
你才二十岁？Nǐ cái èrshí suì. You're only twenty? src
这家公司才三个人。Zhè jiā gōngsī cái sān gè rén. This company only has three employees. src
这个班才两个学生。Zhège bān cái liǎng gè xuéshēng. This class only has two students. src
你男朋友工资才两千？Nǐ nánpéngyou gōngzī cái liǎng qiān? Your boyfriend's salary is only two thousand RMB? src
你才捐十块？Nǐ cái juān shí kuài? You only donated ten kuai? src
她才来上海两个月。Tā cái lái Shànghǎi liǎng gè yuè. She's only been in Shanghai for two months. src
这顿饭才花了二十块。Zhè dùn fàn cái huā le èrshí kuài. This meal only cost twenty kuai. src
你才一百斤，还说要减肥？Nǐ cái yī bǎi jīn, hái shuō yào jiǎnféi? You're only 100 jin and you're talking about losing weight? src
我才吃一个，可以再吃一个吗？Wǒ cái chī yī gè, kěyǐ zài chī yī gè ma? I only ate one. Can I have one more? src
他们认识才三个星期就结婚了。Tāmen rènshi cái sān gè xīngqī jiù jiéhūn le. They only knew each other for three weeks before they got married. src
他们也都是法国人。Tāmen yě dōu shì Fǎguó rén. They are also all French people. src
我们也都喜欢喝啤酒。Wǒmen yě dōu xǐhuan hē píjiǔ. We all like to drink beer too. src
他很高，他的两个弟弟也都跟他差不多高。Tā hěn gāo, tā de liǎng gè dìdi yě dōu gēn tā chàbuduō gāo. He's tall. His two little brothers and he are more or less the same height. src
老板经常加班，你们也都加班吗？Lǎobǎn jīngcháng jiābān, nǐmen yě dōu jiābān ma? The boss constantly works overtime, do you all also work overtime? src
这家店的面包很好吃，别的点心也都不错。Zhè jiā diàn de miànbāo hěn hǎochī , bié de diǎnxīn yě dōu bùcuò. This store's bread is very delicious, the other snacks are also not bad. src
我们也都没吃饭，一起去吧。Wǒmen yě dōu méi chīfàn, yīqǐ qù ba. We all haven't eaten. Let's go together. src
你们也都没去过美国吗？Nǐmen yě dōu méi qù guo Měiguó? Have you all been to America too? src
他的父母都不高，也都不胖。Tā de fùmǔ dōu bù gāo, yě dōu bù pàng. Neither of his parents are very tall or fat. src
他没时间参加我的生日派对，你们也都没时间吗？Tā méi shíjiān cānjiā wǒ de shēngrì pàiduì, nǐmen yě dōu méi shíjiān ma? He didn't have time to come to my birthday party. Neither did you? src
我对瑜伽不感兴趣，我的朋友们也都不太感兴趣。Wǒ duì yújiā bù gǎn xìngqù, wǒ de péngyou men yě dōu bù tài gǎn xìngqù. I'm not very interested in yoga. Neither are my friends. src
你的工资才两千？Nǐ de gōngzī cái liǎng qiān? Your salary is only two thousand RMB? src
这顿饭才二十块，太便宜了！Zhè dùn fàn cái èrshí kuài. Tài piányi le! This meal only cost twenty kuai. It's too cheap! src
你才一百斤，还要减肥？Nǐ cái yī bǎi jīn, hái yào jiǎnféi? You're only 100 jin and you still want to lose some weight? src
她才来两个月。Tā cái lái liǎng gè yuè. She's been been for only two months. src
这家店关门了？可是它才开业一个星期。Zhè jiā diàn guānmén le? Kěshì tā kāiyè cái yī gè xīngqī. This shop is out of business? But it's only been one week since it opened. src
已经两天了，你才看完一页？Yǐjīng liǎngtiān le, nǐ cái kàn wán yī yè? It's been two days and you only finished reading one page? src
我们才玩一会儿，再玩一会儿吧？Wǒmen cái wán yīhuìr, zài wán yīhuìr ba? We only played for a short while. Can we play a little bit longer? src
他们结婚了？他们才认识三个月！Tāmen jiéhūn le? Tāmen cái rènshi sān gè yuè! They got married? They've only knew each other for three months! src
我很好，我的家人也都很好。Wǒ hěn hǎo, wǒ de jiārén yě dōu hěn hǎo. I'm good. So are my family. src
大人很喜欢这个餐厅，孩子们也都很喜欢。Dàren hěn xǐhuan zhège cāntīng, háizi men yě dōu hěn xǐhuan. Both adults and children like this restaurant. src
我老板是美国人，很多客户也都是美国人。Wǒ lǎobǎn shì Měiguó rén, hěn duō kèhù yě dōu shì Měiguó rén. My boss is American. Lots of our clients are also Americans. src
他很高，他的两个弟弟也都比较高。Tā hěn gāo, tā de liǎng gè dìdi yě dōu bǐjiào gāo. He's tall. So are his two younger brothers. src
老板加班，你们也都要加班吗？Lǎobǎn jiābān, nǐmen yě dōu yào jiābān ma? The boss works late, but do you all need to work late? src
这些不贵，那些也都不贵。Zhèxiē bù guì, nàxiē yě dōu bù guì. These are not expensive. Those aren't expensive, either. src
我不喜欢Trump，我的朋友也都不喜欢他。Wǒ bù xǐhuan Trump, wǒ de péngyou yě dōu bù xǐhuan tā. I don't like Trump. My friends don't like him, either. src
你觉得你不容易？我们也都不容易。Nǐ juéde nǐ bù róngyì? Wǒmen yě dōu bù róngyì. You're saying it isn't easy for you? It isn't for us, either. src
我没去过美国，我的家人也都没去过。Wǒ méi qù guo Měiguó, wǒ de jiārén yě dōu méi qù guo. I've never been to America. My family have never been there, either. src
十点了，你还在睡？Shí diǎn le, nǐ háizài shuì? It's ten o'clock, are you still sleeping? src
你还在生气吗？Nǐ háizài shēngqì ma? Are you still mad? src
你还在用那个旧手机啊？Nǐ háizài yòng nàge jiù shǒujī a? Are you still using that old cell phone? src
他怎么还在玩游戏？明天不是有考试吗？Tā zěnme hái zài wán yóuxì? Míngtiān bù shì yǒu kǎoshì ma? Why are you still playing online games? Isn't there gonna be a exam tomorrow? src
我看了好几遍，还是记不住。Wǒ kàn le hǎo jǐ biàn, háishì jì bu zhù. I read several times, but I still can't remember it. src
医生不让她喝酒，但她还是天天喝。Yīshēng bù ràng tā hējiǔ, dàn tā háishì tiāntiān hē. The doctor told her to stop drinking alcohol, but she still drinks it everyday. src
老师虽然生病了，但还是来上课了。Lǎoshī suīrán shēngbìng le, dàn háishì lái shàngkè le. The teacher still made it to the class although she got sick. src
他在中国住了两年多，还是不太了解中国。Tā zài Zhōngguó zhù le liǎng nián duō, háishì bù tài liǎojiě Zhōngguó. He lived in China for 10 years while he still doesn't know much about China. src
他还没到。Tā hái méi dào. He hasn't arrived yet. src
你还没吃饭？Nǐ hái méi chīfàn? You still haven't eaten? src
你们还不走？Nǐmen hái bù ? Aren't you guys not leaving? src
我还没下班。Wǒ hái méi xiàbān. I haven't left work yet. src
我对你那么好，你还不满意？Wǒ duì nǐ nàme hǎo, nǐ hái bù mǎnyì? I treat you so well, but you're still not satisfied? src
上海比我老家贵多了。Shànghǎi bǐ wǒ lǎojiā guì duō le. It's much more expensive in Shanghai than in my hometown. src
他打篮球比我厉害多了。Tā dǎ lánqiú bǐ wǒ lìhai duō le. He plays basketball much better than I do. src
坐高铁比坐飞机方便很多。Zuò gāotiě bǐ zuò fēijī fāngbiàn hěn duō. It's much more convenient to take the high-speed train than the airplane. src
韩国的整容技术比我们国家发达得多。Hánguó de zhěngróng jìshù bǐ wǒmen guójiā fādá de duō. The cosmetic technology in Korea is more developed than our country. src
北京的人口比上海还多。Běijīng de rénkǒu bǐ Shànghǎi hái duō. The population of Beijing is even bigger than Shanghai. src
这家店比那家店还贵。Zhè jiā diàn bǐ nà jiā diàn hái guì. This shop is even more expensive than that one. src
他比姚明还高。Tā bǐ YáoMíng hái gāo. He is even taller than Yao Ming. src
你比我还懒。Nǐ bǐ wǒ hái lǎn. You're even lazier than me. src
弟弟比哥哥还调皮。Dìdi bǐ gēge hái tiáopí. The younger brother is even more naughty than the elder brother. src
他说得这么快，你们听得懂吗？Tā shuōde zhème kuài, nǐmen tīng de dǒng ma? He speak so fast. Can you understand? src
你那么聪明，一定能猜到。Nǐ nàme cōngming, yīdìng néng cāi dào. You're so smart. You can guess. src
老板那么忙，肯定没时间。Lǎobǎn nàme máng, kěndìng méi shíjiān. The boss is so busy. He definitely won't have time for this. src
今天怎么这么冷？Jīntiān zěnme zhème lěng? Why is it so cold today? src
你怎么这么没礼貌？Nǐ zěnme zhème méi lǐmào? Why are you so impolite? src
这个问题比较简单。Zhège wèntí bǐjiào jiǎndān. This question is rather easier. src
我觉得这个价格比较合理。Wǒ juéde zhège jiàgé bǐjiào hélǐ. I think this price is rather reasonable. src
我上班坐地铁比较方便。Wǒ shàngbān zuò dìtiě bǐjiào fāngbiàn. It's rather convenient for me to take the metro to work. src
大城市的工作压力比较大。Dà chéngshì de gōngzuò yālì bǐjiào dà. Working pressure in big cities are rather more. src
我家离市中心比较近。Wǒ jiā lí shìzhōngxīn bǐjiào jìn. My place is rather close to downtown. src
这件衬衫大小比较合适。Zhè jiàn chènshān dàxiǎo bǐjiào héshì. The size of this shirt is rather suitable. src
现在的年轻人比较喜欢用App看电视。Xiànzài de niánqīng rén bǐjiào xǐhuan yòng App kàn diànshì. Nowadays young people prefer to use App to watch TV. src
我比较讨厌男人说脏话。Wǒ bǐjiào tǎoyàn nánrén shuō zānghuà. I hate it when men say dirty words. src
中国政府比较关注农村的发展。Zhōngguó zhèngfǔ bǐjiào guānzhù nóngcūn de fāzhǎn. Chinese government cares a lot about the development of the rural area. src
换个话题吧，这个话题比较敏感。Huàn gè huàtí ba, zhège huàtí bǐjiào mǐngǎn. Let's change the subject. This one is rather sensitive. src
这个老师挺年轻的。Zhège lǎoshī tǐng niánqīng de. This teacher is quite young. src
你男朋友挺帅的。Nǐ nánpéngyou tǐng shuài de. Your boyfriend is quite handsome. src
最近大家都挺忙的。Zuìjìn dàjiā dōu tǐng máng de. We've all been quite busy lately. src
他家不是挺有钱的吗？Tā jiā bù shì tǐng yǒuqián de ma? Isn't his family is quite rich? src
我挺喜欢这份工作的。Wǒ tǐng xǐhuan zhè fèn gōngzuò de. I quite like this job. src
我女儿挺怕他爸爸的。Wǒ nǚ'ér tǐng pà tā bàba de. My daughter is quite afraid of his father. src
那件事我挺后悔的。Nà jiàn shì wǒ tǐng hòuhuǐ de. I regret that piece of matter a lot. src
我们都挺想你的。Wǒmen dōu tǐng xiǎng nǐ de. We all miss you a lot. src
你不是挺爱他的吗？怎么分手了？Nǐ bù shì tǐng ài tā de ma? Zěnme fēnshǒu le? Don't you love him a lot? How come you broke up with him? src
我觉得这个价格比较贵。Wǒ juéde zhège jiàgé bǐjiào guì. I think this price is rather reasonable. src
你上班坐地铁比较方便还是骑车比较方便？Nǐ shàngbān zuò dìtiě bǐjiào fāngbiàn háishì qíchē bǐjiào fāngbiàn? Is is rather convenient for you to take the metro to work or ride a bike? src
你比较喜欢用gmail还是hotmail？Nǐ bǐjiào xǐhuan yòng gmail háishì hotmail? Do you prefer to use Gmail or hotmail? src
我父母比较反对我找外国男朋友。Wǒ fùmǔ bǐjiào fǎnduì wǒ zhǎo wàiguó nánpéngyou. My parents quite object to the fact that I'm with a foreign boyfriend. src
民众比较支持新的就业政策。Mínzhòng bǐjiào zhīchí xīn de jiùyè zhèngcè. The public comparatively support the new employment policy. src
老板通常比较关注结果，不是过程。Lǎobǎn tōngcháng bǐjiào guānzhù jiéguǒ, bù shì guòchéng. The boss usually pay more attention on the results in stead of the process. src
我奶奶不吃肉，只吃蔬菜、豆腐什么的。Wǒ nǎinai bù chī ròu, zhī chī shūcài, dòufu shénme de. My grandma doesn't eat meat. She only eats vegetables, tofu, and so on. src
养狗很麻烦，你要喂它，给他洗澡，跟它玩什么的。Yǎng gǒu hěn máfan, nǐ yào wèi tā, gěi tā xǐzǎo, gēn tā wán shénme de. Having a dog gives you too much trouble. You need to feed it, give it a bath, play with it, and so on. src
数学、物理、化学什么的，我都不感兴趣。Shùxué, wùlǐ, huàxué shénme de, wǒ dōu bù gǎnxìngqù. Math, physics, chemistry, and so on. I'm not interested in any of them. src
我喜欢实用的礼物，手表、衣服、书什么的。Wǒ xǐhuan shíyòng de lǐwù, shǒubiǎo, yīfu, shū shénme de. I like practical presents, watch, clothes, books and so on. src
我们见面一般就是吃饭、聊天什么的。Wǒmen jiànmiàn yībān jiùshì chīfàn, liáotiān shénme de. When we meet, we just eat and talk, and so on. src
明天去野餐，我们要不要买一些水果，零食什么的？Míngtiān qù yěcān, wǒmen yào bu yào mǎi yīxiē shuǐguǒ, língshí shénme de? We are going on picnic tomorrow. Shall we buy some fruits, snacks, and so on? src
跑步、游泳、篮球什么的，这些运动他都喜欢。Pǎobù, yóuyǒng, lánqiú shénme de, zhèxiē yùndòng tā dōu xǐhuan. Running, swimming, basketball, and so on. He likes all these sports. src
长城、故宫什么的，都是北京很有名的景点。Chángchéng, Gùgōng shénme de, dōu shì Běijīng hěn yǒumíng de jǐngdiǎn. The Great Wall, Summer Palace, and so on. They're all very famous tourist attractions in Beijing. src
