一个人住，洗衣服、做饭什么的都要自己做。Yīgèrén zhù, xǐ yīfu, zuòfàn shénme de dōu yào zìjǐ zuò. When you live alone, you need to do things all by yourself, doing laundry, cooking, and so on. src
电视、洗衣机什么的，我爸爸都会修。Diànshì, xǐyījī shénme de, wǒ bàba dōu huì xiū. Television, washing machine, and so on. My father can fix many things. src
越来越多的人不吃快餐，像KFC之类的。Yuè lái yuè duō de rén bù chī kuàicān, xiàng KFC zhī lèi de. More and more people don't eat fast food, like KFC and stuff like that. src
我喜欢呆在大城市，像上海、香港之类的。Wǒ xǐhuan dāi zài dà chéngshì, xiàng Shànghǎi, Xiānggǎng zhī lèi de. I like to stay in big cities like Shanghai, Hong Kong, and places like that. src
他喜欢谈论漂亮的女明星，像章子怡、张柏芝之类的。Tā xǐhuan tánlùn piàoliang de nǚ míngxīng, xiàng Zhāng Ziyí, Zhāng Bǎizhī zhī lèi de. He likes to talk about pretty actresses like Zhang Ziyi, Zhang Baizhi, and people like that. src
你喜欢看《西游记》之类的电影吗？Nǐ xǐhuan kàn "Xī Yóujì" zhī lèi de diànyǐng ma? Do you like to watch movies like "Journey into the West"? src
一看就知道她很有钱，穿的都是Gucci、Chanel之类的衣服。Yī kàn jiù zhīdào tā hěn yǒu qián, chuān de dōu shì Gucci, Chanel zhī lèi de yīfu. You can tell she is rich as soon as you look at her. All of her clothes are brands like Gucci and Chanel. src
西瓜、菠萝、苹果、葡萄等等都是我喜欢的水果。Xīguā, bōluó, píngguǒ, pútáo děngděng dōu shì wǒ xǐhuan de shuǐguǒ. Watermelons, pineapples, apples, grapes and so on are all the fruits that I like. src
我的男朋友会说很多外语，英语、法语、西班牙语等等。Wǒ de nánpéngyou huì shuō hěn duō wàiyǔ, Yīngyǔ, Fǎyǔ, Xībānyáyǔ děngděng. My boyfriend can speak many foreign languages: English, French, Spanish, etc. src
我很喜欢运动，比如跑步、游泳、做瑜伽等等。Wǒ hěn xǐhuan yùndòng, bǐrú pǎobù, yóuyǒng, zuò yújiā děngděng. I like exercising very much, for example, running, swimming, doing yoga, etc. src
我们公司有好几个部门，市场部、客户部、技术部等。Wǒmen gōngsī yǒu hǎojǐ gè bùmén, shìchǎng bù, kèhù bù, jìshù bù děng. Our company has several departments: marketing department, client department, technology department, etc. src
JackieChan、JetLi、BruceLi等都是中国有名的功夫明星。Jackie Chan, Jet Li, Bruce Li děng dōu shì Zhōngguó yǒumíng de gōngfu míngxīng. Jackie Chan, Jet Li, Bruce Li, etc. are all famous Chinese martial arts stars. src
长城、故宫等地方都是北京有名的景点。Chángchéng, Gùgōng děng dìfang dōu shì Běijīng yǒumíng de jǐngdiǎn. The Great Wall, the Forbidden City, etc. are all famous scenic spots in Beijing. src
北京、上海、广州等城市是中国最发达的城市。Běijīng, Shànghǎi, Guǎngzhōu děng chéngshì shì Zhōngguó zuì fādá de chéngshì. Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and so on are the most developed cities in China. src
牛津、剑桥等大学都是最有名的英国大学。Niújīn, Jiànqiáo děng dàxué dōu shì zuì yǒumíng de Yīngguó dàxué. Oxford, Cambridge and so on are the most famous British Universities. src
中国、印度、巴西等国家都不是发达国家。Zhōngguó, Yìndù, Bāxī děng guójiā dōu bù shì fādá guójiā. China, India, Brazil and so on are not developed countries. src
WTO,WHO等组织都是国际组织。WTO, WHO děng zǔzhī dōu shì guójì zǔzhī. WTO, WHO and so on are all international organizations. src
我家附近有很多像KFC之类的快餐店。Wǒ jiā fùjìn yǒu hěn duō xiàng KFC zhī lèi de kuàicān diàn. There are many fast-food restaurants in my neighborhood like KFC and stuff like that. src
你喜欢《星球大战》之类的电影吗？Nǐ xǐhuan "Xīngqiú Dà Zhàn" zhī lèi de diànyǐng ma? Do you like movies like "Star Wars"? src
我没看过像吸血鬼之类的故事。Wǒ méi kàn guo xiàng xīxuèguǐ zhī lèi de gùshi. I haven't seen stories like vampire and stuff like that. src
你们公司谁负责管理之类的工作？Nǐmen gōngsī shéi fùzé guǎnlǐ zhī lèi de gōngzuò? In your company, who is in charge of management and stuff like that? src
她很适合做像市场推广之类的工作。Tā hěn shìhé zuò xiàng shìchǎng tuīguǎng zhī lèi de gōngzuò. She's very suitable for jobs like marketing. src
她穿的衣服都是Gucci、Chanel之类的名牌。Tā chuān de yīfu dōu shì Gucci, Chanel zhī lèi de míngpái. All the clothes she wears are all brands like Gucci and Chanel. src
年轻人很喜欢用像支付宝之类的电子支付方式。Niánqīng rén hěn xǐhuan yòng xiàng Zhīfùbǎo zhī lèi de diànzǐ zhīfù fāngshì. Young people love using electronic methods of payment like Alipay. src
很多中国老人喜欢广场舞、太极之类的运动。Hěn duō Zhōngguó lǎorén xǐhuan guǎngchǎng wǔ, Tàijí zhī lèi de yùndòng. Many old Chinese people are fond of exercising like square dance, taiji. src
我们学校很少办才艺比赛之类的活动。Wǒmen xuéxiào hěnshǎo bàn cáiyì bǐsài zhī lèi de huódòng. Our school rarely holds activities like talent show. src
中国女孩会怎么回应像"你真漂亮"之类的话？Zhōngguó nǚhái huì zěnme huíyìng xiàng"nǐ zhēn piàoliang"zhī lèi de huà? How would Chinese girls respond to words like "You are beautiful?" src
这件衣服我很喜欢，不过有点贵。Zhè jiàn yīfu wǒ hěn xǐhuan, bùguò yǒudiǎn guì. I like this clothing, but it's a little bit expensive. src
那儿的天气不太好，不过我们玩得很开心。Nàr de tiānqì bù tài hǎo, bùguò wǒmen wán de hěn kāixīn. The whether there was not very good, but we had a lot of fun. src
你可以参加，不过我有个条件。Nǐ kěyǐ cānjiā, bùguò wǒ yǒu gè tiáojiàn. You can participate, but I have a condition. src
工作压力有点大，不过我已经习惯了。Gōngzuò yālì yǒudiǎn dà, bùguò wǒ yǐjīng xíguàn le. Working pressure is a little too much, but I'm already used to it. src
他的汉语口语不错，不过不认识汉字。Tā de Hànyǔ kǒuyǔ bùcuò, bùguò bù rènshi hànzì. His speaking Chinese is pretty good, but he doesn't know any characters. src
我的钱包丢了，不过里面没什么重要的东西。Wǒ de qiánbāo diū le, bùguò lǐmiàn méishénme zhòngyào de dōngxi. I lost my wallet, but there was nothing important in it. src
他们昨天吵架了，不过又和好了。Tāmen zuótiān chǎojià le, bùguò yòu héhǎo le. They had a fight yesterday, but they made up. src
这个学生很聪明，不过不太努力。Zhège xuéshēng hěn cōngming, bùguò bù tài nǔlì. This student is very smart, but he's not very hardworking. src
这家餐厅我没去过，不过我听说还不错。Zhè jiā cāntīng wǒ méi qù guo, bùguò wǒ tīngshuō hái bùcuò. I've never been to this restaurant, but I heard it's pretty good. src
西瓜、菠萝、葡萄，等等，我都喜欢吃。Xīguā, bōluó, pútáo, děngděng, wǒ dōu xǐhuan chī. Watermelons, pineapples, apples, grapes and so on, I like them all. src
我爸爸很喜欢运动，比如跑步、游泳、打羽毛球，等等。Wǒ bàba hěn xǐhuan yùndòng, bǐrú pǎobù, yóuyǒng, děngděng. My father likes exercising very much, for example, running, swimming, playing badminton, etc. src
BruceLi、JackieChan、JetLi等都是有名的功夫明星。Bruce Li, Jackie Chan, Jet Li děng dōu shì yǒumíng de gōngfu míngxīng. Bruce Li, Jackie Chan, Jet Li, etc. are all famous Chinese martial arts stars. src
我们公司有市场部、设计部、技术部，等等。Wǒmen gōngsī yǒu shìchǎng bù, shèjì bù, jìshù bù, děngděng. Our company has marketing department, design department, technology department, etc. src
联合国的工作语言有英语、法语、西班牙语等。Liánhéguó de gōngzuò yǔyán yǒu Yīngyǔ, Fǎyǔ, Xībānyáyǔ děng. The working languages of the UN are English, French, Spanish, etc. src
长城、故宫等景点都是北京有名的景点。Chángchéng, Gùgōng děng jǐngdiǎn dōu shì Běijīng yǒumíng de jǐngdiǎn. The Great Wall, the Forbidden City, etc. are all famous tourist attractions in Beijing. src
北京、上海、广州等城市的经济都很发达。Běijīng, Shànghǎi, Guǎngzhōu děng chéngshì de jīngjì dōu hěn fādá. Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and so on are economically developed cities. src
牛津、剑桥等大学是英国最有名的大学。Niújīn, Jiànqiáo děng dàxué shì Yīngguó zuì yǒumíng de dàxué. Oxford, Cambridge and so on are the most famous British Universities. src
中国、印度、巴西等国家都是发展中国家。Zhōngguó, Yìndù, Bāxī děng guójiā dōu shì fāzhǎn zhōng guójiā. China, India, Brazil and so on are all developing countries. src
食品安全、环保、和平等话题都是热点话题。Shípǐn ānquán, huánbǎo, hépíng děng huàtí dōu shì rèdiǎn huàtí. Food safety, environmental protection, peace and so on are all hot topics. src
这个学生很聪明，不过有点懒。Zhège xuéshēng hěn cōngming, bùguò yǒudiǎn lǎn. This student is very smart, but he's a little lazy. src
他是东北人，不过他没有口音。Tā shì Dōngběi rén, bùguò tā méiyǒu kǒuyīn. He's from Northeast, but he doesn't have the accent. src
他说得不错，不过不认识汉字。Tā shuō de bùcuò, bùguò bù rènshi hànzì. He can speak well, but he doesn't know any Chinese characters. src
我的钱包丢了，不过没丢什么重要的东西。Wǒ de qiánbāo diū le, bùguò méi diū shénme zhòngyào de dōngxi. I lost my wallet, but I didn't lose anything important. src
刚来的时候很想家，不过现在习惯了。Gāng lái de shíhou hěn xiǎng jiā, bùguò xiànzài xíguàn le. I was homesick when I first came here, but I'm getting used to it now. src
你可以参加，不过有个条件。Nǐ kěyǐ cānjiā, bùguò wǒ yǒu gè tiáojiàn. You can participate, but there is a condition. src
我们在考虑，不过还没决定。Wǒmen zài kǎolǜ, bùguò hái méi juédìng. We're considering, but we haven't decided yet. src
要不我们一起去吧，一个人去没意思。Yàobù wǒmen yīqǐ qù ba, yīgèrén qù méi yìsi. How about we go together? It's no fun to go by myself. src
挺好吃的，要不你尝尝？Tǐng hǎochī de, yàobù nǐ chángchang? It's tasty. Would you like to taste it? src
要不我们换个地方吧，这里太吵了。Yàobù wǒmen huàn gè dìfang ba, zhèlǐ tài chǎo le. How about we go to somewhere else? It's too loud here. src
要不你先走吧，我还没做完。Yàobù nǐ xiān zǒu bā, wǒ hái méi zuò wán. How about you go first? I haven't finished yet. src
下雨了，要不明天去吧。Xiàyǔ le, yàobù míngtiān qù ba. It's raining. How about we go tomorrow? src
走路去挺远的，要不我开车送你去吧。Zǒulù qù tǐng yuǎn de, yàobù wǒ kāichē sòng nǐ qù ba. It's quite far away to walk there. How about I drive you there? src
你先吃吧，要不然饭就凉了。Nǐ xiān chī ba, yào bùrán fàn jiù liáng le. You should eat, otherwise the food gets cold. src
走吧，要不没地铁了。Zǒu ba, yàobù méi dìtiě le. Let's go, or we will miss the last metro. src
打车去吧，要不会迟到的。Dǎ chē qù ba, yào bù huì chídào de. You should take a taxi, otherwise you'll be late. src
快说对不起吧，要不然她要生气了。Kuài shuō duìbuqǐ ba, yào bùrán tā yào shēngqì le. Say sorry, otherwise she's going to be angry. src
快点回家吧，要不你爸妈会担心的。Kuài diǎn huíjiā ba, yào bù nǐ bàmā huì dānxīn de. Hurry and go home, or your parents will start to worry. src
大家都有点累了，要不休息一会儿吧。Dàjiā dōu yǒudiǎn lèi le, yàobù xiūxi yīhuìr ba. Everyone is a little tired. Let's rest for a while. src
这个星期我比较忙，要不下个星期见？Zhège xīngqī wǒ bǐjiào máng, yàobù xià gè xīngqī jiàn? I'm pretty busy this week. How about we meet up next week? src
这么远，要不我开车送你去？Zhème yuǎn, yàobù wǒ kāichē sòng nǐ qù? It's so far. How about I drive you there? src
打车吧，要不会迟到的。Dǎchē ba, yào bù huì chídào de. You should take a taxi, otherwise you'll be late. src
快回家吧，要不你爸妈会担心的。Kuài huíjiā ba, yào bù nǐ bà mā huì dānxīn de. Hurry up. Go home, or your parents will start to worry. src
你需要吃药。还有，要多休息。Nǐ xūyào chī yào. Háiyǒu, yào duō xiūxi. You need to take medicine. Also, you should get more rest. src
今天要做完这个报告。还有，准备好明天开会的东西。Jīntiān yào zuò wán zhège bàogào. Háiyǒu, zhǔnbèi hǎo míngtiān kāihuì de dōngxi. You need to finish this report today. In addition, get everything we need for tomorrow's meeting. src
租这个房子要先付押金。还有，不能养宠物。Zū zhège fángzi yào xiān fù yājīn. Háiyǒu, bù néng yǎng chǒngwù. You need to pay the deposit first to rent this apartment. In addition, it's not allowed to have pets here. src
谁负责安排我们酒店？还有，机票都订好了吗？Shéi fùzé ānpái wǒmen jiǔdiàn? Háiyǒu, jīpiào dōu dìng hǎo le ma? Who's in charge of arranging our hotel? In addition, are the air tickets all booked yet? src
不要一边吃饭一边说话。还有，不要吃那么快，对胃不好。Bùyào yībiān chīfàn yībiān shuōhuà. Háiyǒu, bùyào chī nàme kuài, duì wèi bù hǎo. Don't talk while you eat. In addition, don't eat so fast. It's bad for your stomach. src
下班以后早点回来。还有，回来的路上买点水果。Xiàbān yǐhòu zǎodiǎn huílái. Háiyǒu, huílái de lùshang mǎi diǎn shuǐguǒ. Come back soon after work. In addition, buy some fruits on your way back. src
我妈不想让我出国。还有，她也不喜欢我的外国男朋友。Wǒ mā bù xiǎng ràng wǒ chūguó. háiyǒu, tā yě bù xǐhuan wǒ de wàiguó nánpéngyou. My mother doesn't want me to go abroad. In addition, she doesn't like my foreign boyfriend. src
不要放花生，我过敏。还有，少放糖。Bùyào fàng huāshēng, wǒ guòmǐn. Háiyǒu, shǎo fàng táng. Don't put peanut. I'm allergic. In addition, less sugar, please. src
考试的时候不要说话。还有，手机放在桌子上。Kǎoshì de shíhou bù yào shuōhuà. Háiyǒu, shǒujī fàng zài zhuōzi shàng. Don't talk when you take a test. Beside, put your cell phone on the desk. src
先生，这里不能抽烟。还有，麻烦你们声音小一点。Xiānsheng, zhèlǐ bù néng chōuyān. Háiyǒu, máfan nǐmen shēngyīn xiǎo yīdiǎn. Sir, you can'r smoke in here. Besides, lower your voice, please. src
希望你不要再迟到了。另外，你应该穿得正式一点。Xīwàng nǐ bùyào zài chídào le. Lìngwài, nǐ yīnggāi chuān de zhèngshì yīdiǎn. I hope you won't be late again. In addition, you should also dress a little more formally. src
美国跟中国不一样，美国没有中国人口多。另外，美国是发达国家，中国是发展中国家。Měiguó gēn Zhōngguó hěn bù yīyàng, Měiguó méiyǒu Zhōngguó rénkǒu duō. Lìngwài, Měiguó shì fādá guójiā, Zhōngguó shì fāzhǎnzhōng guójiā. America is very different from China. Its population is not as big as China. In addition, America is a develop country while China is a developing country. src
这里是VIP室，要另外付费才能用。Zhèlǐ shì VIP shì, yào lìngwài fùfèi cái néng yòng. This is the VIP room. You will have to pay more in order to use it. src
今天我没空去，能不能另外安排时间？Jīntiān wǒ méi kōng qù, néng bu néng lìngwài ānpái shíjiān? I don't have time to go today. Can you schedule it another time? src
这些游戏每次都玩，我建议你另外再想几个游戏。Zhèxiē yóuxì měi cì dōu wán, wǒ jiànyì nǐ lìngwài zài xiǎng jǐ gè yóuxì. We play these games every time. I suggest you think of a few more games. src
如果学生觉得不难，老师可以另外再加一些学习内容。Rúguǒ xuéshēng juéde bù nán, lǎoshī kěyǐ lìngwài zài jiā yīxiē xuéxí nèiróng. If the students don't find the lesson difficult, the teacher can add more learning materials. src
我有两个手机，一个是小米，另外一个是iPhone。Wǒ yǒu liǎng gè shǒujī, yī gè shì Xiǎomǐ, lìngwài yī gè shì iPhone. I have two cell phones. One is Xiao Mi, and the other is iPhone. src
她有两套房子，一套自己住，另外一套租出去了。Tā yǒu liǎng tào fángzi, yī tào zìjǐ zhù, lìngwài yī tào zū chūqù le. She has two houses. She lives in one and rents out the other one. src
我买了三张票，一张是我的，另外两张是给朋友的。Wǒ mǎi le sān zhāng piào, yī zhāng shì wǒ de, lìngwài liǎng zhāng shì gěi péngyou de. I bought three tickets. One is for myself, and the other two are for my friends. src
这几本书我今天拿走，另外几本下次再拿。Zhè jǐ běn shū wǒ jīntiān názǒu, lìngwài jǐ běn xià cì zài ná. I will take these books today. I can take the others next time. src
跟他一起去的另外两个人已经死了。Gēn tā yīqǐ qù de lìngwài liǎng gè rén yǐjīng sǐ le. The other two people who went with him already died. src
我要大杯，不要冰，还有，少放糖。Wǒ yào dà bēi. Bùyào bīng. Háiyǒu, shǎo fàng táng. I want a big cup. Don't put ice. In addition, less sugar, please. src
不要一边吃饭一边说话。还有，别吃那么快。Bùyào yībiān chīfàn yībiān shuōhuà. Háiyǒu, bié chī nàme kuài. Don't talk while you eat. In addition, don't eat so fast. src
考试的时候不要说话。还有，不要用手机。Kǎoshì de shíhou bùyào shuōhuà. Háiyǒu, bùyào yòng shǒujī. Don't talk when you take a test. Beside, don't use your cell phone. src
他们不想要孩子。还有，他们也没时间照顾孩子。Tāmen bù xiǎng yào háizi. Háiyǒu, tāmen yě méi shíjiān zhàogu háizi. They don't want to have kids. In addition, they don't have time to look after kids (even if they had one). src
酒店谁来订？还有，机票买了吗？Jiǔdiàn shéi lái dìng? Háiyǒu, jīpiào mǎi hǎo le ma? Who's going to book the hotel room? In addition, did they buy the air tickets? src
今天要做完这个报告。还有，明天开会前打印三份。Jīntiān yào zuò wán zhège bàogào. Háiyǒu, míngtiān kāihuì qián dǎyìn sān fèn. You need to finish this report today. In addition, print three copies before the meeting tomorrow. src
入住前要付押金。还有，不能带宠物。Rùzhù qián yào fù yājīn. Háiyǒu, bù néng dài chǒngwù. You need to pay the deposit when you check in. In addition, it's not allowed to have pets here. src
先生，这里不能抽烟。还有，请你们声音小一点。Xiānsheng, zhèlǐ bù néng chōuyān. Háiyǒu, qǐng nǐmen shēngyīn xiǎo yīdiǎn. Sir, you can'r smoke in here. Besides, lower your voice, please. src
这个课文太难了，我不想学。另外，我也没准备。Zhège kèwén tài nán le, wǒ bù xiǎng dú. Lìngwài, wǒ yě méi zhǔnbèi. This lesson is too difficult and I don't want to read it. Besides, I didn't prepare for it. src
这个航班经常晚点。另外，他们的飞机餐也很难吃。Zhège hángbān jīngcháng wǎndiǎn. Lìngwài, tāmen de fēijī cān yě hěn nánchī. This flight is always running late. In addition, their meal set is terrible. src
我没时间参加这个活动。另外，我也不太感兴趣。Wǒ méi shíjiān cānjiā zhège huódòng. Lìngwài, wǒ yě bù tài gǎn xìngqù. I don't have time to attend this activity. Besides, I'm not really interested. src
幼儿园提供午餐。另外，每天下午还有点心和水果。Yòuéryuán tígōng wǔcān. Lìngwài, měi tiān xiàwǔ hái yǒu diǎnxin hé shuǐguǒ. The kindergarten provides lunch. In addition, there are deserts and fruits every afternoon. src
今天我没空，能不能另外安排时间？Jīntiān wǒ méi kōng, néng bu néng lìngwài ānpái shíjiān? I don't have time today. Can you schedule it another time? src
在我家开会不方便，我们另外找地方吧。Zài wǒ jiā kāi huì bù fāngbiàn, wǒmen lìngwài zhǎo dìfang ba. It's not very convenient to have this meeting at my place. Let's find some other place. src
这个项目他们做不好，我建议你们另外找人来做。Zhège xiàngmù tāmen zuò bu hǎo, wǒ jiànyì nǐmen lìngwài zhǎo rén lái zuò. They can't accomplish this project. I suggest you find some other people to do it. src
如果学生觉得不难，老师可以另外加一些学习内容。Rúguǒ xuéshēng juéde bù nán, lǎoshī kěyǐ lìngwài jiā yīxiē xuéxí nèiróng. If the students don't find the lesson difficult, the teacher can add more learning materials. src
我很忙，没时间去。再说，他也没请我。Wǒ hěn máng, méi shíjiān qù. Zàishuō, tā yě méi qǐng wǒ. I'm very busy. I don't have time to go. Besides, he didn't invite me. src
那件衣服太贵了，我没买。再说，也不是很好看。Nà jiàn yīfu tài guì le, wǒ méi mǎi. Zàishuō, yě bù shì hěn hǎokàn. That piece of clothing is too expensive. I didn't buy it. Besides, it's not so beautiful. src
我还小，不想结婚。再说，也没遇到合适的人。Wǒ hái xiǎo, bù xiǎng jiéhūn. Zàishuō, yě méi yùdào héshì de rén. I don't want to get married yet because I'm still young. Besides, I haven't met the right one. src
明天去吧，我今天太累了。再说，现在超市已经关门了。Míngtiān qù bā, wǒ jīntiān tài lèi le. Zàishuō, xiànzài chāoshì yǐjīng guānmén le. Let's go tomorrow. Besides, the supermarket is closed now. src
你别生气，这不是他的错。再说，这也不是什么大事。Nǐ bié shēngqì, zhè bù shì tā de cuò. Zàishuō, zhè yě bù shì shénme dà shì. Don't be so mad. It's not his fault. Besides, it's not a big deal. src
你已经吃了五个了，别吃了。再说，我们都还没吃呢。Nǐ yǐjīng chī le wǔ gè le, bié chī le. Zàishuō, wǒmen dōu hái méi chī ne. You've eaten five. Stop eating. Besides, the rest of us haven't eaten yet. src
这么晚，别走了。再说，外面正在下雨。Zhème wǎn, bié zǒu le. Zàishuō, wàimiàn zhèngzài xiàyǔ. It's so late. Stay. Besides, it's raining outside. src
他喜欢，让他去吧。再说，他在家也没事干。Tā xǐhuan, ràng tā qù ba. Zàishuō, tā zài jiā yě méi shì gàn. He likes it. Let him go. Besides, he's got nothing to do at home. src
那件衣服太贵了，我没买。再说，我也不是很喜欢。Nà jiàn yīfu tài guì le, wǒ méi mǎi. Zàishuō, wǒ yě bù shì hěn xǐhuan. That piece of clothing is too expensive. I didn't buy it. Besides, I didn't like it so much. src
对不起，我没时间。再说，我也没兴趣。Duìbuqǐ, wǒ méi shíjiān. Zàishuō, wǒ yě méi xìngqù. Sorry, I don't have time for this. Besides, I'm not interested. src
别吃了，你已经吃了五个了。再说，我们还没吃呢。Bié chī le, nǐ yǐjīng chī le wǔ gè le. Zàishuō, wǒmen hái méi chī ne. Stop eating more. You've already eaten five. Besides, the rest of us haven't eaten yet. src
住我家吧，可以省点钱。再说，孩子们也可以一起玩。Zhù wǒ jiā ba, kěyǐ shěng diǎn qián. Zàishuō, háizi men yě kěyǐ yīqǐ wán. You can stay with me. You can save some money. Besides, the kids can play together. src
我不想干了。天天加班，再说，我在这儿也没有未来。Wǒ bù xiǎng gàn le. Tiāntiān jiābān, Zàishuō, wǒ zài zhèr yě méiyǒu wèilái. I want to quit. I work late every day. Besides, I don't really have a future here. src
明天去买吧，今天太累了。再说，超市也快关门了。Míngtiān qù mǎi ba, jīntiān tài lèi le. Zàishuō, chāoshì yě kuài guānmén le. Let's go and buy it tomorrow. I'm too tired today. Besides, the supermarket is about to close now. src
别怪他。不是他的错。再说，这也不是什么大事。Bié guài tā. Bù shì tā de cuò. Zàishuō, zhè yě bù shì shénme dà shì. Don't be so mad. It's not his fault. Besides, it's not a big deal. src
这个项目的风险太大了。再说，现在很难找到投资。Zhège xiàngmù de fēngxiǎn tài dà le. Zàishuō, xiànzài hěn nán zhǎodào tóuzī. The risk of this project is too high. Besides, it's very hard to find investment now. src
生气没有用，那我应该怎么办？Shēngqì méiyǒu yòng, nà wǒ yīnggāi zěnmebàn? It's no use being angry. What shall I do then? src
你说得有道理，那么就这么办吧。Nǐ shuō de yǒu dàolǐ, nàme jiù zhème bàn ba. What you said makes sense to me, so just do it as you said. src
老板不满意这个方案，那么你们再改改。Lǎobǎn bù mǎnyì zhège fāng'àn, nàme nǐmen zài gǎigai. The boss is not very satisfied with the paln, so you keep working on it. src
大家都同意，那么我们就开始做吧。Dàjiā dōu tóngyì, nàme wǒmen jiù kāishǐ zuò ba. Everyone agrees on this, so we'll start to do it. src
你认为这个想法不行，那你有别的想法吗？Nǐ rènwéi zhège xiǎngfǎ bù xíng , nà nǐ yǒu bié de xiǎngfǎ ma? You don't think this idea is good. Then have you got any other good idea? src
等到大学毕业，我就不住在学校里了。Děngdào dàxué bìyè, wǒ jiù bù zhù zài xuéxiào lǐ le. When I graduate from college, I don't live at school. src
等到秋天，这些树叶就会变黄。Děngdào qiūtiān, zhèxiē shùyè jiù huì biàn huáng. When it is autumn, the leaves will have already become yellow. src
等雨停我再出门。Děng yǔ tíng wǒ zài chūmén. When the rain stops, then I will go outside. src
等这个项目结束，我们部门会开派对庆祝。Děng zhège xiàngmù jiéshù, wǒmen bùmén huì kāi pàiduì qìngzhù. When this project is finished, our department can have a party to celebrate. src
等你当了爸爸，你就会知道做父母多么不容易。Děng nǐ dāng le bàba, nǐ jiù huì zhīdào zuò fùmǔ duōme bù róngyì. When you act as the father, you will become aware of how hard it is to be a parent. src
直到周五晚上，我们才做好这个活动方案。Zhídào Zhōuwǔ wǎnshang, wǒmen cái zuòhǎo zhège huódòng fāng'àn. It was not until Friday evening that we finished this activity program. src
直到去了北京，他才知道大城市的生活多么不容易。Zhídào qù le Běijīng, tā cái zhīdào dàchéngshì de shēnghuó duōme bù róngyì. It was not until he went to Beijing that he began to understand that life in a big city is not easy. src
直到离开家，我才知道家有多好。Zhídào wǒ líkāi jiā de shíhou, wǒ cái zhīdào jiā yǒu duō hǎo. I didn't realize how great it is to be at home until I left it. src
我认识他一年多了，直到现在，我都不知道他的全名。Wǒ rènshi tā yī nián duō le, zhídào xiànzài, wǒ dōu bù zhīdào tā de quánmíng. I've known him for more than one year, but I still don't know his full name now. src
直到他死，我们都没见过。Zhídào tā sǐ, wǒmen dōu méi jiàn guo. We never met till his death. src
他不听，那我应该怎么办？Tā bù tīng, nà wǒ yīnggāi zěnmebàn? He wouldn't listen. What shall I do then? src
你说这个办法不行，那你有别的办法吗？Nǐ shuō zhège bànfǎ bù xíng, nà nǐ yǒu bié de bànfǎ ma? You said this idea is not going to work. So any other good idea? src
大家都到了，那么我们开始吧。Dàjiā dōu dào le, nàme wǒmen kāishǐ ba. Everybody is here, so let's begin. src
雨停了，那我们走吧。Yǔ tíng le, nà wǒmen zǒu ba. The rain stopped. Shall we go? src
他学过十年中文？那他的中文说得很好吧？Tā xué guo shí nián Zhōngwén? Nà tā de Zhōngwén shuō de hěn hǎo ba? He's studied Chinese for ten years? He must speak Chinese very well? src
他表现不错，那么让他通过吧。Tā biǎoxiàn bùcuò, nàme ràng tā tōngguò ba. He performed well, so let him pass. src
会议时间已经确定了，那你快点去安排吧。Huìyì shíjiān yǐjīng quèdìng le, nà nǐ kuài diǎn qù ānpái ba. The meeting time has been set up. So please arrange it soon. src
他们没有提前通知我们，那么这是他们的责任。Tāmen méiyǒu tíqián tōngzhī wǒmen, nàme zhè shì tāmen de zérèn. They did't let us know in advance. Then they should be responsible for this. src
实现这个目标应该不难，那么我们一起努力吧。Shíxiàn zhège mùbiāo yīnggāi bù nán, nàme wǒmen yīqǐ nǔlì ba. It shouldn't be difficult to reach this goal. Let's make an effort. src
用这种方法来赚钱，真丢人。Yòng zhè zhǒng fāngfǎ lái zhuànqián, zhēn diūrén. It's shameful to earn money in this way. src
很多年轻人用手机APP来点外卖。Hěn duō niánqīng rén yòng shǒujī APP lái diǎn wàimài. A lot of young people like to use APP on the cell phone to order food . src
父母不应该经常用钱来奖励孩子。Fùmǔ bù yīnggāi jīngcháng yòng qián lái jiǎnglì háizi. Parents shouldn't often use money to reward their children. src
用这个app来学汉字更容易。Yòng zhège app lái xué Hànzì gèng róngyì. It's easier to use this application to study Chinese characters. src
你可以通过微信来关注我们。Nǐ kěyǐ tōngguò Wēixìn lái guānzhù wǒmen. You can follow us on WeChat. src
很多人都是通过这个网站来找工作的。Hěn duō rén dōu shì tōngguò zhège wǎngzhàn lái zhǎo gōngzuò de. A lot of people hunt for a job through this website. src
商家经常通过打折来吸引顾客。Shāngjiā jīngcháng tōngguò dǎzhé lái xīyǐn gùkè. The sellers often attract customers through sales promotion. src
你们是通过什么平台来推广新产品的？Nǐmen shì tōngguò shénme píngtái lái tuīguǎng xīn chǎnpǐn de? Through what platform did you promote the new product? src
我们需要通过培训来提高服务质量。Wǒmen xūyào tōngguò péixùn lái tígāo fúwù zhìliàng. We need to improve our service quality through training. src
双方都希望通过谈判来解决问题。Shuāngfāng dōu xīwàng tōngguò tánpàn lái jiějué wèntí. Both sides hope to work out the issues through negotiation. src
来中国之前，我的汉语很一般。Lái Zhōngguó zhīqián, wǒ de Hànyǔ yībān. Before I came to China, my Chinese was so so. src
下班之后给我打个电话。Xiàbān zhīhòu gěi wǒ dǎ gè diànhuà. Give me a call after you get off work. src
吃完饭之后去看电影吧？Chī wán fàn zhīhòu qù diànyǐng ba? What about going to the movie after we finish dinner? src
出国之前，他和女朋友分手了。Chūguó zhīqián, tā hé nǚpéngyou fēnshǒu le. Before he went abroad, he broke up with his girlfriend. src
她每天放学之后都要去上钢琴课。Tā měi tiān fàngxué zhīhòu dōu yào qù shàng gāngqín kè. She needs to go to piano class every day after school is over. src
他在英国读完了大学，之后回上海了。Tā zài Yīngguó dú wán le dàxué, zhīhòu huí Shànghǎi le. He finished college in England. Afterwards, he returned to Shanghai. src
她当汉语老师四年多了，之前是教英语的。Tā dāng Hànyǔ lǎoshī sì nián duō le, zhīqián shì jiāo Yīngyǔ de. She's been a Chinese teacher for more than four years. She used to be an English teacher. src
老板刚刚回来工作，之前在休假。Lǎobǎn gānggāng huílái gōngzuò, zhīqián zài xiūjià. The boss just came back to work. He was on vocation before. src
我们都不知道，他之前什么也没说。Wǒmen dōu bù zhīdào, tā zhīqián shénme yě méi shuō. None of us knows. He didn't say anything before. src
我现在去吃饭，之后去见潜在客户。Wǒ xiànzài qù chīfàn, zhīhòu qù jiàn kèhù. I'm going to eat now. After that I will go to meet a potential client. src
考试时不要说话。Kǎoshì shí bùyào shuōhuà. When you take a test, don't talk. src
面试时，要穿得正式一点。Miànshì shí, yào chuān de zhèngshì yīdiǎn. When you go to the interview, you have to dress a little more formally. src
会议结束时老板才来。Huìyì jiéshù shí lǎobǎn cái lái. The boss showed up when the meeting was over. src
我生气时不想说话。Wǒ shēngqì shí bù xiǎng shuōhuà. I don't want to talk when I'm angry. src
他们结婚时什么都没有。Tāmen jiéhūn shí shénme dōu méiyǒu. They've got nothing when they got married. src
大学毕业时，他们分手了。Dàxué bìyè shí, tāmen fēnshǒu le. When they graduated, they broke up. src
飞机起飞时，他关了手机和电脑。Fēijī qǐfēi shí, tā guān le shǒujī hé diànnǎo. When the plane took off, he turned off his cell phone and computer. src
他去世时儿女都不在身边。Tā qùshì shí érnǚ dōu bù zài shēnbiān. His parents weren't home when he passed away. src
我们公司成立时只有三个人。Wǒmen gōngsī chénglì shí zhǐyǒu sān gè rén. There were only three people when this company was founded. src
跟父母说话时不要玩手机。Gēn fùmǔ shuōhuà shí bùyào wán shǒujī. Stop playing with your cell phone when you talk with your parents. src
今年八月以来，这里一直没下过雨。Jīnnián Bāyuè yǐlái, zhèlǐ yīzhí méi xià guo yǔ. It hasn't rained since August. src
结婚以来，我们没吵过架。Jiéhūn yǐlái, wǒmen méi chǎo guo jià. We've never had a fight since we got married. src
从他爸爸去世以来，他一直没回过家。Cóng tā bàba qùshì yǐlái, tā yīzhí méi huí guo jiā. He hasn't returned home since his father passed away. src
从毕业以来，她一直在教汉语。Cóng bìyè yǐlái, tā yīzhí zài jiāo Hànyǔ. She has been teaching Chinese since she graduated. src
自改革开放以来，中国社会发生了巨大的变化。Zì gǎigé kāifàng yǐlái, Zhōngguó shèhuì fāshēng le jùdà de biànhuà. Tremendous changes have been taken place in China since the reform and opening up. src
十年来，房价一直在涨。Shí nián lái, fángjià yīzhí zài zhǎng. Ever since ten years ago, housing price has been going up. src
几年来，我们公司的收入一直在增加。Jǐ nián lái, wǒmen gōngsī de shōurù yīzhí zài zēngjiā. Out company's income has been increasing during the past few years. src
实习几个月来，我学到了很多。Shíxí jǐ gè yuè lái, wǒ xuédào le hěn duō. I've learnt a lot from my internship during the past few months. src
出国几个月来，她一点也不想家。Chūguó jǐ gè yuè lái, tā yīdiǎn yě bù xiǎng jiā. She hasn't missed home at all since he went abroad a few month ago. src
离婚这几年来，他从没去看过孩子。Líhūn zhè jǐ nián lái, tā cóng méi qù kàn guo háizi. He hasn't visited his child ever since he got divorced a few years ago. src
我面试时经常会问这个问题。Wǒ miànshì shí jīngcháng huì wèn zhège wèntí. I often ask this question in a job interview. src
他们大学毕业时就分手了。Tāmen dàxué bìyè shí jiù fēnshǒu le. They broke up when they graduated from college. src
他太太提出离婚时，他很惊讶。Tā tàitai tíchū líhūn shí, tā hěn jīngyà. He was very surprised when his wife asked for a divorce. src
他去世时，他的孩子都不在身边。Tā qùshì shí, tā de háizi dōu bù zài shēnbiān. His children weren't there when he passed away. src
跟别人说话时不要玩手机。Gēn biérén shuōhuà shí bùyào wán shǒujī. Don't play with your cell phone when you talk with other people. src
上大学以来，我一直没逃过课。Shàng dàxué yǐlái, wǒ yīzhí méi táo guò kè. Since I was in college, I haven't skipped a class. src
到上海以来，他的汉语水平提高了。Dào Shànghǎi yǐlái, tā de Hànyǔ shuǐpíng tígāo le. Ever since he came to Shanghai, his Chinese has been improving. src
住院以来，常常有朋友来医院看望她。Zhùyuàn yǐlái, chángcháng yǒu péngyou lái yīyuàn kànwàng tā. Ever since she was in hospital, her friends have constantly come and visited her. src
自从我拿到驾照以来已经有五年了。Zìcóng wǒ ná dào jiàzhào yǐlái yǐjīng yǒu wǔ nián le. I've had my license for five years. src
自从去年夏天以来，他一直没有回过家。Zìcóng qùnián xiàtiān yǐlái, tā yīzhí méiyǒu huíguò jiā. He hasn't returned home since last summer. src
自从退学以来，他一直在帮父母做农活。Zìcóng tuìxué yǐlái, tā yīzhí zài bāng fùmǔ zuò nónghuó. Since he left school,he's been helping her parents do farm work. src
自从1979年改革开放以来，中国人的生活水平得到了提高。Zìcóng yījiǔqījiǔ nián gǎigé kāifàng yǐlái, Zhōngguó rén de shēnghuó shuǐpíng dédào le tígāo. Ever since the 1979 reform, the Chinese people's level of living has gone up. src
三个月来，我们去了很多地方旅游。Sān gè yuè lái, wǒmen qù le hěn duō dìfang lǚyóu. Since three months ago, we've traveled to a lot of places. src
五年来，物价一直上涨。Wǔ nián lái, wùjià yīzhí shàngzhǎng. Ever since five years ago, prices have been going up. src
我的同学几天来一直没有上课。Wǒ de tóngxué jǐ tiān lái yīzhí méiyǒu shàngkè. My classmate hasn't come to class for a few days now. src
他说他会来，后来又说不来了。Tā shuō tā huì lái, hòulái yòu shuō bù lái le. He said he would come, but later he said that he's not coming. src
他们上周吵架了，后来和好了。Tāmen shàng zhōu chǎojià le, hòulái hé hǎo le. They had a fight last week and they made up afterwards. src
他以前是厨师，后来当了老板。Tā yǐqián shì chúshī, hòulái dāng le lǎobǎn. He used to be a chef. Afterwards he became the owner. src
我昨晚走得早，不知道后来发生了什么。Wǒ zuówǎn zǒu de zǎo, bù zhīdào hòulái fāshēng le shénme. I left very early yesterday evening, so I don't know what happened afterwards. src
开始我父母不同意，后来他们同意了。Kāishǐ wǒ fùmǔ bù tóngyì, hòulái tāmen tóngyì le. My parents disapproved in the beginning, but they approved later. src
空调我上个月修好了，后来又坏了。Kōngtiáo wǒ shàng gè yuè xiū hǎo le, hòulái yòu huài le. I fixed the air conditioner last week, but it was broken again after that. src
他们在一起差不多三年，后来分手了。Tāmen zài yīqǐ chàbuduō sān nián, hòulái fēnshǒu le. They had been together for about three years. But they broke up afterwards. src
她以前是兼职老师，后来做了全职。Tā yǐqián shì jiānzhí lǎoshī, hòulái zuò le quánzhí. She used to be a part time teacher. Afterwards she became full time. src
我的大学老师辞职了，后来去上海做生意了。Wǒ de dàxué lǎoshī cízhí le, hòulái qù Shànghǎi zuò shēngyi le. My college teacher quit his job. Afterwards, he went to Shanghai to do business. src
北京以前叫北平，后来改成了北京。Běijīng yǐqián jiào Běipíng, hòulái gǎi chéng le Běijīng. Beijing used to be called Beiping and got changed into Beijing afterwards. src
蛋糕还有八分之一。Dàngāo háiyǒu bā fēn zhī yī. There is still one eighth of the cake left. src
这桶水还有五分之三。Zhè tǒng shuǐ háiyǒu wǔ fēn zhī sān. This bucket of water is still three fifths full. src
我的手机电量还有百分之三十。Wǒ de shǒujī diànliàng háiyǒu bǎifēnzhī sānshí. My phone battery still has 30% left. src
押金要付百分之二十。Yājīnyào fù bǎifēnzhī èrshí. The deposit is 20%. src
我们班有三分之一的同学是外国人。Wǒmen bān yǒu sān fēn zhī yī de tóngxué shì wàiguó rén. One third of our classmates are foreign students. src
美国人口差不多是中国人口的四分之一。Měiguó rénkǒu chàbuduō shì Zhōngguó rénkǒu de sì fēn zhī yī. America's population is about one fourth that of China's. src
我们学校四分之三的老师都是男老师。Wǒmen xuéxiào sì fēn zhī sān de lǎoshī dōu shì nán lǎoshī. Three fourths of the teachers at our school are male teachers. src
我们的需求占整个市场需求的十分之三。Wǒmen de xūqiú zhàn zhěng gè shìchǎng xūqiú de shí fēn zhī sān. Our demands take up three tenths of the entire markets demands. src
电动车的销量占新车销量的八分之五。Diàndòngchē de xiāoliàng zhàn xīn chē xiāoliàng de bā fēn zhī wǔ. Electric car sales occupies five eighths of all new car sales. src
Trump在这个州的支持率是百分之五十七点四。Trump zài zhège zhōu de zhīchí lǜ shì bǎifēnzhī wǔshí qī diǎn sì. In this state, Trump has a support rate of 57.4%. src
过去二十年，大城市年轻人的离婚率增加了百分之八。Dà chéngshì niánqīng rén de líhūn lǜ zēngjiā bǎifēnzhī bā. In the past 20 years, the divorce rate for young people in big cities has gone up by 8%. src
这是什么？Zhè shì shénmei? What is this? src
你知道这是什么吗？Nǐ zhīdào zhè shì shénme ma? Do you know what this is? src
他是谁？Tā shì shéi? Who is he? src
你知道他是谁吗？Nǐ zhīdào tā shì shéi ma? Do you know who he is? src
他叫什么名字？Tā jiào shénme míngzi? What is his name? src
你知道他叫什么名字吗？Nǐ zhīdào tā jiào shénme míngzi ma? Do you know what his name is? src
她住在哪儿？Tā zhù zài nǎr? Where does she live? src
她说过她住在哪儿吗？Tā shuō guo tā zhù zài nǎr ma? Did she say where she lives? src
这个标志是什么意思？Zhège biāozhì shì shénme yìsi? What does this sign mean? src
你们明白这个标志是什么意思吗？Nǐmen míngbai zhège biāozhì shì shénme yìsi ma? Do you understand what this sign means? src
我们想要什么？Wǒmen xiǎng yào shénme? What do we want? src
他问过我们想要什么吗？Tā wèn guo wǒmen xiǎng yào shénme ma? Did he care to ask what we want? src
你的问题是什么？Nǐ de wèntí shì shénme? What is your question? src
你能再说一遍你的问题是什么吗？Nǐ néng zài shuō yī biàn nǐ de wèntí shì shénme ma? Can you repeat what your question is? src
他是什么时候开始学中文的？Tā shì shénme shíhou kāishǐ xué Zhōngwén de? When did he started to learn Chinese? src
你知道他是什么时候开始学中文的吗？Nǐ zhīdào tā shì shénme shíhou kāishǐ xué Zhōngwén de ma? Do you know when he started to learn Chinese? src
这是在哪儿买的？Zhè shì zài nǎr mǎi de? Where did you buy this? src
你能告诉我这是在哪儿买的吗？Nǐ néng gàosu wǒ zhè shì zài nǎr mǎi de ma? Can I tell me where you bought this? src
我老板的孩子多大？Wǒ lǎobǎn de háizi duō dà? How old is my boss' child? src
你知道我老板的孩子多大吗？Nǐ zhīdào wǒ lǎobǎn de háizi duō dà ma? Do you know how old my boss' child is? src
他什么意思？Tā shénme yìsi? What is he saying? src
你懂他什么意思吗？Nǐ dǒng tā shénme yìsi ma? Do you understand what he is saying? src
他是怎么学中文？Tā shì zěnme xué Zhōngwén de? How did he learn Chinese? src
你知道他是怎么学中文的吗？Nǐ zhīdào zěnme xué Zhōngwén ma? Do you know how he learned Chinese? src
我读，你听着。Wǒ dú, nǐ tīng zhe. I'll read the letter, and you will listen. src
我们做，你们看着。Wǒmen zuò, nǐmen kàn zhe. We will do it, and you will watch. src
你们坐着，我马上回来。Nǐmen zuò zhe, wǒ mǎshàng huílái. Sit here. I'll be right back. src
我出去一下，你帮我看着行李。Wǒ chūqù yīxià, nǐ bāng wǒ kān zhe xíngli. I'll go out for a second, and you watch the luggage for me. src
公司的门开着，可是没人在。Gōngsī de mén kāi zhe, kěshì méi rén zài. The door of the company is open but no one is in there. src
她穿着一条小黑裙。Tā chuān zhe yī tiáo xiǎo hēi qún. She's wearing a little black dress. src
躺着最舒服。Tǎng zhe zuì shūfu. It makes me most comfortable just lying there. src
你不要生气，我是说着玩的。Nǐ bùyào shēngqì, wǒ shì shuō zhe wán de! Don't be mad. I was just joking. src
我听不懂英文歌，只是听着玩的。Wǒ tīng bu dǒng Yīngwén gē, zhǐshì tīng zhe wán de. I don't understand English songs. I listen just for fun. src
你们坐着，哪儿都别去。Nǐmen zuò zhe, nǎr dōu bié qù. You sit here. Don't go anywhere else. src
我不是认真的，我是闹着玩的。Wǒ bùshì rènzhēn de, wǒ shì nào zhe wá de. I'm not very serious, I like to have a lot of fun. src
你不要生气，我是说着玩的！Nǐ bùyào shēngqì, wǒ gāngcái shì shuō zhe wán de! Don't be mad.I was just joking. src
你妹妹很漂亮嘛。Nǐ mèimei hěn piàoliang ma. Your sister is pretty. src
他家挺有钱的嘛。Tā jiā tǐng yǒuqián de ma. His family is pretty rich. src
不想去就不要去嘛。Bù xiǎng qù jiù bùyào qù ma. If you don't wanna go, don't go. src
你别太谦虚嘛。Nǐ bié tài qiānxū ma. Don't be too modest. src
大家有话就说嘛。Dàjiā yǒu huà jiù shuō ma. Guys, you should say whatever you want to say. src
你跟他很熟嘛。Nǐ gēn tā hěn shóu ma. You two know each other well. src
开慢点，安全第一嘛。Kāi màn diǎn, ānquán dìyī ma. Drive slowly. Safety first. src
不用塑料袋更环保嘛。Bùyòng sùliàodài gèng huánbǎo ma. It's more environmental not to use plastic bags. src
这个老外很了解中国文化嘛。Zhège lǎowài hěn liǎojiě Zhōngguó wénhuà ma. This foreigner know a lot about Chinese culture. src
别担心，一边工作一边学嘛。Bié dānxīn, yībiān gōngzuò yībiān xué ma. Don't worry. You can learn while you work. src
冬天去吧，太冷；夏天去吧，太热。Dōngtiān qù ba, tài lěng; xiàtiān qù ba, tài rè. Going in the winter, it's too cold; Going in the summer, it's too hot. src
早点去吧，要等；晚点去吧，会堵车。Zǎo diǎn qù ba, yào děng; wǎn diǎn qù ba, yòu dǔchē. Going early, we'll have to wait; Going later, there will be too much traffic. src
穿得多一点吧，会热；穿得少一点吧，会冷。Chuān de duō yīdiǎn ba, huì rè; chuān de shǎo yīdiǎn ba, huì lěng. Wearing a little more, it will be hot; Wearing a little less, it will be cold. src
去吧，要给红包；不去吧，他没面子。Qù ba, yào gěi hóngbāo; bù qù ba, tā méi miànzi. Going there, I need to give a red envelope; Not going, he will lose face. src
不说吧，他还会做错；说吧，他肯定不高兴。Bù shuō ba, tā hái huì zuò cuò; shuō ba, tā kěndìng bù gāoxìng. Not telling him, he will still do it wrong next time; Telling him, he must be upset. src
回去吧，机票太贵；不回去吧，家人肯定会想我。Huíqù ba, jīpiào tài guì; bù huíqù ba, jiārén kěndìng huì xiǎng wǒ. Going back, the air ticket is too expensive; Not going back, my family definitely miss me. src
带你去吧，你总是不听话；不带你去吧，你一个人肯定无聊。Dài nǐ qù ba, nǐ zǒngshì bù tīnghuà; bù dài nǐ qù ba, nǐ yīgèrén kěndìng wúliáo. Taking you with me, you will be naughty like always; Not taking you with me, you will definitely be bored. src
见面吧，常常吵架；不见面吧，还是会想他。Jiànmiàn ba, chángcháng chǎojià; bù jiànmiàn ba, háishì huì xiǎng tā. Seeing each other, we fight a lot; Not seeing each other, I miss him anyway. src
不说真话吧，老婆不高兴；说真话吧，老婆也不高兴。Bù shuō zhēn huà ba, lǎopo bù gāoxìng; shuō zhēn huà ba, lǎopo yě bù gāoxìng. Not speaking the truth, the wife will be upset; Telling the truth, the wife will also be upset. src
这个老房子，卖吧，怕父母不同意；不卖吧，就没钱买新车。Zhège lǎo fángzi, mài ba, pà fùmǔ bù tóngyì; bù mài ba, jiù méi qián mǎi xīn chē. Selling this old house, I'm afraid my parents disagree; Not selling it, I don't have money to buy a new car. src
你的妹妹很漂亮嘛。Nǐ de mèimei hěn piàoliang ma. Your sister is pretty. src
中国人口很多嘛。Zhōngguó rénkǒu hěn duō ma. The Chinese population is huge. src
美国人很开放嘛。Měiguó rén hěn kāifàng ma. Americans are very open-minded. src
大熊猫嘛，孩子们都很喜欢。Dà xióngmāo ma, háizimen dōu hěn xǐhuan. Pandas. All children like them. src
男人嘛，总是要喝点酒，抽点烟。Nánrén ma, zǒng shì yào hē diǎn jiǔ, chōu diǎn yān. Men. They're always going to drink and smoke. src
他会好的。Tā huì hǎo de. He will get better. src
你可以的。Nǐ kěyǐ de. You can do this. src
她一定会来的。Tā yīdìng huì lái de. She's definitely coming. src
我们能搞定的。Wǒmen néng gǎodìng de. We can fix this. src
他不会道歉的。Tā bù huì dàoqiàn de. He's not going to apologize. src
这个地方我们来过的。Zhège dìfang wǒmen lái guo de. We've been here. src
我跟你说过的，你不记得了？Wǒ gēn nǐ shuō guo de, nǐ bù jìde le? I've told you this. Do you not remember? src
我不会骗你的。Wǒ bù huì piàn nǐ de. I won't lie to you. src
你们会成功的。Nǐmen huì chénggōng de. You will succeed. src
你的建议我们会考虑的。Nǐ de jiànyì wǒmen huì kǎolǜ de. We will consider your advice. src
工作吧，太累；不工作吧，无聊。Gōngzuò ba, tài lèi ; bù gōngzuò ba, wúliáo. Working is too tiring; I'll be bored if I don't. src
买吧，不想花那么多钱；不买吧，又不开心。Mǎi bā, bù xiǎng huā nàme duō qián ; bù mǎi bā, yòu bù kāixīn. If I buy it, too expensive, but if I don't buy them, I won't be unhappy. src
早去吧，需要等；晚去吧，会堵车。Zǎo qù bā, xūyào děng ; wǎn qù bā, huì dǔchē. If we go early we'll have to wait, but if we go later, there will be too much traffic. src
关于中国历史，我知道的不多。Guānyú Zhōngguó lìshǐ, wǒ zhīdào de bù duō. As for Chinese history, I don't know a lot. src
关于这次考试，我还有几个问题要问。Guānyú zhè cì kǎoshì, wǒ hái yǒu jǐ gè wèntí yào wèn. As for this exam, I still have a lot of questions that I need to ask. src
关于这个问题，你们还是问他吧。Guānyú zhège wèntí, nǐmen háishì wèn tā bā. As for this problem, you'd better ask him. src
关于你的建议，老板还在考虑。Guānyú nǐ de jiànyì, lǎobǎn hái zài kǎolǜ. As for your suggestion, the boss is still thinking it over. src
关于调查结果，我们也不太清楚。Guānyú diàochá jiéguǒ, wǒmen yě bù tài qīngchu. As for the result of that research, we don't know much either. src
这是一份关于中国奢侈品市场的报告。Zhè shì yī fèn guānyú Zhōngguó shēchǐ pǐn shìchǎng de bàogào. This is a report about the Chinese luxury market. src
汉语有很多关于饮食的成语。Hànyǔ yǒu hěn duō guānyú yǐnshí de chéngyǔ. There are lots of idioms about diet in Chinese. src
我昨天看了一部关于动物保护的纪录片。Wǒ zuótiān kàn le yī bù guānyú dòngwù bǎohù de jìlùpiàn. I saw a documentary about animal protection yesterday. src
网上有很多关于这件事情的评论。Wǎngshang you hěn duō guānyú zhè jiàn shìqing de pínglùn. There are lots of comments about this matter online. src
他写过很多关于男女平等的文章。Tā xiě guo hěn duō guānyú nánnǚ píngděng de wénzhāng. He wrote many articles about gender equality. src
我们聊聊你的新工作吧。Wǒmen liáoliao nǐ de xīn gōngzuò ba. Let's talk about your new job. src
今天开会要说说公司下个月的培训。Jīntiān kāihuì yào shuōshuo gōngsī xià gè yuè de péixùn. Today, we need to hold a meeting about next month's company training. src
直到十二点半，我才做完作业。Zhídào shí'èr diǎn bàn, wǒ cái zuò wán zuòyè. It wasn't until half past twelve in the morning that I finished homework. src
直到半个月以后，我的感冒才好。Zhídào bàn gè yuè yǐhòu, wǒ de gǎnmào cái hǎo. It took me half a month to recover from the cold. src
她直到十八岁才见到亲生父母。Tā zhídào shíbā suì cái jiàndào qīnshēng fùmǔ. It wasn't until she was eighteen that she met her biological parents. src
我直到大学毕业才开始独立生活。Wǒ zhídào dàxué bìyè cái kāishǐ dúlì shēnghuó. It wasn't until I graduated from college that I started living independently. src
直到去了北京，他才知道一个人在大城市多辛苦。Zhídào qù le Běijīng, tā cái zhīdào yīgèrén zài dà chéngshì duō xīnkǔ. It wasn't until he went to Beijing that he understood how hard it is to be alone in a big city. src
他们是同学，但是直到毕业，都没说过话。Tāmen shì tóngxué, dànshì zhídào bìyè, dōu méi shuō guo huà. They are classmates. But they had never spoken until they graduated. src
直到电影结束，他都没来。Zhídào diànyǐng jiéshù, tā dōu méi lái. He never showed up until the movie was over. src
直到我弟弟上大学，他都不会洗衣服。Zhídào wǒ dìdi shàng dàxué, tā dōu bù huì xǐ yīfu. My younger brother could't wash clothes until he went to college. src
我姐姐比我大两岁。Wǒ jiějie bǐ wǒ dà liǎng suì. My sister is two years older than me. src
你比你哥哥小几岁？Nǐ bǐ nǐ gēge xiǎo jǐ suì? How much younger are you than your elder brother? src
他女朋友比他大十岁。Tā nǚpéngyou bǐ tā dà shí suì. His girlfriend is 10 years older than him. src
我老板很年轻，只比我大三四岁。Wǒ lǎobǎn hěn niánqīng, zhī bǐ wǒ dà sān sì suì. My boss is very young. He is only three or four years older than me. src
你俩谁大一点？Nǐ liǎ shéi dà yīdiǎn? Who is elder between you two? src
你爸爸和你妈妈谁大？Nǐ bàba hé nǐ māma shéi dà? Who is the elder one, your dad or your mom? src
你们五个人里面谁最小？Nǐmen wǔ gè rén lǐmiàn shéi zuì xiǎo? Who is the youngest among the five of you? src
我爸爸跟妈妈差不多大。Wǒ bàba gēn māma chàbuduō dà. My dad is about the same age with my mom. src
我们公司大部分的员工都跟我差不多大。Wǒmen gōngsī dà bùfen de yuángōng dōu gēn wǒ chàbuduō dà. Most of the employees in our company are about the same age with me. src
给客人倒茶。Gěi kèrén dàochá. Pour a cup of tea for the guest. src
妈妈在给孩子们做饭。Māma zài gěi háizi men zuòfàn. Mom is cooking for the kids. src
我儿子喜欢给小狗洗澡。Wǒ érzi xǐhuan gěi xiǎogǒu xǐzǎo. My son likes to give a bath to our dog. src
请给我拿一双筷子。Qǐng gěi wǒ ná yī shuāng kuàizi. Please give me a pair of chopsticks. src
可以给我买一杯咖啡吗？Kěyǐ gěi wǒ mǎi yī bēi kāfēi ma? Could you please buy me a cup of coffee? src
可以给我拿一下行李吗？Kěyǐ gěi wǒ ná yīxià xíngli ma? Can you take my suitcase for me? src
这个周末我们给儿子开生日派对。Zhège zhōumò wǒmen gěi érzi kāi shēngrì pàiduì. We're going to hold a birthday party for our son this weekend. src
我没带钥匙，你能给我开一下门吗？Wǒ méi dài yàoshi, nǐ néng gěi wǒ kāi yīxià mén ma? I don't have the key. Could you please open the door for me? src
你想让我给你打扫吗？Nǐ xiǎng ràng wǒ gěi nǐ dǎsǎo ma? Are you asking me to clean your room for you? src
如果你来中国玩，我给你当导游。Rúguǒ nǐ lái Zhōngguó wán, wǒ gěi nǐ dāng dǎoyóu. If you come to visit China, I'll serve as a tour guide for you. src
我们都为你高兴。Wǒmen dōu wèi nǐ gāoxìng. We are all happy for you. src
谁为我考虑过？Shéi wèi wǒ kǎolǜ guo? Is there anyone who's ever thought about me? src
你们可以来为我们加油。Nǐmen kěyǐ lái wèi wǒmen jiāyóu. You guys can come to cheer us up. src
她是为美国政府工作的。Tā shì wèi Měiguó zhèngfǔ gōngzuò de. She works for the United States government. src
这个生日蛋糕是为你准备的。Zhège shēngrì dàngāo shì wèi nǐ zhǔnbèi de. This birthday cake is prepared for you. src
父母都要为家庭付出很多。Fùmǔ dōu yào wèi jiātíng fùchū hěn duō. Parents all need to do a lot for their family. src
你不为自己的孩子担心吗？Nǐ bù wèi zìjǐ de háizi dānxīn ma? Aren't you worried about your child? src
谢谢你为我们提供这么多资源。Xièxie nǐ wèi wǒmen tígōng zhème duō zīyuán. Thank you for providing us with so many resources. src
他为公司的发展贡献了很多。Tā wèi gōngsī de fāzhǎn gòngxiàn le hěn duō. He contributed a lot for the development of the company. src
很多人都在为那些孩子祈祷。Hěn duō rén dōu zài wèi nàxiē háizi qídǎo. Lots of people are praying for those children. src
我女儿不到三岁。Wǒ nǚ'ér bùdào sān suì. My daughter is less than three years old. src
我昨天睡了不到五个小时。Wǒ zuótiān shuì le bùdào wǔ gè xiǎoshí. Yesterday I slept for less than five hours. src
这件衣服花了不到一百块。Zhè jiàn yīfu huā le bùdào yī bǎi kuài. This piece of clothing costs less than 100 RMB. src
我家到公司不到五百米。Wǒ jiā dào gōngsī bùdào wǔ bǎi mǐ. It is less than 500 meters from my house to the company. src
在美国，不到21岁不能喝酒。Zài Měiguó, bùdào èrshí-yī suì, bù néng hējiǔ. In America, people under 21 can't drink alcohol. src
她的病不到一个星期就好了。Tā de bìng bùdào yī gè xīngqī jiù hǎo le. It took less than one week for her to recover from her sickness. src
他们认识不到两个月就结婚了。Tāmen rènshi bùdào liǎng gè yuè jiù jiéhūn le. They've known each other for less than two months and are already married. src
李医生不到55岁就退休了。Lǐ yīshēng bùdào wǔshí-wǔ suì jiù tuìxiū le. Dr. Li is less than 55 years old and he already retired. src
爷爷不到60岁就去世了。Yéye bùdào liùshí suì jiù qùshì le. My grandpa was less than 60 years old when he died. src
老板不到30岁就有白头发了。Lǎobǎn bùdào sānshí suì jiù yǒu bái tóufa le. My boss is less than 30 years old and already has white hair showing on his head. src
一直往前走。Yīzhí wǎng qián zǒu. Go straight along. src
往左拐。Wǎng zuǒ guǎi. Turn left. src
往上看。Wǎng shàng kàn. Look up there. src
那个小偷往东跑了。Nàge xiǎotōu wǎng dōng pǎo le. That thief ran east. src
不要往楼下扔垃圾。Bùyào wǎng lóuxià rēng lājī. Don't throw trash downstairs. src
不要往我家打电话了！Bùyào wǎng wǒ jiā dǎ diànhuà le! Stop calling my house! src
开往北京的火车Kāi wǎng Běijīng de huǒchē The train that goes to Beijing. src
飞往纽约的飞机Fēi wǎng Niǔyuē de fēijī The airplane that flies to New York. src
运往国外的货物Yùn wǎng guówài de huòwù The cargos that are shipped overseas. src
往下说。Wǎng xià shuō. Keep talking. src
往下读。Wǎng xià dú. Keep reading. src
你往下看就知道了。Nǐ wǎng xià kàn jiù zhīdào le. Keep reading it and then you will figure out. src
为了钱，他出卖了朋友。Wèile qián, tā chūmài le péngyou. He betrayed his friends for money. src
为了给他太太庆祝生日，他办了一个盛大的派对。Wèile gěi tā tàitài qìngzhù shēngrì, tā bàn le yī gè shèngdà de pàiduì. He threw a grand party to celebrate his wife's birthday. src
为了有一个好的未来，我必须好好学习。Wèile yǒu yī gè hǎo de wèilái, wǒ bìxū hǎo hào xuéxí. In order to have a good future, I have to study hard. src
为了让自己有更好的语言环境，我打算去中国留学一年。Wèile ràng zìjǐ yǒu gèng hǎo de yǔyán huánjìng, wǒ dǎsuàn qù zhōngguó liúxué yī nián. In order to have a better language-learning environment, I plan to go to study in China for 1 year. src
为了让孩子一生下来就是美国人，中国很多有钱人都在美国生孩子。Wèile ràng háizi yīshēng xiàlái jiùshì Měiguó rén, Zhōngguó hěn duō yǒuqiánrén dōu zài Měiguó shēng háizi. In order to make their child an American citizen, a lot of rich Chinese people stay in the United States during their pregnancy. src
我这么做是为了给你一个更好的未来。Wǒ (zhīsuǒyǐ) zhème zuò shì wèile gěi nǐ yī gè gèng hǎo de weìlái. The reason I did all this was to give you a better future. src
我离开中国是为了去美国结婚。Wǒ (zhīsuǒyǐ) líkāi zhōngguó shì wèile qù Měiguó jiéhūn. The reason I left China was to go to the United States to get married. src
他俩一直不要孩子是为了多点时间享受二人世界。Tā liǎ (zhīsuǒyǐ) yīzhí bùyào háizi shì wèile duō diǎn shíjiān xiǎngshòu èrrénshìjiè. The reason they don't want to have kids is so they can spend more time with each other. src
宝宝对我笑了。Bǎobao duì wǒ xiào le. The baby smiled at me. src
小狗在对你叫。Xiǎo gǒu zài duì nǐ jiào. The dog is barking at you. src
你不应该这样对我们说话。Nǐ bù yīnggāi zhèyang duì wǒmen shuōhuà. You shouldn't talk to us this way. src
你怎么能对你妈妈大喊大叫？Nǐ zěnme néng duì nǐ māma dà hǎn dà jiào? How could you shout at your mother? src
不要对孩子发脾气！Bù yào duì háizi fā píqi! Don't lose your temper at the child! src
对我来说，中文最难的语法是把字句。Duì wǒ lái shuō, Zhōngwén zuì nán de yǔfǎ shì bǎ zì jù. To me, the most difficult Chinese grammar is Ba sentence. src
对他来说，家人比工作更重要。Duì tā lái shuō, jiārén bǐ gōngzuò gèng zhòngyào. To him, family is more important than work. src
对老板来说，赚钱是第一。Duì lǎobǎn lái shuō, zhuànqián shì dìyī. To the boss, making money comes first. src
穿这种衣服对我们来说太奢侈了。Chuān zhè zhǒng yīfu duì wǒmen lái shuō tài shēchǐ le. To us, it's too luxurious to wear this kind of clothes. src
这个问题对一个五岁的孩子来说太复杂了。Zhè gè wèntí duì yī gè wǔ suì de háizi lái shuō tài fùzá le. For a five-year-old kid, this question is too complicated. src
我对学外语很感兴趣。Wǒ duì xué wàiyǔ hěn gǎn xìngqù. I am very interested in learning foreign language. src
你要对自己的工作负责。Nǐ yào duì zìjǐ de gōngzuò fùzé. You need to be responsible for your job. src
老板好像对你不太满意。Lǎobǎn hǎoxiàng duì nǐ bù tài mǎnyì. The boss seems not very satisfied with you. src
这里的服务员都对顾客很热情。Zhèlǐ de fúwùyuán dōu duì gùkè hěn rèqíng. The waiters here are all very friendly to the customers. src
这个App对我的英语学习很有帮助。Zhège App duì wǒ de Yīngyǔ xuéxí hěn yǒu bāngzhù. This method helps a lot with my English learning. src
这件事对他的影响很大。Zhè jiàn shì duì tā de yǐngxiǎng hěn dà. This piece of matter has a big influence on him. src
向东走。Xiàng dōng zǒu. Walk towards east. src
向前看。Xiàng qián kàn. Look forward. src
向左转。Xiàng zuǒ zhuǎn. Turn left. src
老师正向我们走来。Lǎoshī zhèng xiàng wǒmen zǒu lái. The teacher is walking towards us. src
火车已经开了，她还在向我招手。Huǒchē yǐjīng kāi le, tā hái zài xiàng wǒ zhāoshǒu. The train already took off. She kept waving towards me. src
你必须向他道歉！Nǐ bìxū xiàng tā dàoqiàn! You must apologize to him! src
这件事你应该向老板汇报一下。Zhè jiàn shì nǐ yīnggāi xiàng lǎobǎn huìbào yīxià. You should report this to the boss! src
向雷锋同志学习！Xiàng Léi Fēng tóngzhì xuéxí! Learn from Comrade Lei Feng! src
我不喜欢向朋友借钱。Wǒ bù xǐhuan xiàng péngyou jiè qián. I don't like to borrow money to my friends. src
你会向陌生人求助吗？Nǐ huì xiàng mòshēngrén qiúzhù ma? Would you ask strangers for help? src
我们都没经验，是来向你请教的。Wǒmen dōu méi jīngyàn, lái xiàng nǐ qǐngjiào de. None of us have experience. We're here to ask you for advice. src
在这个问题上，我们的看法是一样的。Zài zhè gè wèntí shàng, wǒmen de kànfǎ shì yīyàng de. In regards to this problem, our opinions are the same. src
在美国历史上，谁是最重要的总统？Zài Měiguó lìshǐ shàng, shéi shì zuì zhòngyào de zǒngtǒng ? In American history, who is the most important president? src
这个句子在语法上没什么问题，但是不太自然。Zhège jùzi zài yǔfǎ shàng méi shénme wèntí, dànshì bù tài zìrán. This sentence is okay to say in terms of grammar, it's just not very natural. src
南方人和北方人在生活习惯上有很多差异。Nánfāng rén hé běifāng rén zài shēnghuó xíguàn shàng yǒu hěn duō chāyì. There are many differences between northern and southern people on the topic of living habits. src
在这样的环境下长大，孩子会快乐吗？Zài zhèyàng de huánjìng xià zhǎngdà, háizi huì kuàilè ma? Do you think kids will be happy growing up in this kind of environment? src
在这种情况下，你们会怎么做？Zài zhè zhǒng qíngkuàng xià, nǐmen huì zěnme zuò? In this situation, what would you do? src
在紧急情况下，你可以这样做。Zài jǐnjí qíngkuàng xià, nǐ kěyǐ zhèyàng zuò. In emergencies, you can do that. src
在那么困难的条件下，她还是坚持让孩子们都上学。Zài nàme kùnnan de tiáojiàn xià, tā háishì jiānchí ràng háizi men dōu shàngxué. She still insisted that the children should all go to school under that difficult financial condition. src
在事业方面，我老板很成功。Zài shìyè fāngmiàn, wǒ lǎobǎn hěn chénggōng. On the topic of career, my boss is very successful. src
在技术方面，他是专家。Zài jìshù fāngmiàn, tā shì zhuānjiā. On the topic of technology, he's an expert. src
在管理方面，你比我有经验。Zài guǎnlǐ fāngmiàn, nǐ bǐ wǒ yǒu jīngyàn. On the topic of management, you have more experience than I do. src
中西方文化在很多方面都有共同点。Zhōng xīfāng wénhuà zài hěn duō fāngmiàn dōu yǒu gòngtóngdiǎn. In certain aspects, Chinese and Western culture have a lot in common. src
不要向我开枪！Bùyào xiàng wǒ kāiqiāng! Don't shoot at me . src
你需要向他道歉。Nǐ xūyào xiàng tā dàoqiàn. You need to apologize to him. src
这件事你必须向老板汇报一下！Zhè jiàn shì nǐ bìxū xiàng lǎobǎn huìbào yīxià! You must report this to the boss! src
他还没向我表白。Tā hiáméi xiàng wǒ biǎobái. He hasn't confessed to me yet. src
你要向好学生学习。Nǐ yào xiàng hǎo xuéshēng xuéxí. You should learn from good students. src
警察正在向他的邻居了解情况。Jǐngchá zhèngzài xiàng tā de línjū liǎojiě qíngkuàng. The policemen are asking his neighbors for more information. src
我们都没经验，是来向你取经的。Wǒmen dōu méi jīngyàn, lái xiàng nǐ qǔjīng de. None of us have experience. We're here to get some experience from you. src
我不喜欢向同事借钱!Wǒ bù xǐhuan xiàng tóngshì jiè qián. I don't like to borrow money to my colleagues. src
我给他打电话了。Wǒ gěi tā dǎ diànhuà le. I gave him a phone call. src
请给我回电话。Qǐng gěi wǒ huí diànhuà. Please return my phone call. src
我给你发了一封邮件。Wǒ gěi nǐ fā le yī fēng yóujiàn. I sent you a letter. src
我要给你看我们的新产品。Wǒ yào gěi nǐ kàn wǒmen de xīn chǎnpǐn. I want you to take a look at our new product. src
给女朋友买什么礼物呢？Gěi nǚpéngyou mǎi shénme lǐwù ne? What gift should I buy for my girlfriend? src
给我说说这件事情。Gěi wǒ shuō shuō zhè jiàn shìqing. Talk about this matter with me. src
小时候，妈妈每天都给我讲故事。Xiǎo shíhou, māma měitiān dōu gěi wǒ jiǎng gùshi. When I was young, every day my mother would tell me stories. src
你应该给他道歉。Nǐ yīnggāi gěi tā dàoqiàn. You should apologize to him. src
你不应该这样对父母说话。Nǐ bù yīnggāi zhèyang duì fùmǔ shuōhuà. You shouldn't talk to your parents this way. src
他总是对老师撒谎。Tā zǒngshì duì lǎoshī sāhuǎng. He always lies to his teachers. src
不要对孩子发脾气。Bùyào duì háizi fā píqi. Don't lose your temper at the child. src
学好中文对外国人来说不容易。Xuéhǎo Zhōngwén duì wàiguórén lái shuō bù róngyì. To foreigners, it is not easy to learn Chinese well. src
对孩子来说，这个问题太复杂了。Duì háizi lái shuō, zhège wèntí tài fùzá le. For kids, this question is too complicated. src
对你来说，家庭重要还是工作重要？Duì nǐ lái shuō, jiātíng zhòngyào háishì gōngzuò zhòngyào? To you, is family or work more important? src
我儿子对学外语很感兴趣。Wǒ érzi duì xué wàiyǔ hěn gǎn xìngqù. My son is very interested in learning foreign language. src
你应该对自己的工作负责。Nǐ yīnggāi duì zìjǐ de gōngzuò fùzé . You should be responsible for your job. src
老板对你不太满意。Lǎobǎn duì nǐ bù tài mǎnyì. The boss has been not very satisfied with you. src
观众对比赛结果非常失望。Guānzhòng duì bǐsài jiéguǒ fēicháng shīwàng. Everyone is very disappointed with the result of the game. src
我的小女儿对所有动物都很好奇。Wǒ de xiǎo nǚ'ér duì suǒyǒu dòngwù dōu hěn hàoqí. My younger daughter is curious about all the animals. src
现在不要给他打电话。Xiànzài bùyào gěi tā dǎ diànhuà. Don't give him a phone call now. src
请快点给我回邮件。Qǐng kuàidiǎn gěi wǒ huí yóujiàn. Please return my email soon. src
他说他会给我写信的。Tā shuō tā huì gěi wǒ xiě xìn de. He said he would write letters to me. src
你可以给大家读一下吗？Nǐ kěyǐ gěi dàjiā dú yīxià ma? Could you please read it for everybody? src
我给你发短信了，你怎么不回？Wǒ gěi nǐ fā duǎnxìn le. Nǐ zěnme bù huí? I sent you short messages. Why didn't you return any? src
她的粉丝常常给她寄礼物。Tā de fěnsī chángcháng gěi tā jì lǐwù. Her fans often send her gifts. src
爸爸应该给儿子道歉。Bàba yīnggāi gěi érzi dàoqiàn. The father should apologize to his son. src
谁能给我解释一下？Shéi néng gěi wǒ jiěshì yīxià? Who can explain this to me? src
老板让我明天给客户介绍我们的新产品。Lǎobǎn ràng wǒ míngtiān gěi kèhù jièshào wǒmen de xīn chǎnpǐn. My boss asked to present our new product to the client tomrrow. src
他不是不知道怎么做，只是不想做。Tā bù shì bù zhīdào zěnme zuò, zhǐshì bù xiǎng zuò. It's not that he doesn't know how to do it, he just doesn't want to do it. src
我不是没有想法，只是不想现在就说。Wǒ bù shì méiyǒu xiǎngfǎ, zhǐshì bù xiǎng xiànzài jiù shuō. It's not that I don't have an opinion, I just don't want to say it right now. src
他是好学生，不会没做作业的。Tā shì hǎo xuéshēng, bù huì méi zuò zuòyè de. He is a good student; he can't not do his homework. src
老板不会不同意的。Lǎobǎn bù huì bù tóngyì de. The boss can't disagree. src
买票不能不排队。Mǎi piào bù néng bù páiduì. Buying a ticket doesn't mean you don't have to wait in line. src
他是你最好的朋友，不会不来参加你的婚礼。Tā shì nǐ zuìhǎo de péngyou, bù huì bù lái cānjiā nǐ de hūnlǐ. He is your best friend. There is no possibility he won't come take part in your wedding. src
我知道你想减肥，但是不能不吃早饭。Wǒ zhīdào nǐ xiǎng jiǎnféi, dànshì bù néng bù chī zǎofàn. I know you want to lose weight, but you can't not eat breakfast. src
这是团队活动，不能不参加。Zhè shì tuánduì huódòng, bù néng bù cānjiā. This is a team activity. You can't not participate. src
没有一个人不讨厌他。Méiyǒu yī gè rén bù tǎoyàn tā. There is not one person who doesn't dislike him. src
我们公司没有一个员工不会说英语。Wǒmen gōngsī méiyǒu yī gè yuángōng bù huì shuō Yīngyǔ. Our company doesn't have a single employee who can't speak English. src
他的女朋友没有一个不漂亮的。Tā de nǚpéngyou méiyǒu yī gè bù piàoliang de. None of his girlfriends were not beautiful. src
她的裙子没有一件不是白色的。Tā de qúnzi méiyǒu yī jiàn bù shì báisè de. She doesn't have a single dress that is not white. src
我们家没有一个没上过大学的。Wǒmen jiā méiyǒu yī gè méi shàng guo dàxué de. Our family doesn't have a single person who didn't go to college. src
你们要玩到几点？Nǐmen yào wán dào jǐ diǎn? When will you be done playing? src
我们在酒吧一直聊到半夜。Wǒmen zài jiǔbā yīzhí liáo dào bànyè. We were chatting in the bar until midnight. src
你弟弟要在我们家住到什么时候？Nǐ dìdi yào zài wǒmen jiā zhù dào shénme shíhou? How much longer is your younger brother going to stay in our house? src
昨天的会一直开到晚上九点。Zuótiān de huì yīzhí kāi dào wǎnshang jiǔ diǎn. Yesterday's meeting lasted until 9 pm. src
我邻居今天吵架了，一直吵到警察过来。Wǒ línjū jīntiān chǎojià le, yīzhí chǎo dào jǐngchá guòlái. My neighbors had a fight today, which lasted until the police came. src
我们晚上去吃火锅了，一直吃到火锅店关门。Wǒmen wǎnshang qù chī huǒguō le, yīzhí chī dào huǒguō diàn guānmén. We went to eat hotpot tonight and we didn't finish until the place was closed. src
他昨天一天都在打游戏，一直打到他妈妈回家。Tā zuótiān yī tiān dōu zài dǎ yóuxì, yīzhí dǎ dào tā māma huí jiā. He was playing computer games all day yesterday. He didn't stop until his mother came home. src
你知不知道我们等你等到半夜？Nǐ zhī bu zhīdào wǒmen děng dào bànyè? Do you know we waited for you until midnight? src
我女儿昨天晚上写作业写到十二点半。Wǒ nǚ'ér zuótiān wǎnshang xiě xiě zuòyè dào shí'èr diǎn bàn. My daughter didn't finish her homework until 12:30 last night. src
她给男朋友打电话打到手机没电。Tā gěi nánpéngyou dǎ diànhuà dǎ dào shǒujī méi diàn. She called her boyfriend and they kept talking until her phone was out of battery. src
这个看起来很漂亮。Zhège kàn qǐlái hěn piàoliang. This looks very pretty. src
他看起来很友好。Tā kàn qǐlái hěn yǒuhǎo. He looks friendly. src
这个蛋糕看起来很好吃。Zhège dàngāo kàn qǐlái hěn hǎochī. This cake looks really tasty. src
你今天看起来很累。Nǐ jīntiān kàn qǐlái hěn lèi. You look really tired today. src
这家餐厅看起来不错。Zhè jiā cāntīng kàn qǐlái bùcuò. This restaurant looks good. src
老师让我们去图书馆借书。Lǎoshī ràng wǒmen qù túshū guǎn jiè shū. The teacher let us to go to the library and borrow books. src
这部电影很让人很感动。Zhè bù diànyǐng hěn ràng rén hěn gǎndòng. This movie really moves people. src
她退学的事情使她父母非常失望。Tā tuìxué de shìqing shǐ tā fùmǔ fēicháng shīwàng. Dropping out of school really disappointed her parents. src
这件事情的解决使他最近轻松了很多。Zhè jiàn shìqing de jiějué shǐ tā zuìjìn qīngsōng le hěn duō. The solution to this problem has made him feel more relaxed these days. src
就这么点儿工资！你叫我怎么活？Jiù zhème diǎn er gōngzī! Nǐ jiào wǒ zěnme huó? Only this little salary! How do you expect me to live? src
你叫我到哪儿去给你弄这么多钱？Nǐ jiào wǒ dào nǎr qù gěi nǐ nòng zhème duō qián? Where do you expect me to go get you such a large sum of money? src
我请他过来帮我修电脑。Wǒ qǐng tā guòlái bāng wǒ xiū diànnǎo. I asked him to come and help me fix the computer. src
为了去舞会，她请了一位化妆师来帮她化妆。Wèi le qù wǔhuì, tā qǐng le yī wèi huàzhuāng shī lái bāng tā huàzhuāng. In preparation for the ball, she invited a makeup artist to help her put on makeup. src
请少放点盐。Qǐng shǎo fàng diǎn yán. Less salt, please. src
少吃垃圾食品。Shǎo chī lājī shípǐn. Eat junk food less. src
少买点，吃不完会坏的。Shǎo mǎi diǎn, chī bu wán huì huài de. Don't buy too much. It will go bad if we can't finish eating all. src
你能不能少抽点烟？Nǐ néng bu néng shǎo chōu diǎn yān? Can you smoke less? src
快期中考试了，少玩点游戏吧。Kuài qīzhōng kǎoshì le, shǎo wán diǎn yóuxì ba. You're going to take the mid-term exam. Stop playing so much video games. src
少喝点，明天还要上班呢。Shǎo hē diǎn, míngtiān háiyào shàngbān ne. Don't drink so much. You need go to work tomorrow. src
少看点电视，多看书。Shǎo kàn diǎn diànshì, duō kànshū. Watch TV less. Read more. src
少吃点肉，多吃点蔬菜。Shǎo chī diǎn ròu, duō chī diǎn shūcài. Eat less meat and more vegetables. src
少来。Shǎo lái. Don't give me that. (Stop it!) src
少说废话。Shǎo shuō fèihuà. Cut the crap. src
少管闲事。Shǎo guǎn xiánshì. Stay out of other people's business. src
我每天上班都会经过人民广场。Wǒ měi tiān shàngbān dōu huì jīngguò Rénmín Guǎngchǎng. I pass the People's Square every day on my way to work. src
你经过我家门口的时候叫我一下。Nǐ jīngguò wǒ jiā ménkǒu de shíhou jiào wǒ yīxià. Call me when you pass by my door. src
她经过这个咖啡店的时候会想到他。Tā jīngguò zhège kāfēidiàn de de shíhou huì xiǎngdào tā. She thinks about him when she walks past this cafe. src
经过自己的努力，她考上了北京大学。Jīngguò zìjǐ de nǔlì, tā kǎoshàng le Běijīng dàxué. After all of her hard work, she was admitted into Peking University. src
经过两个月的准备，他顺利地通过了这次面试。Jīngguò liǎng gè yuè de zhǔnbèi, tā shùnlì de tōngguò le zhè cì miànshì. After two months of preparation, he successfully passed the job interview. src
经过调查，我们发现他跟这件事真的没有关系。Jīngguò diàochá, wǒmen fāxiàn tā gēn zhè jiàn shì zhēnde méiyǒu guānxi. After investigating, we found out that he had nothing to do with this. src
经过这几年的发展，我老家发生了很大变化。jīngguò zhè jǐ nián de fāzhǎn, wǒ lǎojiā fāshēng le hěn dà biànhuà. After the last few years of development, my hometown has changed a lot. src
经过一个月的培训，他对公司的业务已经比较熟悉了。Jīngguò yī gè yuè de péixùn, wǒmen de xīn yuángōng yǐjīng zhǔnbèi hǎo le. After going through a month of training, our staff is well prepared. src
请你跟我们说一下当时的经过。Qǐng nǐ gēn wǒmen shuō yīxià dāngshí de jīngguò. Please tell us a little about that process. src
事情的真实经过谁都不知道。Shìqing de zhēnshí jīngguò shéi dōu bù zhīdào. No one knows the actual course of events. src
多吃点。Duō chī diǎn. Eat a little more. src
多放点辣。Duō fàng diǎn là. Put a little more spice. src
多拿一点。Duō ná yīdiǎn. Take more. src
爷爷，你要多出去走走。Yéye, nǐ yào duō chūqù zǒuzou. You need to go out and take a walk more often. src
多给他点时间吧。Duō gěi tā diǎn shíjiān ba. Give him a little more time. src
我想多陪陪家人。Wǒ xiǎng duō péipei jiārén. I want to spend more time with my family. src
感冒的时候要多喝水。Gǎnmào de shíhou yào duō hē shuǐ. Drink more water when you have a cold. src
医生让我多运动。Yīshēng ràng wǒ duō yùndòng. The doctor told me to exercise more. src
他比你有经验，你应该多向他学习。Tā bǐ nǐ yǒu jīngyàn, nǐ yīnggāi duō xiàng tā xuéxí. He's more experienced than you. You should learn from him more. src
想提高汉语口语，就要多练习。Xiǎng tígāo Hànyǔ kǒuyǔ, jiùyào duō liànxí. If you want to improve your speaking Chinese, you need to practice more. src
跟姐姐比，妹妹有点害羞。Gēn jiějie bǐ, mèimei yǒudiǎn hàixiū. Compared to the older sister, the younger sister is a bit shy. src
跟上海比，我老家的物价便宜多了。Gēn Shànghǎi bǐ, wǒ lǎojiā de wùjià piányi duō le. Compared to Shanghai, prices in my hometown are a lot cheaper. src
跟纽约比，北京的冬天比较干。Gēn Niǔyuē bǐ, Běijīng de dōngtiān bǐjiào gàn. Compared to New York, Beijing's winters are more dry. src
那个老外的中文跟John比，马马虎虎。Nàge lǎowài de Zhōngwén gēn John bǐ, mǎmahūhū. Compared to John, that foreigner's Chinese is so-so. src
WhatsApp跟微信比，功能没那么多。WhatsApp gēn Wēixìn bǐ, gōngnéng méi nàme duō. Compared to WeChat, WhatsApp is not as functional. src
跟去年比，你的中文进步了很多。Gēn qùnián bǐ, nǐ de Zhōngwén jìnbù le hěn duō. Compared to last year, your Chinese has improved a lot. src
跟几十年前比，农村人的生活好多了。Gēn jǐshí nián qián bǐ, nóngcūn rén de shēnghuó hǎo duō le. Compared to about 10 years ago, the lives of rural people are much better. src
跟上半年比，公司下半年的利润下降了。Gēn shàng bàn nián bǐ, gōngsī xià bàn nián de lìrùn xiàjiàng le. Compared to the first half of the year, the company's profits have declined. src
跟前几周比，这周的天气舒服多了。Gēn qián jǐ zhōu bǐ, zhè zhōu de tiānqì shūfu duō le. Compared to past weeks, this week's weather has been much more comfortable. src
跟年轻的时候比，爸爸的身体没那么好了。Gēn niánqīng de shíhou bǐ, bàba de shēntǐ méi nàme hǎo le. Compared to when he was younger, my Dad's health is not that good. src
我们得走了。Wǒmen děi zǒu le. We have to leave. src
时间不早了，我得回家了。Shíjiān bù zǎo le, wǒ děi huíjiā le. It's getting late. I have to go home. src
他是你弟弟，你得帮他。Tā shì nǐ dìdi, nǐ de bāng tā. He is your younger brother. You must help him. src
不好意思，你得马上离开。Bù hǎoyìsi, nǐ děi mǎshàng líkāi. Sorry, you have to get out of here right now. src
在学校就得听老师的话。Zài xuéxiào jiù děi tīng lǎoshī de huà. You have to listen to the teacher at school. src
你得先付钱再进。Nǐ děi xiān fù qián zài jìn. You need to pay before you come inside. src
是你的错，你得道歉。Shì nǐ de cuò, nǐ děi dàoqiàn. It's your fault. You must apologize. src
他没有经验，你得教教他。Tā méiyǒu jīngyàn, nǐ děi jiāojiao tā. He doesn't have experience. You must teach him. src
明天去面试，你得穿得正式一点。Míngtiān qù miànshì, nǐ děi chuān de zhèngshì yīdiǎn. You must wear something more formal for tomorrow's job interview. src
你病得太厉害了，得去看医生。Nǐ bìng de tài lìhai le, děi qù kàn yīshēng. You are badly ill. You must go see a doctor. src
他不怎么爱说话。Tā bù zěnme ài shuōhuà. He doesn't like talking too much. src
我老公不怎么运动。Wǒ lǎogōng bù zěnme yùndòng. My husband doesn't exercise very often. src
我们在家不怎么看电视。Wǒmen zài jiā bù zěnme kàn diànshì. We don't watch a lot of television at home. src
我儿子不怎么吃零食。Wǒ érzi bùzěnme chī língshí. My son doesn't eat snacks very often. src
老板不怎么来办公室。Lǎobǎn bù zěnme lái bàngōngshì. My boss doesn't come to the office very often. src
我不怎么在网上买东西。Wǒ bù zěnme zài wǎngshàng mǎi dóngxi. I don't do online shopping very often. src
他们不怎么跟朋友出去玩。Tāmen bù zěnme gēn péngyou chūqù wán. They don't go out and have fun with her friends very often. src
我没怎么复习。Wǒ méi zěnme fùxí. I didn't review much. src
我没怎么想过这个问题。Wǒ méi zěnme xiǎng guo zhège wèntí. I didn't really think about this before. src
昨天我肚子不舒服，没怎么吃东西。Zuótiān wǒ dùzi bù shūfu, méi zěnme chī dōngxi. I didn't feel well in the stomach yesterday, so I didn't eat much. src
不用担心。Bùyòng dānxīn. You don't need to worry. src
不用你帮忙。Bùyòng nǐ bāngmáng. You don't need to help. src
今天不用加班。Jīntiān bùyòng jiābān. We don't need to work overtime today. src
这件事不用跟他说。Zhè jiàn shì bùyòng gēn tā shuō. You don't need to tell him about this. src
告诉他明天不用来了。Gàosu tā míngtiān bùyòng lái le. Tell him that he doesn't need to come tomorrow. src
大家不用给我买礼物。Dàjiā bùyòng gěi wǒ mǎi lǐwù. Guys, you don't need to buy me presents. src
今天人少，不用排队。Jīntiān rén shǎo, bùyòng páiduì. There aren't many people today. We don't need to wait in line. src
五岁的孩子不用买票。Wǔ suì de háizi bùyòng mǎi piào. Five-year-olds don't need to buy tickets. src
新员工不用参加这个会议。Xīn yuángōng bùyòng cānjiā zhège huìyì. New employees don't need to attend this meeting. src
我们只去两天，你不用带这么多衣服。Wǒmen zhǐ qù liǎng tiān, nǐ bùyòng dài zhème duō yīfu. We are only going for two days. You don't need to take this much clothing. src
他说"咱们"，当然包括你。Tā shuō"zánmen", dāngrán bāokuò nǐ. He said "us". That certainly includes you. src
我每个月的房租不包括水电费。Wǒ měi gè yuè de fángzū bù bāokuò shuǐ diàn fèi. My monthly rent does not include my water and electric bill. src
公司的福利包括很多方面。Gōngsī de fúlì bāokuò hěn duō fāngmiàn. The company's welfare benefits includes many aspects. src
他对很多话题都很感兴趣，包括政治。Tā duì hěn duō huàtí dōu hěn gǎn xìngqù, bāokuò zhèngzhì. He finds many topics of conversation interesting, including politics. src
简历一般包括个人信息，教育背景，工作经历等。Jiǎnlì yībān bāokuò gèrén xìnxī, jiàoyù bèijǐng, gōngzuò jīnglì děng. A résumé generally includes a person's information, education background, work experience, etcetera. src
包括税，两张机票一共是五千。Bāokuò shuì, liǎng zhāng jīpiào yīgòng shì wǔ qiān. Including taxes, two airplane tickets all together are $5,000. src
包括我在内，一共有十五个人参加这个会议。Bāokuò wǒ zàinèi, yīgòng yǒu shíwǔ gè rén cānjiā zhège huìyì. Including myself, 15 people total participated in this meeting. src
包括奖金在内，这个月我拿了一万块钱工资。Bāokuò jiǎngjīn zàinèi, zhège yuè wǒ ná le yī wàn kuài qián gōngzī. Including bonuses, this month I received a salary of 1,000 RMB. src
包括母语在内，他一共会说四种语言。Bāokuò mǔyǔ zàinèi, tā yīgòng huì shuō sì zhǒng yǔyán. Including my native language, I can speak a total of 4 languages. src
包括每个月的物业费，我们办公室的租金是两万。Bāokuò měi gè yuè de wùyè fèi, wǒmen bàngōngshì de zūjīn shì liǎng wàn. Including monthly property fees, our office's rent is $20,000. src
我吃饭呢。Wǒ chīfàn ne. I'm eating now. src
爷爷看报纸呢，别打扰他。Yéye kàn bàozhǐ ne, bié dǎrǎo tā. Grandpa is reading newspapers now. Don't disturb him. src
他上厕所呢。Tā shàng cèsuǒ ne. He's using the bathroom now. src
我们上着汉语课呢。Wǒmen shàng zhe Hànyǔ kè ne. We're having a Chinese lesson now. src
老板开着会呢，不方便接电话。Lǎobǎn kāi zhe huì ne, bù fāngbiàn jiē diànhuà. The boss is in the middle of a meeting. It's not convenient for him to talk on the phone. src
他好像是英国人。Tā hǎoxiàng shì Yīngguó rén. He seems to be British. src
你好像不是本地人。Nǐ hǎoxiàng bù shì běndì rén. You don't seem to be local. src
她好像有点喜欢你。Tā hǎoxiàng yǒudiǎn xǐhuan nǐ. It seems that she has a crush on you. src
他们好像分手了。Tāmen hǎoxiàng fēnshǒu le. They seem to have broken up. src
你好像生病了。Nǐ hǎoxiàng shēngbìng le. It seems like you're sick. src
好像要下雨了。Hǎoxiàng yào xiàyǔ le. It seems like it's going to rain. src
我们好像见过。Wǒmen hǎoxiàng jiàn guo. It seems that we've met. src
好像没有人能帮他。Hǎoxiàng méiyǒu rén néng bāng tā. It seems that nobody can help him. src
牛奶好像过期了，别喝了。Niúnǎi hǎoxiàng guòqī le, bié hē le. The milk might have expired. Stop drinking it. src
你好像很怕你老婆。Nǐ hǎoxiàng hěn pà nǐ lǎopo. You seem to fear your wife. src
再说一遍。Zài shuō yī biàn. Say it again. src
你能再读一遍吗？Nǐ néng zài dú yī biàn ma? Could you please read it again? src
这个电影我看过两遍。Zhège diànyǐng wǒ kàn guo liǎng biàn. I've seen this movie twice. src
这个故事我听她说过一百多遍了。Zhège gùshi wǒ tīng tā shuō guo yī bǎi duō biàn le. I've heard her tell this story more than one hundred times. src
我们去过两次。Wǒme qù guo liǎng cì. We've been there twice. src
我问了他很多次，可是他不告诉我。Wǒ wèn le tā hěn duō cì, kěshì tā bù gàosu wǒ. I've asked him about it many times, but he wouldn't tell me. src
这个问题我们讨论过几次。Zhège wèntí wǒmen tǎolùn guo jǐ cì. We've discussed this a few times. src
那个红头发的男孩打了我三下。Nàge hóng tóufa de nánhái dǎ le wǒ sān xià. That red-haired boy hit me three times. src
他轻轻地拍了我两下。Tā qīngqīng de pāi le wǒ liǎng xià. He pat me twice very slightly. src
你没听见吗？我敲了好几下。Nǐ méi tīngjiàn ma? Wǒ qiāo le hǎo jǐ xià. Did you not hear the door? I knocked quite a few times. src
我们可以帮你。Wǒmen kěyǐ bāng nǐ. We can help you. src
我们可以帮忙。Wǒmen kěyǐ bāngmáng. We can do (you) this favor. src
你可以帮我一个忙吗？Nǐ kěyǐ bāng wǒ yī gè máng ma? Can you do me a favor? src
我想跟她结婚。Wǒ xiǎng gēn tā jiéhūn. I want to get married to her. src
他很喜欢跟女生聊天。Tā hěn xǐhuan gēn nǚshēng liáotiān. He loves talking with girls. src
爸爸不喜欢聊他的工作。Bàba bù xǐhuan liáo tā de gōngzuò. My father doesn't like to talk about his work. src
我想创业。Wǒ xiǎng chàungyè. I want to start up my own business. src
我想开公司。Wǒ xiǎng kāi gōngsī. I want to lunch my business. src
我们昨天见了面。Wǒmen zuótiān jiàn le miàn. We've met yesterday. src
我们见过面。Wǒmen jiàn guo miàn. We've met. src
我们早上开了会。Wǒmen zǎoshang kāi le huì. We had a meeting this morning. src
你们开过会了吗？Nǐmen kāi guo huì le ma? Have you had the meeting yet? src
我们开着会呢。Wǒmen kāi zhe huì ne. We're having a meeting right now. src
他昨天来我家了，还吃了饭。Tā zuótiān lái wǒ jiā le, hái chī le fàn. He came to my house yesterday and he ate a meal with us. src
他吃过饭了吗？Tā chī guo fàn le ma? Has he eaten yet? src
他吃着饭呢。Tā chī zhe fàn ne. He's eating a meal right now. src
我们见个面吧。Wǒmen jiàn gè miàn ba. Let's meet. src
我们见过几次面。Wǒmen jiàn guo jǐ cì miàn. We've met a few times. src
我们一起吃过几次饭。Wǒmen yīqǐ chī guo jǐ cì fàn. When you're available, let's go out for dinner. src
老板请大家吃了一顿饭。Lǎobǎn qǐng dàjiā chīle yī dùn fàn. The boss invited everyone to dinner. src
晚安！睡个好觉。Wǎn'ān! Shuì gè hǎo jiào. Good night! I hope you can have some good sleep. src
昨晚我只睡了两个小时觉。Zuówǎn wǒ zhǐ shuì le liǎng gè xiǎoshí jiào. I only slept two hours last night. src
我以为他是英国人。Wǒ yǐwéi tā shì Yīngguó rén. I thought he is British. src
你以为只有你知道？Nǐ yǐwéi zhǐ yǒu nǐ zhīdào? You think you are the only one who knows? src
我以为土豆就是红薯。Wǒ yǐwéi tǔdòu jiùshì hóngshǔ. I thought potato is sweet potato. src
很多人都以为我二十几岁。Hěn duō rén dōu yǐwéi wǒ èrshí jǐ suì. Many people thought I'm in my twenties. src
我以为你们分手了。Wǒ yǐwéi nǐmen fēnshǒu le. I thought you guys broke up. src
我们都以为你生气了。Wǒmen dōu yǐwéi nǐ shēngqì le. We all thought you were angry. src
你以为全世界都跟你一样有钱？Nǐ yǐwéi quán shìjiè dōu gēn nǐ yīyàng yǒuqián? You thought . src
我以为你俩分手了。Wǒ yǐwéi nǐ liǎ fēnshǒu le. I thought you two broke up. src
蛋糕看起来很好吃。Dàngāo kànqǐlái hěn hǎochī. This cake looks really tasty. src
你男朋友看起来很成熟。Nǐ nánpéngyou kànqǐlái hěn chéngshú. Your boyfriend seems very mature. src
老板看起来有点不高兴。Lǎobǎn kànqǐlái yǒudiǎn bù gāoxìng. The boss seems a little unhappy. src
你们看起来差不多高。Nǐmen kànqǐlái chàbuduō gāo. You two seem to have the same height. src
你妈妈真年轻！看起来像你姐姐。Nǐ māma zhēn niánqīng! Kànqǐlái xiàng nǐ jiějie. Your mother is so young! She looks like your elder sister. src
我看起来像不像大老板？Wǒ kànqǐlái xiàng bu xiàng dà lǎobǎn. Do I seem like a big boss? src
你们俩看起来像情侣。Nǐmen liǎ kànqǐlái xiàng qínglǚ. You two look like a couple. src
他们看起来不像有钱人。Tāmen kànqǐlái bù xiàng yǒuqián rén. They don't seem like rich people. src
那个喝醉的男人看起来像你老公。Nà gè hēzuì de nánrén kànqǐlái xiàng nǐ lǎogōng. That drunk guy seems like your husband. src
那个问题一点也不难。Nàge wèntí yīdiǎn yě bù nán. That question isn't difficult at all. src
你一点也不胖。Nǐ yīdiǎn yě bù pàng. You're not even a little bit fat. src
这个菜一点都不好吃。Zhège cài yīdiǎn dōu bù hǎochī. This dish isn't tasty at all. src
我同事一点都不幽默。Wǒ tóngshì yīdiǎn dōu bù yōumò. My colleague is not humorous at all. src
这个笑话一点也不好笑。Zhège xiàohuà yīdiǎn yě bù hǎoxiào. This joke isn't funny at all. src
我一点也不喜欢奶酪。Wǒ yīdiǎn yě bù xǐhuan nǎilào. I don't like cheese even a little bit. src
你一点也不会说吗？Nǐ yīdiǎn yě bù huì shuō ma? You can't even speak a little? src
她一点都不知道这件事。Tā yīdiǎn dōu bù zhīdào zhè jiàn shì. She doesn't know even a little about this. src
我男朋友一点都不懂我。Wǒ nánpéngyou yīdiǎn dōu bù dǒng wǒ. My boyfriend doesn't understand me at all. src
她出国以后一点也不想家。Tā chūguó yǐhòu yīdiǎn yě bù xiǎngjiā. She hasn't missed home at all since she wen abroad. src
我一点也没生气。Wǒ yīdiǎn yě méi shēngqì. I didn't get even a little bit angry. src
今天的考试她一点都没准备。Jīntiān de kǎoshì tā yīdiǎn dōu méi zhǔnbèi. She didn't even prepare a little for the exam today. src
这个菜你们怎么一点也没吃？Zhège cài nǐmen zěnme yīdiǎn yě méi chī? Why didn't you eat this dish at all? src
你妈给你的钱你一点都没花？Nǐ mā gěi nǐ de qián nǐ yīdiǎn dōu méi huā? You didn't even spend a bit of the money you mother gave you? src
邻居昨晚吵死了，我一点都没睡。Línjū zuówǎn chǎo sǐ le, wǒ yīdiǎn dōu méi shuì. My neighbor was too loud last night. I didn't even sleep a bit. src
多亏了大家的帮助！Duō kuī le dàjiā de bāngzhù! Thanks to everyone's help! src
我的问题能这么快解决，多亏了他的人脉关系。Wǒ de wèntí néng zhème kuài jiějué, duō kuī le tā de rénmài guānxi. Thanks to his connections, I can solve my problem so soon. src
你没迟到，多亏了她的车。Nǐ méi chídào, duō kuī le tā de chē. Thanks to her car, you were not late to get there. src
这件事情多亏了你的提醒，不然我肯定忘了。Zhè jiàn shìqing duō kuī le nǐ de tíxǐng, bùrán wǒ kěndìng wàng le. Thank you for your reminding me about this matter! Otherwise I would definitely forget. src
多亏你送她去医院了，不然她的情况会很严重。Duō kuī nǐ sòng tā qù yīyuàn le, bùrán tā de qíngkuàng huì hěn yánzhòng. Thanks to you taking her to the hospital, otherwise her condition can be really severe. src
多亏了你的建议，不然我还不知道怎么办.Duō kuī le nǐ de jiànyì, bùrán wǒ hái bù zhīdào zěnme bàn. Thanks to your advice, otherwise I still don't know what to do about it. src
多亏了你的车，我才没迟到.Duō kuī le nǐ de chē, cái wǒ méi chídào. Thanks to your car, I'm not late to get here. src
多亏了你的介绍，我才有机会认识他.Duō kuī le nǐ de jièshào, wǒ cái yǒu jīhuì rènshi tā. Thanks to your introduction, I get the chance to meet him. src
多亏你帮我，我才能这么快做完。Duō kuī nǐ bāng wǒ, wǒ cái néng zhème kuài zuò wán. Thanks for your help, I can finish doing it so soon. src
你为什么不让我去？Nǐ wèishénme bù ràng wǒ qù? Why wouldn't you let me go there? src
这部电影让人很感动。Zhè bù diànyǐng ràng rén hěn gǎndòng. This movie really moves people. src
那个老人让我想到了我爷爷。Nàge lǎorén ràng wǒ xiǎng dào le wǒ yéye. That old man makes me think about my grandpa. src
他不听话，你叫我怎么办？Tā bù tīnghuà, nǐ jiào wǒ zěnmebàn? He wouldn't listen to me. What are you expecting me to do? src
他偷偷约别的女孩，你叫我怎么想？Tā tōutōu yuē bié de nǚhái, nǐ jiào wǒ zěnme xiǎng? He secretly asked other girls out. What are you expecting me to think? src
你儿子在学校的表现叫老师很头疼。Nǐ érzi zài xuéxiào de biǎoxiàn jiào lǎoshī hěn tóuténg. Your son's behaviors at school give the teacher a lot of headache. src
我想请你帮我一个忙。Wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ bāng wǒ yī gè máng. I want to ask you to do me a favor. src
能不能请你明天照顾一下我的狗？Néng bu néng qǐng nǐ míngtiān zhàogu yīxià wǒ de gǒu? Can I ask you to look after my dog tomorrow? src
他的演讲使听众们非常激动。Tā de yǎnjiǎng shǐ tīngzhòng men fēicháng jīdòng. His speech made the audience very excited. src
经济危机使很多公司倒闭了，也使很多人失去了工作。Jīngjì wēijī shǐ hěn duō gōngsī dǎobì le, yě shǐ hěn duō rén shīqù le gōngzuò. The financial crisis caused lot of company out of business, and many people lost their job because of this. src
我每天上班都经过这里。Wǒ měi tiān shàngbān dōu jīngguò zhèlǐ. I pass by this place every day on the way to work. src
我坐火车回老家常常经过这个城市。Wǒ zuò huǒchē huí lǎojiā chángcháng jīngguò zhège chéngshì. I usually pass by this city when I go back to hometown train. src
她经过这个咖啡店的时候就会想到他。Tā jīngguò zhège kāfēidiàn de shíhou jiù huì xiǎngdào tā. She thinks about him when she walks past this cafe. src
经过这几年的发展，这个城市发生了很大变化。Jīngguò zhè jǐ nián de fāzhǎn , zhège chéngshì fāshēng le hěn dà biànhuà. After the last few years of development, this city has changed a lot. src
经过一个星期的调查，警察认为他没有罪。Jīngguò yī gè xīngqī de diàochá, jǐngchá rènwéi tā méiyǒu zuì. After one week of investigation, the police believes that he's innocent. src
谁都不知道事情的经过。Shéi dōu bù zhīdào shìqing de jīngguò. No one knows the actual course of this incident. src
请你说说他们车祸的经过。Qǐng nǐ shuōshuo chēhuò de jīngguò. Please tell us the whole story about f this car accident. src
从我家走到这里需要通过两座桥。Cóng wǒ jiā zǒu dào zhèlǐ xūyào tōngguò liǎng zuò qiáo. To get here from my house, I have to cross two bridges. src
你往前走，通过一个红色的大门，然后左拐就看到了。Nǐ wǎng qián zǒu, tōngguò yī shān hóng sè de dà mén, ránhòu zuǒ guǎi jiù kàn dào le. Go straight ahead, go through a red door, turn left, and you'll see it. src
我通过了这次考试。Wǒ tōngguò le zhè cì kǎoshì. I passed this test. src
纽约大学通过了我的申请。Niǔyuē dàxué tōngguò le wǒ de shēnqǐng. New York University went through my application. src
他没通过那家公司的面试。Tā méi tōngguò nà jiā gōngsī de miànshì. He didn't pass that company's interview. src
我们是通过他的朋友找到他的。Wǒmen shì tōngguò tā de péngyou zhǎodào tā de. We found him via his friends. src
通过这次调查，我们发现很多员工对新政策都不满意。Tōngguò zhè cì diàochá, wǒmen fāxiàn hěn duō yuángōng duì xīn zhèngcè dōu bù mǎnyì. Through this survey, we found many employees are not very satisfied with the new policy. src
通过参加这个活动，大家互相都更了解了。Tōngguò cānjiā zhège huódòng, dàjiā hùxiāng dōu gèng liǎojiě le. Through attending this activity, everyone knows more about each other. src
他有我帅吗？Tā yǒu wǒ shuài ma? Is he as handsome as me? src
泰国有日本好玩吗？Tàiguó yǒu Rìběn hǎowán ma? Is Thailand as fun as Japan? src
你去过的地方有我多吗？Nǐ qù guo de dìfang yǒu wǒ duō ma? Have you been to as many places as I have? src
你的工资有那么高吗？Nǐ de gōngzī yǒu nàme gāo ma? Is your salary that high? src
他有那么厉害吗？Tā yǒu nàme lìhai ma? Is he that difficult to deal with? src
他有一米九。Tā yǒu yī mǐ jiǔ. His height is 1.9 meter. src
你家有多大？Nǐ jiā yǒu duō dà ? How big is your house? src
我家有一百三十平。Wǒ jiā yǒu yī bǎi sānshí píng. My house is 130 square meters. src
这条河有多长？Zhè tiáo hé yǒu duō cháng? How long is this river? src
这条河有五百多公里（长）。Zhè tiáo hé yǒu wǔ bǎi duō gōnglǐ (cháng). This river is five hundred kilometers long. src
他有多高？Tā yǒu duō gāo? How tall is he? src
他有他那么爸爸高。Tā yǒu tā bàba nàme gāo. He is already as tall as his father. src
这个门有多宽？Zhège mén yǒu duō kuān? How wide is the door? src
这个门只有我的肩膀这么宽。Zhè gè mén zhī yǒu wǒ de jiānbǎng zhème kuān. This door is only my shoulder's wide. src
他有多重？Tā yǒu duō zhòng? How much does he weigh? src
这个孩子才十岁，已经有一百五十斤了。Zhège háizi cái shí suì, yǐjīng yǒu yī bǎi wǔshí jīn le. This kid is only ten, but he's already 150 jin. src
不用谢。Bùyòng xiè. You don't need to thank me. src
孩子不用买票。Háizi bùyòng mǎi piào. Kids don't need to buy tickets. src
你不用过去，她会过来的。Nǐ bùyòng guòqù, tā huì guòlái de. You don't need to go over there. She will come here. src
