买吧，不用考虑价钱。Mǎi ba, bùyòng kǎolǜ jiàqian. Buy it. You don't need to worry about its price. src
你们不用都来，我们不需要这么多人。Nǐmen bùyòng dōu lái, wǒmen bù xūyào zhème duō rén. Not all of you need to come. We don't need so many people. src
这家店的东西算便宜的。Zhè jiā diàn de dōngxi suàn piányi de. The things in this shop are fairly cheap. src
我算是幸运的。Wǒ suàn shì xìngyùn de. I'm lucky actually. src
我女儿算听话的。Wǒ nǚér suàn tīnghuà de. My daughter fairly does what it's told. src
在我们公司，我算年轻的。Zài wǒmen gōngsī, wǒ suàn niánqīng de. I'm fairly young in our company. src
今天不算太热。Jīntiān bù suàn tài rè. It can't be considered too hot today. src
这次考试不算难。Zhè cì kǎoshì bù suàn nán. This examination can't considered difficult. src
三十岁结婚不算晚。Sānshí suì jiéhūn bù suàn wǎn. It can't be considered to be late to get married at 30. src
他才一米七五，不算很高。Tā cái yī mǐ qīwǔ, bù suàn hěn gāo. He's only 1.75 meter. He can't be considered to be very tall. src
剪个头发五十块，不算贵。Jiǎn gè tóufa wǔshí kuài, bù suàn guì. Fifty kuai for a haircut. It can't be considered expensive. src
你家谁算老大？Nǐ jiā shéi suàn lǎodà? Who can be considered as the boss in your family? src
深圳算中国最重要的城市之一。Shēnzhèn suàn Zhōngguó zuì zhòngyào de chéngshì zhīyī. Shenzhen can be considered as one of the most important cities in China. src
美国的中国菜算真正的中国菜吗？Měiguó de Zhōngguó cài suàn zhēnzhèng de Zhōngguó cài ma? Can American Chinese food considered as real Chinese food? src
这已经不算秘密了。Zhè yǐjīng bù suàn mìmì le. It's no longer a secret. src
算你狠！Suàn nǐ hěn! Well aren't you! src
你算老几？Nǐ suàn lǎojǐ? Who do you think you are? src
这不算什么。Zhè bù suàn shénme. It's no big deal. src
这得看你的时间。Zhè děi kàn nǐ de shíjiān. This depends on when you are available. src
这得看天气怎么样。Zhè děi kàn tiānqì zěnmeyàng. It depends on how the weather is. src
那得看考试结果。Nà děi kàn kǎoshì jiéguō. That depends on whether the result of the test. src
那要看他愿不愿意。Nà yào kàn tā yuàn bu yuànyì. That depends on whether he feels like it or not. src
那要看老板怎么想。Nà yào kàn lǎobǎn zěnme xiǎng. It depends on what the boss thinks. src
去不去得看我的心情。Qù bu qù de kàn wǒ de xīnqíng. It depends on my mood whether I go or not. src
什么时候去要看公司的安排。Shénme shíhou qù yào kàn gōngsī de ānpái. When to go depends on the company's arrangement. src
学音乐还是学画画要看孩子的兴趣。Xué yīnyuè háishì xué huàhuà yào kàn háizi de xìngqù. It depends on your children's interest for them to study music or painting. src
能不能留在中国要看我能不能拿到签证。Néng bu néng liú zài Zhōngguó yào kàn wǒ néng bu néng nádào Qiānzhèng. Whether I can stay in China or not depends on whether or not I can get the visa. src
谁当总统得看大选的结果。Shéi dāng zǒngtǒng děi kàn dàxuǎn de jiéguǒ. Who will be the president depends on the result of the election. src
你来！Nǐ lái ba. You do it! src
我来吧。Wǒ lái ba. Let me do it. src
让他自己来。Ràng tā zìjǐ lái. Let him do it himself. src
老师，我来读。Lāoshī, wǒ lái dú. Teacher, let me read it. src
我来看看。Wǒ lái kànkan. Let me take a look. src
我来想想。Wǒ lái xiǎngxiang. Let me think about it. src
你来说。Nǐ lái shuō. You say it. src
我来抱抱。Ràng wǒ lái bàobao. Let me hold it. src
你写得好看，你来吧。Nǐ xiě de hǎokàn, nǐ lái ba. You write well. You write it. src
如果你觉得我做饭不好吃，你来做！Rúguǒ nǐ juéde wǒ zuòfàn bù hǎochī, nǐ lái zuò! If you don't think my food is tasty, then you cook! src
她好像生病了。Tā hǎoxiàng shēngbìng le. It seems like she's sick. src
你好像很不喜欢她。Nǐ hǎoxiàng hěn bù xǐhuan tā. It seems that you dislike her a lot. src
王先生好像很怕他老婆。Wáng xiānsheng hǎoxiàng hěn pà tā lǎopo. Mr. Wang seems to fear his wife a lot. src
他一个人坐在那儿，好像在想事情。Tā yī gèrén zuò zài nàr, hǎoxiàng zài xiǎng shìqing. He's sitting there all by himself. It seems like that he's thinking about something. src
好像不行。Hǎoxiàng bù xíng. It seems that it didn't work. src
好像有人敲门。Hǎoxiàng yǒu rén qiāo mén. It seems that someone is knocking at the door. src
好像有人来过。Hǎoxiàng yǒu rén lái guo. It seems that someone was here. src
他送给了我一束花。Tā sòng gěi le wǒ yī shù huā. He gave me a bouquet of flowers. src
这个老板卖给了我一条死鱼。Zhège lǎobǎn mài gěi le wǒ yītiáo sǐ yú. This boss sold me a dead fish. src
我要还给你三十块钱。Wǒ yào huán gěi nǐ sānshí kuài qián. I need to return 30rmb to you. src
房东租给了我一个很便宜的房子。Fángdōng zū gěi le wǒ yīgè hěn piányi de fángzi. The landlord rented a very cheap house to me. src
我借给了他一本书。Wǒ jiè gěi le tā yī běn shū. I lent him a book. src
我要糖，他递给了我一瓶盐。Wǒ yào táng, tā dì gěi le wǒ yī píng yán. I wanted sugar, he handed me a bottle of salt. src
姐姐分给了我一块蛋糕。Jiějie fēn gěi le wǒ yīkuài dàngāo. Older sister gave me a piece of cake. src
老师传授给了学生很多经验。Lǎoshī chuánshòu gěi le xuésheng hěn duō jīngyàn. The teacher passed on a lot of experience to us. src
我们献给了老师一首歌。Wǒmen xiàn gěi le lǎoshī yī shǒu gē. We dedicated a song to the teacher. src
这些校友捐给了学校二十万。Zhèxiē xiàoyǒu juān gěi le xuéxiào èrshí wàn. These alumni donated two hundred thousand to the school. src
主人赏给了小狗一块肉。Zhǔrén shǎng gěi le xiǎo gǒu yīkuài ròu. The owner rewarded his dog with a piece of meat. src
一个孩子交给了我一封信。Yīgè xiǎohái jiāo gěi le wǒ yī fēng xìn. A child gave me a letter. src
他把一束花送给了我。Tā bǎ yī shù huā sòng gěi le wǒ. He gave me a bouquet of flowers. src
这个老板把一条死鱼卖给了我。Zhège lǎobǎn bǎ yītiáo sǐ yú mài gěi le wǒ. This boss sold me a dead fish. src
房东把一个很便宜的房子租给了我。Fángdōng bǎ yī gè hěn piányi de fángzi zū gěi le wǒ. The landlord rented a very cheap house to me. src
我把书借给了他。Wǒ bǎ shū jiè gěi le tā. I lent him a book. src
我要糖，他把一瓶盐递给了我。Wǒ yào táng, tā bǎ yī píng yán dì gěi le wǒ. I wanted sugar, he handed me a bottle of salt. src
姐姐把一块蛋糕分给了我。Jiějie bǎ yīkuài dàngāo fēn gěi le wǒ. Older sister gave me a piece of cake. src
老师把很多经验都传授给了学生。Lǎoshī bǎ hěn duō jīngyàn dōu chuánshòu gěi le xuésheng. The teacher passed on a lot of experience to us. src
我们把一首歌献给了老师。Wǒmen bǎ yī shǒu gē xiàn gěi le lǎoshī. We dedicated a song to the teacher. src
这些校友把二十万捐给了学校。Zhèxiē xiàoyǒu bǎ èrshí wàn juān gěi le xuéxiào. These alumnus donated two hundred thousand to the school. src
主人把一块肉赏给了小狗。Zhǔrén bǎ yīkuài ròu shǎng gěi le xiǎo gǒu. The owner rewarded his dog with a piece of meat. src
一个孩子把一封信交给了我。Yī gè xiǎohái bǎ yī fēng xìn jiāo gěi le wǒ. A child gave me a letter. src
我妈让我少吃辣。Wǒ mā ràng wǒ shǎo chī là. My mother tells me to eat less spicy food. src
你应该少抽烟。Nǐ yīnggāi shǎo chōuyān. You should smoke less. src
少喝点，下午还要上班呢。Shǎo hē diǎn, xiàwǔ háiyào shàngbān ne. Don't drink so much. You're going back to work this afternoon. src
少废话，快说吧。Shǎo fèihuà, kuài shuō ba. Cut the crap. Spill it out. src
肉太贵了，少点一些。Ròu tài guì le, shǎo diǎn yīxiē. Meat is too expensive. Don't order too much. src
你能不能让他少放点盐？Nǐ néng bu néng ràng tā shǎo fàng diǎn yán? Can you tell him to put salt less? src
少看电视，多看书。Shǎo kàn diànshì, duō kànshū. Watch TV less. Read more. src
医生让我少熬夜，多休息。Yīshēng ràng wǒ shǎo áoyè, duō xiūxi. The doctor told me to stay up less and take more rest. src
我们以为你不在家。Wǒmen yǐwéi nǐ bù zài jiā . We thought you weren't at home. src
同事们都以为我二十岁。Tóngshì men dōu yǐwéi wǒ èrshí suì. My colleagues all thought I'm twenty. src
老师以为学生都听懂了。Lǎoshī yǐwéi xuéshēng dōu tīngdǒng le. The teacher thought students all understood. src
大家都以为他是大老板。Dàjiā dōu yǐwéi tā shì dà lǎobǎn. Everybody thought he's the big boss. src
她是你外婆？我以为是你妈妈。Tā shì nǐ wàipó? Wǒ yǐwéi shì nǐ māma. She's your grandma? I thought she's your mother. src
你去吃四川火锅了？我以为你不爱吃辣。Nǐ qù chī Sìchuān huǒguō le? Wǒ yǐwéi nǐ bù ài chī là. You went to eat Sichuan hotpot? I thought you don't like eating spicy food. src
你们分手了？我以为你们还在一起。Nǐmen fēnshǒu le? Wǒ yǐwéi nǐmen hái zài yīqǐ. You guys broke up? I thought you are still together. src
我看到那张照片，以为你有男朋友了。Wǒ kàndào nà zhāng zhàopiàn, yǐwéi nǐ yǒu nánpéngyou le. I saw that picture and I thought you had a boyfriend. src
从我家到那儿要通过两座桥。Cóng wǒ jiā dào nàr yào tōngguò liǎng zuò qiáo. To get here from my house, you have to cross two bridges. src
通过那个红色的大门，左拐就到了。Tōngguò nàge hóng sè de dà mén, zuǒ guǎi jiù dào le. Go through that red door, turn left and you are there. src
我通过了这个考试。Wǒ tōngguò le zhège kǎoshì. I passed this test. src
他没通过昨天的面试。Tā méi tōngguò zuótiān de miànshì. He didn't pass yesterday's job interview. src
那个穿黑衣服的男人没通过机场的安检。Nàge chuān hēi yīfu de nánrén méi tōngguò jīchǎng de ānjiǎn. That man in black didn't pass the security check at the airport. src
通过这个调查，我们发现很多人都支持他。Tōngguò zhège diàochá, wǒmen fāxiàn hěn duō rén dōu zhīchí tā. Through this survey, we found many people support him. src
通过这个短片，我们更了解你们公司了。Tōngguò zhège duǎnpiàn, wǒmen gèng liǎojiě nǐmen gōngsī le. We've got a better understanding of your company through this short film. src
通过他的介绍，我认识了我现在的老板。Tōngguò tā de jièshào, wǒ rènshi le wǒ xiànzài de lǎobǎn. Through his introduction, I met my current boss. src
通过每个月的培训，我们的员工更专业了。Tōngguò měi gè yuè de péixùn, wǒmen de yuángōng gèng zhuānyè le. Our employees are more professional through monthly training. src
多加点辣。Duō jiā diǎn là. Add a little more spice. src
多放点糖。Duō fàng diǎn táng. Put a little more sugar. src
你为什么不多陪陪家人呢？Nǐ wèishénme bù duō péipei jiārén ne? Why wouldn't you spend more time with your family? src
他比你有经验，你应该多跟他学习。Tā bǐ nǐ yǒu jīngyàn, nǐ yīnggāi duō gēn tā xuéxí. He's more experienced than you. You should learn from him more often. src
你病得太严重了，得去看医生。Nǐ bìng de tài yánzhòng le, děi qù kàn yīshēng. You are badly ill. You need to go see a doctor. src
朋友们都在等，我们得走了。Péngyǒumen dōu zài děng, wǒmen děi zǒu le. Our friends are waiting, we need to go. src
这个方法不行，你得换个方法。Zhège fāngfǎ bùxíng, nǐ děi huàn gè fāngfǎ . This way doesn't work. You need to find another way. src
我没带钥匙，你得回来帮我开门。Wǒ méi dài yàoshi, nǐ děi huílái bāng wǒ kāimén. I forgot my keys. You need to come back to help me open the door. src
这算秘密吗？Zhè suàn mìmì ma? Do you consider this as a secret? src
她算不算你女朋友？Tā suàn bu suàn nǐ nǚpéngyou? Can she be considered as your girlfriend or not? src
美国的中国菜算中国菜吗？Měiguó de Zhōngguó cài suàn Zhōngguó cài ma? Can American Chinese food be considered as Chinese food? src
我们认识，但是不算朋友。Wǒmen rènshi, dànshì bù suàn péngyou. We know each other, but we don't consider each other as friends. src
你老板算大方的，我老板更小气。Nǐ lǎobǎn suàn dàfang de, wǒ lǎobǎn gèng xiǎoqì. Your boss is fairly generous. My boss is even more stingy. src
他才一米七五，不算高。Tā cái yī mǐ qī wǔ, bù suàn gāo. He's only 1.75 meter. He can't be considered to be very tall. src
他不怎么说话。Tā bù zěnme xǐhuan shuōhuà. He doesn't like talking too much. src
我老公不怎么做饭。Wǒ lǎogōng bù zěnme zuòfàn. My husband doesn't cook very often. src
我们不怎么看电视。Wǒmen bù zěnme kàn diànshì. We don't watch a lot of television. src
你好像不怎么喝酒。Nǐ hǎoxiàng bù zěnme hējiǔ. It seems that you don't drink very often. src
我同事不怎么去健身。Wǒ tóngshì bù zěnme qù jiànshēn. My colleagues don't go to the gym. src
新室友不怎么跟朋友出去玩。Xīn shìyǒu bù zěnme gēn péngyou chūqù wán. The new roommate doesn't go out and have fun with her friends very often. src
他没怎么说话。Tā méi zěnme shuōhuà. He didn't say much. src
开会的时候，我们没怎么讨论这件事。Kāihuì de shíhou, wǒmen méi zěnme tǎolùn zhè jiàn shì. We didn't discuss this matter much when we were at the meeting. src
今天很热，不过我没怎么出汗。Jīntiān hěn rè, bùguò wǒ méi zěnme chūhàn. It's hot today, but I didn't sweat much. src
A:谁能读一下这段话？A: Shéi néng dú yīxià zhè duàn huà? Who can read this passage? src
B:老师，我来。B: Lāoshī, wǒ lái. Teacher, let me read it. src
A:你怎么做得这么慢？A: Nǐ zěnme zuò de zhème màn? How come you do it so slowly? src
B:你觉得我慢？你来！B: Nǐ juéde wǒ màn? Nǐ lái! You think I'm slow? You do it! src
A:这个箱子真重！A: Zhège xiāngzi zhēn zhòng! This box is so heavy! src
B:我来吧。B: Wǒ lái ba. Let me help. src
她正看着报纸呢。Tā zhèng kàn zhe bàozhǐ ne. All these sentences mean "She is reading the newspaper." src
我正喝着啤酒。Wǒ zhèng hē zhe píjiǔ. All these sentences mean "I am drinking beer." src
他们唱着歌呢。Tāmen chàng zhe gē ne. All these sentences mean "They are singing." src
昨天有人送给我一束花。Zuótiān sòng gěi yī shù huā. Someone gave me a bouquet of flowers. src
她扔给那个乞丐几个硬币。Tā rēng gěi nàge qǐgài jǐ gè yìngbì. She threw a few coins towards the beggar. src
我们公司一共捐给这个学校二十万。Wǒmen gōngsī yīgòng juān gěi zhège xuéxiào èrshí wàn. Our company donated two hundred thousand kuai in total to the school. src
请递给我一盒纸巾。Qǐng dìgěi wǒ yī hé zhǐjīn. Please pass me a box of tissues. src
你怎么寄给我这么多东西？Nǐ zěnme jì gěi wǒ zhème duō dōngxi? Why did you send me so many things? src
你想把这个礼物送给谁？Nǐ xiǎng bǎ zhège lǐwù sòng gěi shéi? Who are you going to give this present to? src
请把那些照片都发给我。Qǐng bǎ nàxiē zhàopiàn dōu fā gěi wǒ. Please send all of those pictures to me. src
我已经把车卖给了一个朋友。Wǒ yǐjīng bǎ chē mài gěi le yī gè péngyou. I've already sold my car to a friend of mine. src
请把盐递给我，谢谢。Qǐng bǎ yán dì gěi wǒ, xièxie. Please pass me the salt. Thanks. src
可以把这本书借给我吗？Kěyǐ bǎ zhè běn shū jiè gěi wǒ ma? Could you please lend me this book? src
你做得不错。Nǐ zuò de bùcuò. You're doing a great job. src
孩子们学得得挺快的。Háizi men xué de de tǐng kuài de. The kids are learning fast. src
我吃得太饱了。Wǒ chī de tài bǎo le. I'm stuffed. src
你们谈得顺利吗？Nǐmen tán de shùnlì ma? Did your conversation go well? src
她长得还可以。Tā zhǎng de hái kěyǐ. She is all right looking. src
你说中文说得很好。Nǐ shuō Zhōngwén shuō de hěn hǎo. You speak Chinese well. (lit. You speak Chinese speak it well.) src
你的中文说得很好。Nǐ de Zhōngwén shuō de hěn hǎo. You speak Chinese well. (lit. You Chinese speak well.) src
你做菜做得很好。Nǐ zuò cài zuò de hěn hǎo. You cook very well. src
你的菜做得很好。Nǐ de cài zuò de hěn hǎo. You cook very well. src
你写字写得很漂亮。Nǐ xiě zì xiě de hěn piàoliang. You handwriting is beautiful. src
你的字写得很漂亮。Nǐ de zì xiě de hěn piàoliang. You handwriting is beautiful. src
味道好极了。Wèidào hǎo jí le. The taste is amazing. src
这里的天气舒服极了。Zhèlǐ de tiānqì shūfu jíle. The weather here is so comfortable. src
他的袜子臭死了。Tā de wàzi chòu sǐ le. His socks totally reek. src
小狗可爱死了。Xiǎogǒu kě'ài sǐ le. Her baby is so adorable! src
老师说今天没有作业，我们都高兴坏了。Lǎoshī shuō jīntiān méiyǒu zuòyè, wǒmen dōu gāoxìng huài le. The teacher said there's no homework for today, which made the students extremely happy. src
找不到孩子，妈妈急坏了。Zhǎo bu dào háizi, māma jí huài le. Having not found the child, the mother was extremely anxious. src
他已经三天没洗澡了。Tā yǐjīng sān tiān méi xǐzǎo le. He has already gone three days without showering. src
我两年没抽烟了。Wǒ liǎng nián méi chōuyān le. It's been two years since I smoked. src
你们多长时间没回家看爸妈了？Nǐmen duō cháng shíjiān méi huíjiā kàn bàmā le? How long has it been since the last time you went back home to visit your parents？ src
我爷爷去了台湾以后已经三十年没回家了。Wǒ yéye qù le Tàiwān yǐhòu, yǐjīng sānshí nián méi huíjiā le. It's been 30 years since my grandpa left home for Taiwan. src
她妈妈去世以后，她都两个多月没出门了。Tā māma qùshì yǐhòu, tā dōu liǎng gè duō yuè méi chūmén le. She hasn't been out for more than two months since her mother passed away . src
我已经好几个小时没吃东西了。Wǒ yǐjīng hǎo jǐ gè xiǎoshí méi chī dōngxi le. I haven't eaten anything in several hours. src
我上次来中国是2000年。Wǒ shàngcì lái Zhōngguó shì liǎngqiān nián. The last time I came to China was the year 2000. (Same meaning as "I haven't been to China since the year 2000.") src
我们都可以帮忙。Wǒmen dōu kěyǐ bāngmáng. All of us can help you with this. src
他不喜欢聊他的工作。Tā bù xǐhuan liáo tā de gōngzuò. He doesn't like to talk about his work. src
他下个月离职。Tā xià gè yuè lízhí. He will leave his job next month. src
A:我在楼上，你上来。 B:你在楼上等我一下。我一会儿就上去。Wǒ zài lóushàng, nǐ shànglái. Nǐ zài lóushàng děng wǒ yīxià. Wǒ yīhuìr jiù shàngqù. I'm on the upper floor. Come up to me.<br />Please wait a moment on the upper floor. I'm coming up in a few minutes. src
A:出来玩吧，我们在酒吧等你。 B:我妈不让我出去。Chūlái wán ba, wǒmen zài jiǔbā děng nǐ. B: Wǒ mā bù ràng wǒ chūqù. Come and hang out with us. We'll be waiting in the bar.<br />B: My mother won't let me go out. src
A:这是我家，进来吧，随便坐。 B:那是你的卧室吗？我能进去吗？Zhè shì wǒ jiā, jìnlái ba, suíbiàn zuò. Nà shì nǐ de wòshì ma? Wǒ néng jìnqù ma? This is my house. Please come inside. Feel free to take a seat.<br />Is that your bedroom? Can I go in? src
A:你下班了吗？几点回来吃饭？ B:我今天不回去吃饭。Nǐ xiàbān le ma? Jǐ diǎn huílái chīfàn? Wǒ jīntiān bù huíqù chīfàn. Are you off work now? When are you coming back for dinner?<br />I'm not going back home for dinner tonight. src
我下午在家，你可以到我家来。Wǒ xiàwǔ zài jiā, nǐ kěyǐ dào wǒ jiā lái. I'm home this afternoon. You can come to my house. src
老板让你马上到他办公室去。Lǎobǎn ràng nǐ mǎshàng dào tā bàngōngshì qù. The boss is asking you to go over to his office right now. src
请站起来。Qǐng zhàn qǐlái. Please stand up. src
不要让它跑出去。Bùyào ràng tā pǎo chūqù. Don't let it run out. src
从我家走过来要半个小时。Cóng wǒ jiā zǒu guòlái yào bàn gè xiǎoshí. It took me half an hour to walk here from my place. src
你包里的东西都拿出来了吗？Nǐ bāo lǐ de dōngxi dōu ná chūlái le ma? Did you take all your stuff out of your bag? src
服务员，请再拿几个碗来。Fúwùyuán, qǐng zài ná jǐ gè wǎn lái. Waiter, please bring a few more bowls. src
快点送孩子去吧，别迟到了。Kuàidiǎn sòng háizi qù ba, bié chídào le. Hurry up, take the child there. Don't be late. src
师傅，送两桶水来。Shīfu, sòng liǎng tǒng shuǐ lái. Shifu, please deliver two buckets of water. src
可以带朋友来吗？Kěyǐ dài péngyou lái ma? Can I bring some friends? src
他们带了一些礼物去。Tāmen dài le yīxiē lǐwù qù. They took some presents there. src
把书拿出来。Bǎ shū ná chūlái. Please take out your book. src
把手举起来。Bǎ shǒu jǔ qǐlái. Raise your hands. src
帮我把这个箱子搬过去。Bāng wǒ bǎ zhège xiāngzi bān guòqù. Please help me to move this suitcase over there. src
请大家站起来。Qǐng dàjiā zhàn qǐlái. Everyone, please stand up. src
捡起来。Jiǎn qǐlái. Pick it up (from the floor). src
头抬起来。Tóu tái qǐlái. Raise your head. src
别动！把手举起来。Bié dòng! Bǎ shǒu jǔ qǐlái. Don't move! Put your hands up. src
小鸟飞起来了。Xiǎoniǎo fēi qǐláile. The birds starts flying. src
宝宝哭起来了。Bǎobao kū qǐlái le. The baby started crying. src
两个大妈吵起来了。Liǎng gè dàmā chǎo qǐlái le. Two middle-aged ladies started arguing. src
天气热起来了。Tiānqì rè qǐlái le. It's getting hot. src
结婚以后，她胖起来了。Jiéhūn yǐhòu, tā pàng qǐlái le. She is getting fat after she gets married. src
爷爷的身体好起来了。Yéye de shēntǐ hǎo qǐlái le. Grandpa's health is getting better. src
我们开始做饭吧。Wǒmen kāishǐ zuòfàn ba. Let's start cooking. src
大家唱起来，跳起来!Dàjiā chàng qǐlái, tiào qǐlái ! Let's sing and dance! src
你的头发闻起来很香。Nǐ de tóufa wén qǐlái hěn xiāng. Your hair smells good. src
这件事情听起来有点复杂。Zhè jiàn shìqing tīng qǐlái yǒudiǎn fùzá. This matter sounds a little bit complex. src
这些菜尝起来都不错。Zhèxiē cài cháng qǐlái dōu bùcuò. These food taste all good. src
你的床摸起来很舒服。Nǐ de chuáng mō qǐlái hěn shūfu. Your bed feels very comfortable. src
如果不好好复习，你就无法通过明天的考试。Rúguǒ bù hǎohǎo fùxí, nǐ jiù wúfǎ tōngguò míngtiān de kǎoshì. If you don't review well, you won't be able to pass tomorrow's test. src
他如果不迷恋网络游戏，就能考上好的大学。Tā rúguǒ bù míliàn wǎngluò yóuxì, jiù néng kǎo shàng hǎo de dàxué. If he hadn't been so addicted to the video games, he would have been admitted to a better university. src
我如果在北京找不到工作，就会回昆明。Wǒ rúguǒ zài Běijīng zhǎo bù dào gōngzuò, jiù huì huí Kūnmíng. If I can't find a job in Beijing, I'm going to go back to Kunming. src
如果你去的话，帮我跟她问好。Rúguǒ nǐ qù de huà, bāng wǒ gēn tā wènhǎo. If you go, tell her I say hello. src
如果下次有时间的话，一定要找我玩儿。Rúguǒ xià cì yǒu shíjiān de huà, yīdìng yào zhǎo wǒ wán er. When you have time, you need to find me so we can hang out. src
如果你不忙的话，可以帮我联系客户吗？Rúguǒ nǐ bù máng de huà, kěyǐ bāng wǒ liánxì kèhù ma? If you're not busy, can you help me connect with customers? src
你去的话，帮我跟她问好。Nǐ qù de huà, bāng wǒ gēn tā wènhǎo. If you go, tell her I say hello. src
下次有时间的话，一定要找我玩儿。Xià cì yǒu shíjiān de huà, yīdìng yào zhǎo wǒ wán er. When you have time, you need to find me so we can hang out. src
你不忙的话，可以帮我联系客户吗？Nǐ bù máng de huà, kěyǐ bāng wǒ liánxì kèhù ma? If you're not busy, can you help me connect with customers? src
你没戴眼镜，看得清楚吗？Nǐ méi dài yǎnjìng, kàn de qīngchu ma? You didn't wear glasses. Can you see things clearly? src
他这么粗心，做得好吗？Tā zhème cūxīn, zuò de hǎo ma? He'a so careless. Can he do it well? src
你这么聪明，肯定学得会。Nǐ zhème cōngming, kěndìng xué de huì. You're so smart. You can definitely learn this. src
早上五点出发，孩子们起得来吗？Zǎoshang wǔdiǎn chūfā, háizi men qǐ de lái ma? We're leaving at five a.m.. Will the kids be able to get up? src
这么高的山，你爬得上去吗？Zhème gāo de shān, nǐ pá de shàngqù ma? The mountain is so high. Can you make it to the top? src
你的声音太小了，我们听不见。Nǐ de shēngyīn tài xiǎo le, wǒmen tīng bu jiàn. Your voice is too soft. We can't hear you. src
这里太暗了，我看不清楚。Zhèlǐ tài àn le, wǒ kàn bu qīngchu. It's too dim here. I can't see clearly. src
这个自行车太破了，谁都修不好。Zhège zìxíngchē tài pò le, shéi dōu xiū bu hǎo . This bike is so broken. Nobody can fix it. src
她的腿受伤了，站不起来了。Tā de tuǐ shòushāng le, zhàn bu qǐlái le. Her leg is injured. She can't stand. src
门太小了，我开不进去。Mén tài xiǎo le, wǒ kāi bu jìnqù. The door is too small. I can't drive inside. src
你听得懂上海话吗？Nǐ tīng de dǒng Shànghǎi-huà ma? Can you understand Shanghai dialect? src
她这么小，看得懂这本书吗？Tā zhème xiǎo, kàn de dǒng zhè běn shū ma? She's so young. Can she really understand this book? src
我怕我做不好这份工作。Wǒ pà wǒ zuò bu hǎo zhè fèn gōngzuò. I'm afraid that I can't do this job well. src
这种手机现在买不到了。Zhè zhǒng shǒujī xiànzài mǎi bu dào le. You can't buyThis type of cell phone now. src
这本书我一个星期肯定看得完。Zhè běn shū wǒ yī gè xīngiqī kěndìng kàn de wán. I can definitely finish reading this book within one week. src
一般来说，我周末不会加班。Yībān lái shuō, wǒ zhōumò bù huì jiābān. Generally speaking, I don't work on weekend. src
一般来说，女生都觉得瘦一点更好看。Yībān lái shuō, nǚshēng dōu juéde shòu yīdiǎn gèng hǎokàn. Generally speaking, girls all think they look better if they're thinner. src
一般来说，18岁以上的美国公民都可以投票。Yībān lái shuō, shíbā suì yǐshàng de Měiguó gōngmín dōu kěyǐ tóupiào. Generally speaking, American citizens who's 18 or over 18 can vote. src
总的来说，我对大家很满意。Zǒng de lái shuō, wǒ duì dàjiā hěn mǎnyì. I'm satisfied with everybody in general. src
总的来说，这次活动很成功。Zǒng de lái shuō, zhè cì huódòng hěn chénggōng. This event was a success in general. src
总的来说，你今年的表现不错。Zǒng de lái shuō, nǐ jīnnián de biǎoxiàn bùcuò. Your performance this year is great in general. src
总的来说，我们的新产品很受年轻人的欢迎。Zǒng de lái shuō, wǒmen de xīn chǎnpǐn hěn shòu niánqīng rén de huānyíng. Our new product is popular with young people in general. src
严格来说，我们的员工不能穿牛仔裤上班。Yángé lái shuō, wǒmen de yuángōng bù néng chuān niúzǎikù shàngbān. Strictly speaking, our employees can't wear jeans to work. src
严格来说，他是华裔，不是中国人。Yángé lái shuō, tā shì huáyì, bù shì Zhōngguó rén. Technically, he is an American born Chinese, not a Chinese. src
少开车有很多好处，具体来说，它可以保护环境，改善交通，也可以让我们多运动。Shǎo kāichē yǒu hěn duō hǎochù, jùtǐ lái shuō, tā kěyǐ bǎohù huánjìng, gǎishàn jiāotōng, yě kěyǐ ràng wǒmen duō yùndòng. We benefit a lot from driving less often. Specifically, it can protect the environment, improve the traffic, and also make us exercise more. src
说下去。Shuō xiàqù. Keep talking. src
这样做很有意义，你应该做下去。Zhèyàng zuò hěn yǒu yìyì, nǐ yīnggāi zuò xiàqù. It's very meaningful to do this. You should keep doing it. src
他走了，因为他没脸待下去了。Tā zǒu le, yīnwèi tā méiliǎn dāi xiàqù le. He left because he didn't have a face to keep staying. src
再玩下去你就死定了。Zài wán xiàqù nǐ jiù sǐ dìng le. You'll be dead if you keep playing. src
你不能这样生活下去了。Nǐ bù néng zhèyàng shēnghuó xiàqù le. You can't keep living like this. src
这个故事太无聊了，我听不下去了。Zhège gùshi tài wúliáo le, wǒ tīng bu xiàqù le. This story is too boring, I don't want to keep listening. src
这个电影太暴力了，我看不下去了。Zhège diànyǐng tài bàolì le, wǒ kàn bu xiàqù le. This scene in the movie is too cruel. I can't keep watching it. src
你说话太恶心了，我吃不下去了。Nǐ shuōhuà tài ěxīn le, wǒ chī bu xiàqù le. The way you talk is so disgusting. I can't continue with my food. src
这个宾馆太脏了，我待不下去了。Zhège bīnguǎn tài zāng le, wǒ dāi bu xiàqù le. This hotel is too dirty. I can't stay here any longer. src
我跟他过不下去了，我要离婚。Wǒ gēn tā guò bu xiàqù le, wǒ yào líhūn. I can't keep living a life with him. I want a divorce. src
她长得不好看。Tā zhǎng de bù hǎokàn. She is unattractive. src
你想得太复杂了。Nǐ zěnme xiǎng de zhème fùzá? You're overthinking it. src
奶奶走得很慢。Nǎinai zǒu de hěn màn. Grandma walks very slowly. src
你中文说得很好。Nǐ Zhōngwén shuō de hěn hǎo. You speak Chinese well. (lit. You Chinese speak well.) src
菜的味道好极了。Cài de wèidào hǎo jí le. This food's flavor is amazing. src
这件衣服漂亮极了。Zhè jiàn yīfu piàoliang jí le. This piece of clothing is sooo pretty. src
老师说今天没有作业，学生们都高兴坏了。Lǎoshī shuō jīntiān méiyǒu zuòyè, xuéshēng men dōu gāoxìng huài le. The teacher said there's no homework for today, which made the students extremely happy. src
发现儿子又跟同学打架，爸爸气坏了。Fāxiàn érzi yòu gēn tóngxué dǎjià, bàba qì huài le. Discovering that his son was fighting with his classmate again incensed father. src
这个学生聪明得很。Zhège xuéshēng cōngming de hěn. This student is super smart. src
我看，你的工作轻松得很。Wǒkàn, nǐ de gōngzuò qīngsōng de hěn. In my opinion, your job is extremely relaxed. src
他固执得不得了。Tā gùzhí de bùdéliǎo. He is awfully stubborn. src
赢了比赛以后，他骄傲得不得了。Yíng le bǐsài yǐhòu, tā jiāo'ào de bùdéliǎo. He was terribly proud after he won the competition. src
我儿子淘气得要命。Wǒ érzi táoqì de yàomìng. My son is incredibly naughty. src
地铁挤得要命！Dìtiě jǐ de yàomìng! The metro is intenselt crowded! src
我的牙痛得不行！Wǒ de yá tòng de bù xíng! My teeth hurt so terribly! src
今天热得不行。Jīntiān rè de bù xíng. It's awfully hot today. src
我在楼上，请你十分钟以后上来。Wǒ zài lóushàng, qǐng nǐ shí fēnzhōng yǐhòu shànglái. I'm on the upper floor. Please come up in ten minutes. src
你在楼上等我一下。我一会儿就上去找你。Nǐ zài lóushàng děng wǒ yīxià. Wǒ yīhuǐ'er jiù shàngqù zhǎo nǐ. Please wait a moment on the upper floor. I'm coming up to you in a few seconds. src
在树上玩很危险，你快下来!Zài shù shàng wán hěn wéixiǎn, nǐ kuài xiàlái! It's too dangerous to play in the tree! Come down! src
楼下有咖啡厅，我们下去聊吧。Lóuxià yǒu kāfēitīng, wǒmen xiàqù liáo bā. There is a cafe downstairs. Let's go downstair and talk. src
出来玩吧，我们在KTV等你。Chūlái wán bā, wǒmen zài KTV děng nǐ. Come over and hang out with us. We'll be waiting in the KTV. src
外面太热了，不要出去。Wàimiàn tài rè le, bù yào chūqù. It's too hot outside. Don't go outside. src
我们在里面开会，大家都进来吧。Wǒmen zài lǐmiàn kāihuì, dàjiā dōu jìnlái ba. We are going to have a meeting inside. Please come in here. src
他在办公室里等你，你快进去吧。Tā zài bàngōngshì lǐ děng nǐ, nǐ kuài jìnqù ba. He is waiting for you in his office. You can go in now. src
你什么时候回来？Nǐ shénme shíhou huílái? When are you coming back? src
他明天一个人回去。Tā míngtiān yīgèrén huíqù. He is going back alone tomorrow. src
你过来让我看一下。Nǐ guòlái ràng wǒ kàn yīxià. Come here and let me take a look. src
那儿很危险，不要过去。Nàr hěn wēixián, bùdào guòqù. It's dangerous there. Don't go over there. src
我妹妹到上海来了。Wǒ mèimei dào Shànghǎi lái le. My sister arrived in Shanghai. src
你想到我家来吗？Nǐ xiǎng dào wǒ jiā lái ma? Do you want to come to my house? src
我就在会议室等他，你让他马上到会议室来。Wǒ jiù zài huìyìshì děng tā, nǐ ràng tā mǎshàng dào huìyìshì lái. I'm waiting for him in the meeting room. Tell him to come here right now. src
你坐下来吧。Nǐ zuò xiàlái ba. Please sit down. src
他们还没走出来。Tāmen hái méi zǒu chūlái. They haven't walked out yet. src
你可以站起来吗？Nǐ kěyǐ zhàn qǐlái ma? Could you please stand up? src
我们想自己走下去。Wǒmen xiǎng zìjǐ zǒu xiàqù. We'd like to walk down from here by ourselves. src
可以带一些朋友来吗？Kěyǐ dài le yīxiē péngyou lái ma? Can I bring some friends? src
你快点送孩子去吧，别迟到了。Nǐ kuàidiǎn sòng háizi qù ba, bié chídào le. Hurry up, take the child there. Don't be late. src
师傅，再送两桶水来。Shīfu, zài sòng liǎng tǒng shuǐ lái. Shifu, please deliver two more buckets of water. src
他们从老家带了一些特产回来。Tāmen cóng lǎojiā dài le yīxiē tèchǎn huílái. They brought some local goods back from hometown. src
这儿的冬天太冷了，我需要你带一些厚衣服过来。Zhèr de dōngtiān tài lěng le, wǒ xūyào nǐ dài yīxiē hòu yīfu guòlái. It's too cold here in winter. I need you to bring me some thick clothes. src
你要不要拿一点吃的过去？Nǐ yào bù yào ná yīdiǎn chīde guòqù? Would you like to take some food there? src
你们可以帮我拿一些书进去吗？Nǐmen kěyǐ bāng wǒ ná yīxiē shū jìnqù ma? Could you please help me take some books inside? src
把外套脱下来吧。Bǎ wàitào tuō xiàlái ba. Take off your coat. src
你把他们的礼物带过去了吗？Nǐ bǎ tāmen de lǐwù dài guòqù le ma? Did you take their presents there? src
快递还没把我的东西送来。Kuàidì háiméi bǎ wǒ de dōngxi sòng lái. The delivery man hasn't delivered my things yet. src
你吃好了吗？Nǐ chī hǎo le ma? Are you done eating? src
对不起，我记错了时间。Duìbuqǐ, wǒ jì cuò le shíjiān. Sorry, I remember the time wrong. src
你来晚了，我们已经关门了。Nǐ lái wǎn le, wǒmen yǐjīng guānmén 了 le. You came too late. We're closed already. src
他玩坏了哥哥的玩具。Tā wán huài le gēge de wánjù. He broke his older brother's toy. src
我没吃饱。Wǒ méi chī bǎo. I didn't eat enough. src
他还没想好。Tā hái méi xiǎng hǎo. He hasn't thought it through yet. src
我们没听清楚，请再说一遍。Wǒmen méi tīng qīngchu, qǐng zài shuō yī biàn. We didn't hear it clearly. Please say it again. src
这个字写错了。Zhège zì xiě cuò le. You wrote this character wrong. src
杯子摔坏了。Bēizi shuāi huài le. The cup is broken. src
房间打扫干净了吗？Fángjiān dǎsǎo gānjìng le ma? Is your room all cleaned up? src
你们都听懂了吗？Nǐmen dōu tīngdǒng ma? Do you understand all of it? src
我看了，但是没看懂。Wǒ kàn le, dànshì méi kàndǒng. I read it, but I didn't really understand it. src
你踩到了我的脚。Nǐ cǎidào le wǒ de jiǎo. You're stepping on my foot. src
我不小心撞到了墙。Wǒ bù xiǎoxīn zhuàngdào le qiáng. I hit the wall by accident. src
我女儿学会了数数。Wǒ nǚ'ér xuéhuì le shǔ shù. My daughter has learned how to count numbers. src
我爸爸还没学会用智能手机。Wǒ bàba hái méi xuéhuì yòng zhìnéng shǒujī. My father hasn't learnt how to use a smart phone yet. src
老师拿走了我的iPad。Lǎoshī názǒu le wǒ de iPad. The teacher took away my iPad. src
小偷偷走了我的钱包。Xiǎotōu tōuzǒu le wǒ de qiánbāo. The thief stole my wallet. src
他不小心推倒了一个老人。Tā bù xiǎoxīn tuīdǎo le yī gè lǎorén. He pushed over an old people by accident. src
你撞倒了我的自行车。Nǐ zhuàngdǎo le wǒ de zìxíngchē. You knocked over my bike. src
谁扔掉了我的袜子？Shéi rēngdiào le wǒ de wàzi? Who threw away my socks? src
我卖掉了我的旧手机。Wǒ màidiào le wǒ de jiù shǒujī. I sold my old cell phone. src
他一个人吃得完这么多饭吗？Tā yīgèrén chī de wán zhème duō fàn ma? Can he eat all the food by himself? src
我找不到我的手机了。Wǒ zhǎo bu dào wǒ de shǒujī le. I can't find my cellphone. src
在上海买得到这个牌子的手表吗？Zài Shànghǎi mǎi de dào zhè gè páizi de shǒubiǎo ma? Can you buy this brand of watch in Shanghai? src
大家都看不懂这句话。Dàjiā dōu kàn bu dǒng zhè jù huà. Nobody can understand this sentence. src
我没戴眼镜，看不清楚。Wǒ méi dài yǎnjìng, kàn bu qīngchu. When I don't wear glasses, I can't see clearly. src
这件衬衫太脏了，我洗不干净。Zhè jiàn chènshān tài zāng le, wǒ xǐ bu gānjìng. This shirt is too dirty, I can't clean it. src
门太小了，我的车进不去。Mén tài xiǎo le, wǒ de chē jìn bu qù. The door is too small. My car can't go through it. src
你买了她所有的书？Nǐ mǎi le tā suǒyǒu de shū? You've bought all her books? src
我喜欢所有我妈妈做的菜。Wǒ xǐhuan suǒyǒu wǒ māma zuò de cài. I like all the food my mom cooks. src
他记得所有朋友的生日。Tā jìde suǒyǒu péngyou de shēngrì. He remembers all his friends' birthdays. src
我的孩子看过所有迪斯尼动画片。Wǒ de háizi kàn guo suǒyǒu Dísīní dònghuàpiàn. My children have seen all Disney animated films. src
所有人都走了吗？Suǒyǒu rén dōu zǒu le ma? Did all the people leave? src
所有的学校都放假了。Suǒyǒu de xuéxiào dōu fàngjià le. All the schools are out for the holiday. src
我们学校所有的老师都会说英文。Wǒmen xuéxiào suǒyǒu de lǎoshī dōu huì shuō Yīngwén. All the teachers in our school can speak English. src
我们公司所有人都参加了这个会议。Wǒmen gōngsī suǒyǒu rén dōu cānjiā le zhège huìyì. All people in our company attended this meeting. src
不是所有的美国人都爱喝咖啡。Bù shì suǒyǒu de Měiguó rén dōu ài hē kāfēi. Not all Americans like drinking coffee. src
不是所有问题都能用钱来解决。Bù shì suǒyǒu wèntí dōu néng yòng qián lái jiějué. We can't solve all problems with money. src
不是所有朋友都愿意帮他。Bù shì suǒyǒu péngyou dōu yuànyì bāng tā. Not all of his friends are willing to help him. src
不是所有的公司都给员工提供培训。Bù shì suǒyǒu de gōngsī dōu gěi yuángōng tígōng péixùn. Not all companies provide their employees with training. src
快把地上的书捡起来。Kuài bǎ dìshàng de shū jiǎn qǐlái. Quickly pick up the books on the floor. src
你怎么不把老人扶起来？Nǐ zěnme bù bǎ lǎorén fú qǐlái? Why didn't you keep the old man upright? src
大家笑起来了。Dàjiā xiào qǐlái le. Everyone started laughing. src
他的病好起来了。Tā de bìng hǎo qǐlái le. His illness is starting to get better. src
你点的菜尝起来不错。Nǐ diǎn de cài cháng qǐlái bùcuò. The dishes that you ordered taste good . src
这件衣服摸起来很舒服。Zhè jiàn yīfu mō qǐlái hěn shūfu. These clothes feel very comfortable. src
她是我最好的朋友之一。Tā shì wǒ zuì hǎo de péngyou zhī yī. She is one of my best friends. src
Frozen是我最喜欢的迪斯尼电影之一。Frozen shì wǒ zuì xǐhuan de Dísīní diànyǐng zhī yī. Frozen is one of my favorite Disney movies. src
纽约是世界上最国际化的城市之一。Niǔyuē shì shìjiè shàng zuì guójìhuà de chéngshì zhī yī. New York is the one of the most international cities in the world. src
他是这个公司的创始人之一。Tā shì zhège gōngsī de chuàngshǐ rén zhī yī. He is one of the founders of this company. src
成龙是最有名的动作明星之一。Chéng Lóng shì zuì yǒumíng de dòngzuò míngxīng zhī yī. Jackie Cheng is one of the most famous action movie stars. src
中秋节是中国重要的传统节日之一。Zhōngqiūjié shì Zhōngguó zhòngyào de chuántǒng jiérì zhī yī. Mid-autumn Day is one of the important traditional festivals in China. src
全球化是21世纪最大的特点之一。Quánqiúhuà shì èrshí-yī shìjì zuì dà de tèdiǎn zhī yī. Globalization is one of the major features of the 21st century. src
我们的服务主要特点之一是个性化。Wǒmen de fúwù zhǔyào tèdiǎn zhī yī shì gèxìnghuà . Personalization is one of the major characteristics of our service. src
我想离开北京的原因之一是空气污染。Wǒ xiǎng líkāi Běijīng de yuányīn zhī yī shì kōngqì wūrǎn. One of the reasons why I want to leave Beijing is its air pollution. src
他辞职的原因之一是老板经常让他们加班。Tā cízhí de yuányīn zhī yī shì lǎobǎn jīngcháng ràng tāmen jiābān. One of the reasons why he quit his job is that the boss often asks them to work late. src
这个菜很难吃,我吃不下去。Zhège cài hěn nán chī, wǒ chī bù xiàqù. This food is disgusting, I can't keep eating it. src
这个电影画面太残忍了，我看不下去了！Zhège diànyǐng huàmiàn tài cánrěn le, wǒ kàn bù xiàqù le! This scene in the movie is too cruel, I can't keep watching it. src
我有两个手机，一个是小米，另一个是iPhone。Wǒ yǒu liǎng gè shǒujī, yī gè shì Xiǎomǐ, lìng yī gè shì iPhone. I have two cell phones. One is Xiao Mi, and the other is iPhone. src
她有两套房子，一套自己住，另一套租给别人了。Tā yǒu liǎng tào fángzi, yī tào zìjǐ zhù, lìng yī tào zū gěi biérén le. She has two houses. She lives in one and rents the other one to other people. src
这个蛋糕一半是你的，另一半是妹妹的。Zhège dàngāo yībàn shì nǐ de, lìng yībàn shì mèimei de. Half of this cake is yours. The other half is your little sister's. src
她打算在北京待五天。三天出去玩，另外两天去看朋友。Tā dǎsuàn zài Běijīng dāi wǔ tiān. Sān tiān chūqù wán, lìngwài liǎngtiān qù kàn péngyou. She plans to stay in Beijing for three days. Three days for going out and having fun. The other two days for visiting friends. src
我们公司和另外两家公司共用一个办公室。Wǒmen gōngsī hé lìngwài liǎng jiā gōngsī gòngyòng yī gè bàngōngshì. Our company shares the office with the other two companies. src
他的两个女儿一个嫁给了美国人，另一个嫁给了德国人。Tā de liǎng gè nǚ'ér yī gè jià gěi le Měiguó rén, lìng yī gè jià gěi le Déguó rén. He has two daughters, one of which married a American guy and the other married a German guy. src
一些人总是对另外一些人有偏见。Yīxiē rén zǒngshì duì lìngwài yīxiē rén yǒu piānjiàn. Some people always have prejudices against the other people. src
我的手机电量只有百分之五了。Wǒ de shǒujī diànliàng zhǐ yǒu bǎi fēn zhī wǔ le. My phone battery only has 30% left. src
这个文件已经下载了三分之二。Zhège wénjiàn yǐjīng xiàzǎi le sān fēn zhī èr. Two thirds of this document has been downloaded. src
这篇文章有五分之三是抄别人的。Zhè piān wénzhāng yǒu wǔ fēn zhī sān shì chāo biérén de. Three fifths of this article is a copy from other people. src
差不多三分之一的美国人有护照。Chàbuduō sān fēn zhī yī de Měiguó rén yǒu hùzhào. Almost one thirds of the population of America has passport. src
我们公司的外国员工占三分之一。Wǒmen gōngsī de wàiguó yuángōng zhàn sān fēn zhī yī. One third of our company are foreigners. src
美国人口是中国的五分之一。Měiguó rénkǒu shì Zhōngguó de wǔ fēn zhī yī. American population is one fifth of China's. src
押金是房租的百分之二十。Yājīnyào shì fángzū de bǎifēn zhī èrshí. The deposit is 20% of the rent. src
期末考试成绩占总成绩的百分之三十。Qīmò kǎoshì chéngjì zhàn zǒng chéngjì de bǎi fēn zhī sānshí. The grade of the final exam is 30% of total score. src
在美国，全职妈妈差不多占五分之二。Zài Měiguó, quánzhí māma chàbuduō zhàn wǔ fēn zhī èr. In the US, two fifths of the mothers are full-time mother. src
我们吃好了。Wǒmen chī hǎo le. We finished eating. src
作业做好了吗？Zuòyè zuò hǎo le ma ? Did you finish doing your homework? src
我没记错。Wǒ méi jì cuò. I didn't remember incorrectly. src
你们来晚了。Nǐmen lái wǎn le. You came late. src
你没吃饱吗？Nǐ méi chī bǎo ma? Are you not full? src
弟弟玩坏了哥哥的玩具。Dìdi wán huài le gēge de wánjù. The little brother broke his older brother's toy. src
宝宝的头是怎么撞破的？Bǎobǎo de tóu shì zěnme zhuàng pò de? How did the baby hit his head? src
杯子是谁摔坏的？Bēizi shì shéi shuāi huài de? Who broke the cup? src
大家都听清楚了吗？Dàjiā dōu tīng qīngchu le ma? Does everyone hear this clearly? src
衣服没洗干净。Yīfu méi gānjìng. The clothes aren't clean. src
不要了，扔掉吧。Bù yào le, rēng diào bā. I don't want it any more. Throw it away. src
太热了，外套脱掉吧。Tài rè le, wàitào tuō diào bā. It‘s too hot. Let's take off our jackets. src
我刚刚卖掉了我的旧手机。Wǒ gānggāng mài diào le wǒ de jiù shǒujī. I just sold my old cell phone. src
我妈妈已经五十多岁了。Wǒ māma yǐjīng wǔshí duō suì le. My mother is over fifty. src
我们走了两个多小时。Wǒmen zǒu le liǎng gè duō xiǎoshí. It took us more than two hours to walk here. src
这个班有两百多个学生。Zhège bān yǒu liǎng bǎi duō gè xuéshēng. There are more than two hundred students in this class. src
这个包三万多块钱。Zhège bāo sān wàn duō kuài qián. This bag costs more than thirty thousand kuai. src
这本书有一千多页。Zhè běn shū yǒu yī qiān duō yè. This book has more than ten thousand pages. src
他在国外住了二十多年了。Tā zài guówài zhù le èrshí duō nián le. He has been living abroad for more than twenty years. src
他在那儿住了二十多天了。Tā zài nàr zhù le èrshí duō tiān le. He's been staying there for over 20 days. src
我昨天收到了三十多条垃圾短信。Wǒ zuótiān shōudào le sānshí duō tiáo lājī duǎnxìn. I received more than thirty spam messages yesterday. src
这个城市有两千多年的历史。Zhège chéngshì yǒu liǎng qiān duō nián de lìshǐ. China has a history of more than two thousand years. src
我还没有做。Wǒ hái méiyǒu zuò. I haven‘t done it. src
我下个星期可以做。Wǒ xià gè xīngqī kěyǐ zuò. I can do it next week. src
我相信你一定能做到。Wǒ xiāngxìn nǐ yīdìng néng zuòdào. I believe you will be able to do it. src
我还没有买。Wǒ hái méiyǒu mǎi. I haven't bought it yet. src
我没买到。Wǒ méi mǎidào. I didn't buy it. src
这里很难买到进口食品。Zhèlǐ hěn nán mǎidào jìnkǒu shípǐn. It's hard to buy imported good here. src
我想学中文。Wǒ xiǎng xué Zhōngwén. I want to learn Chinese. src
我们今天学了"恭喜发财"。Wǒmen jīntiān xué le "gōngxǐ fācái". Today we learned "kung hei fat choy." src
在这个公司工作，我学到了很多东西。Zài zhège gōngsī gōngzuò, wǒ xuédào le hěn duō dōngxi. Working for this company, I learned a lot of things. src
你拿小包，我拿大包。Nǐ ná xiǎo bāo, wǒ ná dà bāo. You take the small bag, I'll take the big bag. src
今天去拿婚纱，不知道能不能拿到。Jīntiān qù ná hūnshā, bù zhīdào néng bu néng nádào. Today I'm going to pick up the wedding dress, not sure if I'll be able to get it or not. src
他偷偷进了她的房间，拿到了他想要的东西。Tā tōutōu jìn le tā de fángjiān, nádào le tā xiǎngyào de dōngxi. He secretly entered her room and got the thing he wanted to take. src
一定要想一个办法。Yīdìng yào xiǎng yī gè bànfǎ. You have to think of a method. src
你想到了什么好办法？Nǐ xiǎngdào le shénme hǎo bànfǎ? Have you thought of any good methods yet? src
我们都没想到他会这么说。Wǒmen dōu méi xiǎngdào tā huì zhème shuō. None of us thought that he would say it like that. src
我在看一些老照片。Wǒ zài kàn yīxiē lǎo zhàopiàn. I'm looking at some old photos. src
看到这张照片，我想到了我的女儿。Kàndào zhè zhāng zhàopiàn, wǒ xiǎngdào le wǒ de nǚ'ér. After seeing this photo, I thought of my daughter. src
我看到他了，在那里！Wǒ kàndào tā le, zài nàlǐ! I see him, over there! src
怎么追女孩子？Zěnme zhuī nǚ háizi? How do you chase girls? src
那个女孩子，你追到了吗？Nàge nǚháizi, nǐ zhuīdào le ma? That girl, did you catch her yet? src
如果你追到她了，我就请你喝酒。Rúguǒ nǐ zhuīdào tā le, wǒ jiù qǐng nǐ hējiǔ. If you can really catch her, I'll treat you to a drink. src
我不太了解这个人。Wǒ bù tài liǎojiě zhège rén. I don't really understand this person. src
我们刚刚了解到一些新的信息。Wǒmen gānggāng liǎojiědào yīxiē xīn de xìnxī. We just understood the new information. src
从他那里，我了解到了这个女人很多事。Cóng tā nàlǐ, wǒ liǎojiědào le zhège nǚrén hěn duō shì. From him, I understood a lot of things regarding this girl. src
我们怎么联系？Wǒmen zěnme liánxì? How do we get in contact? src
我一直想跟你联系，但是一直没联系到你。Wǒ yīzhí xiǎng gēn nǐ liánxì, dànshì yīzhí méi liánxìdào nǐ. I always wanted get in contact with you, but I never could get a hold of you. src
你知道怎么能联系到他吗？Nǐ zhīdào zěnme néng liánxìdào tā ma? Do you know how to get in contact with him? src
桌子上放着一本书。Zhuōzi shàng fàng zhe yī běn shū . There is a book on the desk. src
大厅里站着一些警察。Dàtīng lǐ zhàn zhe yīxiē jǐngchá. There are several policemen standing in the hall. src
教室里坐着两百多个学生。Jiàoshì lǐ zuò zhe liǎng bǎi duō gè xuéshēng. There are more than two hundred students sitting in the classroom. src
地下室里堆着很多旧东西。Dìxiàshì lǐ duī zhe hěn duō jiù dōngxi. The basement is piled with lots of old stuff. src
楼下停着几辆车。Lóuxià tíng zhe jǐ liàng chē. A few cars are parked downstairs. src
洗衣机里是一些脏衣服。Xǐyījī lǐ shì yīxiē zāng yīfu. There are dirty clothes inside the washing machine. src
袋子里是我的午饭。Dàizi lǐ shì wǒ de wǔfàn. My lunch is in the bag. src
墙上都是他家人的照片。Qiáng shàng dōu shì tā jiārén de zhàopiàn. His family's photos are hanging on the wall. src
盒子里是你的礼物。Hézi lǐ shì nǐ de lǐwù. The gifts that I bought for my friends are inside my suitcase. src
桌子上是昨天没吃完的菜。Zhuōzi shàng shì zuótiān méi chī wán de cài. The food that was left over from yesterday are on the desk. src
她是我的好朋友之一。Tā shì wǒ de hǎo péngyou zhī yī. She is one of my best friends. src
我觉得百事可乐是最好喝的饮料之一。Wǒ juéde Bǎishì kělè shì zuì hǎohē de yǐnliào zhī yī. I think Pepsi is one of the best tasting drinks. src
中国的空气污染是的老外经常抱怨的问题之一。Zhōngguó kōngqì wūrǎn shì lǎowài jīngcháng bàoyuàn de wèntí zhī yī. in China, air pollution is one of the problems foreigners complain a lot about. src
中秋节是中国最重要的传统节日之一。Zhōngqiūjié shì Zhōngguó zuì zhòngyào de chuántǒng jiérì zhī yī. Mid-autumn Day is one of the most important traditional festivals in China. src
个性化是我们服务的主要特点之一。Gèxìnghuà shì wǒmen fúwù de zhǔyào tèdiǎn zhī yī. Personalization is one of the major characteristics of our service. src
我选择这家公司的原因之一是我喜欢这里的工作环境。Wǒ xuǎnzé zhè jiā gōngsī de yuányīn zhī yī shì wǒ xǐhuan zhèlǐ de gōngzuò huánjìng. The reason why I choose this company is that I like the working environment here. src
他妈妈已经五十多岁了。Tā māma yǐjīng wǔshí duō suì le. His mother is already more than fifty years old. src
这个包花了我三万多块钱。Zhège bāo huā le wǒ sān qiān duō kuài qián. This bag cost me more than thirty thousand kuai. src
中国有五千多年的历史。Zhōngguó yǒu wǔ qiān duō nián de lìshǐ. China has more than five thousand years of history. src
工作忙是忙，但是我很开心。Gōngzuò máng shì máng, dànshì wǒ hěn kāixīn. I am busy at work, but I'm very happy with my job. src
这件衣服好看是好看，但是不适合我。Zhè jiàn yīfu hǎokàn shì hǎokàn, dànshì bù shìhé wǒ. This piece of clothing looks good, but it doesn't look good on me. src
这里的环境好是好，但是交通不太方便。Zhèlǐ de huánjìng hǎo shì hǎo, dànshì jiāotōng bù tài fāngbiàn. This environment is great, but the transportation is not very convenient. src
累是累，但是很值得。Lèi shì lèi, dànshì hěn zhídé. It's tiring, but it's all worth it. src
难是难，但是我相信我能做到。Nán shì nán, dànshì wǒ xiāngxìn wǒ néng zuòdào. It is difficult, but I believe that I can do it. src
好吃是好吃，就是不太健康。Hǎochī shì hǎochī, jiùshì bù tài jiànkāng. It is tasty, but it's not very healthy. src
这个东西好是好，就是太贵了。Zhège dōngxi hǎo shì hǎo, jiùshì tài guì le. This thing is good, but it's too expensive. src
这个学生聪明是聪明，就是不太努力。Zhège xuéshēng cōngming shì cōngming, jiùshì bù tài nǔlì. This student may be smart, but he's not very hardworking. src
他女朋友漂亮是漂亮，就是有点矮。Tā nǚpéngyou piàoliang shì piàoliang, jiùshì yǒudiǎn ǎi. His girlfriend is pretty, but she is a little short. src
这个老师教得好是好，就是太严格。Zhège lǎoshī jiāo de hǎo shì hǎo, jiùshì tài yángé. This teacher teaches very well; It's just she's too strict. src
去过两次qù guo liǎng cì have been there twice. src
说了很多次shuō le hěn duō cì have said it many times. src
读两遍dú liǎng biàn Read it twice. src
已经听了十几遍yǐjīng tīng le shí jǐ biàn have already listened to it more than ten times. src
打了三下dǎ le sān xià Hit three times. src
饿死了，我一下课就要去吃午饭。È sǐ le, wǒ yī xiàkè jiù yào qù chī wǔfàn. I'm starved. I will go to lunch as soon as the class is over. src
你能不能一下班就去接孩子？Nǐ néng bu néng yī xiàbān jiù qù jiē háizi? Can you go to pick up the kid as soon as you get off work? src
妈妈一到家就去做饭了。Māma yī dào jiā jiù qù zuòfàn le. As soon as mother arrived home, she went to cook dinner. src
老师一来大家就不说话了。Lǎoshī yī lái dàjiā jiù bù shuōhuà le. As soon as the teacher came , everyone stopped talking. src
我一进门，小狗就跑了过来。Wǒ yī jìn mén, xiǎogǒu jiù pǎo le guòlái. As soon as I walked into the door, the puppy ran over to me. src
我一想到这件事就不高兴。Wǒ yī xiǎngdào zhè jiàn shì jiù bù gāoxìng. Every time I think about this, I get upset. src
她一生气就脸红。Tā yī shēngqì jiù liǎn hóng. Every time she gets angry, her face turns red. src
你怎么一吃火锅就拉肚子？Nǐ zěnme yī chī huǒguō jiù lādùzi? How come you have a diarrhea every time you eat hotpot? src
他一上英语课就想睡觉。Tā yī shàng Yīngyǔ kè jiù xiǎng shuìjiào. Every time he takes English class, he feels like falling asleep. src
一说到物理，我就头疼。Yī shuōdào wùlì, wǒ jiù tóuténg. Every time we talk about physics, it gives me headache. src
你俩谁大？Nǐ liǎ shéi dà ? Who is elder between you two? src
你们五个人里谁最小？Nǐmen wǔ gè rén lǐ shéi zuì xiǎo? Who is the youngest among the five of you? src
他女朋友和他女儿一样大。Tā nǚpéngyou hé tā nǚ'ér yīyàng dà. His girlfriend is about the same age with his daughter. src
我爸爸和妈妈差不多大。Wǒ bàba hé māma chàbuduō dà. My dad is about the same age with my mom. src
小朋友，你几岁了？Xiǎopéngyou, nǐ jǐ suì le? Kid, how old are you? src
大妈，您多大年纪了？Dàmā, nín duō dà niánjì le? Old lady, how old are you? src
爷爷，您多大岁数了？Yéye, nín duō dà suìshu le? Old man, how old are you? src
我是90的，你是哪年的？Wǒ shì jiǔ líng de, nǐ shì nǎ nián de? I was born in 1990. Which year were you born? src
这件衣服便宜是便宜，但是质量不太好。Zhè jiàn yīfu piányi shì piányi, dànshì zhìliàng bù tài hǎo. This piece of clothing may be cheap, but the quality isn't very good. src
这个办公楼好是好，但是交通不太方便。Zhège bàngōnglóu hǎo shì hǎo, dànshì jiāotōng bù tài fāngbiàn. This office building is great, but the transportation is not very convenient. src
玩得开心是开心，但是有点累。Wán de kāixīn shì kāixīn, dànshì yǒudiǎn lèi. We had lots of fun, but we were also a little tired after that. src
这个老师严格是严格，但是她教得好。Zhège lǎoshī yángé shì yángé, dànshì tā jiāo de hǎo. This teacher is strict, but she teaches very well. src
这个运动危险是危险，但是很刺激。Zhège yùndòng wēixiǎn shì wēixiǎn, dànshì hěn cìjī. This sport may be dangerous, but it's also very exciting. src
老师一生气就脸红。Lǎoshī yī shēngqì jiù liǎn hóng. Every time the teacher gets angry, his face turns red. src
她一吃火锅就拉肚子。Tā yī chī huǒguō jiù lādùzi. Every time she eats hotpot, she has diarrhea. src
一不让弟弟玩iPad，他就哭。Yī bù ràng dìdi wán iPad, tā jiù kū. Every time we ask my younger brother to stop playing with iPad, he cries. src
虽然外面很冷，可是里面很暖和。Suīrán wàimiàn hěn lěng, kěshì lǐmiàn hěn nuǎnhuo. Although it's cold outside, it's warm inside. src
这件衣服虽然有点贵，但是质量很好。Zhè jiàn yīfu suīrán yǒudiǎn guì, dànshì zhìliàng hěn hǎo. Although this piece of clothing is a little expensive, the quality is pretty good. src
他虽然不想去，但是还是去了。Tā suīrán bù xiǎng qù, dànshì háishì qù le. Although he didn't want to go, he ended up going. src
虽然他家很有钱，可是他从来不浪费钱。Suīrán tā jiā hěn yǒuqián, kěshì tā cónglái bù làngfèi qián. Even though his family is rich, he never wastes money. src
我妹妹虽然很胖，可是很灵活。Wǒ mèimei suīrán hěn pàng, kěshì hěn línghuó. Although my little sister is fat, she is flexible. src
虽然她准备得很好，但是还是有点紧张。Suīrán tā zhǔnbèi de hěn hǎo, dànshì háishì yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng. Although she's prepared very well, she's still a little nervous. src
你虽然学历高，可是没有工作经验。Nǐ suīrán xuélì gāo, kěshì méiyǒu gōngzuò jīngyàn. Although you're well-educated, you don't have working experience. src
奶奶虽然八十多了，但是精神很好。Nǎinai suīrán bāshí duō le, dànshì tā jīngshén hěn hǎo. Although grandma is in her eighties, she look very well. src
虽然你们没有赢，但是我知道大家尽力了。Suīrán nǐmen méiyǒu yíng, dànshì wǒ zhīdao dàjiā jìnlì le. You didn't win, but I know all of you did your best. src
虽然我认识他很长时间了，但是我还是不了解他。Suīrán wǒ rènshi tā hěn cháng shíjiān le, dànshì wǒ háishì bù liǎojiě tā. Although I'v known him for a long time, I don't know much about him. src
他快要去美国了。Tā kuài yào qù Měiguó le. He's about to go to the USA. src
快下雨了！Kuài xiàyǔ le! It's about to rain! src
我就要饿死了。Wǒ jiù yào è sǐ le. I'm about to starve to death. src
还有十分钟就下班了。Háiyǒu shí fēnzhōng jiù xiàbān le. In 10 more minutes I get off work. src
还有两个星期就要考试了。Háiyǒu liǎng gè xīngqí jiù yào kǎoshì le. We're just two weeks away from the test date. src
想去就去吧，不过要早点回来。Xiǎng qù jiù qù ba, bùguò yào zǎodiǎn huílái. Go if you want to. Just don't come back too late. src
想来就来，不用预约。Xiǎng lái jiù lái, bùyòng yùyuē. Come if you want to. You don't need to make an appoinment. src
想吃就吃，不用问我。Xiǎng chī jiù chī, bùyòng wèn wǒ. If you want to eat, help yourself. You don't need to ask me. src
别害怕，想说就说。Bié hàipà, xiǎng shuō jiù shuō. Don't be afraid. If you want to say, say it. src
想做就做，考虑那么多干吗？Xiǎng zuò jiù zuò, kǎolǜ nàme duō gànmá? If you want to do it, do it. Why would you consider so much? src
想去哪儿就去哪儿。Xiǎng qù nǎr jiù qù nǎr. You can go wherever you like to go. src
想请谁就请谁。Xiǎng qǐng shéi jiù qǐng shéi. You can invite whoever you like to invite. src
想什么时候来就什么时候来。Xiǎng shénme shíhou lái jiù shénme shíhou lái. You can come whenever you like. src
想点什么就点什么，我请客。Xiǎng diǎn shénme jiù diǎn shénme, wǒ qǐngkè. You can order whatever you like. I'm buying. src
这些钱我想怎么花就怎么花，不关你的事。Zhèxiē qián wǒ xiǎng zěnme huā jiù zěnme huā, bù guān nǐ de shì. I will spend the money however I like. It's none of your business. src
跟上海比，我老家的物价很低。Gēn Shànghǎi bǐ, wǒ lǎojiā de wùjià hěn dī. Compared to Shanghai, price in my hometown is very low. src
跟东部比，我更喜欢美国西部。Gēn dōngbù bǐ, wǒ gèng xǐhuan Měiguó xībù. Compared to the east, I like the west of America more. src
跟他比，你最大的优势是什么？Gēn tā bǐ, nǐ zuì dà de yōushì shì shénme? Compared to him, what is your biggest advantage? src
妹妹跟姐姐比起来有点害羞。Mèimei gēn jiějie bǐ qǐlái yǒudiǎn hàixiū. Compared to the older sister, the younger sister is a bit shy. src
新版本跟旧版本比起来，多了一些功能。Xīn bǎnběn gēn jiù bǎnběn bǐ qǐlái, duō le yīxiē gōngnéng. Compared to the old version, the new version has a few more features. src
跟几十年前比起来，中国人的生活水平提高了很多。Gēn jǐ shí nián qián bǐ qǐlái, Zhōngguó rén de shēnghuó shuǐpíng tígāo le hěn duō. Compared to about a few decades ago, the life of rural people are much better. src
跟上半年比，下半年公司的利润下降了。Gēn shàng bàn nián bǐ, xià bàn nián gōngsī de lìrùn xiàjiàng le. Compared to the first half of this year, the company's profits have declined during the second half of this year. src
跟前几周比，这个星期的天气舒服多了。Gēn qián jǐ zhōu bǐ, zhège xīngqī de tiānqì shūfu duō le. Compared to the past few weeks, the weather has been much more comfortable this week. src
跟刚毕业的时候比起来，他成熟了很多。Gēn gāng bìyè de shíhou bǐ qǐlái, tā chéngshú le hěn duō. Compared to when he graduated, he's grown mature a lot. src
他不会不来的。Tā bù huì bù lái de. There is no way he's not coming. src
她不可能不知道。Tā bù kěnéng bù zhīdào. There is no way she doesn't know about this. src
她太害羞了，不是不礼貌。Tā tài hàixiū le, bù shì bù lǐmào. She's too shy; It's not that she's not polite. src
他不是没有钱，是不想乱花钱。Tā bù shì méiyǒu qián, shì bù xiǎng luàn huā qián. It's not that he doesn't have money; it's just he doesn't want to spend it recklessly. src
没有一个人不讨厌他的。Méiyǒu yī gè rén bù tǎoyàn tā de. There is not one person who doesn't dislike him. src
这些菜没有一个不辣的。Zhèxiē cài méiyǒu yī gè bù là de. There is no single one that is not spicy among these dishes. src
我们公司的员工没有一个不会说英语的。Wǒmen gōngsī de yuángōng méiyǒu yī gè bù huì shuō Yīngyǔ de. Our company doesn't have a single employee who can't speak English. src
我们学校的学生没有一个没参加高考的。Wǒmen xuéxiào de xuéshēng méiyǒu yī gè méi cānjiā gāokǎo de. There is no single student who didn't take the college entrance exam in our school. src
他虽然有错，可是不能全怪他。Tā suīrán yǒu cuò, kěshì bù néng quán guài tā. Although he did something wrong, you can't blame him for all of it. src
你虽然学历高，可是没行业经验。Nǐ suīrán xuélì gāo, kěshì méi hángyè jīngyàn. Although you're well-educated, you don't have experience in this industry. src
虽然奶奶已经八十多了，但是她精神很好。Suīrán nǎinai yǐjīng bāshí duō le, dànshì tā jīngshén hěn hǎo. Although grandma is in her eighties, she look very well. src
虽然她病了，可是她没有请假。Suīrán tā bìng le, kěshì tā méiyǒu qǐngjià. Although she's sick, she didn't ask for sick leave. src
虽然他不是很有天赋，可是他非常努力。Suīrán tā bù shì hěn yǒu tiānfù, kěshì tā fēicháng nǔlì. Although he's not very talented, he works very hard. src
虽然我们准备得很好，但是还是有点紧张。Suīrán wǒmen zhǔnbèi de hěn hǎo, dànshì háishì yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng. Although we all prepared very well, we're still a little nervous. src
我认识他的时间虽然不长，但是我已经很了解他了。Wǒ rènshi tā de shíjiān suīrán bù cháng, dànshì wǒ yǐjīng hěn liǎojiě tā le. Although I haven't known him for a long time, I've known him very deeply. src
要么你去，要么他去。Yàome nǐ qù, yàome tā qù. Either you go, or he goes. src
要么继续，要么放弃。Yàome jìxù, yàome fàngqì. Either keep going or give up. src
要么好好做，要么就别做。Yàome hǎohǎo zuò, yàome jiù bié zuò. You either do it well or don't do it. src
要么现在就买，要么现在就走。Yàome xiànzài jiù mǎi, yàome xiànzài jiù zǒu. Either buy it now, or we get out of here now. src
你要么回老家，要么留在上海。Nǐ yàome huí lǎojiā, yàome liúzài Shànghǎi. You either go back to hometown or stay in Shanghai. src
要么看书，要么写作业，不可以出去玩。Yàome kànshū, yàome xiě zuòyè, bù kěyǐ chūqù wán. You either read or do homework. No playing outside. src
要么继续找工作，要么创业，不能什么都不做。Yàome jìxù zhǎo gōngzuò, yàome chuàngyè, bù néng shénme dōu bù zuò. Either keeping looking for a job or start your own business. You can't just sit around doing nothing. src
你要么加入我们队，要么加入他们队。Nǐ yàome jiārù wǒmen duì, yàome jiārù tāmen duì. You either join our team or their team. src
去年夏天，我每天要么去健身，要么去图书馆，特别无聊。Qùnián xiàtiān, wǒ měi tiān yàome qù jiànshēn, yàome qù túshūguǎn, tèbié wúliáo. Last summer I either went to the gym or the library every day. It was so boring. src
我老公周末要么睡觉，要么打游戏，从来不做家务。Wǒ lǎogōng zhōumò yàome shuìjiào, yàome dǎ yóuxì, cónglái bù zuò jiāwù. My husband either sleeps or plays video games on weekends. He never does chores. src
你想来就来。Nǐ xiǎng lái jiù lái. If you want to come, come. src
别害怕，想唱就大声唱。Bié hàipà, xiǎng chàng jiù dàshēng chàng. Don't be afraid. If you want to sing, sing loudly. src
想跑就跑，哪有那么容易？Xiǎng pǎo jiù pǎo, nǎ yǒu nàme róngyì? Isn't it too easy that you just leave when you want to run away? src
这个问题太简单了，连三岁小孩都知道。Zhège wèntí tài jiǎndān le, lián sān suì xiǎohái dōu zhīdào. This question is so easy that even a three-year-old kid knows the answer. src
这个汉字太难了，连我的中文老师都不认识。Zhège Hànzì tài nán le, lián wǒ de Zhōngwén lǎoshī dōu bù rènshi. This Chinese character is so difficult that even my Chinese teacher doesn't know it. src
我们家人人都炒股，连我奶奶都炒。Wǒmen jiā rénrén dōu chǎogǔ, lián wǒ nǎinai dōu chǎo. Everyone in my family plays the stock market. Even my grandma does. src
他很可怜，连他妈妈都不管他。Tā hěn kělián, lián tā māma dōu bù guǎn tā. He's such a poor child. Even his mother doesn't care about him. src
他什么都吃，连狗肉都吃。Tā shénme dōu chī, lián gǒu ròu dōu chī. He eats everything, even dog meat. src
你连你最好的的朋友都不相信？Nǐ lián nǐ zuìhǎo de péngyou dōu bù xiāngxìn? You don't even believe in your best friend? src
他现在很穷，连麦当劳都吃不起。Tā xiànzài hěn qióng, lián Màidāngláo dōu chī bu qǐ. He's very poor now. He couldn't even afford a meal at McDonald. src
你们老板真小气，中秋节连月饼都不发。Nǐmen lǎobǎn zhēn xiǎoqì, Zhōngqiū jié lián yuèbǐng dōu bù fā. Your boss is so petty. He didn't even give mooncakes on Mid-autumn Festival. src
你连她叫什么都没问？Nǐ lián tā jiào shénme dōu méi wèn? You didn't even ask what her name is? src
他连他女朋友喜欢吃什么都不知道。Tā lián tā nǚpéngyou xǐhuan chī shénme dōu bù zhīdào. He doesn't even know what his girlfriend likes to eat? src
她每次来我家都带花。Tā měi cì lái wǒ jiā dōu dài huā. She brings flowers every time she visits me. src
为什么每次我来他都不在？Wèishénme měi cì wǒ lái tā dōu bù zài? How come he's not here every time I come? src
我每次玩这个游戏都输。Wǒ měi cì wán zhège yóuxì dōu shū. Every time I play this game, I lose. src
你怎么每次吃火锅都拉肚子？Nǐ zěnme měicì chī huǒguō dōu lādùzi? Why do you have diarrhea every time you eat hotpot? src
他每次迟到都说因为堵车。Tā měicì chídào dōu shuō yīnwèi dǔchē. He would say it's because of traffic jam every time he's late. src
我每次经过这家店都会进去看看。Wǒ měi cì jīngguò zhè jiā diàn dōu huì jìnqù kànkan. Every time I pass this shop, I go inside and take a look. src
我妹妹每次打针都哭。Wǒ mèimei měicì dǎzhēn dōu kū. My little sister cries every time she has an injection. src
每次遇到生词他都要查字典。Měi cì yùdào shēngcí tā dōu yào chá zìdiǎn. Every time he comes across a new word, he looks it up in the dictionary. src
每次编辑都要保存。Měi cì biānjí dōu yào bǎocún. Every time you edit, save it. src
爸爸每次出差都给我买礼物。Bàba měi cì chūchāi dōu gěi wǒ mǎi lǐwù. My father buys presents for me every time he goes on business trips. src
谁都喜欢美食。Shéi dōu xǐhuan měishí. Everyone likes delicious food. src
谁都可以进。Shéi dōu kěyǐ jìn. Everyone can come in. src
谁都不相信他说的话。Shéi dōu bù xiāngxìn tā shuō de huà. No one believes what he said. src
他的房间里哪儿都是脏衣服。Tā de fángjiān lǐ nǎr dōu shì zāng yīfu. His dirty laundry is everywhere in his room. src
我太累了，哪儿都不想去。Wǒ tài lèi le, nǎr dōu bù xiǎng qù. I'm too tired. I don't want to go anywhere. src
在哪里见面都行。Zài nǎlǐ jiànmiàn dōu xíng. I'm fine with meeting at any place. src
什么时候都可以。Shénme shíhou dōu kěyǐ. Anytime is fine. src
什么时候来都欢迎。Nǐ shénme shíhou lái dōu huānyíng. You're welcome to come anytime. src
什么时候开始都不晚。Shénme shíhou kāishǐ dōu bù wǎn. It's never too late to start. src
你想吃多少都可以。Nǐ xiǎng chī duōshao dōu kěyǐ. You can eat however much you want. src
这些是免费的，我们拿多少都没问题。Zhèxiē shì miǎnfèi de, wǒmen ná duōshao dōu méi wèntí. These are all free. We can take as much as we want. src
我跟他说多少遍都没有用。Wǒ gēn tā shuō duōshǎo biàn dōu méiyǒu yòng. It doesn't help how many times I told him. src
怎么做都可以吗？Zěnme zuò dōu kěyǐ ma? Is it OK if I do however I want? src
这些钱你怎么花都行。Zhèxiē qián nǐ zěnme huā dōu xíng. You can spend these money however you want. src
别人怎么想都不重要。Biérén zěnme xiǎng dōu bù zhòngyào. It doesn't matter however other people think. src
除了他，我们都去过。Chúle tā , wǒmen dōu qù guo. Except for him, we've all been there. src
除了白酒，别的酒他都喝。Chúle báijiǔ, biéde jiǔ tā dōu hē. He can drink anything except white wine. src
除了周末，老板每天都加班。Chúle zhōumò, lǎobǎn měi tiān dōu jiābān. Except for weekends, the boss works overtime everyday. src
除了价格以外，其他方面我们都很满意。Chúle jiàgé yǐwài, qítā fāngmiàn wǒmen dōu hěn mǎnyì. Except for the price, we're satisfied with everything else. src
除了政治新闻以外，其他新闻我都看。Chúle zhèngzhì xīnwén yǐwài, qítā xīnwén wǒ dōu kàn. Except for political news, I read all the types of news. src
除了英语，我也会说法语和西班牙语。Chúle Yīngyǔ, wǒ yě huì shuō Fǎyǔ hé Xībānyáyǔ. In addition to English, I can also speak French and Spanish. src
除了运动以外，你还有什么爱好？Chúle yùndòng yǐwài, nǐ hái yǒu shénme àihào? In addition to sports, what other hobbies do you have? src
除了猫和狗，我还养过兔子。Chúle māo hé gǒu, wǒ xiǎoshíhou hái yǎng guo tùzi. In addition to a cat and a dog, I also had a rabbit. src
除了海鲜，你还对什么过敏？Chúle hǎixiān, nǐ hái duì shénme guòmǐn? In addition to seafood, what else are you allergic to? src
中国的功夫明星，除了李小龙和成龙以外，李连杰也很有名。Zhōngguó de gōngfu míngxīng, chúle Lǐ xiǎolóng hé Chéng Lóng yǐwài, Lǐ Liánjié yě hěn yǒumíng. In addition to Bruce Lee and Jackie Chen , Jet Li is also very famous as a Chinese kongfu star. src
那要看孩子怎么想。Nà yào kàn háizi zěnme xiǎng. It depends on what the child thinks. src
去不去要看他的心情。Qù bu qù yào kàn tā de xīnqíng. Whether he comes or not depends on his mood. src
让谁去得看老板的态度。Ràng shéi qù děi kàn lǎobǎn de tàidu. Who to send there depends on the boss' attitude. src
产品开发要看客户的需求。Chǎnpǐn kāifā yào kàn kèhù de xūqiú. Product development depends on the needs of the clients. src
什么时候给你升职得看你的业绩。Shénme shíhou gěi nǐ shēngzhí děi kàn nǐ de yèjì. When to give you the promotion depends on your performance. src
你的手机多长时间充一次电？Nǐ de shǒujī duō cháng shíjiān chōng yī cì diàn? How often do you charge your phone? src
你多长时间剪一次头发？Nǐ duō cháng shíjiān jiǎn yī cì tóufa? How often do you cut your hair? src
你多长时间刮一次胡子？Nǐ duō cháng shíjiān guā yī cì húzi? How often do you shave? src
我一周给妈妈打两次电话。Wǒ yī zhōu gěi māma dǎ liǎng cì diànhuà. I give mom a call twice a week. src
我们公司一周开一次会。Wǒmen gōngsī yī zhōu kāi yī cì huì. Our company holds a meeting per week. src
我两个月剪一次头发。Wǒ liǎng gè yuè Jiǎn yī cì tóufa. I cut my hair every two months. src
我的手机两天充一次电。Wǒ de shǒujī liǎng tiān chōng yī cì diàn. I charge my phone every two days. src
这种药四个小时吃一次。Zhè zhǒng yào sì gè xiǎoshí chī yī cì. Take this medicine every four hours. src
你应该半年做一次体检。Nǐ yīnggāi bàn nián zuò yī cì tǐjiǎn. You should take the physical examination every half a year. src
你多长时间换一个手机？Nǐ duō cháng shíjiān huàn yī gè shǒujī? How often do you buy a new cell phone? src
你多长时间加一次班？Nǐ duō cháng shíjiān jiā yī cì bān? How often do you work overtime? src
你多长时间吃一次牛油果？Nǐ duō cháng shíjiān chī yī cì niúyóuguǒ? How often do you eat avocado? src
你经常换手机吗？Nǐ jīngcháng huàn shǒujī ma? Do you often buy a new cell phone? src
你经常加班吗？Nǐ jīngcháng jiābān ma? Do you often work late? src
你很少吃牛油果吧？Nǐ hěnshǎo chī niúyóuguǒ ba? You rarely eat avocado, right? src
天气越来越冷了。Tiānqì yuèláiyuè lěng le. The weather is getting colder and colder. src
你女儿越来越漂亮了。Nǐ nǚér yuèláiyuè piàoliang le. Your daughter is getting more and more beautiful. src
你做的菜越来越好吃了。Nǐ zuò de cài yuèláiyuè hǎochī le. The food that you cook is more and more delicious. src
技术越来越发达了。Jìshù yuèláiyuè fādá le. Technology is more and more developed. src
上海的房价越来越高了。Shànghǎi de fángjià yuèláiyuè gāo le. The housing price in Shanghai is getting higher and higher. src
我的学生越来越喜欢上海了。Wǒ de xuéshēng yuèláiyuè xǐhuan Shànghǎi le. My students like Shanghai more and more. src
我女儿越来越爱学英语了。Wǒ nǚ'ér yuèláiyuè ài xué Yīngyǔ le. I'm getting more and more homesick. src
他越来越能吃辣了。Tā yuèláiyuè néng chī là le. He's getting better and better at eating spicy food. src
我越来越明白他说的那些话的意思了。Wǒ yuèláiyuè míngbai tā shuō de nàxiē huà de yìsi le. I understand more and more what he meant by saying those words. src
有了孩子以后，我越来越理解我的父母了。Yǒu le háizi yǐhòu, wǒ yuèláiyuè lǐjiě wǒ de fùmǔ le. After I have my own kid, I understand my parents more and more. src
如果有困难，就给我打电话。Rúguǒ yǒu kùnnan, jiù gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà. If there is any difficulty, give me a call. src
如果你输了，就给我一百块。Rúguǒ nǐ shū le, jiù gěi wǒ yī bǎi kuài. If you lose, you need to give me 100 kuai. src
如果真的找不回来，就再买一个吧。Rúguǒ zhēnde zhǎo bu huílái, jiù zài mǎi yī gè ba. If you can't find it back, then buy a new one. src
如果他再来，我们就报警。Rúguǒ tā zài lái, wǒmen jiù bàojǐng. If he keeps showing up, we'll call the police. src
如果你们已经不相爱了，就分手吧。Rúguǒ nǐmen yǐjīng bù xiāngài le, jiù fēnshǒu ba. If you no longer love each other, break up then. src
如果他知道，那他一定会告诉我。Rúguǒ tā zhīdào, nà tā yīdìng huì gàosu wǒ. If he knew, he would definitely tell me. src
如果大家都不感兴趣，那我不说了。Rúguǒ dàjiā dōu bù gǎn xìngqù, nà wǒ bù shuō le. If none of you are interested, I will stop talking. src
如果你们真的想合作，那么我们应该找时间好好谈谈。Rúguǒ nǐmen zhēnde xiǎng hézuò, nàme wǒmen yīnggāi zhǎo shíjian hǎohǎo tántan. If you really want to work with us, then we should schedule a day to discuss it. src
如果能找到投资，那下个月就可以开始做了。Rúguǒ néng zhǎodào tóuzī, nà xià gè yuè jiù kěyǐ kāishǐ zuò le. If we can find the investment, we'll be able to get on it next month. src
如果你想申请，那么现在就要开始准备。Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng shēnqǐng, nàme xiànzài jiù yào kāishǐ zhǔnbèi. If you want to apply, you need to start to prepare right away. src
你说得越来越好了。Nǐ shuō de yuèláiyuè hǎo le. You speak better and better. src
空气污染越来越严重了。Kōngqì wūrǎn yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le. The air pollution is getting worse and worse. src
你好像越来越喜欢上海了。Nǐ hǎoxiàng yuèláiyuè xǐhuan Shànghǎi le. It seems you like Shanghai more and more. src
学生们越来越爱学习汉语了。Xuéshēng men yuèláiyuè ài xuéxí Hànyǔ le. The students like learning Chinese language more and more. src
我越来越理解我的父母了。Wǒ yuèláiyuè lǐjiě wǒ de fùmǔ le. I understand my parents more and more. src
我越来越不相信他了。Wǒ yuèláiyuè bù xiāngxìn tā le. I believe him less and less. src
你越来越不懂我了。Nǐ yuèláiyuè bù dǒng wǒ le. You understand me less and less. src
我一口都没吃。Wǒ yī kǒu dōu méi chī. I didn't take a single bite. src
他一句中文都不会说。Tā yī jù Zhōngwén dōu bù huì shuō. He can't speak one sentence of Chinese. src
为什么这里一个人都没有？Wèishénme zhèlǐ yī gè rén dōu méiyǒu? Why aren't there any people here? src
她一瓶酒也没喝。Tā yī píng jiǔ yě méi hē. She didn't drink a bottle of wine. src
来上海以前，他一个外国朋友都没有。Lái Shànghǎi yǐqián, tā yī gè wàiguó péngyou dōu méiyǒu. He didn't have a foreign friend before he came to Shanghai. src
这个人我一次都没见过。Zhège rén wǒ yī cì yě méi jiàn guo. I haven't seen this person once. src
这样的菜我一次也没吃过。Zhèyàng de cài wǒ yī cì yě méi chī guo. I've never eaten this kind of food before. src
这次活动我们公司一个人也没参加。Zhè cì huódòng wǒmen gōngsī yī gè rén yě méi cānjiā. Not one person in our company has participated in this activity. src
拼音比汉字容易很多。Pīnyīn bǐ Hànzì róngyì hěn duō. Pinyin is much easier than Chinese characters. src
我感觉今天比昨天好多了。Wǒ gǎnjué jīntiān bǐ zuótiān hǎo duō le. I feel much better today than yesterday. src
你比老板还忙？Nǐ bǐ lǎobǎn hái máng? You're even busier than the boss? src
我弟弟比我哥哥更淘气。Wǒ dìdi bǐ wǒ gēge gèng táoqì. My younger brother is even more naughty than my elder brother. src
昨天38度，今天比昨天还热。Zuótiān sān shí bā dù, jīntiān bǐ zuótiān hái rè. It was 38 degrees yesterday, and it's even hotter today. src
上海的人口比北京更多。Shànghǎi de rénkǒu bǐ Běijīng gèng duō. The population of Shanghai is even bigger than Beijing. src
这种菜不但好吃，而且有营养。Zhè zhǒng cài bùdàn hǎochī, érqiě yǒu yíngyǎng. This kind of vegetable is not only delicious, but nutritious as well. src
她不但聪明，而且很努力。Tā bùdàn cōngming, érqiě hěn nǔlì. She is not only smart, but also very hard-working. src
他不但做完了，而且做得非常好。Tā bùdàn zuò wán le, érqiě zuò de fēicháng hǎo. Not only did he finish, but he also did it extremely well. src
我真的不知道怎么办好。Wǒ zhēnde bù zhīdào zěnmebàn hǎo. I really don't know what to do with it. src
我们都不知道说什么好。Wǒmen dōu bù zhīdào shuō shénme hǎo. None of us knew what to say about it. src
他的短信我不知道怎么回复好。Tā de duǎnxìn wǒ bù zhīdào zěnme huífù hǎo. I don't know how to reply to his message. src
这些东西妈妈不知道放在哪儿好。Zhèxiē dōngxi māma bù zhīdào fàng zài nǎr hǎo. Mom doesn't know where to put these stuff. src
好吃的太多了，他不知道先吃哪个好。Hǎochī de tài duō le, tā bù zhīdào xiān chī nǎge hǎo. There are too much delicious food. He doesn't know which one to start with. src
十一她不知道去哪儿玩好。Shíyī tā bù zhīdào qù nǎr wán hǎo. She doesn't know where to go for fun during National Day holidays. src
都很漂亮，我不知道买哪件好。Dōu hěn piàoliang, wǒ bù zhīdào mǎi nǎ jiàn hǎo. They are all beautiful. I'm not sure which one to buy. src
经理不知道让谁去好。Jīnglǐ bù zhīdào ràng shéi qù hǎo. The manager doesn't know who to send there. src
我们不知道怪谁好。Wǒmen bù zhīdào guài shéi hǎo. We don't know who to blame. src
我想跟她表白，但是我不知道什么时候说好。Wǒ xiǎng gēn tā biǎobái, dànshì wǒ bù zhīdào shénme shíhou shuō hǎo. I want to confess to her, but I'm not sure when to say it. src
他现在的工资是两年前的四倍。Tā xiànzài de gōngzī shì liǎng nián qián de sì bèi. His current salary is four times what it was two years ago. src
公司现在的规模是十年前的五倍。Gōngsī xiànzài de guīmó shì shí nián qián de wǔ bèi. The company's current scope is five times what it was 10 years ago. src
今年的产量是去年的两倍。Jīnnián de chǎnliàng shì qùnián de liǎng bèi. This year's output is twice as big as last year. src
他现在的工资比两年前多了三倍。Tā xiànzài de gōngzī bǐ liǎng nián qián duō le sān bèi. His salary is three times higher now than what it was two years ago. src
今年的产量比去年增加了一倍。Jīnnián de chǎnliàng bǐ qùnián zēngjiā le yī bèi. This year's production is doubled than last year's. src
我家客厅比你家客厅大一倍。Wǒ jiā kètīng bǐ nǐ jiā kètīng dà yī bèi. My house's kitchen is double the size of your house's kitchen. src
他的车比你的车贵十倍。Tā de chē bǐ nǐ de chē guì shí bèi. His car is ten times more expensive than your car. src
这个15岁的男孩比一般的孩子重一倍。Zhège 15 suì de nánhái bǐ yībān de háizi zhòng yī bèi. This fifteen-year-old kid weighs double than a normal kid at his age. src
你的速度比我们的速度快两倍。Nǐ de sùdù bǐ wǒmen de sùdù kuài liǎng bèi. Your speed is twice faster than ours. src
中国人口比美国人口多四倍。Zhōngguó rénkǒu bǐ Měiguó rénkǒu duō sì bèi. China's population is four times bigger than America's. src
我们一方面要让客户满意，另一方面又不能让公司有损失。Wǒmen yī fāngmiàn yào ràng kèhù mǎnyì, lìng yī fāngmiàn yòu bù néng ràng gōngsī yǒu sǔnshī. One one hand, we need to make our clients satisfied, but on the other hand, we can't cause the company any loss. src
这个项目一方面能增加当地人的收入，另一方面还能保护当地的环境。Zhège xiàngmù yī fāngmiàn néng zēngjiā dāngdì rén de shōurù, lìng yī fāngmiàn hái néng bǎohù dāngdì de huánjìng. One one hand, this project can increase local people's income; on the other hand, it can protect local environment. src
他一方面很想创业，另一方面又担心风险太大。Tā yī fāngmiàn hěn xiǎng chuàngyè, lìng yī fāngmiàn yòu dānxīn fēngxiǎn tài dà. On one hand, he wants to start a business, but on the other hand, he's afraid the risk is too great. src
智能手机一方面让我们的生活方便了很多，另一方面也浪费了我们不少时间。Zhìnéng shǒujī yī fāngmiàn ràng wǒmen de shēnghuó fāngbiàn le hěn duō, lìng yī fāngmiàn yě làngfèi le wǒmen bùshǎo shíjiān. One one hand, smart phone makes our life more convenient; on the other hand, it wastes a lot of our time. src
开发太阳能一方面可以减少污染，一方面也可以降低成本。Kāifā tàiyángnéng yī fāngmiànkěyǐ jiǎnshǎo wūrǎn, yī fāngmiàn yě kěyǐ jiàngdī chéngběn. On one hand, developing solar power can reduce pollution; on the other hand, it could also reduce the cost. src
小张请假了，怪不得今天没有看到他。Xiǎo Zhāng qǐngjià le, guàibude jīntiān méiyǒu kàndào tā. Little Zhang asked for some vacation time, no wonder I haven't seen him today. src
天天迟到，怪不得他被炒鱿鱼。Tiāntiān chídào, guàibude tā bèi chǎoyóuyú. He's late for work everyday. No wonder he got fired. src
她是你妹妹？难怪你们长得这么像。Tā shì nǐ mèimei? Nánguài nǐmen cháng de zhème xiàng. She's your younger sister. No wonder you two look so much alike. src
你手机没电了？怪不得我打不通。Nǐ shǒujī méi diàn le? Guàibude wǒ dǎ bu tōng. Your cell phone is out of battery? No wonder I couldn't get through. src
你放了醋？难怪这么难吃！Nǐ fàng le cù? Nánguài zhème nánchī! You put vinegar. No wonder it taste so bad! src
怪不得她拉肚子，原来她昨天又吃火锅了。Guàibude tā lādùzi, yuánlái tā zuótiān yòu chī huǒguō le. No wonder she had a diarrhea. She went to eat hotpot again yesterday. src
难怪学生都不喜欢这个老师，原来他的作业太多了。Nánguài xuéshēng dōu bù xǐhuan zhège lǎoshī, yuánlái tā de zuòyè tài duō le. No wonder the students don't like this teacher. The homework he gives is too much. src
怪不得你们这么高兴，原来是要结婚了。Guàibude nǐmen zhème gāoxìng, yuánlái shì yào jiéhūn le. No wonder you two look so happy. You are getting married. src
怪不得他没告诉我，原来是不想让我担心。Guàibude tā méi gàosu wǒ, yuánlái shì bù xiǎng ràng wǒ dānxīn. No wonder he hasn't told me. He doesn't want me to worry about this. src
这也难怪他，他这么小。Zhè yě nánguài tā, tā zhème xiǎo. Don't blame him. He's so young. src
这也难怪大家，是我们通知晚了。Zhè yě nánguài dàjiā, shì wǒmen tōngzhī wǎn le. Don't blame everybody. It was a short notice. src
要我说，这件事先不要告诉爸妈。Yào wǒ shuō, zhè jiàn shì xiān bùyào gàosu bà mā. The way I see it, this is something we shouldn't tell Mom and Dad. src
要我说，就去外面吃吧，不要在家做饭了。Yào wǒ shuō, jiù qù wàimiàn chī ba, bùyào zài jiā zuòfàn le. I say we should just eat out instead of cooking at home. src
要我说，他就不应该跟老婆离婚。Yào wǒ shuō, tā jiù bù yīnggāi gēn lǎopo líhūn. I think he shouldn't divorce his wife. src
要我说，带不带礼物都没关系，重要的是人要去。Yào wǒ shuō, dài bu dài lǐwù dōu méi guānxi, zhòngyào de shì rén yào qù. In my opinion, bringing gifts or not isn't what matters, the important thing is that people go. src
要我说，你们还是分手吧，他不适合你。Yào wǒ shuō, nǐmen háishì fēnshǒu ba, tā bù shìhé nǐ. I think you guys should break up. He's not right for you. src
那个问题一点儿也不难。Nàge wèntí yīdiǎnr yě bù nán. That question isn't difficult at all. src
我儿子一点都不爱玩游戏。Wǒ érzi yīdiǎn dōu bù ài wán yóuxì. My son doesn't like playing video games at all. src
她一点都没准备。Tā yīdiǎn dōu méi zhǔnbèi. She didn't prepare at all. src
作业他一点都没做？Zuòyè tā yīdiǎn dōu méi zuò? He didn't do his homework at all? src
这个东西不但贵，而且难买。Zhège dōngxi bùdàn guì, érqiě nán mǎi . This thing is not only expensive, but also hard to buy. src
这道菜不但好看，也好吃。Zhè dào cài bùdàn hǎokàn, yě hǎochī. This dish is not only good-looking, but also delicious. src
她不但聪明，而且很幽默。Tā bùdàn cōngming, érqiě hěn yōumò. She is not only smart, but also very humorous. src
她不但离开了我，还拿走了我所有的钱。Tā bùdàn líkāi le wǒ, hái názǒu le wǒ suǒyǒu de qián. Not only did she leave me, but she also took all my money. src
他不但提前做完了，而且做得很好。Tā bùdàn tíqián zuò wán le, érqiě zuò de hěn hǎo. Not only did he finish it in advance, but he did it very well. src
不但大学生找工作难，而且研究生也不容易。Bùdàn dàxuéshēng zhǎo gōngzuò nán, érqiě yánjiūshēng yě bù róngyì. Not only is it hard to find a job for undergraduates, but it's also hard for graduates. src
这个电影不但孩子们喜欢，大人也很喜欢。Zhège diànyǐng bùdàn háizi men xǐhuan, dàren yě hěn xǐhuan. Not only do children like this movie, but the adults like it. src
不但员工压力大，老板压力也很大。Bùdàn yuángōng yālì dà, lǎobǎn yālì yě hěn dà. Not only are the employees under a lot of pressure, but the boss are under a lot of pressure. src
老师发现，不但学生说谎，而且家长也说谎。Lǎoshī fāxiàn, bùdàn xuéshēng shuōhuǎng, érqiě jiāzhǎng yě shuōhuǎng. The teacher found not only did the student lie, but their parents did. src
不但老百姓害怕这些人，警察也害怕。Bùdàn lǎobǎixìng hàipà zhèxiē rén, érqiě jǐngchá yě hàipà. Not only do the ordinary people fear these people, but the police fear them. src
我们都是来做生意的。Wǒmen dōu shì lái zuò shēngyi de. We are all here doing business. src
我是来上海旅游的。Wǒ shì lái Shànghǎi lǚyóu de. I came to Shanghai to travel. src
他们都是来实习的。Tāmen dōu shì lái shíxí de. They all came here to do an internship. src
你真的是来帮我们的吗？Nǐ zhēnde shì lái bāng wǒmen de ma? Are you here to help us? Really? src
你要记住，你是去学习的，不是去玩的。Nǐ yào jìzhù, nǐ shì qù xuéxí de, bùshì qù wán de. You need to remember, you went (to school) to study, not to hang out with people. src
钱是用来花的。Qián shì yònglái huā de. Money is for spending. src
这种菜是用来做汤的。Zhè zhǒng cài shì yònglái zuò tāng de. This kind of vegetable is for making soup. src
这种车是用来搬家的。Zhè zhǒng chē shì yònglái bānjiāde. This kind of car is for moving. src
这个房间是给客人住的。Zhège fángjiān shì gěi kèrén zhù de. This room is for our guest to live in. src
这些钱是给孩子上大学的。zhèxiē qián shì gěi háizi shàng dàxué de. This money is for our children going to college. src
这个人我在哪儿见过。Zhège rén wǒ zài nǎr jiàn guo. I met this person somewhere. src
这首歌我在哪儿听过。Zhè shǒu gē wǒ zài nǎr tīng guo. I've heard this song somewhere. src
这篇文章我们在哪儿看过。Zhè piān wénzhāng wǒmen zài nǎr kàn guo. I've read this article somewhere. src
你让谁来帮我一下。Nǐ ràng shéi lái bāng wǒ yīxià. Ask somebody to help me with this. src
这件事我听谁说过。Zhè jiàn shì wǒ tīng shéi shuō guo. I've heard someone say this before. src
你找谁带你进去吧。Nǐ zhǎo shéi dài nǐ jìnqù ba. You should find someone to take you inside. src
我们应该做点儿什么。Wǒmen yīnggāi zuò diǎnr shénme. We should do something. src
老大，你不说点儿什么？Lǎodà, nǐ bù shuō diǎnr shénme? Boss, aren't you going to say something? src
我想喝点儿什么。Wǒ xiǎng hē diǎnr shénme. I want to drink something. src
什么时候我们见面谈吧。Shénme shíhou wǒmen jiànmiàn tán ba. Let's meet and talk about this sometime. src
什么时候来我新家玩吧。Shénme shíhou lái wǒ xīn jiā wán ba. You should come to my new house to hangout sometime. src
我们什么时候去看看他吧。Wǒmen shénme shíhou qù kànkan tā ba. Let's pay him a visit sometime. src
等到你感觉不舒服就晚了。Děngdào nǐ gǎnjué bù shūfu jiù wǎn le. It will be too late when you start feeling not well. src
等雨停了我再出门。Děng yǔ tíng le wǒ zài chūmén. When the rain stops, then I will go outside. src
等做完这个项目，我就休假。Děng zuò wán zhège xiàngmù, wǒ jiù xiūjià. I will take a vacation when I complete doing this project. src
等到老板签了字，我再做安排。Děngdào lǎobǎn qiān le zì, wǒ zài zuò ānpái. I will make arrangements when the boss signs the paper. src
等我回了家，才发现手机忘在了出租车上。Děng wǒ huí le jiā, cái fāxiàn shǒujī wàng zài le chūzūchē shàng. I didn't realize I left my cellphone in the taxi until I got home. src
等到孩子上了小学，她才开始工作。Děngdào háizi shàng le xiǎoxué, tā cái kāishǐ gōngzuò. She didn't start working until her children went to elementary school. src
等学生都安静了，老师才开始上课。Děng xuéshēng dōu ānjìng le, lǎoshī cái kāishǐ shàngkè. The teacher didn't begin the class until the students all became quiet. src
等他有了孩子，才知道做父母多么不容易。Děng tā yǒu le háizi, cái zhīdào zuò fùmǔ duōme bù róngyì. It wasn't until he had a child that he realized how hard it is to be a parent. src
等到他得了癌症，才意识到健康有多宝贵。Děngdào tā de le áizhèng, cái yìshí dào jiànkāng yǒu duō bǎoguì. He didn't realize how precious health is until he had cancer. src
我爱吃所有的中国菜。Wǒ ài chī suǒyǒude Zhōngguó cài. I love eating all the Chinese food. src
他记得所有人的生日。Tā jìde suǒyǒu rén de shēngrì. He remembers everyone's birthday. src
这里所有的女孩都没上过学。Zhèlǐ suǒyǒude nǚhái dōu méi shàng guò xué. All of the girls here have never gone to school. src
我们部门所有的员工都会说英文。Wǒmen bùmén suǒyǒude yuángōng dōu huì shuō Yīngwén. All the employees from our department can speak English. src
你们公司所有的经理都是男的吗？Nǐmen gōngsī suǒyǒude jīnglǐ dōu shì nán de ma? All the managers in your company are male? src
我看过所有的迪斯尼动画片。Wǒ kàn guò suǒyǒude Dísīní dònghuàpiàn. I've seen all the Disney movies. src
他找了所有的朋友，但是没有人帮他。Tā zhǎo le suǒyǒude péngyǒu, dànshì méiyǒu rén bāng tā. He went to all his friends, but nobody helped him. src
钱不可能解决所有的问题。Qián bù kěnéng jiějué suǒyǒude wèntí. Money can't solve all the problems. src
老板让所有的员工都去参加这个会。Lǎobǎn ràng suǒyǒude yuángōng dōu qù cānjiā zhège huì. Boss asked all the employees to attend this meeting. src
你有老板忙吗？Nǐ yǒu lǎobǎn máng ma? Are you as busy as the boss? src
他有姚明高吗？Tā yǒu Yáo Míng gāo ma? Is he as tall as YaoMing? src
纽约人口有上海人口多吗？Niǔyuē rénkǒu yǒu Shànghǎi rénkǒu duō ma? Is the population of New York city as big as that of Shanghai? src
你有他说得好吗？Nǐ yǒu tā shuō de hǎo ma? Can you speak as well as he does? src
你有Bolt跑得快吗？Nǐ yǒu Bolt pǎo de kuài? Can you run as fast as Bolt does? src
她有那么漂亮吗？Tā yǒu nàme piàoliang ma? Is she that pretty? Really? src
他有姚明那么高吗？Tā yǒu Yáo Míng nàme gāo ma? Is he as tall as YaoMing? src
你有BillGates那么有钱吗？Nǐ yǒu Bill Gates nàme yǒuqián ma? Are you as rich as Bill Gates? src
这个药的效果有这么好吗？Zhège yào de xiàoguǒ yǒu zhème hǎo ma? Is the effect of this medicine that great? Really? src
你要先做作业再看电视。Tā yào xiān zuò zuòyè, zài kàn diànshì. First you need to do your homework, and then you can watch. src
你先找工作再考虑买房子。Nǐ xiān zhǎo gōngzuò zài kǎolǜ mǎi fángzi. First find a job, then you can think about buying a house. src
还好我们打车来的，不然就迟到了。Háihǎo wǒmen dǎchē lái de, bùrán jiù chídào le. Luckily, we came by taxi, otherwise we could have been late. src
还好我妈没看到，不然她肯定要生气。Háihǎo wǒ mā méi kàndào, bùrán tā kěndìng yào shēngqì. It's a good thing that my mother didn't see it, otherwise she would definitely be mad. src
还好有你在，不然我真不知道怎么办。Háihǎo nǐ zài, bùrán wǒ zhēn bù zhīdào zěnme bàn. Fortunately you're here, otherwise I really don't know what to do. src
还好带伞了，不然肯定淋湿了。Háihǎo dài sǎn le, bùrán kěndìng línshī le. It's a good thing I brought the umbrella. Otherwise, I would have definitely gotten soaked. src
还好我们买了很多，不然肯定不够。Háihǎo wǒmen mǎi le hěn duō, bùrán kěndìng bù gòu. Luckily, we bought a lot. Otherwise it wouldn't be enough. src
还好我没听他的话，不然就输了。Hái hǎo wǒ méi tīng tā de huà, bùrán jiù shū le. It's a good thing I didn't listen to him, otherwise I would have lost the game. src
还好我没点那么多菜，不然都浪费了。Háihǎo wǒ méi diǎn nàme duō cài, bùrán dōu làngfèi le. Luckily I didn't order that much food, otherwise it would be all wasted. src
还好你提醒我了，不然我肯定忘了。Háihǎo nǐ tíxǐng wǒ le, bùrán wǒ kěndìng wàng le. Luckily, you reminded me, otherwise I would have definitely forgotten. src
我真的不知道怎么办才好。Wǒ zhēnde bù zhīdào zěnme bàn cái hǎo. I really don't know what to do with it. src
这件事我不知道跟谁说好。Zhè jiàn shì wǒ bù zhīdào gēn shéi shuō hǎo. I'm not sure who to talk to about this piece of matter. src
老板不知道怪谁好。Lǎobǎn bù zhīdào guài shéi hǎo. The boss wasn't sure about who to blame. src
这些钱他不知道放在哪儿才好。Zhèxiē qián tā bù zhīdào fàng zài nǎr cái hǎo. He doesn't know where to put these money. src
下雨天我不知道带孩子去哪儿玩好。Xiàyǔ tiān wǒ bù zhīdào dài hāizi qù nǎr wán hǎo. I don't know where to take my kid to play on rainy days. src
好吃的太多了，孩子们不知道先吃哪个才好。Hǎochī de tài duō le, háizi men bù zhīdào xiān chī nǎge cái hǎo. There are too much delicious food. The children don't know which one to start with. src
我想问，可是不知道什么时候问才好。Wǒ xiǎng wèn, kěshì bù zhīdào shénme shíhou wèn cái hǎo. I want to ask, but I'm not sure when to ask. src
他不是中国人，是美国人。Tā bù shì Zhōngguó rén, shì Měiguó rén. He isn't Chinese, he's American. src
这个大楼不是公寓，是办公楼。Zhège dàlóu bù shì gōngyù, shì bàngōnglóu. This building isn't an apartment building, it's an office building. src
那不是一个问题，而是一个机会。Nà bù shì yī gè wèntí, érshì yī gè jīhuì. That isn't a problem, it's an opportunity. src
