重要的不是你的外表，而是你的内心。Zhòngyào de bù shì nǐ de wàibiǎo, érshì nǐ de nèixīn. What's important is not how you look outside, it's your inside. src
我不是故意的，是不小心。Wǒ bù shì gùyì de, shì bù xiǎoxīn. I didn't mean to, it's an innocent mistake. src
你这样做不是帮他，是害他。Nǐ zhèyàng zuò bù shì bāng tā, shì hài tā. You were not helping him by doing this, you're hurting him. src
我帮你不是想让你感谢我，而是想跟你做朋友。Wǒ bāng nǐ bù shì xiǎng ràng nǐ gǎnxiè wǒ, érshì xiǎng gēn nǐ zuò péngyou. The reason why I helped you is not to make you grateful to me, but to be friends with you. src
我们不是来玩的，是来工作的。Wǒmen bù shì lái wán de, shì lái gōngzuò de. We're not here to play, we're here to do our job. src
他不是不喜欢你，是跟你还不熟。Tā bù shì bù xǐhuan nǐ, shì gēn nǐ hái bù shóu. It's not that he doesn't like you, it's just he's unacquainted with you. src
生活中不是缺少美，而是缺少发现美的眼睛。Shēnghuó zhōng bù shì quēshǎo měi, érshì quēshǎo fāxiàn měi de yǎnjing. Beauty is found everywhere. To our eyes, it is not a lack of beauty but a lack of discovery. src
为了钱，他什么都愿意做。Wèile qián, tā shénme dōu yuànyì zuò. He's willing to do anything for money. src
为了孩子的未来，他决定搬到上海。Wèile háizi de wèilái, tā juédìng bāndào Shanghai. He decided to move to Shanghai for his children's future. src
为了这个面试，他买了一套很贵的西服。Wèile zhège miànshì, tā mǎi le yī tào hěn guì de xīfú. He bought a very expensive suit for this job interview. src
为了找灵感，那个作家搬到了农村。Wèile zhǎo línggǎn, nàge zuòjiā bān dào le nóngcūn. In order to find inspiration, that writer moved to the countryside. src
为了奖励大家，公司明年带你们去日本旅行。Wèile jiǎnglì dàjiā, gōngsī míngnián dài nǐmen qù Rìběn lǚxíng. In order to reward everyone, the company will take you on a trip to Japan next year. src
你学中文是因为你的中国女朋友吗？Nǐ xué Zhōngwén shì wèile Zhōngguó ma? Are you studying Chinese for your Chinese girlfriend? src
我这么做是为了帮你。Wǒ zhème zuò shì wèile bāng nǐ. Why I did all this is to help you. src
他做兼职是为了多赚点钱。Tā zuò jiānzhí shì wèile duō zhuàn diǎn qián. The reason why he does a part time jog is to make a little more money. src
我们反对是因为风险太大。Wǒmen zhī suǒyǐ fǎnduì shì yīnwèi fēngxiǎn tài dà. The reason why we disagree is that the risk is too high. src
我把作业做完了。Wǒ bǎ zuòyè zuò wán le. I finished the homework. src
你把这个汉字写错了。Nǐ bǎ zhège Hànzì xiě cuò le. You wrote this character wrong. src
请把这些东西拿出来。Qǐng bǎ zhèxiē dōngxi ná chūlái. Please take this stuff out. src
我把他推出去了。Wǒ bǎ tā tuī chūqù le. I pushed him out. src
你把作业写完了吗？Nǐ bǎ zuòyè zuò wán le ma? Did you finishing doing your homework? src
你可以把这些都吃完吗？Nǐ kěyǐ bǎ zhèxiē dōu chī wán ma? Can you eat these all? src
你把我的东西放在哪里了？Nǐ bǎ wǒ de dōngxi fàng zài nálǐ le? Where did you put my stuff? src
他把你的书借给谁了？Tā bǎ nǐ de shū jiè gěi shéi le? Who did he lend your book to? src
你是不是把纸用完了？Nǐ shì bù shì bǎ zhǐ yòng wán le? Did you use up the paper or not? src
你能不能把你的名字写清楚？Nǐ néng bù néng bǎ nǐ de míngzi xiě qīngchǔ? Can you write your name clearly or not? src
请你把那把伞拿给我。Qǐng bǎ nà bǎ sǎn ná gěi wǒ. Please give me that umbrella. src
自己做饭一方面更健康，一方面还能省点钱。Zìjǐ zuòfàn yī fāngmiàn gèng jiànkāng, yī fāngmiàn hái néng shěng diǎn qián. On one hand, cook for yourself is more healthier; on the other hand, it can help to save some money. src
他一方面想改变，一方面又害怕改变。Tā yī fāngmiàn xiǎng gǎibiàn, yī fāngmiàn yòu hàipà gǎibiàn. On one hand, he wants to change; on the other hand, he's afraid of change. src
我们一方面不想这样做，一方面必须这样做。Wǒmen yī fāngmiàn bù xiǎng zhèyàng zuò, yī fāngmiàn bìxū zhèyàng zuò. On one hand, we don't want to do it this way; on the other hand, we must do it this way. src
抽烟一方面对自己有害，一方面对身边的人也有害。Chōuyān yī fāngmiàn duì zìjǐ yǒuhài, yī fāngmiàn duì shēnbiān de rén yě yǒuhài. On one hand, smoking can do harm to the smoker himself; on the other hand, it can do harm to people around the smoker. src
用智能手机一方面很方便，另一方面也很容易浪费时间。Yòng zhìnéng shǒujī yī fāngmiàn hěn fāngbiàn, lìng yī fāngmiàn yě hěn róngyì làngfèi shíjiān. One one hand, it's very convenient to use a smart phone; on the other hand, it's very easy to waste a lot of our time by using it. src
我们一方面要让客户满意，另一方面也要控制成本。Wǒmen yī fāngmiàn yào ràng kèhù mǎnyì, lìng yī fāngmiàn yě yào kòngzhì chéngběn. One one hand, we need to make our clients satisfied, but on the other hand, we need to control our cost. src
一方面他们的服务很专业，另一方面他们的价格也很合理。Yī fāngmiàn tāmen de fúwù hěn zhuānyè, lìng yī fāngmiàn tāmen de jiàgé yě hěn hélǐ. On one hand, their service is very professional; on the other hand, their price is reasonable. src
这样做一方面能节省时间，一方面能提高质量。Zhèyàng zuò yī fāngmiàn néng jiéshěng shíjiān, yī fāngmiàn néng tígāo zhìliàng. On one hand, we can save time by doing it this way; on the other hand, the quality will be improved. src
这个项目一方面能增加当地人的收入，另一方面能保护当地的环境。Zhège xiàngmù yī fāngmiàn néng zēngjiā dāngdì rén de shōurù, lìng yī fāngmiàn néng bǎohù dāngdì de huánjìng. One one hand, this project can increase local people's income; on the other hand, it can protect local environment. src
政府一方面要发展这些古城，一方面也要保护好这些古城。Zhèngfǔ yī fāngmiàn yào fāzhǎn zhèxiē gǔchéng, yī fāngmiàn yě yào bǎohù hǎo zhèxiē gǔchéng. On one hand, the government need to develop these old towns; on the other hand, they need to protect them well. src
我是来旅游的。Wǒ shì lái lǚyóu de. I came for traveling. src
我们都是去出差的。Wǒmen dōu shì qù chūchāi de. We are all going on business trips. src
我们不是去玩的，是去做调查的。Wǒmen bù shì qù wán de, shì qù zuò diàochá de. We're not going to hang out with people. Instead, we're there to do research. src
这些礼物是给客户准备的。Zhèxiē lǐwù shì gěi kèhù zhǔnbèi de. These presents are prepared for the clients. src
钱是用来花的，不是用来省的。Qián shì yònglái huā de, bù shì yònglái shěng de. Money is for spending, not for saving. src
他们关系很好的，从来不吵架。Tāmen guānxi hěn hǎo de, cónglái bù chǎojià. Their relationship is very good. They never quarreled. src
我相信会越来越好的。Wǒ xiāngxìn huì yuèláiyuè hǎo de. I believe it will become better and better. src
去年我们来过这里的。Qùnián wǒmen lái guo zhèlǐ de. We've been here last year. src
我弟弟很能吃的！Wǒ dìdi hěn néng chī de! My little brother can eat a lot! src
你的建议公司会再考虑一下的。Nǐ de jiànyì gōngsī huì zài kǎolǜ yīxià de. The company will consider your advice a little bit more. src
我们一定会成功的。Wǒmen yīdìng huì chénggōng de. You will definitely succeed. src
一般来说，私立学校都比较贵。Yībān lái shuō, sīlì xuéxiào dōu bǐjiào guì. Generally speaking, private schools are more expensive. src
一般来说，我们只要外国实习生。Yībān lái shuō, wǒmen zhǐ yào wàiguó shíxíshēng. Generally speaking, we only want foreigner interns. src
一般来说，大城市有更多工作机会。Yībān lái shuō, dà chéngshì yǒu gèng duō gōngzuò jīhuì. Generally speaking, there are more job opportunities in big cities. src
总的来说，这个情况在改善。Zǒng de lái shuō, zhège qíngkuàng zài gǎishàn. Generally speaking, this situation has been improving. src
严格来说，他是我主管，不是我老板。Yángé lái shuō, tā shì wǒ zhǔguǎn, bù shì wǒ lǎobǎn. Strictly speaking, he's my director, not my boss. src
具体来说，这样做有三个好处。Jùtǐ lái shuō, zhèyàng zuò yǒu sān gè hǎochù. To be specific, there are three benefits in doing so. src
我上周六跟我家人在饭店吃饭。Wǒ shàng zhōuliù gēn wǒ jiārén zài fàndiàn chīfàn. I ate with my family in a restaurant last Saturday. src
你们是什么时候来的？Nǐmen shì shénme shíhou lái de? When did you come? src
我们是昨天来的。Wǒmen shì zuótiān lái de. We came yesterday. src
你是怎么来的？Nǐ shì zěnme lái de? How did you come? src
我是坐飞机来的。Wǒ shì zuò fēijī lái de. I came by plane. src
是谁告诉你的？Shì shéi gàosu nǐ de? Who was it that told you? src
是一个同事告诉我的。Shì yī gè tóngshì gàosu wǒde. It was a colleague that told me. src
你是在哪儿出生的？Nǐ shì zài chūshēng de? Where were you born? src
我是在中国出生的。Wǒ shì zài Zhōngguó chūshēng de. I was born in China. src
我们不是坐火车来的。Wǒmen bù shì zuò huǒchē lái de. We didn't come by train. src
这个电话不是打给他的。Zhège diànhuà bù shì dǎ gěi tā de. This phone call isn't to him. src
我们不是去看她的。Wǒmen bù shì qù kàn tā de. We didn't go to see her. src
你坐地铁来的吗？Nǐ zuò dìtiě lái de ma? Did you come by metro? src
我们两个月以前认识的。Wǒmen liǎng gè yuè yǐqián rènshi de. We met two months ago. src
我跟我男朋友一起去的。Wǒ gēn wǒ nánpéngyou yīqǐ qù de. I went there with my boyfriend. src
如果明天下雨的话，我们就不去了。Rúguǒ míngtiān xiàyǔ dehuà, wǒmen jiù bù qù le. If it rains tomorrow, we won't go. src
别点那么多菜。如果吃不完的话，就浪费了。Bié diǎn nàme duō cài. Rúguǒ chī bù wán dehuà, jiù tài làngfèi le. Don't order so much. It will be a big waste of food if we can't finish all. src
如果有人帮他的话，他就不会出事了。Rúguǒ yǒu rén bāng tā dehuà, tā jiù bù huì chūshì le. If someone had helped him, he would't have had this accident. src
如果你们不来的话，一定会后悔的。Rúguǒ nǐmen bù lái dehuà, yīdìng huì hòuhuǐ de . If you don't come, you'll definitely regret it. src
如果他不同意的话，你怎么办？Rúguǒ tā bù tóngyì dehuà, nǐ zěnmebàn? What will you do if he disapprove? src
不想去的话就别去了。Bù xiǎng qù dehuà jiù bié qù le. Don't go if you don't feel like going. src
好吃的的话，就多吃点。Hǎochī de dehuà, jiù duō chī diǎn. If you think it's tasty, eat some more. src
喜欢就拿走吧。Xǐhuan jiù názǒu ba. Take it if you like it. src
有事给我打电话。Yǒu shì gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà. Give me a call if you need anything. src
有空来我家玩。Yǒu kòng lái wǒ jiā wán. If you're not busy, come to my place so we can hang out. src
老板今天不在，要么你们明天来吧。Lǎobǎn jīntiān bù zài, yàome nǐmen míngtiān lái ba. The boss isn't here today. How about if you all come back tomorrow? src
大家都有点累了，要么休息一会儿吧。Dàjiā dōu yǒudiǎn lèi le, yàome xiūxi yīhuìr ba. Everyone is a little tired. Why don't we rest for a while? src
这个星期我比较忙，要么下个星期见？Zhège xīngqī wǒ bǐjiào máng, yàome xià gè xīngqī jiàn? I'm pretty busy this week. How about we meet up next week? src
我周末还没安排，要么你们来我家玩？Wǒ zhōumò hái méi ānpái, yàome lái wǒ jiā wán? I don't have plans for the weekend. How about you guys come to my place and hang out? src
我的钱不够，要么我用支付宝付吧。Wǒ de qián bù gòu, yàome wǒ yòng Zhīfùbǎo fù ba. I don't have that much money. How about I pay you by Alipay? src
要么现在就买，要么就别买。Yàome xiànzài jiù mǎi, yàome jiù bié mǎi. Either buy it now, or don't buy it. src
要么好好听课，要么现在就出去。Yàome hǎohǎo tīngkè, yàome xiànzài jiù chūqù. Either listen to the lesson carefully or get out right now. src
我觉得这不是麻烦，而是机会。Wǒ juéde zhè bù shì máfan, ér shì jīhuì. I don't think it's trouble. I think it's an opportunity. src
我不是八卦，是关心你。Wǒ bù shì bāguà, shì guānxīn nǐ. I'm not gossiping. I'm concerned about you. src
不好意思，我儿子不是故意的，是不小心。Bù hǎoyìsi, wǒ érzi bù shì gùyì de, shì bù xiǎoxīn. I'm sorry. My son didn't mean to do that. It was an innocent mistake. src
你这样做是害他，不是帮他。Nǐ zhèyàng zuò shì hài tā, bù shì bāng tā. You were hurting him by doing this, not helping him. src
他这样做是为了团队，不是为了自己。Tā zhèyàng zuò shì wèile tuánduì, bù shì wèile zìjǐ. He did this for the team, not for himself. src
我们是来办事的，不是来玩的。Wǒmen shì lái bànshì de, bù shì lái wán de. We're here to do our job, not to have fun. src
她不是不喜欢你，而是跟你还不熟。Tā bù shì bù xǐhuan nǐ, ér shì gēn nǐ hái bù shóu. It's not that she doesn't like you, it's just she's unacquainted with you. src
我没说不是想骗你，是怕你不高兴。Wǒ méi shuō bù shì xiǎng piàn nǐ, shì pà nǐ bù gāoxìng. The reason why I didn't tell is not that I wanted to lie to you; it's that I'm afraid you would be upset. src
水果，我最爱吃草莓。Shuǐguǒ, wǒ zuì ài chī cǎoméi. Fruit, I like strawberries best. src
不好意思，咖啡，我都喝完了。Bù hǎoyìsi, kāfēi, wǒ dōu hē wán le. I'm sorry. I finished all the coffee. src
你好，票，还有吗？Nǐhǎo, piào, háiyǒu ma? Hello. Are there any tickets left? src
这个问题，你一个人没办法解决。Zhège wèntí, nǐ yīgèrén méi bànfǎ jiějué. There is no way that you can solve this problem all by yourself. src
那部电影，看过的人都喜欢。Nà bù diànyǐng, kàn guo de rén dōu xǐhuan. Whoever watched that movie likes it. src
这个新项目，公司打算让我来负责。Zhège xīn xiàngmù, gōngsī dǎsuàn ràng wǒ lái fùzé. The company plans to let me in charge of this new project. src
你借我的钱，还没还吧？Nǐ jiè wǒ de qián, hái méi hái ba? You haven't returned the money you borrowed from me, have you? src
他的事，我不想管那么多。Tā de shì, wǒ bù xiǎng guǎn nàme duō. I don't want to be so much involved in his business. src
明天下午要开会，你记得吧？Míngtiān xiàwǔ yào kāi huì, nǐ jìde ba? You have a meeting tomorrow afternoon. You remember that, don't you? src
我的笔，弟弟弄坏了。Wǒ de bǐ, dìdi nòng huài le. My younger brother broke my pen. src
你脸上有一点灰。Nǐ yǒu yīdiǎn huī. There's a little dirt on your face. src
你碗里还有一点饭，吃完吧。Nǐ wǎn lǐ hái yǒu yīdiǎn fàn, chī wán ba. There's still a little rice in your bowl. Finish eating it. src
房间里有点热。Fángjiān lǐ yǒudiǎn rè. It is a little hot inside the room. src
我今天有点累。Jīntiān wǒmen yǒudiǎn máng. I am a little busy today. src
这个菜有点咸。Zhège cài yǒudiǎn xián. The dish is a little salty. src
老板，便宜一点儿吧。Lǎobǎn, piányi yīdiǎnr ba. Sir, a little cheaper please. (directed to the owner of a shop) src
请说慢一点儿。Qǐng shuō màn yīdiǎnr. Please speak a little more slowly. src
快点儿，要迟到了。Kuài diǎnr, yào chídào le. A bit faster, we will be late. src
我今天有点儿不舒服。Wǒ jīntiān yǒudiǎnr bù shūfu. Today I don't feel very good. src
我们还是有点儿不明白。Wǒmen háishì yǒudiǎnr bù míngbai. We still don't really understand. src
孩子们有点儿不喜欢这个地方。Háizi men yǒudiǎnr bù xǐhuan zhège dìfang. Kids kind of don't like this place. src
这是四川菜吗？一点儿都不辣。Zhè shì Sìchuān cài ma? Yīdiǎnr dōu bù là. This is Sichuan food? It is not spicy at all. src
这些钱你一点儿也没花？Zhèxiē qián nǐ yīdiǎnr yě méi huā? You didn't spend the money at all? src
A:你也是大学生？你是什么专业的？ B:我是中文专业的。Nǐ yě shì dàxuéshēng? Nǐ shì shénme zhuānyè de? Wǒ shì Zhōngwén zhuānyè de. Are you also a college student? What do you major in?<br />I major in Chinese. src
这个苹果是坏的。Zhège píngguǒ shì huài de. This apple is bad. src
你错了，那个人是女的。Nǐ cuò le, nàge rén shì nǚ de. You are mistaken. That person is a woman. src
他家的家具都是中式的。Tā jiā de jiājù dōu shì Zhōng shì de. The furniture in his house is all in the Chinese style. src
A:你是什么时候开始学中文的？ B:我是两年前开始学中文的。Nǐ shì shénme shíhou kāishǐ xué Zhōngwén de? Wǒ shì liǎng nián qián kāishǐ xué Zhōngwén de. A: When was it that you started studying Chinese?<br />It was two years ago when I started studying Chinese. src
A:你是在哪里学的中文？ B:我是在上海学的中文。Nǐ shì zài nǎlǐ xué de Zhōngwén? Wǒ shì zài Shànghǎi xué de Zhōngwén. Where is it that you study Chinese?<br />It's in Shanghai that I study Chinese. src
A:昨天你是怎么回的家？ B:昨天我是打车回家的。Zuótiān nǐ shì zěnme huí de jiā? Zuótiān wǒ shì dǎchē huíjiā de. How did you come back yesterday?<br />I went home by taxi yesterday. src
我是来实习的。Wǒ shì lái shíxí de. I came here to do an internship. src
A:我是教汉语的。你是做什么的？ B:我是送外卖的。Wǒ shì jiāo Hànyǔ de. Nǐ shì zuò shénme de? Wǒ shì sòng wàimài de. A: I teach Chinese. What kind of work do you do?<br />B: I'm a take-out delivery guy. src
我会去的。Wǒ huì qù de. I will go. src
我们能做好的，你放心。Wǒmen néng zuòhǎo de, nǐ fàngxīn. We will get it done. Don't worry. src
这个东西可以吃的。Zhège dōngxi kěyǐ chī de. This thing is eatable. src
她把我的手机放在她的包里了。Tā bǎ wǒ de shǒujī fàng zài tā de bāo lǐ le. She put my phone in her bag. src
他把脏衣服放在床下面了。Tā bǎ zāng yīfu fàng zài chuáng xiàmiàn le. He put his dirty laundry under his bed. src
你是不是把护照放在行李箱里了？Nǐ shì bu shì bǎ hùzhào fàng zài xínglixiāng lǐ le? Did you put your passport in your suitcase or not? src
老师把我的名字读错了。Lǎowhī bǎ wǒ de míngzì dú cuò le. The teacher read my name wrong. src
请把客人带进去。Qǐng bǎ kèrén dài jìnqù. Please take the guests inside. src
把我的眼镜拿过来。Bǎ wǒ de yǎnjìng ná guòlái. Please bring my glasses over here. src
你们把那个问题解决了吗？Nǐmen bǎ nàge wèntí jiějué le ma? Did you solve that problem? src
你把我手机放在哪儿了？Nǐ bǎ wǒ shǒujī fàng zài nǎr le? Where did you put my cell phone? src
他把钱借给谁了？Tā bǎ qián jiè gěi shéi le? Who did he lend the money to? src
你能不能把你房间打扫干净？Nǐ néng bu néng bǎ nǐ fángjiān dǎsǎo gānjìng? Can you clean your room or not? src
我们都会游泳。Wǒmen dōu huì yóuyǒng. We all can swim. src
他不会修电脑。Tā bù huì xiū diànnǎo. He doesn't know how to fix computers. src
你真的能吃三碗米饭吗？Nǐ zhēnde néng chī sān wǎn mǐfàn ma? Are you really able to eat three bowls of rice? src
A:你会说中文吗？A: Nǐ huì shuō Zhōngwén ma? Can you speak Chinese? src
B:不好意思，我只能说一点。B: Bù hǎoyìsi, wǒ zhǐ néng shuō yīdiǎn. Sorry, I can only speak a little. src
我可以走了吗？Wǒ kěyǐ zǒu le ma? Am I allowed to leave now? src
你能不能帮我一下吗？Nǐ néng bu néng bāng wǒ yīxià ma? Could you help me a bit? src
动物不能进。Dòngwù bù néng jìn. Animals are not allowed to come in. src
A:我能在这里抽烟吗？A: Wǒ néng zài zhèlǐ chōuyān ma? Can I smoke here? src
B:不可以。B: Bù kěyǐ. No, you can't. src
明天你能早点来吗？Míngtiān nǐ néng zǎodiǎn lái ma? Is it possible for you to come al little earlier tomorrow? src
可不可以换一个？Kě bù kěyǐ huàn yī gè? Is it possible to change it? src
能不参加吗？Néngbù cānjiā ma? Is it possible to not attend? src
A:能不能取消今天的课？A: Néng bù néng qǔxiāo jīntiān de kè? Is it possible to cancel today's lesson? src
B:不能。B: Bù néng. Impossible. src
你会生我的气吗？Nǐ huì shēng wǒ de qì ma? Will you be mad at me? src
这样穿会好看吗？Zhèyàng chuān huì hǎokàn ma? Will I look good if I dress like this? src
A:今天会下雨吗？ B:我看不会。Jīntiān huì xiàyǔ ma? Wǒ kàn bù huì. Is it going to rain today?<br />I don't think it will. src
这个女生很会打扮。Zhège nǚshēng hěn huì dǎban. This girl knows how to dress up really well. src
我妈妈很会做饭。Wǒ māma hěn huì zuòfàn. My mother really knows how to cook. src
他很会说话。Tā hěn huì shuōhuà. He's a smooth talker. src
他很能说。Tā hěn néng shuō. He's quite a talker. src
他太能睡了。Tā tài néng shuì le. He can really sleep. src
没想到你这么能吃苦。Méixiǎngdào nǐ zhème néng chīkǔ. I didn't expect you to be a person who can handle so many burdens. src
你真能吃!Nǐ zhēn néng chī! Wow, you really can eat! src
中国人真会吃!Zhōngguó rén zhēn huì chī! Chinese people really can eat. src
我的脚好了，现在又能跳舞了。Wǒ de jiǎo hǎo le, xiànzài yòu néng tiàowǔ le. I am able to dance now since my foot is better. (The condition changed) src
我学了两个月，现在我会跳舞了。Wǒ xué le liǎng gè yuè, xiànzài wǒ huì tiàowǔ le. I studied for two months. I know how to dance now. (It's a learned skill) src
我爸妈同意了，现在我可以跳舞了。Wǒ fùmǔ tóngyì le, xiànzài wǒ kěyǐ tiàowǔ le. My parents agreed. I'm allowed to dance now. (The dad gave permission) src
他被打了。Tā bèi dǎ le. He got beaten up. src
你被公司炒鱿鱼了？Nǐ bèi gōngsī chǎo yóuyú le? You got fired by the company? src
我家被偷了。Wǒ jiā bèi tōu le. My house got stolen. src
我被他骗了。Wǒ bèi tā piàn le. I got deceived by him. src
他被警察抓了。Tā bèi jǐngchá zhuā le. He got arrested by the police. src
他被父母骂了。Tā bèi fùmǔ mà le. He was scolded by his parents. src
我的车被撞了。Wǒ de chē bèi zhuàng le. My car got hit. src
他们做的坏事被发现了。Tāmen zuò de huàishì bèi fāxiàn le. The bad things they've done got caught. src
文件被删了。Wénjiàn bèi shān le. The files are deleted. src
咖啡被我喝了。Kāfēi bèi wǒ hē le. The coffee was drunk by me. src
咖啡被我喝完了。Kāfēi bèi wǒ hē wán le. The coffee was finished finished by me. src
他被打伤了。Tā bèi dǎ shāng le. He got beaten up and he was wounded. src
那些书被借走了吗？Nàxiē shū bèi jiè zǒu le ma? Are those books borrowed? src
他被谁打的？Tā bèi shéi dǎ de? By whom he got beaten up? src
你是不是被公司炒鱿鱼了？Nǐ shì bu shì bèi gōngsī chǎo yóuyú le? Did you get fired by the company or not? src
花瓶被摔碎了。Huāpíng bèi shuāi suì le. The vase was broken into pieces. src
那个人被车撞死了。Nàge rén bèi chē zhuàng sǐ le. That man got hit and killed by a car. src
那个男人被警察赶出去了。Nàge nánrén bèi jǐngchá gǎn chūqù le. The man was kicked out by the policeman. src
孩子被他父母带回去了。Háizi bèi tā fùmǔ dài huíqù le. The child was taken back by his parents. src
她喜欢你还是他？Tā xǐhuan nǐ háishì tā? Does she like you or him? src
你喝茶还是喝咖啡？Nǐ hē chá háishì hē kāfēi? Do you drink tea or coffee? src
你中午出去吃还是叫外卖？Nǐ zhōngwǔ chūqù chī háishì jiào wàimài? Are you going out for lunch or order take-out? src
明天或者后天都行。Míngtiān huòzhě hòutiān dōu xíng. Either tomorrow or the day after is fine. src
周末我想在家看书或者看电影。Zhōumò wǒ xiǎng zài jiā kànshū huòzhě kàn diànyǐng. I'd like to stay at home reading or watching some movies. src
我不知道这本书是他的还是我的。Wǒ bù zhīdào zhè běn shū shì tā de háishì wǒ de. I don't know if this book is his or mine. src
我不知道是自己跟他说还是让别人帮我跟他说。Wǒ bù zhīdào shì zìjǐ gēn tā shuō háishì ràng biérén bāng wǒ gēn tā shuō. I don't know if I should talk to him myself or ask someone else to talk to him for me. src
我不清楚是我们先走还是等他们一起走。Wǒ bù qīngchu shì wǒmen xiān zǒu háishì děng tāmen yīqǐ zǒu. I'm not sure if we should leave first, or wait for them and leave together. src
A:昨天我去杭州了。 B:你是怎么去的？ A:我是坐火车去的。Zuótiān wǒ qù Hángzhōu le. Nǐ shì zěnme qù de? Wǒ shì zuò huǒchē qù de. I went to Hangzhou yesterday.<br />How did you get there?<br />I went by train. src
A:我是坐火车去的。Wǒ shì zuò huǒchē qù de. I went by train. src
你昨天是几点到的？Nǐ zuótiān shì jǐ diǎn dào de? What time did you arrive yesterday? src
你是跟谁去的？Nǐ shì gēn shéi qù de? Who did you go with? src
他是用什么打你的？Tā shì yòng shénme dǎ nǐ de? What did he use to hit you? src
A:你们是什么时候到的？ B:我们是昨天到的。Nǐmen shì shénme shíhou dào de? Wǒmen shì zuótiān dào de. When did you arrive?<br />We arrived yesterday. src
A:你是在哪儿出生的？ B:我是在香港出生的。Nǐ shì zài nǎr chūshēng de? Wǒ shì zài Xiānggǎng chūshēng de. Where were you born?<br />I was born in Hong Kong. src
A:你骑自行车来的吗？ B:我走来的。Nǐ qí zìxíngchē lái de ma? Wǒ zǒu lái de. Did you come by bike?<br />I came by foot. src
A:谁告诉你的？ B:一个同事告诉我的。Shéi gàosu nǐ de? Yī gè tóngshì gàosu wǒ de. Who was it that told you?<br />It was a colleague that told me. src
他们不是在网上认识的。Tāmen bù shì zài wǎngshàng rènshi de. They didn't meet online. src
他不是跟我们一起去的。Tā bù shì gēn wǒmen yīqǐ qù de. He didn't go together with us. src
我不是走来的。Wǒ bù shì zǒu lái de. I didn't come by foot. src
这个东西多少钱买的？Zhège dōngxi duōshǎo qián mǎi de? How much did this thing cost? src
她用邮件回复的吗？Tā yòng yóujiàn huífù de ma? Did she reply by email? src
我们用Skype开的会。Wǒmen yòng Skype kāi de huì. We had a meeting by Skype. src
谁开的空调？Shéi kāi de kōngtiáo? Who turned on the air conditioner? src
我在图书馆认识我男朋友的。Wǒ zài túshūguǎn rènshi wǒ nánpéngyou de. It was in the library that I met my boyfriend. src
你是昨天见客户的吗？Nǐ shì zuótiān jiàn kèhù de ma? Is it yesterday you had a meeting with the client? src
我常常收到垃圾短信。Wǒ chángcháng shōudào lājī duǎnxìn. I often receive junk messages. src
你们经常加班吗？Nǐmen jīngcháng jiābān ma? Do you often work late? src
他们常常吵架。Tāmen chángcháng chǎojià. They often fight. src
他经常不吃早饭。Tā jīngcháng bù chī zǎo fàn. He often skips breakfast. src
常来玩！Cháng lái wán! Come and hang out often! src
常联系！Cháng liánxì! Let's keep in touch! src
她忘带钥匙是经常的事情。Tā wàng dài yàoshi shì jīngcháng de shìqing. Her forgetting to bring a key is a frequent occurrence. src
处理顾客投诉是酒店经理经常性的工作。Chǔlǐ gùkè tóusù shì jiǔdiàn jīnglǐ jīngchángxìng de gōngzuò. It's a common job for hotel's manager to deal with customers' complaints. src
他不常抽烟。Tā bù cháng chōuyān. He doesn't smoke very often. src
我妈妈不常网购。Wǒ māma bù cháng wǎng gòu. My mother doesn't do online shopping often. src
他刚到。Tā gāng dào. He just arrived. src
我们昨天刚到。Wǒmen zuótiān gāng dào. We just arrived yesterday. src
真不巧，老板刚走。Zhēn bùqiǎo, lǎobǎn gāng zǒu. What a bad coincidence. The boss just left. src
我刚到上海的时候，谁都不认识。Wǒ gāng dào Shànghǎi de shíhou, shéi dōu bù rènshi. I didn't know anyone when I just came to Shanghai. src
天刚晴。Tiān gāng qíng. The sky just cleared up. src
他的感冒刚刚好。Tā de gǎnmào gānggāng hǎo. He just recovered from his cold. src
面包刚熟，过一会儿再吃。Miànbāo gāng shóu, guò yīhuìr zài chī. The bread just got done cooking. Eat in a little bit. src
他刚才哭了。Tā gāngcái kū le. He was crying just now. src
我刚才看到他了。Wǒ gāngcái kàndào tā le. I just now saw him. src
现在我感觉比刚才好一点了。Xiànzài wǒ gǎnjué bǐ gāngcái hǎo yīdiǎn le. I feel a little better now than just before. src
刚才的事情太让人生气了。Gāngcái de shìqing tài ràng rén shēngqì le. What just happened is really upsetting. src
他刚才的态度很差。Tā gāngcái de tàidu hěn chà. The attitude that he just gave is bad. src
我昨天看了。Wǒ zuótiān kàn le. I looked at it yesterday. src
我刚才看了。Wǒ gāngcái kàn le. I looked at it just now. src
我刚看到。Wǒ gāng kàndào. I just saw it. src
我刚才看到了。Wǒ gāngcái kàndào le. I saw it just now. src
你刚知道吗？Nǐ gāng zhīdào ma? You just found out? src
我刚听说。Wǒ gāng tīngshuō. I just heard. src
宝宝刚醒。Bǎobao gāng xǐng. The baby just woke up. src
我刚才没看到。Wǒ gāngcái méi kàndào. I didn't see it just now. src
我刚才没听懂。Wǒ gāngcái méi tīngdǒng. I didn't understand just now. src
A:你刚才去哪儿了？ B:我去上厕所了。刚回来。Nǐ gāngcái qù nǎr le? Wǒ qù shàng cèsuǒ le. Gāng huílái. Where did you go just now?<br />I went to the bathroom. I just got back. src
A:那你不知道刚才的事吧？ B:刚才发生什么事了？Nà nǐ bù zhīdào gāngcái de shì ba? Gāngcái fāshēng shénme shì le? Then you don't know what happened just now?<br />What's just happened? src
请说慢一点。Qǐng shuō màn yīdiǎn. Please speak a little more slowly. src
快点，要迟到了。Kuài diǎn, yào chídào le. A bit faster, we will be late. src
孩子们有点不喜欢我们的新家。Háizi men yǒudiǎn bù xǐhuan wǒmen de xīn jiā. Our children doesn't like our new home much. src
她有点不舒服。Tā yǒudiǎn bù shūfu. She doesn't feel very well. src
我有点不相信那个人。Wǒ yǒudiǎn bù xiāngxìn nàge rén. I don't really believe that guy. src
我们有点没听懂。Wǒmen yǒudiǎn méi tīngdǒng. We didn't understand much. src
这个菜一点也不辣。Zhège cài yīdiǎn yě bù là. This dish is not spicy at all. src
作业你一点也没做？Zuòyè nǐ yīdiǎn yě méi zuò? You didn't do your homework at all? src
今天有点热。Jīntiān yǒuyīdiǎn rè. It's a little hot today. src
A:这件衣服有点贵啊。 B:是贵了一点，但是很好看，我很喜欢。Zhè jiàn yīfu yǒudiǎn guì a. Shì guì le yīdiǎn, dànshì hěn hǎokàn, wǒ hěn xǐhuan. This piece of clothing is a bit expensive.<br />It's a bit expensive, but it looks really good and I like it. src
A:小姐，这件衣服能不能便宜一点？ C:不好意思，不能还价，一点也不能便宜。Xǎojie, zhè jiàn yīfu néng bù néng piányi yīdiǎn? Bù hǎoyìsi, bù néng huánjià, yīdiǎn yě bù néng piányi. Miss, could we get this a little cheaper?<br />I'm sorry, no haggling. It can't be a little bit cheaper. Not even a bit. src
从明天开始，我不抽烟了。Cóng míngtiān kāishǐ, wǒ bù chōuyān le. Starting tomorrow, I will not smoke. src
从有了女朋友以后，他不泡妞了。Cóng yǒu le nǚ péngyou yǐhòu, tā bù pàoniū le. After he gets a girlfriend, he won’t hit on women. src
他从地上拿起来了一百块。Tā cóng dìshàng ná qǐláile yībǎi kuài. He picked up one hundred RMB from the ground. src
从学生到老师都放假了。Cóng xuéshēng dào lǎoshī dōu fàngjiàle. Everyone, from the students to the teachers, are on holiday. src
他从最差的学生变成了最认真的学生。Tā cóng zuì chà de xuéshēng biànchéng le zuì rènzhēn de xuéshēng. He went from being the worst student to the best student. src
我的学校离你家很远。Wǒ de xuéxiào lí nǐ jiā hěn yuǎn. My school is far from your house. src
第一次世界大战离第二次世界大战不到50年。Dì-yī cì shìjiè dàzhàn lí dì èr cì shìjiè dàzhàn bù dào 50 nián. World War I and World War II are less than 50 years apart. src
A:你会说中文吗？ B:不好意思，我只会说一点。Nǐ huì shuō Zhōngwén ma? Bù hǎoyìsi, wǒ zhǐ huì shuō yīdiǎn. Can you speak Chinese?<br />Sorry, I can only speak a little. src
A:你能吃三碗米饭吗？ B:不能。Nǐ néng chī sān wǎn mǐfàn ma? Bù néng. Are you able to eat three bowls of rice?<br />I can't. src
A:我能在这里抽烟吗？ B:不可以。Wǒ néng zài zhèlǐ chōuyān ma? Bù kěyǐ. Can I smoke here?<br />No, you can't. src
A:外国人能不能参加？ B:不能。Wàiguó rén néng bu néng cānjiā? Bù kěyǐ. Is it possible for foreigners to attend?<br />Impossible. src
她才五岁，但是很会说话。Tā cái wǔ suì, dànshì hěn huì shuōhuà. She's only five but she's a smooth talker. src
他刚来。Tā gāng lái. He just came. src
我昨天刚看到他。Wǒ zuótiān gāng kàndào tā. I just saw him yesterday. src
我刚说过，不想再说一遍。Wǒ zuótiān gāng kàn dào tā. I just said it, and I don't want to say it again. src

他刚才来过。Tā gāngcái lái guo. He came just now. src
我刚才看过了，不想再看了。Wǒ gāngcái kàn guo le, bù xiǎng zài kàn le. I saw it just now, and I don't want to see it again. src

这些刚好。Zhèxiē gāng hǎo. These are just right. src
你喜欢他还是我？Nǐ xǐhuan tā háishì wǒ? Does you like him or me? src
你可以坐1号线或者2号线去人民广场。Nǐ kěyǐ zuò yī hào xiàn huòzhě èr hào xiàn qù Rénmín Guǎngchǎng. You can take Line 1 or Line 2 to People's Square. src
我们可以电话或者邮件联系。Wǒmen kěyǐ diànhuà huòzhě yóujiàn liánxì. We can contact each other by phone or email. src
我想知道他们是支持还是反对。Wǒ xiǎng zhīdào tāmen shì zhīchí háishì fǎnduì. I'm wondering if they are with me or against me. src
老板不确定是这个周末出差还是下个周末出差。Lǎobǎn bù quèdìng shì zhège zhōumò chūchāi háishì xià gè zhōumò chūchāi. The boss isn't sure if he's going on business trips this weekend or next weekend. src
我们先去吃饭，然后去超市。Wǒmen xiān qù chīfàn, ránhòu qù chāoshì. I'm going to eat, then I'll go to the supermarket. src
他先说了一个好消息，然后又说了一个坏消息。Tā xiān shuō le yī gè hǎo xiāoxi, ránhòu yòu shuō le yī gè huài xiāoxi. First he told the good news, then he told the bad news. src
我不在乎人家怎么说。Wǒ bù zàihu rénjia zěnme shuō. I don't care about what other people say. src
别人怎么想我怎么知道？Biérén zěnme xiǎng wǒ zěnme zhīdào? How possibly can I know what other people think? src
那是人家的事，你管那么多干嘛？Nà shì rénjia de shì, nǐ guǎn nàme duō gàn ma? That's other people's business. Why would you care so much? src
因为人家喜欢你啊。Yīnwèi rénjia xǐhuan nǐ a. Because I like you! src
讨厌！老是拿人家开玩笑。Tǎoyàn! Lǎo shì ná rénjia kāiwánxiào. You are annoying, always making fun of me. src
你快给人家道歉。Nǐ kuài gěi rénjia dàoqiàn. Apologize to her now. src
你看人家多聪明！Nǐ kàn rénjia duō cōngming! Look at him! How smart he is! src

从下个月起，你别来上班了。Cóng xià gè yuè qǐ, nǐ bié lái shàngbān le. Don't bother to come to work from next month. src
从我记事起，就特别喜欢画画。Cóng wǒ jìshì qǐ, jiù tèbié xǐhuan huà huà. I like drawing since I can remember. src
从我妈妈怀孕开始，我爸爸就不抽烟了。Cóng wǒ māma huáiyùn kāishǐ, wǒ bàba jiù bù chōuyān le. My father has stopped smoking since my mother's pregnancy. src
你是不是从我包里拿了一百块钱？Nǐ shì bù shì cóng wǒ bāo lǐ ná le yī bǎi kuài qián? Did you take one hundred RMB from my purse or not? src
我从他身上学到了很多东西。Wǒ cóng tā shēnshang xuédào le hěn duō dōngxi. I learned a lot from him. src

我家离学校很远。Wǒ jiā lí xuéxiào hěn yuǎn. My home is far from my school. src

离毕业还有几个月。Lí bìyè háiyǒu jǐge yuè. I have a few months away from graduation. src
我们刚刚开始谈恋爱，离结婚还远呢。Wǒmen gānggāng kāishǐ tánliànài, lí jiéhūn hái yuǎn ne. We've just started our relationship. It's too soon to talk about marriage. src

他以后不想住在日本。Tā yǐhòu bù xiǎng zhù zài Rìběn. He doesn't want to live in Japan later. src

两个星期以后，我要回美国。Liǎng gè xīngqī yǐhòu, wǒ yào huí Měiguó. After two weeks, I'm going to return to the USA. src
老板一个小时以后回来。Lǎobǎn yī gè xiǎoshí yǐhòu huílái. The boss will come back in an hour. The boss will come back in an hour. src

他小时候住在我家附近，后来他搬家了。Tā xiǎoshíhou zhù zài wǒ jiā fùjìn, hòulái tā bānjiā le. He lived in my neighborhood when he was young. Then he moved. src
他在我们公司工作过两年，后来换工作了。Tā zài wǒmen gōngsī gōngzuò guo liǎng nián, hòulái huàn gōngzuò le. He worked for our company for two years. Then he changed his job. src

结婚以后/之后他们有了两个宝宝。Jiéhūn yǐhòu / zhīhòu tāmen yǒu le liǎng gè bǎobǎo. After getting married, they had two babies. src
等我涨工资以后/之后请你吃饭。Děng wǒ zhǎng gōngzī yǐhòu / zhīhòu qǐng nǐ chīfàn. After I get a raise, I will treat you to a meal. src
听到这个消息以后/之后，我高兴得一晚上没睡。Tīngdào zhè gè xiāoxi yǐhòu / zhīhòu, wǒ gāoxìng de yī wǎn shàng méi shuì. After I heard this news, I was so happy I couldn't sleep the whole night. src
以后再也不来这里吃饭了，又贵又难吃。Yǐhòu zài yě bù lái zhèlǐ chīfàn le, yòu guì yòu nánchī. In the future I will never come to this place to eat again. It's expensive and the food is not good. src
以后我可能会去国外上大学。Yǐhòu wǒ kěnéng huì qù guówài shàng dàxué. In the future I might go to college abroad. src
以后的事情以后再说吧。Yǐhòu de shìqing yǐhòu zài shuō bā. We'll talk about future things some time later. src
我要先回家把东西放下，之后去咖啡店找你。Wǒ yào xiān huí jiā bǎ dōngxi fàng xià, zhīhòu qù kāfēidiàn zhǎo nǐ. I'm going to go home and drop my stuff off first, then go to the cafe to look for you. src
去年夏天他来过我家，之后再也没见到他。Qùnián xiàtiān tā lái guò wǒ jiā, zhīhòu zài yě méi jiàn dào tā. Last summer, he came to my house. After that, I haven't seen him. src
房子涨价之后，越来越多的人开始买房。Fángzi zhǎngjià zhīhòu, Yuè lái Yuè duō de rén kāishǐ mǎi Fáng. After prices went up, more and more people started buying houses. src
我六点下班，之后，我去跟朋友吃饭。Wǒ liù diǎn xiàbān, zhīhòu, wǒ qù gēn péngyou chīfàn. I will get off work at six o'clock, and after that I will meet with a friend to eat dinner. src
昨天我跟朋友吃完饭以后去了酒吧。Zuótiān wǒ gēn péngyou chī wán fàn yǐhòu qù le jiǔbā. Yesterday, when my friends and I were done eating, we went to the bar. src
昨天我跟朋友去吃饭了，之后，我们去了酒吧。Zuótiān wǒ gēn péngyou qù chīfàn le, zhīhòu, wǒmen qù le jiǔbā. Yesterday I ate dinner with a friend, and afterward we went to a bar. src
我们先复习一下，然后上新课。Wǒmen xiān fùxí yīxià, ránhòu shàng xīn kè. We do some reviewing first and the started the new lesson. src
我们一会儿在楼下见，然后一起走。Wǒmen yīhuìr zài lóu xià jiàn, ránhòu yīqǐ zǒu. We'll meet downstairs and then we go together. src
宝宝醒了，哭了一会儿，然后又睡着了。Bǎobao xǐng le, kū le yīhuìr, ránhòu yòu shuìzháo le. The baby woke up. He cried for a little while and then fell asleep again. src
中国是人口最多的发展中国家，然后是印度。Zhōngguó shì rénkǒu zuì duō de fāzhǎn zhōng guójiā, ránhòu shì Yìndù. China is the biggest developing country and then it's India. src
我以后想开公司。Wǒ yǐhòu xiǎng kāi gōngsī. I want to start up my own business in the future. src
请你以后别来了。Qǐng nǐ yǐhòu bié lái le. Please stop coming in the future. src
我一个小时以后回来。Wǒ yī gè xiǎoshí yǐhòu huílái. will come back in an hour. src
毕业以后他出国了。Bìyè yǐhòu tā chūguó le. He went abroad after he graduated. src
开始大家都不同意，后来大家都同意了。Kāishǐ dàjiā dōu bù tóngyì, hòulái dàjiā dōu tóngyì le. Everyone disagreed in the beginning, but they all agreed later. src
他在我们公司干过两年，后来跳槽了。Tā zài wǒmen gōngsī gàn gàn guo liǎng nián, hòulái tiàocáo le. He worked for our company for two years. And then he jumped ship. src
这个人我看了又看，还是觉得我不认识他。Zhège rén wǒ kàn le yòu kàn, háishì juéde wǒ bù rènshi tā. I looked at him again and again, but I still think I don't know him. src
我想了又想，还是觉得不能这样做。Wǒ xiǎng le yòu xiǎng, háishì juéde bù néng zhèyàng zuò. I thought it over again and again, I think I can't do it like this. src
他找了又找，还是没找到他的钱包。Tā zhǎo le yòu zhǎo, háishì méi zhǎodào tā de qiánbāo He searched again and again, and still couldn't find his wallet. src
他想了又想，还是不同意。Tā xiǎng le yòu xiǎng, háishì bù tóngyì. He thought it over again and again, and he still disagree. src
我们问了又问，她就是不说。Wǒmen wèn le yòu wèn, tā jiùshì bù shuō. We asked again and again, but she wouldn't say it. src
他试了又试，就是打不开门。Tā shì le yòu shì, jiùshì dǎ bù kāi mén. He tried again and again, but he still couldn't open the door. src
我尝了又尝，还是觉得这些菜坏了。Wǒ cháng le yòu cháng, háishì juéde zhèxiē cài huài le. I tasted again and again, but I still think those food has gone bad. src
他闻了又闻，还是什么都没闻到。Tā wén le yòu wén, háishì shénme dōu méi wéndào. He smelled again and again, but he still didn't smell anything. src
这个方案改了又改，终于通过了。Zhège fāng'àn gǎi le yòu gǎi, zhōngyú tōngguò le. This plan was changed again and again, and finally it passed. src
这件衣服妈妈洗了又洗，终于洗干净了。Zhè jiàn yīfu māma xǐ le yòu xǐ, zhōngyú xǐ gānjìng le. Mother washed this clothing again and again, and it's finally clean. src
上个周末下雨了，我们只好待在家。Shàng gè zhōumò xiàyǔ le, wǒmen zhǐhǎo dāi zài jiā. It rained last weekend. We didn't have a choice but stay at home. src
太晚了，我只好打车回去。Tài wǎn le, wǒ zhǐhǎo dǎchē huíqù. It's too late. I had to take a taxi back home. src
别的餐厅都关门了，我们只好去吃KFC。Biéde cāntīng dōu guānmén le, wǒmen zhǐhǎo qù chī KFC. Other restaurants are all closed. We didn't have a choice but go to KFC to eat. src
我们今天没买到票，只好明天再买。Wǒmen jīntiān méi mǎidào piào, zhǐhǎo míngtiān zài mǎi. We didn't get the tickets, so we had to buy it tomorrow. src
他中午没时间去吃饭，只好叫外卖。Tā zhōngwǔ méi shíjiān qù chīfàn, zhǐhǎo jiào wàimài. He didn't have time for lunch, so he had to order food. src
他没有时间去，只好我去了。Tā méiyǒu shíjiān qù, zhǐhǎo wǒ qù le. He doesn't have time to go. So I have to go. src
爸爸的话他总是不听，只好妈妈去跟他说。Bàba de huà tā zǒngshì bù tīng, zhǐhǎo māma qù gēn tā shuō. He always doesn't listen to what his father said. It has to be his mother who'll talk to him. src
我们都要上班，只好女儿自己去。Wǒmen dōu yào shàngbān, zhǐhǎo nǚ’ér zìjǐ qù. We all need to go to work. Our daughter has to go by herself. src
老板不在，只好你来见这个新客户了。Lǎobǎn bù zài, zhǐhǎo nǐ lái jiàn zhège xīn kèhù le. The boss isn't here. It has to be you to meet this new client for him. src
爸妈今天不在家，只好我来照顾妹妹了。Bà mā jīntiān bù zài jiā, zhǐhǎo wǒ lái zhàogu mèimei le. My parents are not home today. It has to be me who looks after my little sister. src
我差点儿没想起来。Wǒ chàdiǎnr méi xiǎng qǐlái. I almost forgot it. src
我差点没赶上火车。Wǒ chàdiǎn méi gǎnshàng huǒchē. I didn't miss the train. src
他差点没通过考试。Tā chàdiǎn méi tōngguò kǎoshì. He barely passed the examination. src
排队的人太多了，差点儿没买到。Páiduì de rén tài duō le, chàdiǎnr méi mǎidào. The waiting line is too long. I almost didn't get it. src
我会尽量想办法帮你的。Wǒ huì jǐnliàng xiǎng bànfǎ bāng nǐ de. I will try my best to figure out something to help you. src
你看书吧，我尽量不打扰你。Nǐ kànshū ba, wǒ jǐnliàng bù dǎrǎo nǐ. Go ahead and study, I'll do my best to not disturb you. src
父母应该尽量多陪陪孩子。Fùmǔ yīnggāi jǐnliàng duō péi péi háizi. Parents should do as much as possible to be with the children. src
你是哥哥，要尽量照顾好妹妹。Nǐ shì gēge, yào jǐnliàng zhàogù hǎo mèimei . You are the big brother and you should try your best to take good care of you little sister. src
我们要尽量避免问这种问题，有的客户会感觉很不舒服。Wǒmen yào jǐnliàng bìmiǎn wèn zhè zhǒng wèntí, yǒude kèhù huì hěn bù shūfu de. We should avoid asking this kind of questions, which could make some clients very uncomfortable. src
我感冒的时候一般不吃药，但是这次很严重，我不得不吃药。Wǒ gǎnmào de shíhou yībān bù chīyào, dànshì zhè cì hěn yánzhòng, wǒ bùdébù chī yào. I usually don't take medicine when I have cold. But it's very bad this time, and I have to take some pills. src
你真的太厉害了，我不得不承认。Nǐ zhēnde tài lìhai le, wǒ bùdébù chéngrèn. You are so good. I have to admit it. src
老板很讨厌应酬，可是她不得不去。Lǎobǎn hěn tǎoyàn yìngchou, kěshì tā bùdébù qù. The boss doesn't like to business socializing, but she has to go. src
不好意思，时间有限，我不得不打断你。Bù hǎoyìsi, shíjiān yǒuxiàn, wǒ bùdébù dǎduàn nǐ. I'm sorry. We have very limited time. I have to interrupt you. src
这些情况很重要，我们不得不重视。Zhèxiē qíngkuàng hěn zhòngyào wǒmen bùdébù zhòngshì. The situation is very important. We have to take it very seriously. src
几乎每个人都有手机。Jīhū měi gè rén dōu yǒu shǒujī. Almost everyone has a cell phone. src
在我们公司，几乎每个人都会说英文。Zài wǒmen gōngsī, jīhū měi gè rén dōu huì shuō Yīngwén. In our company, almost everyone can speak English. src
在中国，几乎所有老外都会说"你好"。Zài Zhōngguó, jīhū suǒyǒu lǎowài dōu huì shuō "nǐhǎo." In China, almost all of the foreigners can say "hello" in Chinese. src
几乎所有人都相信他。Jīhū suǒyǒu rén dōu xiāngxìn tā. Almost everyone believes what he said. src
几乎全世界的观众都喜欢这部电影。Jīhū quán shìjiè de guānzhòng dōu xǐhuan zhè bù diànyǐng. Almost all the audience in the world like this movie. src
爸爸的头发几乎白了。Bàba de tóufa jīhū bái le. Dad's hair is almost all white. src
这次旅行，他们几乎花了所有的钱。Zhè cì lǚxíng tāmen jīhū huā le suǒyǒu de qián. They spent almost all the money on this trip. src
他一个人几乎吃了一整个蛋糕。Tā yī gèrén jīhū chī le yī zhěng gè dàngāo. He almost ate this whole cake by himself. src
我老板几乎不喝酒。Wǒmen jiā rén jīhū dōu bù hējiǔ. Almost all our family doesn't drink. src
老板这几个月几乎没好好休息过。Lǎobǎn zhè jǐ gè yuè jīhū méi hǎohǎo xiūxi guò. The boss barely has taken any good rest for the recent few months. src
我再也不想看到你了！Wǒ zài yě bù xiǎng kàndào nǐ le! I never want to see you again! src
我再也不想跟你说话了。Wǒ zài yě bù xiǎng gēn nǐ shuōhuà le. I don't want to talk with you ever again. src
我们再也不会相信你了！Wǒmen zài yě bù huì xiāngxìn tā le! We're not going to believe you ever again! src
医生说她再也不能跳舞了。Yīshēng shuō tā zài yě bù néng tiàowǔ le. The doctor said she can never be able to dance again. src
我再也不要离开你了。Wǒ zàiyě bù yào líkāi nǐ le. I'm not going to leave you ever again. src
从那以后，我再也没去过酒吧。Cóng nà yǐhòu, wǒ zài yě méi qù guo jiǔbā. I've never been to the bar again since then. src
出国以后，我再也没吃过地道的中国菜。Chūguó yǐhòu, wǒ zài yě méi chī guo dìdào de Zhōngguó cài. I've never eaten any authentic Chinese food ever since I left the country. src
分手以后，他们再也没见过。Fēnshǒu yǐhòu, tāmen zài yě méi jiàn guo. They haven't seen each other ever since they broke up. src
毕业以后，她再也没花过父母的钱。Bìyè yǐhòu, tā zài yě méi huā guo fùmǔ de qián. She has never spent her parents' money after she graduated. src
考完试以后，我再也没碰过那些书。Kǎo wán shì yǐhòu, wǒ zàiyě méi pèng guo nàxiē shū. I haven't touched those books after I took the exam. src
你去买早饭的时候顺便帮我带杯咖啡吧。Nǐ chūqù de shíhou shùnbiàn bāng wǒ dài bēi kāfēi ba. Bring me a cup of coffee when you go to buy breakfast. src
你去超市能不能顺便帮我买一瓶牛奶？Nǐ qù chāoshì néng bu néng shùnbiàn bāng wǒ mǎi yī píng niúnǎi? Could you please buy me a bottle of milk when you go to the supermarket? src
老板去见客户，顺便吃了午饭。Lǎobǎn qù jiàn kèhù, shùnbiàn chī le wǔfàn. The boss went to see the client and also eat lunch with him. src
我下周去北京出差，顺便去看一个朋友。Wǒ xià zhōu qù Běijīng chūchāi, shùnbiàn qù kàn yīgè péngyou. I'm going to Beijing on a business trip next week. I'll go to visit a friend while I'm there. src
我出门的时候都会顺便扔垃圾。Wǒ chūmén de shíhou dōu huì shùnbiàn rēng lājī. I take out the trash every time I leave the house. src
你见他的时候顺便问一下他周末来不来。Nǐ jiàn tā de shíhou shùnbiàn wèn yīxià tā zhōumò lái bu lái. Ask him if he's coming this weekend when you meet him. src
顺便说一下，我最近搬家了。Shùnbiàn huō yīxià, wǒ zuìjìn bān jiā le. By the way, I moved lately. src
顺便问一下，你下周什么时候回来？Shùnbiàn wèn yīxià, nǐ xià zhōu shénme shíhou huílái? By the way, when are you coming back next weekend? src
顺便说一下，电脑已经修好了。Shùnbiàn huō yīxià, diànnǎo yǐjīng xiū hǎo le. By the way, the computer's been fixed. src
明天我很忙，恐怕没有时间。Míngtiān wǒ hěn máng, kǒngpà méiyǒu shíjiān. I'm busy tomorrow, I'm afraid I don't have time. src
已经很晚了，恐怕他不会来了。Yǐjīng hěn wǎn le, kǒngpà tā bù huì lái le. It's already very late. I'm afraid he's not coming. src
这样做恐怕不行。Zhèyàng zuò kǒngpà bù xíng. I'm afraid it doesn't work this way. src
工作太多了，恐怕今天做不完。Gōngzuò tài duō le, kǒngpà jīntiān zuò bù wán. There's too much work. I'm afraid I can't finish it all today. src
饭太多了，恐怕我吃不完。Fàn tài duō le, kǒngpà wǒ chī bù wán. Rice is too much. I'm afraid I can't eat it all. src
恐怕我今天没有时间做作业。Kǒngpà wǒ jīntiān méiyóu shíjiān zuò zuòyè. I'm afraid today I don't have time to do homework. src
我老家空气还不错，PM2.5一般在五十以下。Wǒ lǎojiā kōngqì hái bùcuò, PM2.5 yībān zài wǔshí yǐxià. The air in my hometown is good. PM 2.5 is generally under 50. src
我们需要有两年以上工作经验的人。Wǒmen xūyào yǒu liǎng nián yǐshàng gōngzuò jīngyàn de rén. We need people with two years of working experience or more. src
十岁以下的孩子不用买票。Shí suì yǐxià de háizi bùyòng mǎi piào. Children under the age of 10 do not need to buy tickets. src
我们出差都住三星级以上的酒店。Wǒmen chūchāi dōu zhù sān xīngjí yǐshàng de jiǔdiàn. When we go on business trips, we stay at hotels with at least a 3-star rating. src
这里的冬天气温都在零度以下。Zhèlǐ de dōngtiān qìwēn dōu zài língdù yǐxià. This winter, the temperature has been less than 0 degrees. src
以下就谈谈这个问题应该怎么解决。Yǐxià jiù tántán zhège wèntí yīnggāi zěnme jiějué. In the following conversation, we will discuss how we should resolve this problem. src
以上只是我个人的看法。Yǐshàng zhī shì wǒ gèrén de kànfǎ. The following is just my personal opinion. src
两天以内必须完成。Liǎng tiān yǐnèi bìxū wánchéng. Must be completed in two days or less. src
半小时以内能送到吗？Bàn xiǎoshí yǐnèi néng sòngdào ma? Can you deliver in 30 minutes or less? src
这个大楼50米以内不能停车。Zhège dàlóu wǔshí mǐ yǐnèi bù néng tíng chē. You cannot park within 50 meters of this building. src
请你站在两米以外的地方。Qǐng nǐ zhàn zài liǎng mǐ yǐwài de dìfang. Can you stop 2 meters outside of this place? src
这个区以外的几个区都不太发达。Zhège qū yǐwài de jǐ gè qū dōu bù tài fādá. All of the areas outside this one are not very developed. src
除了三四年级的学生以外，五年级的学生也可以参加。Chúle sān sì niánjí de xuéshēng yǐwài, wǔ niánjí de xuéshēng yě kěyǐ cānjiā. Aside from the students in Grade Three and Grade Four, students in Grade Five can also participate. src
大熊猫嘛，大家都喜欢。Dà xióngmāo ma, dàjiā dōu xǐhuan. Pandas. Everybody likes them. src
名牌嘛，一定不便宜。Míngpái ma, yīdìng bù piányi. Brandname. It can't be cheap. src
第一次嘛，以后就会了。Dì-yī cì ma, yǐhòu jiù huì le. First time. You'll learn soon. src
孩子嘛，不懂这些很正常。Háizi ma, bù dǒng zhèxiē hěn zhèngcháng. Kids. It's common that they don't understand these things . src
老板请客嘛，当然要大方。Lǎobǎn qǐngkè ma, dāngrán yào dàfang. The boss is buying. Of course I need to be generous. src
万一我父母不同意呢？Wànyī wǒ fùmǔ bù tóngyì ne? What if my parents disapprove? src
万一被发现了怎么办？Wànyī bèi fāxiàn le zěnme bàn? What if we get caught? src
带着伞吧，万一下雨呢？Dài zhe sǎn ba, wàn yī xiàyǔ ne? Take an umbrella. What if it rains? src
你先打电话问问。他万一不在呢？Nǐ xiān dǎ diànhuà wènwen. Tā wànyī bù zài ne? You should call first. What if he's not there? src
开慢点！万一撞到人怎么办？Kāi màn diǎn! Wànyī zhuàngdào rén zěnme bàn? Drive slowly! What if you hit someone? src
万一他不喜欢，你可以来换。Wànyī tā bù xǐhuan, nǐ kěyǐ lái huàn. If he doesn't like it, you can come to make an exchange. src
我要记下来，万一忘了，可以查。Wǒ yào jì xiàlái, wànyī wàng le, kěyǐ chá. I need to write it down. In case I forget, I can look it up. src
万一迷路了，就用地图导航。Wànyī mílù le, jiù yòng dìtú dǎoháng. In case you get lost, use the map's GPS navigation. src
万一发生这种情况，马上报警。Wànyī fāshēng zhè zhǒng qíngkuàng, mǎshàng bàojǐng. In the unlikely event that this happens, call the police immediately. src
北京现在特别冷，多带几件衣服，以防万一。Běijīng xiànzài tèbié lěng, duō dài jǐ jiàn yīfu, yǐ fáng wànyī. It's especially cold now in Beijing. You should bring a few more pieces of clothing, just in case. src
多带点现金吧，以防万一。Duō dài diǎn xiànjīn ba, yǐ fáng wànyī. Take more cash, just in case. src
多买点吧，以防万一。Duō mǎi diǎn ba, yǐ fáng wànyī. We should buy some more, just in case. src
只要下雨，她就会心情不好。Zhǐyào xiàyǔ, tā jiù huì xīnqíng bù hǎo. As long as it's raining, she will be in a bad mood. src
只要有你在，我就放心了。Zhǐyào yǒu nǐ zài, wǒ jiù fàngxīn le. As long as you are here, I won't be worried. src
只要你努力学习，就会有进步。Zhǐyào nǐ nǔlì xuéxí, jiù huì yǒu jìnbù. As long as you study hard, you'll make progress. src
只要你真的喜欢，我就给你买。Zhǐyào nǐ zhēnde xǐhuan, wǒ jiù gěi nǐ mǎi. As long as you really like it, I will buy it for you. src
只要不堵车，我们就能准时到。Zhǐyào bù dǔchē, wǒmen jiù néng zhǔnshí dào. As long as there won't be traffic jam, we can be there on time. src
只要你不生气，我就告诉你。Zhǐyào nǐ bù shēngqì, wǒ jiù gàosu nǐ. As long as you won't get mad, I'll tell you. src
只要你的要求是合理的，我们就可以考虑。Zhǐyào nǐ de yāoqiú shì hélǐ de, wǒmen jiù kěyǐ kǎolǜ. As long as your requirements are reasonable, we will considerate then. src
这是我们俩的秘密，跟任何人都不要说。Zhè shì wǒmen liǎ de mìmì, gēn rènhé rén dōu bùyào shuō. This is our secret. Don't tell it to anyone. src
我父母不让我参加任何校外的活动。Wǒ fùmǔ bù ràng wǒ cānjiā rènhé xiàowài de huódòng. My parents won't let me participate in any school activity. src
这么多年过去了，他还是没有任何变化。Zhème duō nián guòqù le, tā háishì méiyǒu rènhé biànhuà. So many years have passed, and he hasn't changed a bit. src
这种情况在任何时候都不能发生。Zhè zhǒng qíngkuàng zài rènhé shíhou dōu bù néng fāshēng. You can't let this kind of thing happen in any circumstance. src
我们老板人很好，你有任何想法都可以跟他说。Wǒmen lǎobǎn rén hěn hǎo, nǐ yǒu rènhé xiǎngfǎ dōu kěyǐ gēn tā shuō. Our boss is a very good person. Any thoughts you have you can discuss with him. src
我先走了，有任何需要给我打电话吧。Wǒ xiān zǒu le, yǒu rènhé xūyào gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà bā. I'm leaving now. Call me if you need anything. src
这里买不到进口食品。Zhèlǐ mǎi bu dào jìnkǒu shípǐn. You can't buy imported good here. src
我们今天学了很多生词。Wǒmen jīntiān xué le hěn duō shēngcí. Today we learned many new words. src
不知道什么时候能拿到我的工作签证。Bù zhīdào shénme shíhou néng ná dào wǒ de gōngzuò qiānzhèng. I'm not sure when I'll be able to get my work visa. src
如果他拿不到绿卡，我就跟他分手。Rúguǒ tā ná bu dào lǜkǎ, wǒ jiù gēn tā fēnshǒu. If he can't get a green card, I will break up with him. src
我们都没想到他这么生气。Wǒmen dōu méi xiǎngdào tā zhème shēngqì. None of us thought that he would be so mad. src
我们刚刚了解到一些新的消息。Wǒmen gānggāng liǎojiědào yīxiē xīn de xī. We just understood the new information. src
从他那里，我了解到了真相。Cóng tā nàlǐ, wǒ liǎojiědào le . I learned the truth from him. src
你知道他的联系方式吗？Nǐ zhīdào tā de liánxì fāngshì ma? Do you have his contact information? src
我想跟你联系，但是一直联系不到你。Wǒ xiǎng gēn nǐ liánxì, dànshì yīzhí liánxì bu dào nǐ. I always wanted to get in touch with you, but hasn't got a hold of you. src
他越跑越快。Tā yuè pǎo yuè kuài. The more he runs, the faster he gets. src
雨越下越大。Yǔ yuè xià yuè dà. The more it rains, the heavier the rain gets. src
我们越说越高兴。Wǒmen yuè shuō yuè gāoxìng. The more we talk, the happier we are. src
她越想越生气。Tā yuè xiǎng yuè shēngqì. The more she thinks about it, the angrier she gets. src
我越看越喜欢。Wǒ yuè kàn yuè xǐhuan. The more I look at it, the more I like it. src
她越说，我越生气。Tā yuè shuō, wǒ yuè shēngqì. The more she talks, the angrier I get. src
你们越看我，我越紧张。Nǐmen yuè kàn wǒ, wǒ yuè jǐnzhāng. The more you look at me, the more nervous I am. src
我越走，腿越痛。Wǒ yuè zǒu, tuǐ yuè tòng. The more I walk, the more my legs hurt. src
他越问，我越不想说。Tā yuè wèn, wǒ yuè bù xiǎng shuō. The more he asks, the less I want to talk. src
你越逼他，他越讨厌你。Nǐ yuè bī tā, tā yuè tǎoyàn nǐ . The more you push him, the more he hates you. src
我越看越想看。Wǒ yuè kàn yuè xiǎng kàn. The more I watch it, the more I want to watch. src
你会越吃越想吃。Nǐ huì yuè chī yuè xiǎng chī. The more you eat it, the more you will want to eat. src
这种花的味道让人越闻越想闻。Zhè zhǒng huā de wèidào ràng rén yuè wén yuè xiǎng wén. The more you smell this kind of flower, the more you want to smell it. src
不要给孩子喝这种饮料，他们会越喝越想喝。Bùyào gěi háizi hē zhè zhǒng yǐnliào tāmen huì yuè hē yuè xiǎng hē. Don't give this kind of drink to kids. The more they drink it, the more they want to drink it. src
我吃了这个药以后总是想睡觉，而且越睡越想睡。Chī le zhège yào yǐhòu, wǒ zǒngshì hěn xiǎng shuìjiào, érqiě yuè shuì yuè xiǎng shuì. I'm always so sleepy after taking this medicine. And also, the more I sleep, the more l want to sleep. src
朋友？这个人我连见都没见过。Péngyou? Zhège rén wǒ lián jiàn dōu méi jiàn guo. Friends? I've never seen this person. src
你怎么连问都不问就拿别人的东西？Nǐ zěnme lián wèn dōu bù wèn jiù ná biérén de dōngxi? Why are you taking other people's stuff without even asking? src
他连说都不说就走了。Tā lián shuō dōu bù shuō jiù zǒu le. He just left without even telling. src
你们连尝都没尝就说不好吃？Nǐmen lián cháng dōu méi cháng jiù shuō bù hǎochī? You guys didn't even taste it at all and you say it's not tasty? src
两年前，他连一句中文都不会说。Liǎng nián qián, tā lián yī jù Zhōngwén dōu bù huì shuō. He couldn't even say a sentence in Chinese two years ago. src
他连一套西服都没有？Tā lián yī tào xīfú dōu méiyǒu? He doesn't even have one suit? src
我们连一次都没见过。Wǒmen lián yī cì dōu méi jiàn guo. We haven't even met once. src
对于这个问题，我没有意见。Duìyú zhège wèntí, wǒ méiyǒu yìjiàn. As for this problem, I don't have any ideas. src
关于这个问题，我没有意见。Guānyú zhège wèntí, wǒ méiyǒu yìjiàn. As for this problem, I don't have any ideas. src
这样穿显得我比较成熟。Zhèyàng chuān xiǎnde wǒ bǐjiào chéngshú. Dressing like this makes me look more mature. src
那样吃显得你很没礼貌。Nàyàng chī xiǎnde nǐ hěn méi lǐmào. Eating like that makes you look not very polite. src
这么做会显得你很小气。Zhème zuò huì xiǎnde nǐ hěn xiǎoqì. Doing it like this makes you seem stingy. src
那样说显得她很笨。Nàyàng shuō xiǎnde tā hěn bèn. Talking like that makes her look stupid. src
这种颜色的衣服显得你的脸色不好看。Zhè zhǒng yánsè de yīfu xiǎnde nǐ de liǎnsè bù hǎokàn. This color of clothing doesn't go well with your complexion. src
你今天看起来很高兴。Nǐ jīntiān kànqǐlái hěn gāoxìng. You seem very happy today. src
这个餐厅看起来不错，我们可以试试。Zhège cāntīng kànqǐlái bùcuò, wǒmen kěyǐ shìshi. This restaurant doesn't seem too bad, let's try it out. src
她看起来有点生气。Tā kànqǐlái yǒu diǎn shēngqì. She seems a little angry. src
你的衣服看起来挺贵的。Nǐ de yīfu kànqǐlái tǐng guì de. Your clothes seems expensive to me. src
你女朋友看起来像我的中文老师。Nǐ nǚpéngyou kànqǐlái xiàng wǒ de Zhōngwén lǎoshī. Your girlfriend seems like my Chinese teacher. src
A:你今天看起来很苗条。 B:可能是这件衣服显得我很苗条。A- : Nǐ jīntiān kànqǐlái hěn miáotiáo. B: Kěnéng shì zhè jiàn yīfu xiǎnde wǒ hěn miáotiáo. You seem very slim today.<br />It's probably these clothes that makes me seem that way. src
B:可能是这件衣服显得我很苗条。B: Kěnéng shì zhè jiàn yīfu xiǎnde wǒ hěn miáotiáo. It's probably these clothes that makes me seem that way. src
昨天有人来找你来着。Zuótiān yǒu rén zhǎo nǐ láizhe. There was someone looking for you yesterday. src
那本书昨天还在这儿来着，今天怎么找不到了？Nà běn shū zuótiān hái zài zhèr láizhe, jīntiān zěnme zhǎo bùdào le? That book was here yesterday. Why can't I find it today? src
他叫什么来着？Tā jiào shénme láizhe? What was his name again? src
那首歌是谁唱的来着？Nà shǒu gē shì shéi chàng de láizhe? Who sang that song again? src
我们上次说周末去哪儿玩来着？Wǒmen shàng cì shuō zhōumò qù nǎr wán láizhe? Where is it that we said we are going to this weekend? src
我说什么来着！你一吃火锅就拉肚子！Wǒ shuō shénme láizhe! Nǐ yī chī huǒguō jiù lā dùzi! I told you so! You have a diarrhea every time you eat hotpot! src
我说什么来着！这个东西肯定是假的！Wǒ shuō shénme láizhe! Zhège dōngxi kěndìng shì jiǎde! I told you so! This thing must be fake! src
我说什么来着！他不是真的喜欢你！Wǒ shuō shénme láizhe! Tā bù shì zhēn de xǐhuan nǐ! I told you so! He is not really into you! src
我说什么来着！他们会回来的。Wǒ shuō shénme láizhe! Tāmen huì huílái de. I told you so! They would come back. src
我说什么来着！你婆婆肯定会给你一个红包！Wǒ shuō shénme láizhe! Nǐ pópo kěndìng huì gěi nǐ yī gè hóngbāo! I told you so! Your mother-in-law would definitely give you a red packet! src
去年夏天他来过我家，之后再也没见过他。Qùnián xiàtiān tā lái guò wǒ jiā, zhīhòu zài yě méi jiàn guo tā. Last summer, he came to my house. After that, I haven't seen him. src
